001package com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Libraries;
002import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.core.interfaces.*;
003import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.core.exceptions.*;
004import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.core.*;
005import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.core.CMClass.CMObjectType;
006import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.core.CMProps.Str;
007import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.core.CMSecurity.SecGroup;
008import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.core.collections.*;
009import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Libraries.interfaces.*;
010import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Libraries.interfaces.GenericEditor.CMEval;
011import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Libraries.interfaces.ListingLibrary.ListStringer;
012import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Libraries.interfaces.MoneyLibrary.MoneyDenomination;
013import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Abilities.interfaces.*;
014import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Areas.interfaces.*;
015import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Behaviors.interfaces.*;
016import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.CharClasses.interfaces.*;
017import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Commands.interfaces.*;
018import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Common.interfaces.*;
019import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Common.interfaces.Clan.MemberRecord;
020import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Exits.interfaces.*;
021import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Items.interfaces.*;
022import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Items.interfaces.ClanItem.ClanItemType;
023import com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Items.interfaces.MusicalInstrument.InstrumentType;

050public class CMGenEditor extends StdLibrary implements GenericEditor
051{
052        @Override
053        public String ID()
054        {
055                return "CMGenEditor";
056        }
057
058        private final long maxLength=Long.MAX_VALUE;
059        // showNumber should always be a valid number no less than 1
060        // showFlag should be a valid number for editing, or -1 for skipping
061
062        private static CMEval CMEVAL_INSTANCE = new CMEval()
063        {
064                @Override
065                public Object eval(final Object val, final Object[] choices, final boolean emptyOK) throws CMException
066                {
067                        if(choices.length==0)
068                                return "";
069                        final String str=val.toString().trim();
070                        for(final Object o : choices)
071                        {
072                                if(str.equalsIgnoreCase(o.toString()))
073                                        return o.toString();
074                        }
075                        throw new CMException("That was not one of your choices.");
076                }
077        };
078
079        @Override
080        public void promptStatInt(final MOB mob, final Modifiable E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String field) throws IOException
081        {
082                promptStatInt(mob, E, null, showNumber, showFlag, fieldDisplayStr, field);
083        }
084
085        @Override
086        public void promptStatInt(final MOB mob, final Modifiable E, final String help, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String field) throws IOException
087        {
088                E.setStat(field, "" + prompt(mob, CMath.s_long(E.getStat(field)), showNumber, showFlag, fieldDisplayStr, help));
089        }
090
091        @Override
092        public void promptStatBool(final MOB mob, final Modifiable E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String field) throws IOException
093        {
094                promptStatBool(mob, E, null, showNumber, showFlag, fieldDisplayStr, field);
095        }
096
097        @Override
098        public void promptStatBool(final MOB mob, final Modifiable E, final String help, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String field) throws IOException
099        {
100                E.setStat(field, "" + prompt(mob, CMath.s_bool(E.getStat(field)), showNumber, showFlag, fieldDisplayStr, help));
101        }
102
103        @Override
104        public void promptStatStr(final MOB mob, final Modifiable E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String field) throws IOException
105        {
106                promptStatStr(mob, E, null, showNumber, showFlag, fieldDisplayStr, field, true);
107        }
108
109        @Override
110        public void promptStatStr(final MOB mob, final Modifiable E, final String help, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String field, final boolean emptyOK) throws IOException
111        {
112                E.setStat(field, prompt(mob, E.getStat(field), showNumber, showFlag, fieldDisplayStr, emptyOK, false, help, null, null));
113        }
114
115        public void promptRawStatStr(final MOB mob, final Modifiable E, final String help, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String field, final boolean emptyOK) throws IOException
116        {
117                E.setStat(field, prompt(mob, E.getStat(field), showNumber, showFlag, fieldDisplayStr, emptyOK, true, help, null, null));
118        }
119
120        public void promptStatStr(final MOB mob, final Modifiable E, final String help, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String field, final int maxChars) throws IOException
121        {
122                E.setStat(field, prompt(mob, E.getStat(field), showNumber, showFlag, fieldDisplayStr, false, false, maxChars, help, null, null));
123        }
124
125        @Override
126        public void promptStatChoices(final MOB mob, final Modifiable E, final String help, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String field, final Object[] choices) throws IOException
127        {
128                E.setStat(field, prompt(mob, E.getStat(field), showNumber, showFlag, fieldDisplayStr, false, false, help, CMEVAL_INSTANCE, choices));
129        }
130
131        @Override
132        public void promptStatCommaChoices(final MOB mob, final Modifiable E, final String help, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String field, final Object[] choices) throws IOException
133        {
134                E.setStat(field, this.promptCommaList(mob, E.getStat(field), showNumber, showFlag, fieldDisplayStr, help, CMEVAL_INSTANCE, choices));
135        }

137        @Override
138        public String prompt(final MOB mob, final String oldVal, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr) throws IOException
139        {
140                return prompt(mob, oldVal, showNumber, showFlag, fieldDisplayStr, false, false, null, null, null);
141        }

144        public String prompt(final MOB mob, final String oldVal, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String help) throws IOException
145        {
146                return prompt(mob, oldVal, showNumber, showFlag, fieldDisplayStr, false, false, help, null, null);
147        }

150        public String prompt(final MOB mob, final String oldVal, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final boolean emptyOK) throws IOException
151        {
152                return prompt(mob, oldVal, showNumber, showFlag, fieldDisplayStr, emptyOK, false, null, null, null);
153        }

157        {
158                return prompt(mob, oldVal, showNumber, showFlag, fieldDisplayStr, emptyOK, false, help);
159        }

161        @Override
162        public String prompt(final MOB mob, final String oldVal, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final boolean emptyOK, final boolean rawPrint) throws IOException
163        {
164                return prompt(mob, oldVal, showNumber, showFlag, fieldDisplayStr, emptyOK, rawPrint, null, null, null);
165        }

167        @Override
168        public String prompt(final MOB mob, final String oldVal, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final boolean emptyOK, final boolean rawPrint, final String help) throws IOException
169        {
170                return prompt(mob, oldVal, showNumber, showFlag, fieldDisplayStr, emptyOK, rawPrint, help, null, null);
171        }

173        @Override
174        public boolean prompt(final MOB mob, final boolean oldVal, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr) throws IOException
175        {
176                return prompt(mob, oldVal, showNumber, showFlag, fieldDisplayStr, null);
177        }

180        public double prompt(final MOB mob, final double oldVal, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr) throws IOException
181        {
182                return prompt(mob, oldVal, showNumber, showFlag, fieldDisplayStr, null);
183        }

185        @Override
186        public int prompt(final MOB mob, final int oldVal, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr) throws IOException
187        {
188                return prompt(mob, oldVal, showNumber, showFlag, fieldDisplayStr, null);
189        }
190
191        @Override
192        public long prompt(final MOB mob, final long oldVal, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr) throws IOException
193        {
194                return prompt(mob, oldVal, showNumber, showFlag, fieldDisplayStr, null);
195        }
196
197        @Override
198        public boolean promptToggle(final MOB mob, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr)
199                throws IOException
200        {
201                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
202                        return false;
203                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+fieldDisplayStr);
204                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
205                        return false;
206                if(showFlag!=showNumber)
207                        return mob.session().confirm(L("Toggle (y/N)?"),"N");
208                return true;
209        }
210
211        public String promptCommaList(final MOB mob,
212                                                                  String oldVal,
213                                                                  final int showNumber,
214                                                                  final int showFlag,
215                                                                  final String fieldDisplayStr,
216                                                                  final String help,
217                                                                  final CMEval eval,
218                                                                  final Object[] choices) throws IOException
219        {
220                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
221                        return oldVal;
222                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+fieldDisplayStr+": '"+oldVal+"'.");
223                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
224                        return oldVal;
225                String newName="?";
226                final String promptStr=L("Enter a value to add/remove@x1\n\r:",(help!=null?" (?)":""));
227                final String oldOldVal=oldVal;
228                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
229                {
230                        newName=mob.session().prompt(promptStr,"");
231                        if(newName.equals("?")&&(help!=null))
232                                mob.tell(help);
233                        else
234                        if(newName.trim().length()==0)
235                        {
236                                if(oldVal.equals(oldOldVal))
237                                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
238                                return oldVal;
239                        }
240                        else
241                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("null"))
242                                oldVal="";
243                        else
244                        {
245                                if(eval!=null)
246                                try
247                                {
248                                        final Object value=eval.eval(newName,choices,false);
249                                        if(value instanceof String)
250                                                newName=(String)value;
251                                }
252                                catch(final CMException e)
253                                {
254                                        mob.tell(e.getMessage());
255                                        continue;
256                                }
257                                final List<String> curSet=CMParms.parseCommas(oldVal,true);
258                                String oldOne=null;
259                                for(final String c : curSet)
260                                {
261                                        if(c.equalsIgnoreCase(newName))
262                                                oldOne=c;
263                                }
264                                if(oldOne!=null)
265                                {
266                                        curSet.remove(oldOne);
267                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' removed.",oldOne));
268                                }
269                                else
270                                {
271                                        curSet.add(newName);
272                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' added.",newName));
273                                }
274                                oldVal=CMParms.toListString(curSet);
275                        }
276                }
277                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
278                return oldVal;
279        }
280
281        @Override
282        public String prompt(final MOB mob,
283                                                final String oldVal,
284                                                final int showNumber,
285                                                final int showFlag,
286                                                final String fieldDisplayStr,
287                                                final boolean emptyOK,
288                                                final boolean rawPrint,
289                                                final String help,
290                                                final CMEval eval,
291                                                final Object[] choices)
292        throws IOException
293        {
294                return prompt(mob,oldVal,showNumber,showFlag,fieldDisplayStr,emptyOK,rawPrint,0,help,eval,choices);
295        }
296
297        @Override
298        public String prompt(final MOB mob,
299                                                 final String oldVal,
300                                                 final int showNumber,
301                                                 final int showFlag,
302                                                 final String fieldDisp,
303                                                 final boolean emptyOK,
304                                                 final boolean rawPrint,
305                                                 final int maxChars,
306                                                 final String help,
307                                                 final CMEval eval,
308                                                 final Object[] choices)
309        throws IOException
310        {
311                if((mob==null)||(mob.session() == null))
312                        return oldVal;
313                final Session sess=mob.session();
314                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
315                        return oldVal;
316                String showVal=oldVal;
317                if((maxChars > 0)&&(showVal.length()>maxChars)&& (!((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))))
318                        showVal=showVal.substring(0,maxChars)+"...";
319                if(rawPrint)
320                {
321                        if((showFlag==showNumber)||(showFlag<=-999))
322                        {
323                                sess.sendGMCPEvent("Siplet.Input", "{\"title\":\""+MiniJSON.toJSONString(fieldDisp)+"\",\"text\":\""+MiniJSON.toJSONString(oldVal)+"\"}");
324                                sess.safeRawPrintln(showNumber+". "+fieldDisp+": '"+showVal+"'.");
325                        }
326                        else
327                                sess.safeRawPrintln(showNumber+". "+fieldDisp+": '"+showVal+"'.");
328                }
329                else
330                        mob.tell(showNumber+". "+fieldDisp+": '"+showVal+"'.");
331                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
332                        return oldVal;
333                String newName="?";
334                final boolean mcp =sess.isAllowedMcp("dns-org-mud-moo-simpleedit", (float)1.0);
335                final String promptStr=L("Enter a new value@x1@x2@x3\n\r:",(emptyOK?" (or NULL)":""),(mcp?" (or \\#$#)":""),(help!=null?" (?)":""));
336                while(newName.equals("?")&&(mob.session()!=null)&&(!sess.isStopped()))
337                {
338                        newName=sess.prompt(promptStr,"");
339                        if(mcp && newName.equals("\\#$#"))
340                        {
341                                final int tag=Math.abs(new Random(System.currentTimeMillis()).nextInt());
342                                sess.sendMcpCommand("dns-org-mud-moo-simpleedit-content",
343                                                " reference: #64.name name: Data type: string content*: \"\" _data-tag: "+tag);
344                                final List<String> strs = Resources.getFileLineVector(new StringBuffer(oldVal));
345                                for(final String s : strs)
346                                        sess.rawPrintln("#$#* "+tag+" content: "+s);
347                                sess.rawPrintln("#$#: "+tag);
348                                newName = "?";
349                        }
350                        else
351                        if(newName.equals("?")&&((help!=null)||((choices!=null)&&(choices.length>0))))
352                        {
353                                if(help!=null)
354                                        mob.tell(help);
355                                else
356                                        mob.tell(L("You choices are: @x1",CMParms.toListString(choices)));
357                        }
358                        else
359                        {
360                                final boolean noEntry=(newName.trim().length()==0);
361                                if(noEntry)
362                                        newName=oldVal;
363                                else
364                                if((newName.equalsIgnoreCase("null"))&&(emptyOK))
365                                        newName="";
366
367                                if(eval!=null)
368                                try
369                                {
370                                        final Object value=eval.eval(newName,choices,emptyOK);
371                                        if(value instanceof String)
372                                                newName=(String)value;
373                                }
374                                catch(final CMException e)
375                                {
376                                        mob.tell(e.getMessage());
377                                        mob.tell(L("You choices are: @x1",CMParms.toListString(choices)));
378                                        newName="?";
379                                        continue;
380                                }
381                                if((noEntry)&&(newName.equals(oldVal)))
382                                        break;
383                                return newName;
384                        }
385                }
386                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
387                return oldVal;
388        }
389
390        @Override
391        public boolean prompt(final MOB mob, final boolean oldVal, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String help)
392        throws IOException
393        {
394                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
395                        return oldVal;
396                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+fieldDisplayStr+": '"+oldVal+"'.");
397                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
398                        return oldVal;
399                String newName="?";
400                while(newName.equals("?")&&(mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
401                {
402                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter true or false@x1:",(help!=null?" (?)":"")),"");
403                        if(newName.equals("?")&&(help!=null))
404                                mob.tell(help);
405                        else
406                        if(newName.toUpperCase().startsWith("T")||newName.toUpperCase().startsWith("F"))
407                                return newName.toUpperCase().startsWith("T");
408                        else
409                        if(newName.toUpperCase().startsWith("Y")||newName.toUpperCase().startsWith("N"))
410                                return newName.toUpperCase().startsWith("Y");
411                        else
412                                break;
413                }
414                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
415                return oldVal;
416        }
417
418        @Override
419        public double prompt(final MOB mob, final double oldVal, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String help)
420        throws IOException
421        {
422                return prompt(mob, oldVal, showNumber, showFlag, fieldDisplayStr, help,Double.MIN_VALUE,Double.MAX_VALUE);
423        }
424
425        public double prompt(final MOB mob, final double oldVal, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String help, final double minValue, final double maxValue)
426        throws IOException
427        {
428                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
429                        return oldVal;
430                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+fieldDisplayStr+": '"+oldVal+"'.");
431                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
432                        return oldVal;
433                String newName="?";
434                while(newName.equals("?")&&(mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
435                {
436                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new value@x1:",(help!=null?" (?)":"")),"");
437                        if(newName.equals("?")&&(help!=null))
438                                mob.tell(help);
439                        else
440                        if(CMath.isNumber(newName))
441                        {
442                                final double d=CMath.s_double(newName);
443                                if(d<minValue)
444                                        mob.session().println(L("Min value is: @x1",""+minValue));
445                                else
446                                if(d>maxValue)
447                                        mob.session().println(L("Max value is: @x1",""+maxValue));
448                                else
449                                        return d;
450                        }
451                        else
452                                break;
453                }
454                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
455                return oldVal;
456        }
457
458        @Override
459        public int prompt(final MOB mob, final int oldVal, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String help)
460        throws IOException
461        {
462                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
463                        return oldVal;
464                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+fieldDisplayStr+": '"+oldVal+"'.");
465                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
466                        return oldVal;
467                String newName="?";
468                while(newName.equals("?")&&(mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
469                {
470                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new value@x1:",(help!=null?" (?)":"")),"");
471                        if(newName.equals("?")&&(help!=null))
472                                mob.tell(help);
473                        else
474                        if(CMath.isInteger(newName))
475                                return CMath.s_int(newName);
476                        else
477                                break;
478                }
479                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
480                return oldVal;
481        }
482
483        @Override
484        public long prompt(final MOB mob, final long oldVal, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String help)
485        throws IOException
486        {
487                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
488                        return oldVal;
489                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+fieldDisplayStr+": '"+oldVal+"'.");
490                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
491                        return oldVal;
492                String newName="?";
493                while(newName.equals("?")&&(mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
494                {
495                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new value@x1:",(help!=null?" (?)":"")),"");
496                        if(newName.equals("?")&&(help!=null))
497                                mob.tell(help);
498                        else
499                        if(CMath.isInteger(newName))
500                                return CMath.s_long(newName);
501                        else
502                                break;
503                }
504                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
505                return oldVal;
506        }
507
508        @Override
509        public int promptMulti(final MOB mob, final int oldVal, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final PairList<String,String> choices)
510        throws IOException
511        {
512                return CMath.s_int(promptMultiOrExtra(mob,""+oldVal,showNumber,showFlag,fieldDisplayStr,choices));
513        }
514
515        @Override
516        public String promptMultiOrExtra(final MOB mob, final String oldVal, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final PairList<String,String> choices)
517                throws IOException
518        {
519                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
520                        return oldVal;
521                final Vector<String> oldVals = new Vector<String>();
522                if(CMath.s_int(oldVal) > 0)
523                {
524                        for(int c=0;c<choices.size();c++)
525                                if(CMath.bset(CMath.s_int(oldVal),CMath.s_int(choices.get(c).first)))
526                                        oldVals.addElement(choices.get(c).second);
527                }
528                else
529                if(choices.containsFirst(oldVal.toUpperCase().trim()))
530                        oldVals.addElement(oldVal);
531                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+fieldDisplayStr+": '"+CMParms.toListString(oldVals)+"'.");
532                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
533                        return oldVal;
534                String newVal=oldVal;
535                String thisVal="?";
536                while(thisVal.equals("?")&&(mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
537                {
538                        thisVal=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new choice to add/remove (?):"),"").trim();
539                        if(thisVal.equals("?"))
540                                mob.tell(CMParms.toListString(choices.toArraySecond(new String[0])));
541                        else
542                        if(thisVal.length()==0)
543                                newVal = oldVal;
544                        else
545                        if(thisVal.equalsIgnoreCase("NULL"))
546                        {
547                                if(choices.containsFirst(""))
548                                        newVal = "";
549                                else
550                                        newVal = "0";
551                                oldVals.clear();
552                                break;
553                        }
554                        else
555                        {
556                                String foundChoice = null;
557                                String foundVal = "";
558                                for(int c=0;c<choices.size();c++)
559                                {
560                                        if(choices.get(c).second.equalsIgnoreCase(thisVal))
561                                        {
562                                                foundChoice = choices.get(c).second;
563                                                foundVal = choices.get(c).first.toString();
564                                        }
565                                }
566                                if(foundChoice == null)
567                                {
568                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not an available option.  Use ? for a list.",newVal));
569                                        thisVal = "?";
570                                }
571                                else
572                                if(!CMath.isInteger(foundVal))
573                                {
574                                        oldVals.clear();
575                                        newVal = foundVal;
576                                        oldVals.addElement(foundVal);
577                                }
578                                else
579                                if(foundVal == "0")
580                                {
581                                        newVal = "0";
582                                        oldVals.clear();
583                                }
584                                else
585                                {
586                                        if(oldVals.contains(foundChoice))
587                                        {
588                                                newVal = Integer.toString(CMath.s_int(newVal) - CMath.s_int(foundVal));
589                                                oldVals.remove(foundChoice);
590                                                mob.tell(L("'@x1' removed.",foundChoice));
591                                                thisVal = "?";
592                                        }
593                                        else
594                                        {
595                                                oldVals.add(foundChoice);
596                                                mob.tell(L("'@x1' added.",foundChoice));
597                                                thisVal = "?";
598                                                newVal = Integer.toString(CMath.s_int(newVal) | CMath.s_int(foundVal));
599                                        }
600                                }
601                        }
602                }
603                if(oldVal.equals(newVal))
604                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
605                return newVal;
606        }
607
608        @Override
609        public String promptMultiSelectList(final MOB mob, final String oldVal, final String delimiter, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final PairList<String,String> choices, final boolean nullOK)
610                throws IOException
611        {
612                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
613                        return oldVal;
614                final Vector<String> oldVals = new Vector<String>();
615                for(final String s : CMParms.parseAny(oldVal,delimiter,!nullOK))
616                {
617                        if(choices.containsFirst(s.toUpperCase().trim())&&(!oldVals.contains(s.toUpperCase().trim())))
618                                oldVals.addElement(s);
619                }
620                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
621                {
622                        mob.tell(showNumber+". "+fieldDisplayStr+": '"+CMParms.toListString(oldVals)+"'.");
623                        return oldVal;
624                }
625                String thisVal="?";
626                while(thisVal.equals("?")&&(mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
627                {
628                        mob.tell(showNumber+". "+fieldDisplayStr+": '"+CMParms.toListString(oldVals)+"'.");
629                        thisVal=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new choice to add/remove (?):"),"").trim();
630                        if(thisVal.equals("?"))
631                                mob.tell(CMParms.toListString(choices.toArraySecond(new String[0])));
632                        else
633                        if(thisVal.equalsIgnoreCase("NULL") && nullOK)
634                        {
635                                oldVals.clear();
636                                thisVal="?";
637                        }
638                        else
639                        if(thisVal.trim().length()>0)
640                        {
641                                String foundChoice = null;
642                                for(int c=0;c<choices.size();c++)
643                                {
644                                        if(choices.get(c).second.equalsIgnoreCase(thisVal))
645                                                foundChoice = choices.get(c).second;
646                                }
647                                if(foundChoice == null)
648                                {
649                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not an available option.  Use ? for a list.",thisVal));
650                                        thisVal = "?";
651                                }
652                                else
653                                {
654                                        if(oldVals.contains(foundChoice))
655                                        {
656                                                oldVals.remove(foundChoice);
657                                                mob.tell(L("'@x1' removed.",foundChoice));
658                                                thisVal = "?";
659                                        }
660                                        else
661                                        {
662                                                oldVals.add(foundChoice);
663                                                mob.tell(L("'@x1' added.",foundChoice));
664                                                thisVal = "?";
665                                        }
666                                }
667                        }
668                }
669                final String newVal=CMParms.combineWith(oldVals, "|");
670                if(oldVal.equals(newVal))
671                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
672                return newVal;
673        }
674
675        @Override
676        public String prompt(final MOB mob, final String oldVal, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final PairList<String,String> choices)
677        throws IOException
678        {
679                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
680                        return oldVal;
681                String oldShowVal = oldVal;
682                for(int c=0;c<choices.size();c++)
683                {
684                        if(choices.get(c).first.equalsIgnoreCase(oldVal))
685                                oldShowVal = choices.get(c).second;
686                }
687                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+fieldDisplayStr+": '"+oldShowVal+"'.");
688                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
689                        return oldVal;
690                String newVal="?";
691                while(newVal.equals("?")&&(mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
692                {
693                        newVal=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new choice (? or NULL):"),"").trim();
694                        if(newVal.equals("?"))
695                                mob.tell(CMParms.toListString(choices.toArraySecond(new String[0])));
696                        else
697                        if(newVal.length()==0)
698                                newVal = oldVal;
699                        else
700                        {
701                                if(newVal.equalsIgnoreCase("NULL"))
702                                        newVal = "";
703                                String foundChoice = null;
704                                for(int c=0;c<choices.size();c++)
705                                {
706                                        if(choices.get(c).second.equalsIgnoreCase(newVal))
707                                                foundChoice = choices.get(c).first;
708                                }
709                                if(foundChoice == null)
710                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not an available choice.  Use ? for a list.",newVal));
711                                else
712                                {
713                                        newVal = foundChoice;
714                                        break;
715                                }
716                        }
717                }
718                if(oldVal.equals(newVal))
719                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
720                return newVal;
721        }
722
723        @Override
724        public void genName(final MOB mob, final Environmental E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
725        {
726                final String newName=prompt(mob,E.Name(),showNumber,showFlag,"Name",false,false);
727                if(newName.equals(E.Name()))
728                        return;
729                if((mob.session()==null)
730                ||((!(E instanceof MOB))&&(!(E instanceof Item)))
731                ||(!CMLib.flags().isCataloged(E)))
732                {
733                        final String oldName=E.Name();
734                        E.setName(newName);
735                        if(E.displayText().equalsIgnoreCase(oldName+" stands here."))
736                                E.setDisplayText(L("@x1 stands here.",newName));
737                        return;
738                }
739                if((E instanceof Physical)&&(CMLib.flags().isCataloged(E)))
740                {
741                        final Physical P = (Physical)E;
742                        final Physical cataP=CMLib.catalog().getCatalogObj(P);
743                        if(cataP==null)
744                        {
745                                P.setName(newName);
746                                CMLib.catalog().changeCatalogUsage(P,false);
747                                return;
748                        }
749                        else
750                        if(mob.session().confirm(L("This object is cataloged.  Changing its name will detach it from the cataloged version, are you sure (y/N)?"),"N"))
751                        {
752                                CMLib.catalog().changeCatalogUsage(P,false);
753                                P.setName(newName);
754                        }
755                }
756        }
757
758        protected void catalogCheckUpdate(final MOB mob, final Physical P)
759                throws IOException
760        {
761                if((!CMLib.flags().isCataloged(P))
762                ||((!(P instanceof MOB))&&(!(P instanceof Item)))
763                ||(mob.session()==null))
764                {
765                        if(P instanceof MOB)
766                                P.setMiscText(P.text());
767                        return;
768                }
769
770                final StringBuffer diffs=CMLib.catalog().checkCatalogIntegrity(P);
771                if((diffs!=null)&&(diffs.length()>0))
772                {
773                        final Physical origCataP = CMLib.catalog().getCatalogObj(P);
774                        final Physical cataP=(Physical)origCataP.copyOf();
775                        CMLib.catalog().changeCatalogUsage(cataP,true);
776                        final StringBuffer detailedDiff=new StringBuffer("");
777                        final List<String> V=CMParms.parseCommas(diffs.toString(),true);
778
779                        for(int v=0;v<V.size();v++)
780                        {
781                                final String stat=V.get(v);
782                                detailedDiff.append("CATALOG:"+stat+":'"+cataP.getStat(stat)+"'\n\r");
783                                detailedDiff.append("YOURS  :"+stat+":'"+P.getStat(stat)+"'\n\r");
784                        }
785                        cataP.destroy();
786                        mob.tell(L("You have modified the following fields: \n\r@x1",detailedDiff.toString()));
787                        final String message = "This object is cataloged.  Enter U to update the cataloged version, or D to detach this object from the catalog, or C to Cancel (u/d/C)?";
788                        final String choice = mob.session().choose(message, L("UDC"), L("C"));
789                        if(choice.equalsIgnoreCase("C"))
790                        {
791                                P.setMiscText(origCataP.text());
792                                P.recoverPhyStats();
793                                if(P instanceof MOB)
794                                {
795                                        ((MOB)P).recoverCharStats();
796                                        ((MOB)P).recoverMaxState();
797                                }
798                                CMLib.catalog().changeCatalogUsage(P, true);
799                        }
800                        else
801                        if(choice.equalsIgnoreCase("U"))
802                        {
803                                CMLib.catalog().updateCatalog(P);
804                                mob.tell(L("Catalog update complete."));
805                                Log.infoOut("BaseGenerics",mob.Name()+" updated catalog "+((P instanceof MOB)?"MOB":"ITEM")+" "+P.Name());
806                                P.setMiscText(P.text());
807                        }
808                        else
809                        if(choice.equalsIgnoreCase("D"))
810                        {
811                                CMLib.catalog().changeCatalogUsage(P,false);
812                                P.setMiscText(P.text());
813                        }
814                        else
815                                mob.tell(L("That wasn't a choice?!"));
816                }
817        }
818
819        protected void genImage(final MOB mob, final Environmental E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
820        {
821                E.setImage(prompt(mob, E.rawImage(), showNumber, showFlag, "MXP Image filename", true, false,
822                                "This is the path/filename of your MXP image file for this object."));
823        }
824
825        protected void genCorpseData(final MOB mob, final DeadBody I, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
826                throws IOException
827        {
828                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
829                        return;
830                mob.tell(L("@x1. Corpse Data: '@x2/@x3'.",""+showNumber,I.getMobName(),I.getKillerName()));
831                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
832                        return;
833                mob.tell(L("Dead MOB name: '@x1'.",I.getMobName()));
834                String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new name\n\r:"),"");
835                if(newName.length()>0)
836                        I.setMobName(newName);
837                else mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
838                mob.tell(L("Dead MOB Description: '@x1'.",I.getMobDescription()));
839                newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new description\n\r:"),"");
840                if(newName.length()>0)
841                        I.setMobDescription(newName);
842                else mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
843                mob.tell(L("Is a Players corpse: @x1",""+I.isPlayerCorpse()));
844                newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new true/false\n\r:"),"");
845                if((newName.length()>0)&&(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("true")||newName.equalsIgnoreCase("false")))
846                        I.setIsPlayerCorpse(Boolean.valueOf(newName.toLowerCase()).booleanValue());
847                else mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
848                mob.tell(L("Dead mobs PK flag: @x1",""+I.getMobPKFlag()));
849                newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new true/false\n\r:"),"");
850                if((newName.length()>0)&&(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("true")||newName.equalsIgnoreCase("false")))
851                        I.setMobPKFlag(Boolean.valueOf(newName.toLowerCase()).booleanValue());
852                else mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
853                genCharStats(mob,I.charStats());
854                mob.tell(L("Killers Name: '@x1'.",I.getKillerName()));
855                newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new killer\n\r:"),"");
856                if(newName.length()>0)
857                        I.setKillerName(newName);
858                else mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
859                mob.tell(L("Killer is a player: @x1",""+I.isKillerPlayer()));
860                newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new true/false\n\r:"),"");
861                if((newName.length()>0)&&(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("true")||newName.equalsIgnoreCase("false")))
862                        I.setIsKillerPlayer(Boolean.valueOf(newName.toLowerCase()).booleanValue());
863                else mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
864                mob.tell(L("Time of death: @x1",CMLib.time().date2String(I.getTimeOfDeath())));
865                newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new value\n\r:"),"");
866                if(newName.length()>0)
867                        I.setTimeOfDeath(CMLib.time().string2Millis(newName));
868                else mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
869                mob.tell(L("Last message string: @x1",I.getLastMessage()));
870                newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new value\n\r:"),"");
871                if(newName.length()>0)
872                        I.setLastMessage(newName);
873                else mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
874        }
875
876        protected void genAuthor(final MOB mob, final Area A, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
877        {
878                A.setAuthorID(prompt(mob, A.getAuthorID(), showNumber, showFlag, "Author", true, false, "Area Author's Name"));
879        }
880
881        protected void genPanelType(final MOB mob, final ElecPanel S, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
882        throws IOException
883        {
884                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
885                        return;
886                if(S.panelType()==null)
887                        return;
888                final String componentType=CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(S.panelType().name().toLowerCase());
889                mob.tell(L("@x1. Panel Type: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,componentType));
890                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
891                        return;
892                boolean continueThis=true;
893                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(continueThis))
894                {
895                        continueThis=false;
896                        final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new one (?)\n\r:"),"");
897                        if(newName.length()>0)
898                        {
899                                if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
900                                {
901                                        mob.tell(L("Component Types: @x1",CMParms.toListString(ElecPanel.PANELTYPES)));
902                                        continueThis=true;
903                                }
904                                else
905                                {
906                                        TechType newType=null;
907                                        for(int i=0;i<TechType.values().length;i++)
908                                        {
909                                                if(TechType.values()[i].name().equalsIgnoreCase(newName))
910                                                        newType=TechType.values()[i];
911                                        }
912                                        if(newType==null)
913                                        {
914                                                mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not recognized.  Try '?' for a list.",newName));
915                                                continueThis=true;
916                                        }
917                                        else
918                                                S.setPanelType(newType);
919                                }
920                        }
921                        else
922                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
923                }
924        }
925
926        protected void genCurrency(final MOB mob, final Area A, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
927        throws IOException
928        {
929                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
930                        return;
931                final String currencyName=A.getCurrency().length()==0?"Default":A.getCurrency();
932                if(mob.session()!=null)
933                        mob.session().colorOnlyPrintln(L("@x1. Currency: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,currencyName));
934                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
935                        return;
936                final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new one or 'DEFAULT'\n\r:"),"");
937                if(newName.length()>0)
938                {
939                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("default"))
940                                A.setCurrency("");
941                        else
942                        if((newName.indexOf('=')<0)&&(!CMLib.beanCounter().getAllCurrencies().contains(newName.trim().toUpperCase())))
943                        {
944                                final List<String> V=CMLib.beanCounter().getAllCurrencies();
945                                mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not a known currency. Existing currencies include: DEFAULT@x2",newName.trim().toUpperCase(),CMParms.toListString(V)));
946                        }
947                        else
948                        if(newName.indexOf('=')>=0)
949                                A.setCurrency(newName.trim());
950                        else
951                                A.setCurrency(newName.toUpperCase().trim());
952                }
953                else
954                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
955        }
956
957        protected void genTimeClock(final MOB mob, final Area A, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
958        throws IOException
959        {
960
961                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
962                        return;
963                final TimeClock TC=A.getTimeObj();
964                StringBuffer report=new StringBuffer("");
965                boolean usingParent = false;
966                for(final Enumeration<Area> a=A.getParents();a.hasMoreElements();)
967                {
968                        if(a.nextElement().getTimeObj() == A.getTimeObj())
969                                usingParent=true;
970                }
971                if(TC==CMLib.time().globalClock())
972                        report.append("Default -- Can't be changed.");
973                else
974                if(usingParent)
975                        report.append("Inherited -- Can't be changed.");
976                else
977                {
978                        report.append(TC.getHoursInDay()+" hrs-day/");
979                        report.append(TC.getDaysInMonth()+" days-mn/");
980                        report.append(TC.getMonthsInYear()+" mnths-yr");
981                }
982                mob.tell(L("@x1. Calendar: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,report.toString()));
983                if(TC==CMLib.time().globalClock() || usingParent)
984                        return;
985                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
986                        return;
987                String newName="";
988                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(newName.length()==0))
989                {
990                        report=new StringBuffer("\n\rCalendar/Clock settings:\n\r");
991                        report.append("1. "+TC.getHoursInDay()+" hours per day\n\r");
992                        report.append("2. Dawn Hour: "+TC.getDawnToDusk()[TimeClock.TimeOfDay.DAWN.ordinal()]+"\n\r");
993                        report.append("3. Day Hour: "+TC.getDawnToDusk()[TimeClock.TimeOfDay.DAY.ordinal()]+"\n\r");
994                        report.append("4. Dusk Hour: "+TC.getDawnToDusk()[TimeClock.TimeOfDay.DUSK.ordinal()]+"\n\r");
995                        report.append("5. Night Hour: "+TC.getDawnToDusk()[TimeClock.TimeOfDay.NIGHT.ordinal()]+"\n\r");
996                        report.append("6. Weekdays: "+CMParms.toListString(TC.getWeekNames())+"\n\r");
997                        report.append("7. Months: "+CMParms.toListString(TC.getMonthNames())+"\n\r");
998                        report.append("8. Year Title(s): "+CMParms.toListString(TC.getYearNames()));
999                        mob.tell(report.toString());
1000                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter one to change:"),"");
1001                        if(newName.length()==0)
1002                                break;
1003                        final int which=CMath.s_int(newName);
1004
1005                        if((which<0)||(which>8))
1006                                mob.tell(L("Invalid: @x1",""+which));
1007                        else
1008                        if(which<=5)
1009                        {
1010                                newName="";
1011                                final String newNum=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new number:"),"");
1012                                final int val=CMath.s_int(newNum);
1013                                if(newNum.length()==0)
1014                                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
1015                                else
1016                                switch(which)
1017                                {
1018                                case 1:
1019                                        TC.setHoursInDay(val);
1020                                        break;
1021                                case 2:
1022                                        TC.getDawnToDusk()[TimeClock.TimeOfDay.DAWN.ordinal()]=val;
1023                                        break;
1024                                case 3:
1025                                        if((val>=0)&&(TC.getDawnToDusk()[TimeClock.TimeOfDay.DAWN.ordinal()]>=val))
1026                                                mob.tell(L("That value is before the dawn!"));
1027                                        else
1028                                                TC.getDawnToDusk()[TimeClock.TimeOfDay.DAY.ordinal()]=val;
1029                                        break;
1030                                case 4:
1031                                        if((val>=0)&&(TC.getDawnToDusk()[TimeClock.TimeOfDay.DAWN.ordinal()]>=val))
1032                                                mob.tell(L("That value is before the dawn!"));
1033                                        else
1034                                        if((val>=0)&&(TC.getDawnToDusk()[TimeClock.TimeOfDay.DAY.ordinal()]>=val))
1035                                                mob.tell(L("That value is before the day!"));
1036                                        else
1037                                                TC.getDawnToDusk()[TimeClock.TimeOfDay.DUSK.ordinal()]=val;
1038                                        break;
1039                                case 5:
1040                                        if((val>=0)&&(TC.getDawnToDusk()[TimeClock.TimeOfDay.DAWN.ordinal()]>=val))
1041                                                mob.tell(L("That value is before the dawn!"));
1042                                        else
1043                                        if((val>=0)&&(TC.getDawnToDusk()[TimeClock.TimeOfDay.DAY.ordinal()]>=val))
1044                                                mob.tell(L("That value is before the day!"));
1045                                        else
1046                                        if((val>=0)&&(TC.getDawnToDusk()[TimeClock.TimeOfDay.DUSK.ordinal()]>=val))
1047                                                mob.tell(L("That value is before the dusk!"));
1048                                        else
1049                                                TC.getDawnToDusk()[TimeClock.TimeOfDay.NIGHT.ordinal()]=val;
1050                                        break;
1051                                }
1052                        }
1053                        else
1054                        {
1055                                newName="";
1056                                final String newNum=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new list (comma delimited)\n\r:"),"");
1057                                if(newNum.length()==0)
1058                                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
1059                                else
1060                                switch(which)
1061                                {
1062                                case 6:
1063                                        TC.setDaysInWeek(CMParms.toStringArray(CMParms.parseCommas(newNum,true)));
1064                                        break;
1065                                case 7:
1066                                        TC.setMonthsInYear(CMParms.toStringArray(CMParms.parseCommas(newNum,true)));
1067                                        break;
1068                                case 8:
1069                                        TC.setYearNames(CMParms.toStringArray(CMParms.parseCommas(newNum,true)));
1070                                        break;
1071                                }
1072                        }
1073                }
1074                TC.save();
1075        }
1076
1077        protected void genClan(final MOB mob, final MOB M, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
1078                throws IOException
1079        {
1080                if((showFlag<=0)||(showFlag==showNumber))
1081                {
1082                        boolean more=true;
1083                        while(more && (mob.session()!=null) && (!mob.session().isStopped()))
1084                        {
1085                                more=false;
1086                                final StringBuilder clanList=new StringBuilder("");
1087                                for(final Pair<Clan,Integer> c : M.clans())
1088                                        clanList.append(c.first.getName()).append(" (").append(c.first.getRoleName(c.second.intValue(), false, false)).append("), ");
1089                                if(clanList.length()>2)
1090                                        clanList.setLength(clanList.length()-2);
1091                                mob.tell(L("@x1. Clan(s): '@x2'.",""+showNumber,clanList.toString()));
1092                                if((showFlag==showNumber)||(showFlag<=-999))
1093                                {
1094                                        more=true;
1095                                        final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new clan to add, remove, or change (?):"),"");
1096                                        Clan C=null;
1097                                        if(newName.trim().length()==0)
1098                                                more=false;
1099                                        else
1100                                        {
1101                                                C=CMLib.clans().getClanAnyHost(newName);
1102                                                if(C==null)
1103                                                        C=CMLib.clans().findClan(newName);
1104                                                if(C!=null)
1105                                                {
1106                                                        if(M.getClanRole(C.clanID())==null)
1107                                                        {
1108                                                                final String role=C.getRoleName(C.getGovernment().getAcceptPos(), false, false);
1109                                                                final String newRole=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter role [@x1]\n\r: (@x2):",CMParms.toListString(C.getRolesList()),role),role);
1110                                                                if(newRole.trim().length()>0)
1111                                                                {
1112                                                                        int roleID=-1;
1113                                                                        if(CMath.isInteger(newRole.trim()))
1114                                                                                roleID=CMath.s_int(newRole.trim());
1115                                                                        else
1116                                                                                roleID=C.getRoleFromName(newRole.trim());
1117                                                                        if(roleID<0)
1118                                                                                mob.tell(L("Invalid role '@x1'",newRole));
1119                                                                        else
1120                                                                        {
1121                                                                                M.setClan(C.clanID(), roleID);
1122                                                                                mob.tell(L("Clan added."));
1123                                                                        }
1124                                                                }
1125                                                                else
1126                                                                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
1127                                                        }
1128                                                        else
1129                                                        {
1130                                                                M.setClan(C.clanID(), -1);
1131                                                                mob.tell(L("Clan removed."));
1132                                                        }
1133                                                }
1134                                                else
1135                                                {
1136                                                        final StringBuilder list=new StringBuilder("(no clan '"+newName+"', try: ");
1137                                                        for(final Enumeration<Clan> e=CMLib.clans().clans();e.hasMoreElements();)
1138                                                                list.append(e.nextElement().getName()).append(", ");
1139                                                        list.setLength(list.length()-2);
1140                                                        mob.tell(list.toString()+")");
1141                                                }
1142                                        }
1143                                }
1144                        }
1145                }
1146        }
1147
1148        protected void genDeity(final MOB mob, final MOB M, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
1149        throws IOException
1150        {
1151                if((showFlag<=0)||(showFlag==showNumber))
1152                {
1153                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Deity (ID): '@x2'.",""+showNumber,M.getWorshipCharID()));
1154                        if((showFlag==showNumber)||(showFlag<=-999))
1155                        {
1156                                final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new one (null)\n\r:"),"");
1157                                if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("null"))
1158                                        M.setWorshipCharID("");
1159                                else
1160                                if(newName.length()>0)
1161                                {
1162                                        if(CMLib.map().getDeity(newName)==null)
1163                                                mob.tell(L("That deity does not exist."));
1164                                        else
1165                                                M.setWorshipCharID(CMLib.map().getDeity(newName).Name());
1166                                }
1167                                else
1168                                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
1169                        }
1170                }
1171        }
1172
1173        @Override
1174        public Room changeRoomType(Room R, final Room newRoom)
1175        {
1176                if((R==null)||(newRoom==null))
1177                        return R;
1178                synchronized(("SYNC"+R.roomID()).intern())
1179                {
1180                        R=CMLib.map().getRoom(R);
1181                        final Room oldR=R;
1182                        R=newRoom;
1183                        final Vector<CMObject> oldBehavsNEffects=new Vector<CMObject>();
1184                        for(final Enumeration<Ability> a=oldR.effects();a.hasMoreElements();)
1185                        {
1186                                final Ability A=a.nextElement();
1187                                if(A!=null)
1188                                {
1189                                        if(!A.canBeUninvoked())
1190                                        {
1191                                                oldBehavsNEffects.addElement(A);
1192                                                oldR.delEffect(A);
1193                                        }
1194                                        else
1195                                                A.unInvoke();
1196                                }
1197                        }
1198                        for(final Enumeration<Behavior> e=oldR.behaviors();e.hasMoreElements();)
1199                        {
1200                                final Behavior B=e.nextElement();
1201                                if(B!=null)
1202                                        oldBehavsNEffects.addElement(B);
1203                        }
1204                        CMLib.threads().deleteTick(oldR,-1);
1205                        R.setRoomID(oldR.roomID());
1206                        final Area A=oldR.getArea();
1207                        if(A!=null)
1208                                A.delProperRoom(oldR);
1209                        R.setArea(A);
1210                        for(int d=0;d<R.rawDoors().length;d++)
1211                                R.rawDoors()[d]=oldR.rawDoors()[d];
1212                        for(int d=Directions.NUM_DIRECTIONS()-1;d>=0;d--)
1213                                R.setRawExit(d,oldR.getRawExit(d));
1214                        R.setDisplayText(oldR.displayText());
1215                        R.setDescription(oldR.description());
1216                        if(R.image().equalsIgnoreCase(CMLib.protocol().getDefaultMXPImage(oldR)))
1217                                R.setImage(null);
1218                        if((R instanceof GridLocale)&&(oldR instanceof GridLocale))
1219                        {
1220                                ((GridLocale)R).setXGridSize(((GridLocale)oldR).xGridSize());
1221                                ((GridLocale)R).setYGridSize(((GridLocale)oldR).yGridSize());
1222                                ((GridLocale)R).clearGrid(null);
1223                        }
1224                        final Vector<MOB> allmobs=new Vector<MOB>();
1225                        int skip=0;
1226                        while(oldR.numInhabitants()>(skip))
1227                        {
1228                                final MOB M=oldR.fetchInhabitant(skip);
1229                                if(M.isSavable())
1230                                {
1231                                        if(!allmobs.contains(M))
1232                                                allmobs.addElement(M);
1233                                        oldR.delInhabitant(M);
1234                                }
1235                                else
1236                                if(oldR!=R)
1237                                {
1238                                        oldR.delInhabitant(M);
1239                                        R.bringMobHere(M,true);
1240                                }
1241                                else
1242                                        skip++;
1243                        }
1244                        final Vector<Item> allitems=new Vector<Item>();
1245                        while(oldR.numItems()>0)
1246                        {
1247                                final Item I=oldR.getItem(0);
1248                                if(!allitems.contains(I))
1249                                        allitems.addElement(I);
1250                                oldR.delItem(I);
1251                        }
1252
1253                        for(int i=0;i<allitems.size();i++)
1254                        {
1255                                final Item I=allitems.elementAt(i);
1256                                if(!R.isContent(I))
1257                                {
1258                                        if(I.subjectToWearAndTear())
1259                                                I.setUsesRemaining(100);
1260                                        I.recoverPhyStats();
1261                                        R.addItem(I);
1262                                        R.recoverRoomStats();
1263                                }
1264                        }
1265                        for(int m=0;m<allmobs.size();m++)
1266                        {
1267                                final MOB M=allmobs.elementAt(m);
1268                                if(!R.isInhabitant(M))
1269                                {
1270                                        final MOB M2=(MOB)M.copyOf();
1271                                        M2.setStartRoom(R);
1272                                        M2.setLocation(R);
1273                                        long rejuv=CMProps.getTicksPerMinute()+CMProps.getTicksPerMinute()+(CMProps.getTicksPerMinute()/2);
1274                                        if(rejuv>(CMProps.getTicksPerMinute()*20))
1275                                                rejuv=(CMProps.getTicksPerMinute()*20);
1276                                        M2.phyStats().setRejuv((int)rejuv);
1277                                        M2.recoverCharStats();
1278                                        M2.recoverPhyStats();
1279                                        M2.recoverMaxState();
1280                                        M2.resetToMaxState();
1281                                        M2.bringToLife(R,true);
1282                                        R.recoverRoomStats();
1283                                        M.destroy();
1284                                }
1285                        }
1286
1287                        try
1288                        {
1289                                for(final Enumeration<Room> r=CMLib.map().rooms();r.hasMoreElements();)
1290                                {
1291                                        final Room R2=r.nextElement();
1292                                        for(int d=0;d<R2.rawDoors().length;d++)
1293                                        {
1294                                                if(R2.rawDoors()[d]==oldR)
1295                                                {
1296                                                        R2.rawDoors()[d]=R;
1297                                                        if(R2 instanceof GridLocale)
1298                                                                ((GridLocale)R2).buildGrid();
1299                                                }
1300                                        }
1301                                }
1302                        }
1303                        catch (final NoSuchElementException e)
1304                        {
1305                        }
1306                        try
1307                        {
1308                                for(final Enumeration<MOB> e=CMLib.players().players();e.hasMoreElements();)
1309                                {
1310                                        final MOB M=e.nextElement();
1311                                        if(M.getStartRoom()==oldR)
1312                                                M.setStartRoom(R);
1313                                        else
1314                                        if(M.location()==oldR)
1315                                                M.setLocation(R);
1316                                }
1317                        }
1318                        catch (final NoSuchElementException e)
1319                        {
1320                        }
1321                        R.getArea().fillInAreaRoom(R);
1322                        for(int i=0;i<oldBehavsNEffects.size();i++)
1323                        {
1324                                if(oldBehavsNEffects.elementAt(i) instanceof Behavior)
1325                                        R.addBehavior((Behavior)oldBehavsNEffects.elementAt(i));
1326                                else
1327                                        R.addNonUninvokableEffect((Ability)oldBehavsNEffects.elementAt(i));
1328                        }
1329                        CMLib.database().DBUpdateRoom(R);
1330                        CMLib.database().DBUpdateMOBs(R);
1331                        CMLib.database().DBUpdateItems(R);
1332                        oldR.destroy();
1333                        R.getArea().addProperRoom(R); // necessary because of the destroy
1334                        R.setImage(R.rawImage());
1335                        R.startItemRejuv();
1336                }
1337                return R;
1338        }
1339
1340        protected Room genRoomType(final MOB mob, Room R, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
1341                throws IOException
1342        {
1343                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
1344                        return R;
1345                mob.tell(L("@x1. Type: '@x2'",""+showNumber,CMClass.classID(R)));
1346                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
1347                        return R;
1348                String newName="";
1349                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(newName.length()==0))
1350                {
1351                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new one (?)\n\r:"),"");
1352                        if(newName.trim().equals("?"))
1353                        {
1354                                mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList2Cols(mob,CMClass.locales()).toString()+"\n\r");
1355                                newName="";
1356                        }
1357                        else
1358                        if(newName.length()>0)
1359                        {
1360                                final Room newRoom=CMClass.getLocale(newName);
1361                                if(newRoom==null)
1362                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' does not exist. No Change.",newName));
1363                                else
1364                                if(mob.session().confirm(L("This will change the room type of room @x1. It will automatically save any mobs and items in this room permanently.  Are you absolutely sure (y/N)?",R.roomID()),"N"))
1365                                        R=changeRoomType(R,newRoom);
1366                                R.recoverRoomStats();
1367                        }
1368                        else
1369                        {
1370                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
1371                                break;
1372                        }
1373                }
1374                return R;
1375        }
1376
1377        @Override
1378        public void genDescription(final MOB mob, final Environmental E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
1379        {
1380                E.setDescription(prompt(mob, E.description(), showNumber, showFlag, "Description", true, true, null));
1381        }
1382
1383        protected void genNotes(final MOB mob, final MOB M, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
1384        {
1385                if(M.playerStats()!=null)
1386                M.playerStats().setNotes(prompt(mob,M.playerStats().getNotes(),showNumber,showFlag,"Private notes",true,false,null));
1387        }
1388
1389        protected void genPassword(final MOB mob, final MOB M, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
1390                throws IOException
1391        {
1392                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
1393                        return;
1394                mob.tell(L("@x1. Password: ********.",""+showNumber));
1395                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
1396                        return;
1397                final String str=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new one to reset\n\r:"),"");
1398                if((str.length()>0)&&(M.playerStats()!=null))
1399                {
1400                        M.playerStats().setPassword(str);
1401                        CMLib.database().DBUpdatePassword(M.Name(),M.playerStats().getPasswordStr());
1402                }
1403                else
1404                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
1405        }
1406
