1407        protected void genEmail(final MOB mob, final AccountStats A, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
1408        {
1409                if(A==null)
1410                        return;
1411                A.setEmail(prompt(mob,A.getEmail(),showNumber,showFlag,"Email",true,false,null));
1412        }
1413
1414        protected void genBirthday(final MOB mob, final PlayerStats A, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
1415        {
1416                if(A==null)
1417                        return;
1418                A.setStat("BIRTHDAY",prompt(mob,A.getStat("BIRTHDAY"),showNumber,showFlag,"Birthday (m,d,y)",true,false,null));
1419        }
1420
1421        @Override
1422        public void genDisplayText(final MOB mob, final Environmental E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
1423        {
1424                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
1425                        return;
1426                if(mob.session()!=null)
1427                        mob.session().safeRawPrintln(L("@x1. Display: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,E.displayText()));
1428                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
1429                        return;
1430                String newName=null;
1431                if(E instanceof Item)
1432                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter something new (null == blended)\n\r:"),"");
1433                else
1434                if(E instanceof Exit)
1435                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter something new (null == see-through)\n\r:"),"");
1436                else
1437                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter something new (null = empty)\n\r:"),"");
1438                if(newName.length()>0)
1439                {
1440                        if(newName.trim().equalsIgnoreCase("null"))
1441                                newName="";
1442                        E.setDisplayText(newName);
1443                }
1444                else
1445                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
1446                if((E instanceof Item)&&(E.displayText().length()==0))
1447                        mob.tell(L("(blended)"));
1448        }
1449
1450        protected void genMountText(final MOB mob, final Rideable E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
1451                        throws IOException
1452        {
1453                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
1454                        return;
1455                if(mob.session()==null)
1456                        return;
1457                mob.session().safeRawPrintln(L("@x1. Mount Strings: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,
1458                                                        E.putString(CMClass.sampleMOB())+"/"+
1459                                                        E.mountString(0, CMClass.sampleMOB())+"/"+
1460                                                        E.dismountString(CMClass.sampleMOB())));
1461                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
1462                        return;
1463                String newName;
1464                mob.session().safeRawPrintln(L("Enter new 'put' string (ENTER='"+E.putString(CMClass.sampleMOB())+"')"));
1465                newName=mob.session().prompt(":","");
1466                if(newName.length()>0)
1467                        E.setPutString(newName);
1468                else
1469                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
1470                mob.session().safeRawPrintln(L("Enter new 'mount' string (ENTER='"+E.mountString(0,CMClass.sampleMOB())+"')"));
1471                newName=mob.session().prompt(":","");
1472                if(newName.length()>0)
1473                        E.setMountString(newName);
1474                else
1475                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
1476                mob.session().safeRawPrintln(L("Enter new 'dismount' string (ENTER='"+E.dismountString(CMClass.sampleMOB())+"')"));
1477                newName=mob.session().prompt(":","");
1478                if(newName.length()>0)
1479                        E.setDismountString(newName);
1480                else
1481                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
1482        }
1483
1484        protected void genMountText2(final MOB mob, final Rideable E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
1485                        throws IOException
1486        {
1487                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
1488                        return;
1489                if(mob.session()==null)
1490                        return;
1491                mob.session().safeRawPrintln(L("@x1. State Strings: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,
1492                                                        E.stateString(CMClass.sampleMOB())+"/"+
1493                                                        E.stateStringSubject(CMClass.sampleMOB())+"/"+
1494                                                        E.rideString(CMClass.sampleMOB())));
1495                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
1496                        return;
1497                String newName;
1498                mob.session().safeRawPrintln(L("Enter new 'state' string (ENTER='"+E.stateString(CMClass.sampleMOB())+"')"));
1499                newName=mob.session().prompt(":","");
1500                if(newName.length()>0)
1501                        E.setStateString(newName);
1502                else
1503                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
1504                mob.session().safeRawPrintln(L("Enter new 'state subject' string (ENTER='"+E.stateStringSubject(CMClass.sampleMOB())+"')"));
1505                newName=mob.session().prompt(":","");
1506                if(newName.length()>0)
1507                        E.setStateStringSubject(newName);
1508                else
1509                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
1510                mob.session().safeRawPrintln(L("Enter new 'ride verb' string (ENTER='"+E.rideString(CMClass.sampleMOB())+"')"));
1511                newName=mob.session().prompt(":","");
1512                if(newName.length()>0)
1513                        E.setRideString(newName);
1514                else
1515                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
1516        }
1517
1518        protected void genClosedText(final MOB mob, final Exit E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
1519                throws IOException
1520        {
1521                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
1522                        return;
1523                if(E instanceof Item)
1524                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Exit Closed Text: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,E.closedText()));
1525                else
1526                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Closed Text: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,E.closedText()));
1527                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
1528                        return;
1529                final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter something new (null=blank)\n\r:"),"");
1530                if(newName.equals("null"))
1531                        E.setExitParams(E.doorName(),E.closeWord(),E.openWord(),"");
1532                else
1533                if(newName.length()>0)
1534                        E.setExitParams(E.doorName(),E.closeWord(),E.openWord(),newName);
1535                else
1536                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
1537        }
1538
1539        protected void genDoorName(final MOB mob, final Exit E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
1540                throws IOException
1541        {
1542                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
1543                        return;
1544                if(E instanceof Item)
1545                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Exit Direction (or 'null'): '@x2'.",""+showNumber,E.doorName()));
1546                else
1547                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Door Name: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,E.doorName()));
1548                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
1549                        return;
1550                String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter something new\n\r:"),"");
1551                if(newName.length()>0)
1552                {
1553                        if((E instanceof Item)&&(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("null")))
1554                                newName="";
1555                        E.setExitParams(newName,E.closeWord(),E.openWord(),E.closedText());
1556                }
1557                else
1558                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
1559        }
1560
1561        protected void genBurnout(final MOB mob, final Light I, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
1562        {
1563                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
1564                        return;
1565                mob.tell(L("@x1. Is destroyed after burnout: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,""+I.destroyedWhenBurnedOut()));
1566                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
1567                        return;
1568                I.setDestroyedWhenBurntOut(!I.destroyedWhenBurnedOut());
1569        }
1570
1571        protected void genOpenWord(final MOB mob, final Exit E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
1572                throws IOException
1573        {
1574                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
1575                        return;
1576                mob.tell(L("@x1. Open Word: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,E.openWord()));
1577                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
1578                        return;
1579                final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter something new\n\r:"),"");
1580                if(newName.length()>0)
1581                        E.setExitParams(E.doorName(),E.closeWord(),newName,E.closedText());
1582                else
1583                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
1584        }
1585
1586        protected void genSubOps(final MOB mob, final Area A, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
1587                throws IOException
1588        {
1589                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
1590                        return;
1591                String str="Q";
1592                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(str.length()>0))
1593                {
1594                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Area staff names: @x2",""+showNumber,A.getSubOpList()));
1595                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
1596                                return;
1597                        str=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a name to add or remove\n\r:"),"");
1598                        if(str.length()>0)
1599                        {
1600                                if(A.amISubOp(str))
1601                                {
1602                                        A.delSubOp(str);
1603                                        mob.tell(L("Staff removed."));
1604                                }
1605                                else
1606                                if(CMLib.players().playerExists(str))
1607                                {
1608                                        A.addSubOp(str);
1609                                        mob.tell(L("Staff added."));
1610                                }
1611                                else
1612                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not recognized as a valid user name.",str));
1613                        }
1614                }
1615        }
1616
1617        protected void genParentAreas(final MOB mob, final Area A, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final Set<Area> alsoUpdateAreas)
1618                        throws IOException
1619        {
1620                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
1621                        return;
1622                String newArea="Q";
1623                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(newArea.length()>0))
1624                {
1625                        final StringBuilder str=new StringBuilder("");
1626                        for(final Enumeration<Area> a = A.getParents(); a.hasMoreElements(); )
1627                                str.append(a.nextElement().Name()).append(";");
1628                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Parent Areas: @x2",""+showNumber,str.toString()));
1629                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
1630                                return;
1631                        newArea=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter an area name to add or remove\n\r:"),"");
1632                        if(newArea.equalsIgnoreCase("*clear*"))
1633                        {
1634                                final List<Area> allParents=new LinkedList<Area>();
1635                                for(final Enumeration<Area> e=A.getParents();e.hasMoreElements();)
1636                                        allParents.add(e.nextElement());
1637                                for(final Area a : allParents)
1638                                        A.removeParent(a);
1639                        }
1640                        else
1641                        if(newArea.length()>0)
1642                        {
1643                                final Area lookedUp=CMLib.map().getArea(newArea);
1644                                if(lookedUp!=null)
1645                                {
1646                                        if (lookedUp.isChild(A))
1647                                        {
1648                                                // this new area is already a parent to A,
1649                                                // they must want it removed
1650                                                A.removeParent(lookedUp);
1651                                                lookedUp.removeChild(A);
1652                                                alsoUpdateAreas.add(lookedUp);
1653                                                mob.tell(L("Area '@x1' removed.",lookedUp.Name()));
1654                                        }
1655                                        else
1656                                        {
1657                                                if(A.canParent(lookedUp))
1658                                                {
1659                                                        A.addParent(lookedUp);
1660                                                        lookedUp.addChild(A);
1661                                                        alsoUpdateAreas.add(lookedUp);
1662                                                        mob.tell(L("Area '@x1' added.",lookedUp.Name()));
1663                                                }
1664                                                else
1665                                                {
1666                                                        mob.tell(L("Area '@x1' cannot be added because this would create a circular reference.",lookedUp.Name()));
1667                                                }
1668                                        }
1669                                }
1670                                else
1671                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not recognized as a valid area name.",newArea));
1672                        }
1673                }
1674        }
1675
1676        protected void genChildAreas(final MOB mob, final Area A, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final Set<Area> alsoUpdateAreas)
1677                        throws IOException
1678        {
1679                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
1680                        return;
1681                String newArea="Q";
1682                final Area defaultParentArea=CMLib.map().getDefaultParentArea();
1683                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(newArea.length()>0))
1684                {
1685                        final StringBuilder str=new StringBuilder("");
1686                        if(defaultParentArea!=A)
1687                        {
1688                                for(final Enumeration<Area> a = A.getChildren(); a.hasMoreElements(); )
1689                                        str.append(a.nextElement().Name()).append(";");
1690                        }
1691                        else
1692                                str.append(L("* This is the Default parent area *"));
1693                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Children areas: @x2",""+showNumber,str.toString()));
1694                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
1695                                return;
1696                        newArea=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter an area name to add or remove\n\r:"),"");
1697                        if(newArea.equalsIgnoreCase("*clear*"))
1698                        {
1699                                final List<Area> allChildren=new LinkedList<Area>();
1700                                for(final Enumeration<Area> e=A.getChildren();e.hasMoreElements();)
1701                                        allChildren.add(e.nextElement());
1702                                for(final Area a : allChildren)
1703                                        A.removeChild(a);
1704                        }
1705                        else
1706                        if(newArea.length()>0)
1707                        {
1708                                final Area lookedUp=CMLib.map().getArea(newArea);
1709                                if(lookedUp!=null)
1710                                {
1711                                        if (lookedUp.isParent(A))
1712                                        {
1713                                                // this area is already a child to A, they must want it removed
1714                                                A.removeChild(lookedUp);
1715                                                lookedUp.removeParent(A);
1716                                                alsoUpdateAreas.add(lookedUp);
1717                                                mob.tell(L("Area '@x1' removed.",lookedUp.Name()));
1718                                        }
1719                                        else
1720                                        {
1721                                                if(A.canChild(lookedUp))
1722                                                {
1723                                                        A.addChild(lookedUp);
1724                                                        lookedUp.addParent(A);
1725                                                        alsoUpdateAreas.add(lookedUp);
1726                                                        mob.tell(L("Area '@x1' added.",lookedUp.Name()));
1727                                                }
1728                                                else
1729                                                {
1730                                                        mob.tell(L("Area '@x1' cannot be added because this would create a circular reference.",lookedUp.Name()));
1731                                                }
1732                                        }
1733                                }
1734                                else
1735                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not recognized as a valid area name.",newArea));
1736                        }
1737                }
1738        }
1739
1740        protected void genCloseWord(final MOB mob, final Exit E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
1741                throws IOException
1742        {
1743                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
1744                        return;
1745                mob.tell(L("@x1. Close Word: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,E.closeWord()));
1746                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
1747                        return;
1748                final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter something new\n\r:"),"");
1749                if(newName.length()>0)
1750                        E.setExitParams(E.doorName(),newName,E.openWord(),E.closedText());
1751                else
1752                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
1753        }
1754
1755        protected void genExitMisc(final MOB mob, final Exit E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
1756                throws IOException
1757        {
1758                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
1759                        return;
1760                if(E.hasALock())
1761                {
1762                        E.setReadable(false);
1763                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Assigned Key Item: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,E.keyName()));
1764                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
1765                                return;
1766                        final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter something new (null=blank)\n\r:"),"");
1767                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("null"))
1768                                E.setKeyName("");
1769                        else
1770                        if(newName.length()>0)
1771                                E.setKeyName(newName);
1772                        else
1773                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
1774                }
1775                else
1776                {
1777                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
1778                        {
1779                                if(!E.isReadable())
1780                                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Door not is readable.",""+showNumber));
1781                                else
1782                                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Door is readable: @x2",""+showNumber,E.readableText()));
1783                                return;
1784                        }
1785                        else
1786                        if(genGenericPrompt(mob,"Is this door ",E.isReadable()))
1787                        {
1788                                E.setReadable(true);
1789                                mob.tell(L("\n\rText: '@x1'.",E.readableText()));
1790                                final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter something new (null=blank)\n\r:"),"");
1791                                if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("null"))
1792                                        E.setReadableText("");
1793                                else
1794                                if(newName.length()>0)
1795                                        E.setReadableText(newName);
1796                                else
1797                                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
1798                        }
1799                        else
1800                                E.setReadable(false);
1801                }
1802        }
1803
1804        protected void genReadable1(final MOB mob, final Item E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
1805        {
1806                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
1807                        return;
1808
1809                if(E instanceof Computer)
1810                        return;
1811
1812                if((E instanceof Wand)
1813                ||(E instanceof SpellHolder)
1814                ||(E instanceof Light)
1815                ||(E instanceof Container)
1816                ||(E instanceof Ammunition)
1817                ||((E instanceof ClanItem)
1818                        &&((((ClanItem)E).getClanItemType()==ClanItem.ClanItemType.GATHERITEM)
1819                                ||(((ClanItem)E).getClanItemType()==ClanItem.ClanItemType.CRAFTITEM)
1820                                ||(((ClanItem)E).getClanItemType()==ClanItem.ClanItemType.SPECIALAPRON)))
1821                ||(E instanceof DoorKey))
1822                        CMLib.flags().setReadable(E,false);
1823                else
1824                if((CMClass.classID(E).endsWith("Readable"))
1825                ||(E instanceof Recipe)
1826                ||(E instanceof com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Items.interfaces.RoomMap))
1827                        CMLib.flags().setReadable(E,true);
1828                else
1829                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
1830                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Item is readable: @x2",""+showNumber,""+E.isReadable()));
1831                else
1832                        CMLib.flags().setReadable(E,genGenericPrompt(mob,showNumber+". Is this item readable",E.isReadable()));
1833        }
1834
1835        protected void genDrinkType(final MOB mob, final Drink E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
1836        {
1837                mob.session().println(L("@x1. Current liquid type: @x2",""+showNumber,RawMaterial.CODES.NAME(E.liquidType())));
1838                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
1839                        return;
1840                boolean q=false;
1841                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!q))
1842                {
1843                        final String newType=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new type (?)\n\r:"),RawMaterial.CODES.NAME(E.liquidType()));
1844                        if(newType.equals("?"))
1845                        {
1846                                final StringBuffer say=new StringBuffer("");
1847                                final List<Integer> liquids = RawMaterial.CODES.COMPOSE_RESOURCES(RawMaterial.MATERIAL_LIQUID);
1848                                for(final Integer code : liquids)
1849                                        say.append(RawMaterial.CODES.NAME(code.intValue())+", ");
1850                                mob.tell(say.toString().substring(0,say.length()-2));
1851                                q=false;
1852                        }
1853                        else
1854                        {
1855                                q=true;
1856                                int newValue=RawMaterial.CODES.FIND_IgnoreCase(newType);
1857                                if((newValue&RawMaterial.MATERIAL_MASK)!=RawMaterial.MATERIAL_LIQUID)
1858                                        newValue=-1;
1859                                if(newValue>=0)
1860                                        E.setLiquidType(newValue);
1861                                else
1862                                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
1863                        }
1864                }
1865        }
1866
1867        protected void genReadable2(final MOB mob, final Item E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
1868                throws IOException
1869        {
1870                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
1871                        return;
1872
1873                if(E instanceof Computer)
1874                        return;
1875
1876                if(E.isReadable()
1877                ||(E instanceof SpellHolder)
1878                ||(E instanceof Ammunition)
1879                ||(E instanceof Recipe)
1880                ||(E instanceof Exit)
1881                ||(E instanceof Wand)
1882                ||(E instanceof ClanItem)
1883                ||(E instanceof Light)
1884                ||(E instanceof DoorKey))
1885                {
1886                        boolean ok=false;
1887                        while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
1888                        {
1889                                if(CMClass.classID(E).endsWith("SuperPill"))
1890                                {
1891                                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Assigned Spell or Parameters: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,E.readableText()));
1892                                        ok=true;
1893                                }
1894                                else
1895                                if(E instanceof SpellHolder)
1896                                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Assigned Spell(s) ( ';' delimited)\n: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,E.readableText()));
1897                                else
1898                                if(E instanceof Ammunition)
1899                                {
1900                                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Ammunition type: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,E.readableText()));
1901                                        ok=true;
1902                                }
1903                                else
1904                                if(E instanceof Exit)
1905                                {
1906                                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Assigned Room IDs: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,E.readableText()));
1907                                        ok=true;
1908                                }
1909                                else
1910                                if(E instanceof Wand)
1911                                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Assigned Spell Name: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,E.readableText()));
1912                                else
1913                                if(E instanceof DoorKey)
1914                                {
1915                                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Assigned Key Code: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,E.readableText()));
1916                                        ok=true;
1917                                }
1918                                else
1919                                if(E instanceof com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Items.interfaces.RoomMap)
1920                                {
1921                                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Assigned Map Area(s): '@x2'.",""+showNumber,E.readableText()));
1922                                        ok=true;
1923                                }
1924                                else
1925                                if(E instanceof Light)
1926                                {
1927                                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Light duration (before burn out): '@x2'.",""+showNumber,""+CMath.s_int(E.readableText())));
1928                                        ok=true;
1929                                }
1930                                else
1931                                if(E instanceof LandTitle)
1932                                {
1933                                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Assigned Property ID: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,E.readableText()));
1934                                        ok=true;
1935                                }
1936                                else
1937                                {
1938                                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Assigned Read Text: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,E.readableText()));
1939                                        ok=true;
1940                                }
1941
1942                                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
1943                                        return;
1944                                String newName=null;
1945
1946                                if((E instanceof Wand)
1947                                ||((E instanceof SpellHolder)&&(!(CMClass.classID(E).endsWith("SuperPill")))))
1948                                {
1949                                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter something new (?)\n\r:"),"");
1950                                        if(newName.length()==0)
1951                                                ok=true;
1952                                        else
1953                                        {
1954                                                if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
1955                                                        mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.abilities(),-1).toString());
1956                                                else
1957                                                if(E instanceof Wand)
1958                                                {
1959                                                        final Ability A=CMClass.getAbility(newName);
1960                                                        if((A==null)
1961                                                        ||(((A.classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_DOMAINS)==Ability.DOMAIN_ARCHON)
1962                                                                &&(mob.fetchAbility(A.ID())==null)))
1963                                                        {
1964                                                                mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not recognized.  Try '?'.",newName));
1965                                                        }
1966                                                        else
1967                                                                ok=true;
1968                                                }
1969                                                else
1970                                                if(E instanceof SpellHolder)
1971                                                {
1972                                                        final String oldName=newName;
1973                                                        if(!newName.endsWith(";"))
1974                                                                newName+=";";
1975                                                        int x=newName.indexOf(';');
1976                                                        while(x>=0)
1977                                                        {
1978                                                                String spellName=newName.substring(0,x).trim();
1979                                                                final int x1=spellName.indexOf('(');
1980                                                                if((x1>0)&&(spellName.endsWith(")")))
1981                                                                        spellName=spellName.substring(0,x1);
1982                                                                final Ability A=CMClass.getAbility(spellName);
1983                                                                if((A==null)
1984                                                                ||(((A.classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_DOMAINS)==Ability.DOMAIN_ARCHON)
1985                                                                        &&(mob.fetchAbility(A.ID())==null)))
1986                                                                {
1987                                                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not recognized.  Try '?'.",spellName));
1988                                                                        break;
1989                                                                }
1990                                                                else
1991                                                                        ok=true;
1992                                                                newName=newName.substring(x+1).trim();
1993                                                                x=newName.indexOf(';');
1994                                                        }
1995                                                        newName=oldName;
1996                                                }
1997                                        }
1998                                }
1999                                else
2000                                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter something new (null=blank)\n\r:"),"");
2001
2002                                if(ok)
2003                                {
2004                                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("null"))
2005                                                E.setReadableText("");
2006                                        else
2007                                        if(newName.length()>0)
2008                                                E.setReadableText(newName);
2009                                        else
2010                                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
2011                                }
2012                        }
2013                }
2014                else
2015                if(E instanceof Drink)
2016                {
2017                        genDrinkType(mob,(Drink)E,showNumber,showFlag);
2018                }
2019        }
2020
2021        protected void genRecipe(final MOB mob, final Recipe E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
2022        throws IOException
2023        {
2024                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
2025                        return;
2026                StringBuilder str=new StringBuilder(showNumber+". Recipe Data: "+E.getCommonSkillID()+" ("+E.getTotalRecipePages()+"): ");
2027                for(final String line : E.getRecipeCodeLines())
2028                {
2029                        final int x=line.indexOf('\t');
2030                        final int len=line.length()>10?10:line.length();
2031                        str.append(line.substring(0,(x<0)?len:x)).append(' ');
2032                }
2033                mob.tell(str.toString());
2034                final Session S=mob.session();
2035                if((S==null)||((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999)))
2036                        return;
2037                while(!S.isStopped())
2038                {
2039                        final String newName=S.prompt(L("Enter new skill id (?)\n\r:"),"");
2040                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
2041                        {
2042                                str=new StringBuilder("");
2043                                Ability A=null;
2044                                for(final Enumeration<Ability> e=CMClass.abilities();e.hasMoreElements();)
2045                                {
2046                                        A=e.nextElement();
2047                                        if(((A.classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_ACODES)==Ability.ACODE_COMMON_SKILL)
2048                                        &&(((A.classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_DOMAINS)==Ability.DOMAIN_CRAFTINGSKILL)
2049                                                ||((A.classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_DOMAINS)==Ability.DOMAIN_EPICUREAN)
2050                                                ||((A.classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_DOMAINS)==Ability.DOMAIN_BUILDINGSKILL)))
2051                                                str.append(A.ID()+"\n\r");
2052                                }
2053                                mob.tell(L("\n\rCommon Skills:\n\r@x1\n\r",str.toString()));
2054                        }
2055                        else
2056                        if((newName.length()>0)
2057                        &&(CMClass.getAbility(newName)!=null)
2058                        &&((CMClass.getAbility(newName).classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_ACODES)==Ability.ACODE_COMMON_SKILL))
2059                        {
2060                                E.setCommonSkillID(CMClass.getAbility(newName).ID());
2061                                break;
2062                        }
2063                        else
2064                        if(newName.length()>0)
2065                                mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not a valid common skill.  Try ?.",newName));
2066                        else
2067                        {
2068                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
2069                                break;
2070                        }
2071                }
2072                final String newCount=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter new maximum recipe count (@x1):",""+E.getTotalRecipePages()),"");
2073                if((newCount.length()>0)&&(CMath.s_int(newCount)>0))
2074                        E.setTotalRecipePages(CMath.s_int(newCount));
2075                else
2076                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
2077                final Ability A=CMClass.getAbility(E.getCommonSkillID());
2078                final CraftorAbility C;
2079                if((A!=null)
2080                &&((A.classificationCode()==(Ability.ACODE_COMMON_SKILL|Ability.DOMAIN_CRAFTINGSKILL))
2081                        ||(A.classificationCode()==(Ability.ACODE_COMMON_SKILL|Ability.DOMAIN_EPICUREAN))
2082                        ||(A.classificationCode()==(Ability.ACODE_COMMON_SKILL|Ability.DOMAIN_BUILDINGSKILL)))
2083                &&(A instanceof CraftorAbility))
2084                {
2085                        C=(CraftorAbility)A;
2086                        mob.tell(L("Params: @x1",CMStrings.replaceAll(C.parametersFormat(), "\t", ",")));
2087                }
2088                else
2089                        C = null;
2090                while(!S.isStopped())
2091                {
2092                        final String[] recipes = E.getRecipeCodeLines();
2093                        str=new StringBuilder("");
2094                        for(int i=1;i<=recipes.length;i++)
2095                                str.append(i+") "+CMStrings.replaceAll(recipes[i-1],"\t",",")).append("\n");
2096                        if(recipes.length<E.getTotalRecipePages())
2097                                str.append(L("(@x1) ADD NEW RECIPE",""+(recipes.length+1))).append("\n");
2098                        mob.tell(str.toString());
2099                        final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a number to add/edit/remove\n\r:"),"");
2100                        final int x=CMath.s_int(newName);
2101                        if((x<=0)||(x>E.getTotalRecipePages()))
2102                                break;
2103                        final List<String> recipeList = new XVector<String>(recipes);
2104                        class Checker
2105                        {
2106                                public String getErrors(final String line)
2107                                {
2108                                        if((C==null)&&(E.getCommonSkillID()!=null)&&(E.getCommonSkillID().length()>0))
2109                                                return L("Skill @x1 is not a crafting skill!",E.getCommonSkillID());
2110                                        try
2111                                        {
2112                                                if(C!=null)
2113                                                        CMLib.ableParms().testRecipeParsing(new StringBuffer(CMStrings.replaceAll(line,",","\t")), C.parametersFormat());
2114                                        }
2115                                        catch(final CMException cme)
2116                                        {
2117                                                return cme.getMessage();
2118                                        }
2119                                        return null;
2120                                }
2121                        }
2122                        if(x<=recipes.length)
2123                        {
2124                                final String newLine=mob.session().prompt(L("Re-Enter this line, or NULL to delete (?).\n\r:"),"");
2125                                if(newLine.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
2126                                        mob.tell((C==null)?"?":CMStrings.replaceAll(C.parametersFormat(), "\t", ","));
2127                                else
2128                                if(newLine.equalsIgnoreCase("null"))
2129                                        recipeList.remove(x-1);
2130                                else
2131                                if(newLine.length()==0)
2132                                        mob.tell(L("(No change)"));
2133                                else
2134                                {
2135                                        final String errors = new Checker().getErrors(newLine);
2136                                        if((errors==null)||(errors.length()==0))
2137                                                recipeList.set(x-1, CMStrings.replaceAll(newLine,",","\t"));
2138                                        else
2139                                                mob.tell(L("Error: @x1, aborting change.",errors));
2140                                }
2141                        }
2142                        else
2143                        {
2144                                final String newLine=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new line, or enter to cancel (?).\n\r:"),"");
2145                                if((newLine!=null)&&(newLine.trim().length()>0))
2146                                {
2147                                        if(newLine.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
2148                                                mob.tell((C==null)?"?":CMStrings.replaceAll(C.parametersFormat(), "\t", ","));
2149                                        else
2150                                        {
2151                                                final String errors = new Checker().getErrors(newLine);
2152                                                if((errors==null)||(errors.length()==0))
2153                                                        recipeList.add(CMStrings.replaceAll(newLine,",","\t"));
2154                                                else
2155                                                        mob.tell(L("Error: @x1, aborting change.",errors));
2156                                        }
2157                                }
2158                                else
2159                                        mob.tell(L("(No change)"));
2160                        }
2161                        E.setRecipeCodeLines(recipeList.toArray(new String[0]));
2162                }
2163        }
2164
2165        protected void genGettable(final MOB mob, final Item I, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
2166                throws IOException
2167        {
2168                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
2169                        return;
2170                if(I instanceof Potion)
2171                        ((Potion)I).setDrunk(false);
2172
2173                String c="Q";
2174                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!c.equals("\n")))
2175                {
2176                        mob.session().println(L("@x1. A) Is Gettable   : @x2",""+showNumber,""+(!CMath.bset(I.basePhyStats().sensesMask(),PhyStats.SENSE_ITEMNOTGET))));
2177                        mob.session().println(L("    B) Is Droppable  : @x1",""+(!CMath.bset(I.basePhyStats().sensesMask(),PhyStats.SENSE_ITEMNODROP))));
2178                        mob.session().println(L("    C) Is Removable  : @x1",""+(!CMath.bset(I.basePhyStats().sensesMask(),PhyStats.SENSE_ITEMNOREMOVE))));
2179                        mob.session().println(L("    D) Non-Locatable : @x1",(((I.basePhyStats().sensesMask()&PhyStats.SENSE_UNLOCATABLE)>0)?"true":"false")));
2180                        mob.session().println(L("    E) Blend Display : @x1",(((I.basePhyStats().sensesMask()&PhyStats.SENSE_ALWAYSCOMPRESSED)>0)?"true":"false")));
2181                        if(I instanceof Container)
2182                                mob.session().println(L("    F) Contents Acces: @x1",(((I.basePhyStats().sensesMask()&PhyStats.SENSE_INSIDEACCESSIBLE)>0)?"true":"false")));
2183                        else
2184                        if(I instanceof Weapon)
2185                                mob.session().println(L("    F) Is Two-Handed : @x1",""+I.rawLogicalAnd()));
2186                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
2187                                return;
2188                        c=mob.session().choose(L("Enter one to change, or ENTER when done:"),L("ABCDEF\n"),"\n").toUpperCase();
2189                        switch(Character.toUpperCase(c.charAt(0)))
2190                        {
2191                        case 'A':
2192                                CMLib.flags().setGettable(I, (CMath.bset(I.basePhyStats().sensesMask(), PhyStats.SENSE_ITEMNOTGET)));
2193                                break;
2194                        case 'B':
2195                                CMLib.flags().setDroppable(I, (CMath.bset(I.basePhyStats().sensesMask(), PhyStats.SENSE_ITEMNODROP)));
2196                                break;
2197                        case 'C':
2198                                CMLib.flags().setRemovable(I, (CMath.bset(I.basePhyStats().sensesMask(), PhyStats.SENSE_ITEMNOREMOVE)));
2199                                break;
2200                        case 'D':
2201                        {
2202                                if((I.basePhyStats().sensesMask()&PhyStats.SENSE_UNLOCATABLE)>0)
2203                                        I.basePhyStats().setSensesMask(I.basePhyStats().sensesMask()-PhyStats.SENSE_UNLOCATABLE);
2204                                else
2205                                        I.basePhyStats().setSensesMask(I.basePhyStats().sensesMask()|PhyStats.SENSE_UNLOCATABLE);
2206                                break;
2207                        }
2208                        case 'E':
2209                        {
2210                                if((I.basePhyStats().sensesMask()&PhyStats.SENSE_ALWAYSCOMPRESSED)>0)
2211                                        I.basePhyStats().setSensesMask(I.basePhyStats().sensesMask()-PhyStats.SENSE_ALWAYSCOMPRESSED);
2212                                else
2213                                        I.basePhyStats().setSensesMask(I.basePhyStats().sensesMask()|PhyStats.SENSE_ALWAYSCOMPRESSED);
2214                                break;
2215                        }
2216                        case 'F':
2217                        {
2218                                if(I instanceof Container)
2219                                {
2220                                        if((I.basePhyStats().sensesMask()&PhyStats.SENSE_INSIDEACCESSIBLE)>0)
2221                                                I.basePhyStats().setSensesMask(I.basePhyStats().sensesMask()-PhyStats.SENSE_INSIDEACCESSIBLE);
2222                                        else
2223                                                I.basePhyStats().setSensesMask(I.basePhyStats().sensesMask()|PhyStats.SENSE_INSIDEACCESSIBLE);
2224                                        break;
2225                                }
2226                                else
2227                                if(I instanceof Weapon)
2228                                        I.setRawLogicalAnd(!I.rawLogicalAnd());
2229                                break;
2230                        }
2231                        }
2232                }
2233        }
2234
2235        protected void toggleDispositionMask(final PhyStats E, final int mask)
2236        {
2237                final int current=E.disposition();
2238                if((current&mask)==0)
2239                        E.setDisposition(current|mask);
2240                else
2241                        E.setDisposition(current&((int)(PhyStats.ALLMASK-mask)));
2242        }
2243
2244        protected void genDisposition(final MOB mob, final PhyStats E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
2245                throws IOException
2246        {
2247                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
2248                        return;
2249                final int[] disps={PhyStats.IS_INVISIBLE,
2250                                         PhyStats.IS_HIDDEN,
2251                                         PhyStats.IS_NOT_SEEN,
2252                                         PhyStats.IS_BONUS,
2253                                         PhyStats.IS_GLOWING,
2254                                         PhyStats.IS_LIGHTSOURCE,
2255                                         PhyStats.IS_FLYING,
2256                                         PhyStats.IS_CLIMBING,
2257                                         PhyStats.IS_SNEAKING,
2258                                         PhyStats.IS_SWIMMING,
2259                                         PhyStats.IS_EVIL,
2260                                         PhyStats.IS_GOOD};
2261                final String[] briefs={"invisible",
2262                                                 "hide",
2263                                                 "unseen",
2264                                                 "magical",
2265                                                 "glowing",
2266                                                 "lightsrc",
2267                                                 "fly",
2268                                                 "climb",
2269                                                 "sneak",
2270                                                 "swimmer",
2271                                                 "evil",
2272                                                 "good"};
2273                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
2274                {
2275                        final StringBuffer buf=new StringBuffer(showNumber+". Dispositions: ");
2276                        for(int i=0;i<disps.length;i++)
2277                        {
2278                                final int mask=disps[i];
2279                                if((E.disposition()&mask)!=0)
2280                                        buf.append(briefs[i]+" ");
2281                        }
2282                        mob.tell(buf.toString());
2283                        return;
2284                }
2285                String c="Q";
2286                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!c.equals("\n")))
2287                {
2288                        char letter='A';
2289                        String letters="";
2290                        for (final int mask : disps)
2291                        {
2292                                for(int num=0;num<PhyStats.IS_DESCS.length;num++)
2293                                {
2294                                        if(mask==CMath.pow(2,num))
2295                                        {
2296                                                mob.session().println("    "+letter+") "+CMStrings.padRight(PhyStats.IS_DESCS[num],20)+":"+((E.disposition()&mask)!=0));
2297                                                letters+=letter;
2298                                                break;
2299                                        }
2300                                }
2301                                letter++;
2302                        }
2303                        c=mob.session().choose(L("Enter one to change, or ENTER when done: "),letters+"\n","\n").toUpperCase();
2304                        letter='A';
2305                        for (final int mask : disps)
2306                        {
2307                                if(letter==Character.toUpperCase(c.charAt(0)))
2308                                {
2309                                        toggleDispositionMask(E,mask);
2310                                        break;
2311                                }
2312                                letter++;
2313                        }
2314                }
2315        }
2316
2317        public boolean genGenericPrompt(final MOB mob, String prompt, final boolean val)
2318        {
2319                try
2320                {
2321                        prompt=CMStrings.padRight(prompt,35);
2322                        if(val)
2323                                prompt+="(Y/n): ";
2324                        else
2325                                prompt+="(y/N): ";
2326
2327                        return mob.session().confirm(prompt,val?L("Y"):L("N"));
2328                }
2329                catch(final IOException e)
2330                {
2331                        return val;
2332                }
2333        }
2334
2335        protected void toggleSensesMask(final PhyStats E, final int mask)
2336        {
2337                final int current=E.sensesMask();
2338                if((current&mask)==0)
2339                        E.setSensesMask(current|mask);
2340                else
2341                        E.setSensesMask(current&((int)(PhyStats.ALLMASK-mask)));
2342        }
2343
2344        protected void toggleClimateMask(final Places A, final int mask)
2345        {
2346                int current=A.getClimateTypeCode();
2347                if(current<0)
2348                        current=0;
2349                if((current&mask)==0)
2350                        A.setClimateType(current|mask);
2351                else
2352                        A.setClimateType(current&((int)(PhyStats.ALLMASK-mask)));
2353        }
2354
2355        protected void genClimateType(final MOB mob, final Places A, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
2356                throws IOException
2357        {
2358                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
2359                        return;
2360                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
2361                {
2362                        final List<String> conditions=new Vector<String>();
2363                        if(A.getClimateTypeCode()==Places.CLIMASK_INHERIT)
2364                                conditions.add("Inherited");
2365                        else
2366                        {
2367                                if(CMath.bset(A.getClimateTypeCode(), Places.CLIMASK_WET))
2368                                        conditions.add("wet");
2369                                if(CMath.bset(A.getClimateTypeCode(), Places.CLIMASK_HOT))
2370                                        conditions.add("hot");
2371                                if(CMath.bset(A.getClimateTypeCode(), Places.CLIMASK_DRY))
2372                                        conditions.add("dry");
2373                                if(CMath.bset(A.getClimateTypeCode(), Places.CLIMASK_COLD))
2374                                        conditions.add("cold");
2375                                if(CMath.bset(A.getClimateTypeCode(), Places.CLIMASK_WINDY))
2376                                        conditions.add("windy");
2377                                if(conditions.size()==0)
2378                                        conditions.add("normal");
2379                        }
2380                        mob.session().println(L("@x1. Climate: @x2",""+showNumber,CMLib.english().toEnglishStringList(conditions.toArray(new String[0]))));
2381                        return;
2382                }
2383                String c="Q";
2384                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!c.equals("\n")))
2385                {
2386                        mob.session().println(L("@x1. Climate:",""+showNumber));
2387                        int type=A.getClimateTypeCode();
2388                        mob.session().println(L("    I) Inherited        : @x1",""+(type==Places.CLIMASK_INHERIT)));
2389                        if(type == Places.CLIMASK_INHERIT)
2390                                type=0;
2391                        mob.session().println(L("    R) Wet and Rainy    : @x1",""+((type&Places.CLIMASK_WET)>0)));
2392                        mob.session().println(L("    H) Excessively hot  : @x1",""+((type&Places.CLIMASK_HOT)>0)));
2393                        mob.session().println(L("    C) Excessively cold : @x1",""+((type&Places.CLIMASK_COLD)>0)));
2394                        mob.session().println(L("    W) Very windy       : @x1",""+((type&Places.CLIMASK_WINDY)>0)));
2395                        mob.session().println(L("    D) Very dry         : @x1",""+((type&Places.CLIMASK_DRY)>0)));
2396                        c=mob.session().choose(L("Enter one to change, or ENTER when done: "),L("RHCWDI\n"),"\n").toUpperCase();
2397                        switch(c.charAt(0))
2398                        {
2399                        case 'I':
2400                                A.setClimateType(Places.CLIMASK_INHERIT);
2401                                break;
2402                        case 'C':
2403                                toggleClimateMask(A, Places.CLIMASK_COLD);
2404                                break;
2405                        case 'H':
2406                                toggleClimateMask(A, Places.CLIMASK_HOT);
2407                                break;
2408                        case 'R':
2409                                toggleClimateMask(A, Places.CLIMASK_WET);
2410                                break;
2411                        case 'W':
2412                                toggleClimateMask(A, Places.CLIMASK_WINDY);
2413                                break;
2414                        case 'D':
2415                                toggleClimateMask(A, Places.CLIMASK_DRY);
2416                                break;
2417                        }
2418                }
2419        }
2420
2421        protected void genCharStats(final MOB mob, final CharStats E)
2422        throws IOException
2423        {
2424                String c="Q";
2425                final String commandStr="ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890!@#$%&*()=+-[]|{}_?,.;:~";
2426                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!c.equals("\n")))
2427                {
2428                        for(final int i : CharStats.CODES.ALLCODES())
2429                        {
2430                                if(i!=CharStats.STAT_GENDER)
2431                                        mob.session().println("    "+commandStr.charAt(i)+") "+CMStrings.padRight(CharStats.CODES.DESC(i),20)+":"+((E.getStat(i))));
2432                        }
2433                        c=mob.session().choose(L("Enter one to change, or ENTER when done: "),commandStr.substring(0,CharStats.CODES.TOTAL())+"\n","\n").toUpperCase();
2434                        final int num=commandStr.indexOf(c);
2435                        if(num>=0)
2436                        {
2437                                final String newVal=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new value:  @x1 (@x2): ",CharStats.CODES.DESC(num),""+E.getStat(num)),"");
2438                                if(((CMath.s_int(newVal)>0)||(newVal.trim().equals("0")))
2439                                &&(num!=CharStats.STAT_GENDER))
2440                                        E.setStat(num,CMath.s_int(newVal));
2441                                else
2442                                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
2443                        }
2444                }
2445        }
2446
2447        protected void genCommonBonus(final MOB mob, final PlayerStats pStats, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
2448                        throws IOException
2449        {
2450                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
2451                        return;
2452                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
2453                {
2454                        final StringBuffer buf=new StringBuffer(showNumber+". New Char Bonuses: ");
2455                        buf.append(" C:").append(pStats.getBonusCommonSkillLimits())
2456                           .append(" F:").append(pStats.getBonusCraftingSkillLimits())
2457                           .append(" G:").append(pStats.getBonusNonCraftingSkillLimits())
2458                           .append(" L:").append(pStats.getBonusLanguageLimits())
2459                           .append(" R:").append(pStats.getBonusCharStatPoints());
2460                        mob.tell(buf.toString());
2461                        return;
2462                }
2463
2464                pStats.setBonusCommonSkillLimits(CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("*. Bonus Common Skills (@x1): ",""+pStats.getBonusCommonSkillLimits()),""+pStats.getBonusCommonSkillLimits())));
2465                pStats.setBonusCraftingSkillLimits(CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("*. Bonus Craft Skills (@x1): ",""+pStats.getBonusCraftingSkillLimits()),""+pStats.getBonusCraftingSkillLimits())));
2466                pStats.setBonusNonCraftingSkillLimits(CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("*. Bonus Gather Skills (@x1): ",""+pStats.getBonusNonCraftingSkillLimits()),""+pStats.getBonusNonCraftingSkillLimits())));
2467                pStats.setBonusLanguageLimits(CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("*. Bonus Languages (@x1): ",""+pStats.getBonusLanguageLimits()),""+pStats.getBonusLanguageLimits())));
2468                pStats.setBonusCharStatPoints(CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("*. Bonus Creation Pts (@x1): ",""+pStats.getBonusCharStatPoints()),""+pStats.getBonusCharStatPoints())));
2469        }
2470
2471        protected void genCharStats(final MOB mob, final MOB E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
2472                throws IOException
2473        {
2474                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
2475                        return;
2476                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
2477                {
2478                        final StringBuffer buf=new StringBuffer(showNumber+". Stats: ");
2479                        for(final int i : CharStats.CODES.BASECODES())
2480                                buf.append(CharStats.CODES.ABBR(i)+":"+E.baseCharStats().getStat(i)+" ");
2481                        mob.tell(buf.toString());
2482                        return;
2483                }
2484                String c="Q";
2485                final String commandStr="ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890!@#$%^&*()=+-";
2486                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!c.equals("\n")))
2487                {
2488                        for(final int i : CharStats.CODES.ALLCODES())
2489                        {
2490                                if(i!=CharStats.STAT_GENDER)
2491                                        mob.session().println("    "+commandStr.charAt(i)+") "+CMStrings.padRight(CharStats.CODES.DESC(i),20)+":"+((E.baseCharStats().getStat(i))));
2492                        }
2493                        c=mob.session().choose(L("Enter one to change, or ENTER when done: "),commandStr.substring(0,CharStats.CODES.TOTAL())+"\n","\n").toUpperCase();
2494                        final int num=commandStr.indexOf(c);
2495                        if(num>=0)
2496                        {
2497                                final String newVal=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new value:  @x1 (@x2): ",CharStats.CODES.DESC(num),""+E.baseCharStats().getStat(num)),"");
2498                                if(((CMath.s_int(newVal)>0)||(newVal.trim().equals("0")))
2499                                &&(num!=CharStats.STAT_GENDER))
2500                                {
2501                                        E.baseCharStats().setStat(num,CMath.s_int(newVal));
2502                                        if((num==CharStats.STAT_AGE)&&(E.playerStats()!=null)&&(E.playerStats().getBirthday()!=null))
2503                                        {
2504                                                final TimeClock C=CMLib.time().localClock(E.getStartRoom());
2505                                                E.playerStats().getBirthday()[PlayerStats.BIRTHDEX_YEAR]=C.getYear()-CMath.s_int(newVal);
2506                                        }
2507                                }
2508                                else
2509                                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
2510                        }
2511                }
2512        }
2513
2514        protected void genCharState(final MOB mob, final MOB E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
2515        throws IOException
2516        {
2517                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
2518                        return;
2519                final CharState baseState=E.baseState();
2520                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
2521                {
2522                        final StringBuffer buf=new StringBuffer(showNumber+". State: ");
2523                        for(final String i : baseState.getStatCodes())
2524                                buf.append(i.substring(0,2)+":"+E.baseState().getStat(i)+" ");
2525                        mob.tell(buf.toString());
2526                        return;
2527                }
2528                String c="Q";
2529                final String commandStr="ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890!@#$%^&*()=+-";
2530                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!c.equals("\n")))
2531                {
2532                        for(int i=0;i<baseState.getStatCodes().length;i++)
2533                        {
2534                                final String state=baseState.getStatCodes()[i];
2535                                mob.session().println("    "+commandStr.charAt(i)+") "+CMStrings.padRight(state,20)+":"+((baseState.getStat(state))));
2536                        }
2537                        c=mob.session().choose(L("Enter one to change, or ENTER when done: "),commandStr.substring(0,baseState.getStatCodes().length)+"\n","\n").toUpperCase();
2538                        final int num=commandStr.indexOf(c);
2539                        if(num>=0)
2540                        {
2541                                final String state=baseState.getStatCodes()[num];
2542                                final String newVal=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new value:  @x1 (@x2): ",state,baseState.getStat(state)),"");
2543                                if(((CMath.s_int(newVal)>0)||(newVal.trim().equals("0"))))
2544                                {
2545                                        baseState.setStat(state,Integer.toString(CMath.s_int(newVal)));
2546                                }
2547                                else
2548                                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
2549                        }
2550                }
2551        }
2552
2553        protected void genSensesMask(final MOB mob, final PhyStats E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
2554                throws IOException
2555        {
2556                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
2557                        return;
2558                final int[] senses={
2559                                          PhyStats.CAN_SEE_DARK,
2560                                          PhyStats.CAN_SEE_HIDDEN,
2561                                          PhyStats.CAN_SEE_INVISIBLE,
2562                                          PhyStats.CAN_SEE_SNEAKERS,
2563                                          PhyStats.CAN_SEE_INFRARED,
2564                                          PhyStats.CAN_SEE_GOOD,
2565                                          PhyStats.CAN_SEE_EVIL,
2566                                          PhyStats.CAN_SEE_BONUS,
2567                                          PhyStats.CAN_NOT_SPEAK,
2568                                          PhyStats.CAN_NOT_HEAR,
2569                                          PhyStats.CAN_NOT_SEE,
2570                                          PhyStats.CAN_SEE_HIDDEN_ITEMS,
2571                };
2572                final String[] briefs={"darkvision",
2573                                                                 "hidden",
2574                                                                 "invisible",
2575                                                                 "sneakers",
2576                                                                 "infrared",
2577                                                                 "good",
2578                                                                 "evil",
2579                                                                 "magic",
2580                                                                 "mute",
2581                                                                 "deaf",
2582                                                                 "blind",
2583                                                                 "items"};
2584                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
2585                {
2586                        final StringBuffer buf=new StringBuffer(showNumber+". Senses: ");
2587                        for(int i=0;i<senses.length;i++)
2588                        {
2589                                final int mask=senses[i];
2590                                if((E.sensesMask()&mask)!=0)
2591                                        buf.append(briefs[i]+" ");
2592                        }
2593                        mob.tell(buf.toString());
2594                        return;
2595                }
2596                String c="Q";
2597                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!c.equals("\n")))
2598                {
2599                        char letter='A';
2600                        String letters="";
2601                        for (final int mask : senses)
2602                        {
2603                                for(int num=0;num<PhyStats.CAN_SEE_DESCS.length;num++)
2604                                {
2605                                        if(mask==CMath.pow(2,num))
2606                                        {
2607                                                letters+=letter;
2608                                                mob.session().println("    "+letter+") "+CMStrings.padRight(PhyStats.CAN_SEE_DESCS[num],20)+":"+((E.sensesMask()&mask)!=0));
2609                                                break;
2610                                        }
2611                                }
2612                                letter++;
2613                        }
2614                        c=mob.session().choose(L("Enter one to change, or ENTER when done: "),letters+"\n","\n").toUpperCase();
2615                        letter='A';
2616                        for (final int mask : senses)
2617                        {
2618                                if(letter==Character.toUpperCase(c.charAt(0)))
2619                                {
2620                                        toggleSensesMask(E,mask);
2621                                        break;
2622                                }
2623                                letter++;
2624                        }
2625                }
2626        }
2627
2628        protected void genDoorsNLocks(final MOB mob, final CloseableLockable E, final String doorName, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
2629                throws IOException
2630        {
2631                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
2632                        return;
2633                boolean HasDoor=E.hasADoor();
2634                boolean Open=E.isOpen();
2635                boolean DefaultsClosed=E.defaultsClosed();
2636                boolean HasLock=E.hasALock();
2637                boolean Locked=E.isLocked();
2638                boolean DefaultsLocked=E.defaultsLocked();
2639                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
2640                {
2641                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Has a @x5: @x2\n\r   Has a lock  : @x3\n\r   Open ticks: @x4",""+showNumber,""+E.hasADoor(),""+E.hasALock(),""+E.openDelayTicks(),doorName));
2642                        return;
2643                }
2644
2645                if(genGenericPrompt(mob,"Has a "+doorName,E.hasADoor()))
2646                {
2647                        HasDoor=true;
2648                        DefaultsClosed=genGenericPrompt(mob,"Defaults closed",E.defaultsClosed());
2649                        Open=!DefaultsClosed;
2650                        if(genGenericPrompt(mob,"Has a lock",E.hasALock()))
2651                        {
2652                                HasLock=true;
2653                                DefaultsLocked=genGenericPrompt(mob,"Defaults locked",E.defaultsLocked());
2654                                Locked=DefaultsLocked;
2655                        }
2656                        else
2657                        {
2658                                HasLock=false;
2659                                Locked=false;
2660                                DefaultsLocked=false;
2661                        }
2662                        mob.tell(L("\n\rReset Delay (# ticks): '@x1'.",""+E.openDelayTicks()));
2663                        final int newLevel=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new delay\n\r:"),""));
2664                        if(newLevel>0)
2665                                E.setOpenDelayTicks(newLevel);
2666                        else
2667                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
2668                }
2669                else
2670                {
2671                        HasDoor=false;
2672                        Open=true;
2673                        DefaultsClosed=false;
2674                        HasLock=false;
2675                        Locked=false;
2676                        DefaultsLocked=false;
2677                }
2678                E.setDoorsNLocks(HasDoor,Open,DefaultsClosed,HasLock,Locked,DefaultsLocked);
2679        }
2680
2681        public String makeContainerTypes(final Container E)
2682        {
2683                String canContain=", "+Container.CONTAIN_DESCS[0];
2684                if(E.containTypes()>0)
2685                {
2686                        canContain="";
2687                        for(int i=0;i<Container.CONTAIN_DESCS.length-1;i++)
2688                                if(CMath.isSet((int)E.containTypes(),i))
2689                                        canContain+=", "+Container.CONTAIN_DESCS[i+1];
2690                }
2691                return canContain.substring(2);
2692        }
2693
2694        protected void genContainerTypes(final MOB mob, final Container E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
2695                throws IOException
2696        {
2697                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
2698                        return;
2699                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
2700                {
2701                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Can contain : @x2",""+showNumber,makeContainerTypes(E))); // portals use keys as roomids, showing is OK
2702                        return;
2703                }
2704                String change="NO";
2705                if(!(E instanceof Electronics))
2706                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(change.length()>0))
2707                {
2708                        mob.tell(L("\n\rCan only contain: @x1",makeContainerTypes(E)));
2709                        change=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a type to add/remove (?)\n\r:"),"");
2710                        if(change.length()==0)
2711                                break;
2712                        int found=-1;
2713                        if(change.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
2714                        {
2715                                for (final String element : Container.CONTAIN_DESCS)
2716                                        mob.tell(element);
2717                        }
2718                        else
2719                        {
2720                                for(int i=0;i<Container.CONTAIN_DESCS.length;i++)
2721                                {
2722                                        if(Container.CONTAIN_DESCS[i].startsWith(change.toUpperCase()))
2723                                                found=i;
2724                                }
2725                                if(found<0)
2726                                        mob.tell(L("Unknown type.  Try '?'."));
2727                                else
2728                                if(found==0)
2729                                        E.setContainTypes(0);
2730                                else
2731                                if(CMath.isSet((int)E.containTypes(),found-1))
2732                                        E.setContainTypes(E.containTypes()-CMath.pow(2,found-1));
2733                                else
2734                                        E.setContainTypes(E.containTypes()|CMath.pow(2,found-1));
2735                        }
