2736                }
2737        }
2738
2739        protected void genLevel(final MOB mob, final Physical P, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
2740        {
2741                if(P.basePhyStats().level()<0)
2742                        P.basePhyStats().setLevel(1);
2743                P.basePhyStats().setLevel(prompt(mob,P.basePhyStats().level(),showNumber,showFlag,"Level"));
2744        }
2745
2746        protected void genRejuv(final MOB mob, final Physical P, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
2747                throws IOException
2748        {
2749                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
2750                        return;
2751                if(P instanceof Item)
2752                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Rejuv/Pct: '@x2' (0=special).",""+showNumber,""+P.basePhyStats().rejuv()));
2753                else
2754                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Rejuv Ticks: '@x2' (0=never).",""+showNumber,""+P.basePhyStats().rejuv()));
2755                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
2756                        return;
2757                final String rlevel=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter new amount\n\r:"),"");
2758                final int newLevel=CMath.s_int(rlevel);
2759                if((newLevel>0)||(rlevel.trim().equals("0")))
2760                {
2761                        P.basePhyStats().setRejuv(newLevel);
2762                        if(((P.basePhyStats().rejuv()==0)||(P.basePhyStats().rejuv()==PhyStats.NO_REJUV))&&(P instanceof MOB))
2763                        {
2764                                P.basePhyStats().setRejuv(PhyStats.NO_REJUV);
2765                                mob.tell(L("@x1 will now never rejuvenate.",P.Name()));
2766                        }
2767                }
2768                else
2769                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
2770        }
2771
2772        protected void genUses(final MOB mob, final Item I, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
2773        {
2774                if(I instanceof Ammunition)
2775                        I.setUsesRemaining(prompt(mob,((Ammunition)I).ammunitionRemaining(),showNumber,showFlag,"Ammo Remaining"));
2776                else
2777                        I.setUsesRemaining(prompt(mob,I.usesRemaining(),showNumber,showFlag,"Uses Remaining"));
2778        }
2779
2780        protected void genMaxUses(final MOB mob, final Wand W, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
2781        {
2782                W.setMaxUses(prompt(mob,W.maxUses(),showNumber,showFlag,"Maximum Uses"));
2783        }
2784
2785        protected void genCondition(final MOB mob, final Item I, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
2786        {
2787                I.setUsesRemaining(prompt(mob,I.usesRemaining(),showNumber,showFlag,"Condition"));
2788        }
2789
2790        @Override
2791        public void genMiscSet(final MOB mob, final Environmental E, final int showFlag)
2792                throws IOException
2793        {
2794                try
2795                {
2796                        if(E!=mob)
2797                                CMLib.threads().suspendTicking(E, -1);
2798                        if(CMLib.flags().isCataloged(E))
2799                        {
2800                                if(CMLib.catalog().isCatalogObj(E.Name()))
2801                                        mob.tell(L("*** This object is Cataloged **\n\r"));
2802                                else
2803                                        mob.tell(L("*** This object WAS cataloged and is still tied **\n\r"));
2804                        }
2805
2806                        if(E instanceof ShopKeeper)
2807                                modifyGenShopkeeper(mob,(ShopKeeper)E,showFlag);
2808                        else
2809                        if(E instanceof MOB)
2810                        {
2811                                if(((MOB)E).playerStats()==null)
2812                                        modifyGenMOB(mob,(MOB)E,showFlag);
2813                                else
2814                                        modifyPlayer(mob,(MOB)E,showFlag);
2815                        }
2816                        else
2817                        if((E instanceof Exit)&&(!(E instanceof Item)))
2818                                modifyGenExit(mob,(Exit)E,showFlag);
2819                        else
2820                        if(E instanceof com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Items.interfaces.RoomMap)
2821                                modifyGenMap(mob,(com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Items.interfaces.RoomMap)E,showFlag);
2822                        else
2823                        if(E instanceof Armor)
2824                                modifyGenArmor(mob,(Armor)E,showFlag);
2825                        else
2826                        if(E instanceof MusicalInstrument)
2827                                modifyGenInstrument(mob,(MusicalInstrument)E,showFlag);
2828                        else
2829                        if(E instanceof Food)
2830                                modifyGenFood(mob,(Food)E,showFlag);
2831                        else
2832                        if((E instanceof Drink)&&(E instanceof Item))
2833                                modifyGenDrink(mob,(Drink)E,showFlag);
2834                        else
2835                        if(E instanceof Weapon)
2836                                modifyGenWeapon(mob,(Weapon)E,showFlag);
2837                        else
2838                        if(E instanceof Container)
2839                                modifyGenContainer(mob,(Container)E,showFlag);
2840                        else
2841                        if(E instanceof Item)
2842                        {
2843                                if(E.ID().equals("GenWallpaper"))
2844                                        modifyGenWallpaper(mob,(Item)E,showFlag);
2845                                else
2846                                        modifyGenItem(mob,(Item)E,showFlag);
2847                        }
2848                        if((E instanceof Physical)&&(showFlag != -950))
2849                                catalogCheckUpdate(mob, (Physical)E);
2850                }
2851                finally
2852                {
2853                        if(E!=mob)
2854                                CMLib.threads().resumeTicking(E, -1);
2855                }
2856        }
2857
2858        @Override
2859        public void genMiscText(final MOB mob, final Environmental E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
2860                throws IOException
2861        {
2862                if(E.isGeneric())
2863                        genMiscSet(mob,E,showFlag);
2864                else
2865                {
2866                        E.setMiscText(prompt(mob, E.text(), showNumber, showFlag, "Misc Text", true, false));
2867                }
2868        }
2869
2870        protected void genTitleRoom(final MOB mob, final LandTitle L, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
2871                throws IOException
2872        {
2873                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
2874                        return;
2875                mob.tell(L("@x1. Land plot ID: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,L.landPropertyID()));
2876                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
2877                        return;
2878                String newText="?!?!";
2879                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())
2880                        &&((newText.length()>0)&&(CMLib.map().getRoom(newText)==null)))
2881                {
2882                        newText=mob.session().prompt(L("New Property ID:"),"");
2883                        if((newText.length()==0)
2884                        &&(CMLib.map().getRoom(newText)==null)
2885                        &&(CMLib.map().getArea(newText)==null))
2886                                mob.tell(L("That property (room ID) doesn't exist!"));
2887                }
2888                if(newText.length()>0)
2889                        L.setLandPropertyID(newText);
2890                else
2891                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
2892
2893        }
2894
2895        public void genAbility(final MOB mob, final Physical P, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String prompt) throws IOException
2896        {
2897                P.basePhyStats().setAbility(prompt(mob, P.basePhyStats().ability(), showNumber, showFlag, prompt));
2898        }
2899
2900        @Override
2901        public void genAbility(final MOB mob, final Physical P, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
2902        {
2903                if(P instanceof Electronics)
2904                        genAbility(mob,P,showNumber,showFlag,"Technical Level");
2905                else
2906                        genAbility(mob,P,showNumber,showFlag,"Magical Ability");
2907        }
2908
2909        protected void genCoinStuff(final MOB mob, final Coins I, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
2910        throws IOException
2911        {
2912                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
2913                        return;
2914                mob.tell(L("@x1. Money data: '@x2 x @x3'.",""+showNumber,""+I.getNumberOfCoins(),CMLib.beanCounter().getDenominationName(I.getCurrency(),I.getDenomination())));
2915                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
2916                        return;
2917                boolean gocontinue=true;
2918                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(gocontinue))
2919                {
2920                        gocontinue=false;
2921                        String oldCurrency=I.getCurrency();
2922                        if(oldCurrency.length()==0)
2923                                oldCurrency="Default";
2924                        oldCurrency=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter currency code (?):"),oldCurrency).trim().toUpperCase();
2925                        if(oldCurrency.equalsIgnoreCase("Default"))
2926                        {
2927                                if(I.getCurrency().length()>0)
2928                                        I.setCurrency("");
2929                                else
2930                                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
2931                        }
2932                        else
2933                        if((oldCurrency.length()==0)||(oldCurrency.equalsIgnoreCase(I.getCurrency())))
2934                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
2935                        else
2936                        if(!CMLib.beanCounter().getAllCurrencies().contains(oldCurrency))
2937                        {
2938                                final List<String> V=CMLib.beanCounter().getAllCurrencies();
2939                                for(int v=0;v<V.size();v++)
2940                                {
2941                                        if(V.get(v).length()==0)
2942                                                V.set(v,"Default");
2943                                }
2944                                mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not a known currency. Existing currencies include: DEFAULT@x2",oldCurrency,CMParms.toListString(V)));
2945                                gocontinue=true;
2946                        }
2947                        else
2948                                I.setCurrency(oldCurrency.toUpperCase().trim());
2949                }
2950                gocontinue=true;
2951                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(gocontinue))
2952                {
2953                        gocontinue=false;
2954                        String newDenom=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter denomination (?):"),""+I.getDenomination()).trim().toUpperCase();
2955                        final MoneyLibrary.MoneyDenomination[] DV=CMLib.beanCounter().getCurrencySet(I.getCurrency());
2956                        if((newDenom.length()>0)
2957                        &&(!CMath.isDouble(newDenom))
2958                        &&(!newDenom.equalsIgnoreCase("?")))
2959                        {
2960                                final double denom=CMLib.english().matchAnyDenomination(I.getCurrency(),newDenom);
2961                                if(denom>0.0)
2962                                        newDenom=""+denom;
2963                        }
2964                        if((newDenom.length()==0)
2965                        ||(CMath.isDouble(newDenom)
2966                                &&(!newDenom.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
2967                                &&(CMath.s_double(newDenom)==I.getDenomination())))
2968                                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
2969                        else
2970                        if((newDenom.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
2971                        ||(!CMath.isDouble(newDenom))
2972                        ||((DV!=null)&&(CMLib.beanCounter().getDenominationIndex(I.getCurrency(), CMath.s_double(newDenom))<0)))
2973                        {
2974                                StringBuffer allDenoms=new StringBuffer("");
2975                                if(DV!=null)
2976                                {
2977                                        for (final MoneyDenomination element : DV)
2978                                                allDenoms.append(element.value()+"("+element.name()+"), ");
2979                                }
2980                                if(allDenoms.toString().endsWith(", "))
2981                                        allDenoms=new StringBuffer(allDenoms.substring(0,allDenoms.length()-2));
2982                                mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not a defined denomination. Try one of these: @x2.",newDenom,allDenoms.toString()));
2983                                gocontinue=true;
2984                        }
2985                        else
2986                                I.setDenomination(CMath.s_double(newDenom));
2987                }
2988                if((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
2989                        I.setNumberOfCoins(CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Enter stack size\n\r:"),""+I.getNumberOfCoins())));
2990        }
2991
2992        protected void genHitPoints(final MOB mob, final MOB M, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
2993        {
2994                if(M.isMonster())
2995                        M.basePhyStats().setAbility(prompt(mob,M.basePhyStats().ability(),showNumber,showFlag,"Hit Points Bonus Modifier","Hit points = (level*level) + (random*level*THIS)"));
2996                else
2997                        M.basePhyStats().setAbility(prompt(mob,M.basePhyStats().ability(),showNumber,showFlag,"Ability -- unused"));
2998        }
2999
3000        protected void genValue(final MOB mob, final Item I, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
3001        {
3002                I.setBaseValue(prompt(mob,I.baseGoldValue(),showNumber,showFlag,"Base Value"));
3003        }

3005        protected void genWeight(final MOB mob, final Physical P, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException

3007                P.basePhyStats().setWeight(prompt(mob,P.basePhyStats().weight(),showNumber,showFlag,"Weight"));
3008        }
3009
3010        protected void genClanItem(final MOB mob, final ClanItem I, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
3011                throws IOException
3012        {
3013                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3014                        return;
3015                mob.tell(L("@x1. Clan: '@x2', Type: @x3.",""+showNumber,I.clanID(),I.getClanItemType().toString()));
3016                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
3017                        return;
3018                final String clanID=I.clanID();
3019                I.setClanID(mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new clan\n\r:"),clanID));
3020                if(I.clanID().equals(clanID))
3021                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
3022                final String clanType=I.getClanItemType().toString();
3023                String s="?";
3024                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(s.equals("?")))
3025                {
3026                        s=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new type (?)\n\r:"),clanType);
3027                        if(s.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
3028                                mob.tell(L("Types: @x1",CMParms.toListString(ClanItem.ClanItemType.ALL)));
3029                        else
3030                        if(s.equalsIgnoreCase(clanType))
3031                        {
3032                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
3033                                break;
3034                        }
3035                        else
3036                        {
3037                                final ClanItemType type = ClanItemType.getValueOf(s);
3038                                if(type != null)
3039                                {
3040                                        I.setClanItemType(type);
3041                                }
3042                                else
3043                                {
3044                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is unknown.  Try '?'",s));
3045                                        s="?";
3046                                }
3047                        }
3048                }
3049        }
3050
3051        protected void genHeight(final MOB mob, final Physical P, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
3052        {
3053                P.basePhyStats().setHeight(prompt(mob, P.basePhyStats().height(), showNumber, showFlag, "Height"));
3054        }

3056        protected void genSize(final MOB mob, final Armor A, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
3057        {

3060
3061        @Override
3062        public void wornLayer(final MOB mob, final short[] layerAtt, final short[] clothingLayer, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
3063                throws IOException
3064        {
3065                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3066                        return;
3067                final boolean seeThroughBool=CMath.bset(layerAtt[0],Armor.LAYERMASK_SEETHROUGH);
3068                final boolean multiWearBool=CMath.bset(layerAtt[0],Armor.LAYERMASK_MULTIWEAR);
3069                final String seeThroughStr=(!seeThroughBool)?" (opaque)":" (see-through)";
3070                final String multiWearStr=multiWearBool?" (multi)":"";
3071                mob.tell(L("@x1. Layer: '@x2'@x3@x4.",""+showNumber,""+clothingLayer[0],seeThroughStr,multiWearStr));
3072                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
3073                        return;
3074                if((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
3075                        clothingLayer[0] = CMath.s_short(mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new layer\n\r:"),""+clothingLayer[0]));
3076                boolean newSeeThrough=seeThroughBool;
3077                if((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
3078                        newSeeThrough=mob.session().confirm(L("Is see-through (Y/N)? "),""+seeThroughBool);
3079                boolean multiWear=multiWearBool;
3080                if((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
3081                        multiWear=mob.session().confirm(L("Is multi-wear (Y/N)? "),""+multiWearBool);
3082                layerAtt[0] = (short)0;
3083                layerAtt[0] = (short)(layerAtt[0]|(newSeeThrough?Armor.LAYERMASK_SEETHROUGH:0));
3084                layerAtt[0] = (short)(layerAtt[0]|(multiWear?Armor.LAYERMASK_MULTIWEAR:0));
3085        }
3086
3087        public void genTPQ(final MOB mob, final MOB me, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
3088        {
3089                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3090                        return;
3091                mob.tell(L("@x1. Trains: @x2, Pracs: @x3, Quest Pts: @x4",""+showNumber,""+me.getTrains(), ""+me.getPractices(), ""+me.getQuestPoint()));
3092                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
3093                        return;
3094                me.setTrains(CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("*. Training Points ("+me.getTrains()+"): ",""+me.getTrains())),me.getTrains()));
3095                me.setPractices(CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("*. Practice Points ("+me.getPractices()+"): ",""+me.getPractices())),me.getPractices()));
3096                me.setQuestPoint(CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("*. Quest Points ("+me.getQuestPoint()+"): ",""+me.getQuestPoint())),me.getQuestPoint()));
3097        }
3098
3099        protected void genLayer(final MOB mob, final Armor E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
3100        {
3101                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3102                        return;
3103                final short[] layerAtt = new short[]{E.getLayerAttributes()};
3104                final short[] clothingLayer = new short[]{E.getClothingLayer()};
3105                wornLayer(mob,layerAtt,clothingLayer,showNumber,showFlag);
3106                E.setClothingLayer(clothingLayer[0]);
3107                E.setLayerAttributes(layerAtt[0]);
3108        }

3150        protected void genArmor(final MOB mob, final Physical P, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
3151        {

3153                        P.basePhyStats().setArmor(prompt(mob,P.basePhyStats().armor(),showNumber,showFlag,"Armor (lower-better)"));

3158        protected void genMoney(final MOB mob, final MOB M, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
3159        {
3160                if(M.getMoney()==0)
3161                {
3162                        final double d=CMLib.beanCounter().getTotalAbsoluteNativeValue(M);
3163                        CMLib.beanCounter().subtractMoney(M,d);
3164                        M.setMoney((int)Math.round(d));
3165                }
3166                CMLib.beanCounter().setMoney(M,prompt(mob,M.getMoney(),showNumber,showFlag,"Money"));
3167        }
3168
3169        protected void genWeaponAmmo(final MOB mob, final Weapon W, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
3170                throws IOException
3171        {
3172                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3173                        return;
3174                if(!(W instanceof AmmunitionWeapon))
3175                        return;
3176                final AmmunitionWeapon AW=(AmmunitionWeapon)W;
3177                final String defaultAmmo=(AW.requiresAmmunition())?"Y":"N";
3178                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
3179                {
3180                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Ammo required: @x2 (@x3/@x4)",""+showNumber,""+AW.requiresAmmunition(),""+AW.ammunitionCapacity(),""+AW.ammunitionType()));
3181                        return;
3182                }
3183
3184                if(mob.session().confirm(L("Does this weapon require ammunition (default=@x1) (Y/N)?",defaultAmmo),defaultAmmo))
3185                {
3186                        mob.tell(L("\n\rAmmo type: '@x1'.",AW.ammunitionType()));
3187                        final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new one\n\r:"),"");
3188                        if(newName.length()>0)
3189                        {
3190                                AW.setAmmunitionType(newName);
3191                                mob.tell(L("(Remember to create a GenAmmunition item with '@x1' in the secret identity, and the uses remaining above 0!",AW.ammunitionType()));
3192                        }
3193                        else
3194                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
3195                        mob.tell(L("\n\rAmmo capacity: '@x1'.)",""+AW.ammunitionCapacity()));
3196                        final int newValue=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new value\n\r:"),""));
3197                        if(newValue>0)
3198                                AW.setAmmoCapacity(newValue);
3199                        else
3200                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
3201                        AW.setAmmoRemaining(AW.ammunitionCapacity());
3202                }
3203                else
3204                {
3205                        AW.setAmmunitionType("");
3206                        AW.setAmmoCapacity(0);
3207                }
3208        }
3209
3210        protected void genWeaponRanges(final MOB mob, final Weapon W, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
3211                throws IOException
3212        {
3213                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3214                        return;
3215                mob.tell(L("@x1. Minimum/Maximum Ranges: @x2/@x3.",""+showNumber,""+W.minRange(),""+W.maxRange()));
3216                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
3217                        return;
3218                final String newMinStr=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new minimum range\n\r:"),"");
3219                final String newMaxStr=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new maximum range\n\r:"),"");
3220                if((newMinStr.length()==0)&&(newMaxStr.length()==0))
3221                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
3222                else
3223                {
3224                        W.setRanges(CMath.s_int(newMinStr),CMath.s_int(newMaxStr));
3225                        if((W.minRange()>W.maxRange())||(W.minRange()<0)||(W.maxRange()<0))
3226                        {
3227                                mob.tell(L("(defective entries.  resetting.)"));
3228                                W.setRanges(0,0);
3229                        }
3230                }
3231        }
3232
3233        protected void genWeaponType(final MOB mob, final Weapon W, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
3234                throws IOException
3235        {
3236                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3237                        return;
3238                mob.tell(L("@x1. Weapon Attack Type: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,Weapon.TYPE_DESCS[W.weaponDamageType()]));
3239                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
3240                        return;
3241                boolean q=false;
3242                final String sel="NSPBFMR";
3243                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!q))
3244                {
3245                        final String newType=mob.session().choose(L("Enter a new value\n\r:"),sel+"?","");
3246                        if(newType.equals("?"))
3247                        {
3248                                for(int i=0;i<sel.length();i++)
3249                                        mob.tell(sel.charAt(i)+") "+Weapon.TYPE_DESCS[i]);
3250                                q=false;
3251                        }
3252                        else
3253                        {
3254                                q=true;
3255                                int newValue=-1;
3256                                if(newType.length()>0)
3257                                        newValue=sel.indexOf(newType.toUpperCase());
3258                                if(newValue>=0)
3259                                        W.setWeaponDamageType(newValue);
3260                                else
3261                                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
3262                        }
3263                }
3264        }
3265
3266        protected void getTheme(final MOB mob, final Area A, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
3267                throws IOException
3268        {
3269                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3270                        return;
3271                mob.tell(L("@x1. Theme setting: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,Area.THEME_PHRASE[A.getThemeCode()]));
3272                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
3273                        return;
3274                boolean q=false;
3275                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!q))
3276                {
3277                        final String newType=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new level (?)\n\r"),Area.THEME_PHRASE[A.getThemeCode()]);
3278                        if(newType.equals("?"))
3279                        {
3280                                final StringBuffer say=new StringBuffer("");
3281                                for(int i=1;i<Area.THEME_PHRASE.length;i++)
3282                                        say.append(i+") "+Area.THEME_PHRASE[i]+"\n\r");
3283                                mob.tell(say.toString());
3284                                q=false;
3285                        }
3286                        else
3287                        {
3288                                q=true;
3289                                int newValue=-1;
3290                                if(CMath.s_int(newType)>0)
3291                                        newValue=CMath.s_int(newType);
3292                                else
3293                                for(int i=0;i<Area.THEME_PHRASE.length;i++)
3294                                {
3295                                        if(Area.THEME_PHRASE[i].toUpperCase().startsWith(newType.toUpperCase()))
3296                                                newValue=i;
3297                                }
3298                                if(newValue>=0)
3299                                        A.setTheme(newValue);
3300                                else
3301                                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
3302                        }
3303                }
3304        }
3305
3306        protected void genConsumedMaterials(final MOB mob, final FuelConsumer E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
3307        {
3308                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3309                        return;
3310                boolean q=false;
3311                final Session S=mob.session();
3312                while((S!=null)&&(!S.isStopped())&&(!q))
3313                {
3314                        final StringBuilder str=new StringBuilder("");
3315                        for(int i=0;i<E.getConsumedFuelTypes().length;i++)
3316                        {
3317                                if(i>0)
3318                                        str.append(", ");
3319                                str.append(RawMaterial.CODES.NAME(E.getConsumedFuelTypes()[i]));
3320                        }
3321                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Consumed Resources: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,str.toString()));
3322                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
3323                                return;
3324                        final String newType=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a resource to add/remove (?)\n\r:"),"");
3325                        if((newType==null)||(newType.length()==0))
3326                                return;
3327                        else
3328                        if(newType.equals("?"))
3329                        {
3330                                final StringBuffer say=new StringBuffer("");
3331                                for(final String codeName : RawMaterial.CODES.NAMES())
3332                                        say.append(codeName+", ");
3333                                mob.tell(say.toString().substring(0,say.length()-2));
3334                                q=false;
3335                        }
3336                        else
3337                        {
3338                                q=true;
3339                                final int newValue=RawMaterial.CODES.FIND_IgnoreCase(newType);
3340                                if(newValue>=0)
3341                                {
3342                                        if(CMParms.contains(E.getConsumedFuelTypes(), newValue))
3343                                        {
3344                                                final int[] newSet=new int[E.getConsumedFuelTypes().length-1];
3345                                                for(int o=0,n=0;o<E.getConsumedFuelTypes().length;o++)
3346                                                        if(E.getConsumedFuelTypes()[o]!=newValue)
3347                                                        newSet[n++]=E.getConsumedFuelTypes()[o];
3348                                                E.setConsumedFuelType(newSet);
3349                                        }
3350                                        else
3351                                        {
3352                                                final int[] newSet=Arrays.copyOf(E.getConsumedFuelTypes(),E.getConsumedFuelTypes().length+1);
3353                                                newSet[newSet.length-1]=newValue;
3354                                                E.setConsumedFuelType(newSet);
3355                                        }
3356                                }
3357                                else
3358                                        mob.tell(L("Unknown resource: '@x1'.  Use ? for a list.",newType));
3359                        }
3360                }
3361        }
3362
3363        protected void genMessageTypes(final MOB mob, final ShipWarComponent E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
3364        {
3365                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3366                        return;
3367                boolean q=false;
3368                final Session S=mob.session();
3369                while((S!=null)&&(!S.isStopped())&&(!q))
3370                {
3371                        final StringBuilder str=new StringBuilder("");
3372                        for(int i=0;i<E.getDamageMsgTypes().length;i++)
3373                        {
3374                                if(i>0)
3375                                        str.append(", ");
3376                                str.append(CMMsg.TYPE_DESCS[E.getDamageMsgTypes()[i]]);
3377                        }
3378                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Shielded Types: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,str.toString()));
3379                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
3380                                return;
3381                        final String newType=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a type to add/remove (?)\n\r:"),"");
3382                        if((newType==null)||(newType.length()==0))
3383                                return;
3384                        else
3385                        if(newType.equals("?"))
3386                        {
3387                                final StringBuffer say=new StringBuffer("");
3388                                for(final String codeName : CMMsg.TYPE_DESCS)
3389                                        say.append(codeName+", ");
3390                                mob.tell(say.toString().substring(0,say.length()-2));
3391                                q=false;
3392                        }
3393                        else
3394                        {
3395                                q=true;
3396                                final int newValue=CMParms.indexOf(CMMsg.TYPE_DESCS, newType.toUpperCase().trim());
3397                                if(newValue>=0)
3398                                {
3399                                        if(CMParms.contains(E.getDamageMsgTypes(), newValue))
3400                                        {
3401                                                final int[] newSet=new int[E.getDamageMsgTypes().length-1];
3402                                                for(int o=0,n=0;o<E.getDamageMsgTypes().length;o++)
3403                                                {
3404                                                        if(E.getDamageMsgTypes()[o]!=newValue)
3405                                                                newSet[n++]=E.getDamageMsgTypes()[o];
3406                                                }
3407                                                E.setDamageMsgTypes(newSet);
3408                                        }
3409                                        else
3410                                        {
3411                                                final int[] newSet=Arrays.copyOf(E.getDamageMsgTypes(),E.getDamageMsgTypes().length+1);
3412                                                newSet[newSet.length-1]=newValue;
3413                                                E.setDamageMsgTypes(newSet);
3414                                        }
3415                                }
3416                                else
3417                                        mob.tell(L("Unknown type: '@x1'.  Use ? for a list.",newType));
3418                        }
3419                }
3420        }
3421
3422        protected void genMaterialCode(final MOB mob, final Item E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
3423                        throws IOException
3424        {
3425                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3426                        return;
3427                E.setMaterial(genAnyMaterialCode(mob,"Material Type",E.material(),false,showNumber,showFlag));
3428        }
3429
3430        protected int genAnyMaterialCode(final MOB mob, final String prompt, int currMat, final boolean inheritOk, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
3431                throws IOException
3432        {
3433                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3434                        return currMat;
3435                String matName=(currMat<0)?"Inherited":RawMaterial.CODES.NAME(currMat);
3436                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+prompt+": '"+matName+"'.");
3437                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
3438                        return currMat;
3439                boolean q=false;
3440                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!q))
3441                {
3442                        matName=(currMat<0)?"Inherited":RawMaterial.CODES.NAME(currMat);
3443                        final String newType=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new material (?)\n\r:"),matName);
3444                        if(newType.equals("?"))
3445                        {
3446                                final StringBuffer say=new StringBuffer("");
3447                                if(inheritOk)
3448                                        say.append("Inherited, ");
3449                                for(final String S : RawMaterial.CODES.NAMES())
3450                                        say.append(S+", ");
3451                                mob.tell(say.toString().substring(0,say.length()-2));
3452                                q=false;
3453                        }
3454                        else
3455                        if(newType.equalsIgnoreCase("Inherited"))
3456                        {
3457                                q=true;
3458                                currMat=-1;
3459                        }
3460                        else
3461                        {
3462                                q=true;
3463                                final int newValue=RawMaterial.CODES.FIND_IgnoreCase(newType);
3464                                if(newValue>=0)
3465                                        currMat=newValue;
3466                                else
3467                                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
3468                        }
3469                }
3470                return currMat;
3471        }
3472
3473        protected void genBreathes(final MOB mob, final Race me, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
3474        {
3475                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3476                        return;
3477                boolean q=false;
3478                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!q))
3479                {
3480                        final StringBuilder matName=new StringBuilder("");
3481                        if(me.getBreathables().length==0)
3482                                matName.append("Anything");
3483                        else
3484                        for(final int r : me.getBreathables())
3485                                if(matName.length()>0)
3486                                        matName.append(", ").append(RawMaterial.CODES.NAME(r));
3487                                else
3488                                        matName.append(RawMaterial.CODES.NAME(r));
3489                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Can breathe: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,matName.toString()));
3490                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
3491                                return;
3492                        final String newType=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a material to add/remove, or ANYTHING (?)\n\r:"),"");
3493                        if(newType.trim().length()==0)
3494                                return;
3495                        if(newType.equals("?"))
3496                        {
3497                                final StringBuffer say=new StringBuffer("");
3498                                say.append("ANYTHING, ");
3499                                for(final String S : RawMaterial.CODES.NAMES())
3500                                        say.append(S+", ");
3501                                mob.tell(say.toString().substring(0,say.length()-2));
3502                                q=false;
3503                        }
3504                        else
3505                        if(newType.equalsIgnoreCase("ANYTHING"))
3506                        {
3507                                q=true;
3508                                me.setStat("BREATHES","");
3509                        }
3510                        else
3511                        {
3512                                q=false;
3513                                final int newValue=RawMaterial.CODES.FIND_IgnoreCase(newType);
3514                                if(newValue>=0)
3515                                {
3516                                        String newList;
3517                                        final int x=CMParms.indexOf(me.getBreathables(), newValue);
3518                                        if(x>=0)
3519                                        {
3520                                                if(me.getBreathables().length==1)
3521                                                        newList=""+RawMaterial.RESOURCE_AIR;
3522                                                else
3523                                                {
3524                                                        final StringBuilder str=new StringBuilder("");
3525                                                        for(final int r : me.getBreathables())
3526                                                        {
3527                                                                if(r!=newValue)
3528                                                                {
3529                                                                        if(str.length()>0)
3530                                                                                str.append(", ").append(r);
3531                                                                        else
3532                                                                                str.append(r);
3533                                                                }
3534                                                        }
3535                                                        newList=str.toString();
3536                                                }
3537                                                mob.tell(L("You've removed @x1",RawMaterial.CODES.NAME(newValue)));
3538                                        }
3539                                        else
3540                                        {
3541                                                final StringBuilder str=new StringBuilder(CMParms.toListString(me.getBreathables()));
3542                                                if(str.length()>0)
3543                                                        str.append(", ").append(newValue);
3544                                                else
3545                                                        str.append(newValue);
3546                                                newList=str.toString();
3547                                        }
3548                                        me.setStat("BREATHES",newList);
3549                                        mob.tell(L("You've added @x1",RawMaterial.CODES.NAME(newValue)));
3550                                }
3551                                else
3552                                        mob.tell(L("Unknown resource '@x1' (no change)",newType));
3553                        }
3554                }
3555        }
3556
3557        protected void genInstrumentType(final MOB mob, final MusicalInstrument E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
3558                throws IOException
3559        {
3560                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3561                        return;
3562                mob.tell(L("@x1. Instrument Type: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,E.getInstrumentTypeName()));
3563                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
3564                        return;
3565                boolean q=false;
3566                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!q))
3567                {
3568                        final String newType=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new type (?)\n\r:"),E.getInstrumentTypeName());
3569                        if(newType.equals("?"))
3570                        {
3571                                final StringBuffer say=new StringBuffer("");
3572                                for(final InstrumentType type : MusicalInstrument.InstrumentType.values())
3573                                        say.append(type.name()+", ");
3574                                mob.tell(say.toString().substring(0,say.length()-2));
3575                                q=false;
3576                        }
3577                        else
3578                        {
3579                                q=true;
3580                                InstrumentType newValue=null;
3581                                for(final InstrumentType type : MusicalInstrument.InstrumentType.values())
3582                                {
3583                                        if(newType.equalsIgnoreCase(type.name()))
3584                                                newValue=type;
3585                                }
3586                                if(newValue != null)
3587                                        E.setInstrumentType(newValue);
3588                                else
3589                                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
3590                        }
3591                }
3592        }
3593
3594        protected void genSpecialFaction(final MOB mob, final MOB E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final Faction F)
3595        throws IOException
3596        {
3597                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3598                        return;
3599                if(F==null)
3600                        return;
3601                final Faction.FRange myFR=CMLib.factions().getRange(F.factionID(),E.fetchFaction(F.factionID()));
3602                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+F.name()+": "+((myFR!=null)?myFR.name():"UNDEFINED")+" ("+E.fetchFaction(F.factionID())+")");
3603                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
3604                        return;
3605                for(final Enumeration<Faction.FRange> e=F.ranges();e.hasMoreElements();)
3606                {
3607                        final Faction.FRange FR=e.nextElement();
3608                        mob.tell(CMStrings.padRight(FR.name(),20)+": "+FR.low()+" - "+FR.high()+")");
3609                }
3610                final String newOne=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new value\n\r:"));
3611                if(CMath.isInteger(newOne))
3612                {
3613                        E.addFaction(F.factionID(),CMath.s_int(newOne));
3614                        return;
3615                }
3616                for(final Enumeration<Faction.FRange> e=F.ranges();e.hasMoreElements();)
3617                {
3618                        final Faction.FRange FR=e.nextElement();
3619                        if(FR.name().toUpperCase().startsWith(newOne.toUpperCase()))
3620                        {
3621                                if(FR.low()==F.minimum())
3622                                        E.addFaction(F.factionID(),FR.low());
3623                                else
3624                                if(FR.high()==F.maximum())
3625                                        E.addFaction(F.factionID(),FR.high());
3626                                else
3627                                        E.addFaction(F.factionID(),FR.low()+((FR.high()-FR.low())/2));
3628                                return;
3629                        }
3630                }
3631                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
3632        }
3633
3634        protected void genFaction(final MOB mob, final MOB E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
3635        throws IOException
3636        {
3637                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3638                        return;
3639                String newFact="Q";
3640                final int wrap=CMLib.lister().fixColWidth(50,mob.session());
3641                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(newFact.length()>0))
3642                {
3643                        String listing=E.getFactionListing();
3644                        if((listing.length()>wrap)&&((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999)))
3645                                listing=CMStrings.limit(listing, wrap)+((listing.length()>wrap)?"...":"");
3646                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Factions: @x2",""+showNumber,listing));
3647                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
3648                                return;
3649                        newFact=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a faction name to add or remove\n\r:"),"");
3650                        if(newFact.length()>0)
3651                        {
3652                                Faction lookedUp=CMLib.factions().getFactionByName(newFact);
3653                                if(lookedUp==null)
3654                                        lookedUp=CMLib.factions().getFaction(newFact);
3655                                if(lookedUp!=null)
3656                                {
3657                                        if (E.fetchFaction(lookedUp.factionID())!=Integer.MAX_VALUE)
3658                                        {
3659                                                // this mob already has this faction, they must want it removed
3660                                                E.removeFaction(lookedUp.factionID());
3661                                                mob.tell(L("Faction '@x1' removed.",lookedUp.name()));
3662                                        }
3663                                        else
3664                                        {
3665                                                final String howMuch = mob.session().prompt(L("How much faction (@x1)?",""+lookedUp.findDefault(E)),
3666                                                                   Integer.toString(lookedUp.findDefault(E)));
3667                                                if(CMath.isInteger(howMuch))
3668                                                {
3669                                                        int value =Integer.valueOf(howMuch).intValue();
3670                                                        if(value<lookedUp.minimum())
3671                                                                value=lookedUp.minimum();
3672                                                        if(value>lookedUp.maximum())
3673                                                                value=lookedUp.maximum();
3674                                                        E.addFaction(lookedUp.factionID(),value);
3675                                                        mob.tell(L("Faction '@x1' added.",lookedUp.name()));
3676                                                }
3677                                                else
3678                                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not a valid number.",howMuch));
3679                                        }
3680                                 }
3681                                 else
3682                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not recognized as a valid faction name or file.",newFact));
3683                        }
3684                }
3685        }
3686
3687        protected void genGender(final MOB mob, final MOB E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
3688                throws IOException
3689        {
3690                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3691                        return;
3692                mob.tell(L("@x1. Gender: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,""+Character.toUpperCase((char)E.baseCharStats().getStat(CharStats.STAT_GENDER))));
3693                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
3694                        return;
3695                final String newType=mob.session().choose(L("Enter a new gender (M/F/N)\n\r:"),L("MFN"),"");
3696                int newValue=-1;
3697                if(newType.length()>0)
3698                        newValue=("MFN").indexOf(newType.trim().toUpperCase());
3699                if(newValue>=0)
3700                {
3701                        switch(newValue)
3702                        {
3703                        case 0:
3704                                E.baseCharStats().setStat(CharStats.STAT_GENDER,'M');
3705                                break;
3706                        case 1:
3707                                E.baseCharStats().setStat(CharStats.STAT_GENDER,'F');
3708                                break;
3709                        case 2:
3710                                E.baseCharStats().setStat(CharStats.STAT_GENDER,'N');
3711                                break;
3712                        }
3713                }
3714                else
3715                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
3716        }
3717
3718        protected void genWeaponClassification(final MOB mob, final Weapon E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
3719                throws IOException
3720        {
3721                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3722                        return;
3723                mob.tell(L("@x1. Weapon Classification: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,Weapon.CLASS_DESCS[E.weaponClassification()]));
3724                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
3725                        return;
3726                boolean q=false;
3727                final String sel=("ABEFHKPRSDTN");
3728                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!q))
3729                {
3730                        final String newType=mob.session().choose(L("Enter a new value (?)\n\r:"),sel+"?","");
3731                        if(newType.equals("?"))
3732                        {
3733                                for(int i=0;i<sel.length();i++)
3734                                        mob.tell(sel.charAt(i)+") "+Weapon.CLASS_DESCS[i]);
3735                                q=false;
3736                        }
3737                        else
3738                        {
3739                                q=true;
3740                                int newValue=-1;
3741                                if(newType.length()>0)
3742                                        newValue=sel.indexOf(newType.toUpperCase());
3743                                if(newValue>=0)
3744                                        E.setWeaponClassification(newValue);
3745                                else
3746                                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
3747                        }
3748                }
3749        }
3750
3751        protected void genSecretIdentity(final MOB mob, final Item E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
3752        {
3753                E.setSecretIdentity(prompt(mob, E.rawSecretIdentity(), showNumber, showFlag, "Secret Identity", true, false));
3754        }
3755
3756        protected void genMaterialSubType(final MOB mob, final RawMaterial E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
3757        {
3758                E.setSubType(prompt(mob, E.getSubType(), showNumber, showFlag, "Rsc Sub-Type", true, false).toUpperCase().trim());
3759        }
3760
3761        protected void genNourishment(final MOB mob, final Food E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
3762        {
3763                E.setNourishment(prompt(mob, E.nourishment(), showNumber, showFlag, "Nourishment/Eat"));
3764        }
3765
3766        protected void genBiteSize(final MOB mob, final Food E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
3767        {
3768                E.setBite(prompt(mob, E.bite(), showNumber, showFlag, "Bite/Eat (0=all)"));
3769        }
3770
3771        protected void genRace(final MOB mob, final MOB M, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
3772                throws IOException
3773        {
3774                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3775                        return;
3776                String raceID="begin!";
3777                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(raceID.length()>0))
3778                {
3779                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Race: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,M.baseCharStats().getMyRace().ID()));
3780                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
3781                                return;
3782                        raceID=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new race (?)\n\r:"),"").trim();
3783                        if(raceID.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
3784                                mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.races(),-1).toString());
3785                        else
3786                        if(raceID.length()==0)
3787                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
3788                        else
3789                        {
3790                                final Race R=CMClass.getRace(raceID);
3791                                if(R!=null)
3792                                {
3793                                        M.baseCharStats().setMyRace(R);
3794                                        M.baseCharStats().getMyRace().startRacing(M,false);
3795                                        M.baseCharStats().getMyRace().setHeightWeight(M.basePhyStats(),(char)M.baseCharStats().getStat(CharStats.STAT_GENDER));
3796                                }
3797                                else
3798                                        mob.tell(L("Unknown race! Try '?'."));
3799                        }
3800                }
3801        }
3802
3803        protected void genCharClass(final MOB mob, final MOB M, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
3804                throws IOException
3805        {
3806                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3807                        return;
3808                String classID="begin!";
3809                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(classID.length()>0))
3810                {
3811                        final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer("");
3812                        for(int c=0;c<M.baseCharStats().numClasses();c++)
3813                        {
3814                                final CharClass C=M.baseCharStats().getMyClass(c);
3815                                str.append(C.ID()+"("+M.baseCharStats().getClassLevel(C)+") ");
3816                        }
3817                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Class: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,str.toString()));
3818                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
3819                                return;
3820                        classID=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a class to add/remove(?)\n\r:"),"").trim();
3821                        if(classID.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
3822                                mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.charClasses(),-1).toString());
3823                        else
3824                        if(classID.length()==0)
3825                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
3826                        else
3827                        {
3828                                CharClass C=CMClass.getCharClass(classID);
3829                                if((C!=null)&&((C.availabilityCode()>0)||CMSecurity.isASysOp(mob)))
3830                                {
3831                                        if(M.baseCharStats().getClassLevel(C)>=0)
3832                                        {
3833                                                if(M.baseCharStats().numClasses()<2)
3834                                                        mob.tell(L("Final class may not be removed.  To change a class, add the new one first."));
3835                                                else
3836                                                {
3837                                                        final StringBuffer charClasses=new StringBuffer("");
3838                                                        final StringBuffer classLevels=new StringBuffer("");
3839                                                        for(int c=0;c<M.baseCharStats().numClasses();c++)
3840                                                        {
3841                                                                final CharClass C2=M.baseCharStats().getMyClass(c);
3842                                                                final int L2=M.baseCharStats().getClassLevel(C2);
3843                                                                if(C2!=C)
3844                                                                {
3845                                                                        charClasses.append(";"+C2.ID());
3846                                                                        classLevels.append(";"+L2);
3847                                                                }
3848                                                        }
3849                                                        M.baseCharStats().setMyClasses(charClasses.toString());
3850                                                        M.baseCharStats().setMyLevels(classLevels.toString());
3851                                                }
3852                                        }
3853                                        else
3854                                        {
3855                                                int highLvl=Integer.MIN_VALUE;
3856                                                CharClass highestC=null;
3857                                                for(int c=0;c<M.baseCharStats().numClasses();c++)
3858                                                {
3859                                                        final CharClass C2=M.baseCharStats().getMyClass(c);
3860                                                        if(M.baseCharStats().getClassLevel(C2)>highLvl)
3861                                                        {
3862                                                                highestC=C2;
3863                                                                highLvl=M.baseCharStats().getClassLevel(C2);
3864                                                        }
3865                                                }
3866                                                M.baseCharStats().setCurrentClass(C);
3867                                                int levels=M.baseCharStats().combinedSubLevels();
3868                                                levels=M.basePhyStats().level()-levels;
3869                                                String lvl=null;
3870                                                if(levels>0)
3871                                                {
3872                                                        lvl=mob.session().prompt(L("Levels to give this class (@x1)\n\r:",""+levels),""+levels).trim();
3873                                                        int lvl2=CMath.s_int(lvl);
3874                                                        if(lvl2>levels)
3875                                                                lvl2=levels;
3876                                                        M.baseCharStats().setClassLevel(C,lvl2);
3877                                                }
3878                                                else
3879                                                if(highestC!=null)
3880                                                {
3881                                                        lvl=mob.session().prompt(L("Levels to siphon from @x1 for this class (0)\n\r:",highestC.ID()),""+0).trim();
3882                                                        int lvl2=CMath.s_int(lvl);
3883                                                        if(lvl2>highLvl)
3884                                                                lvl2=highLvl;
3885                                                        M.baseCharStats().setClassLevel(highestC,highLvl-lvl2);
3886                                                        M.baseCharStats().setClassLevel(C,lvl2);
3887                                                }
3888                                        }
3889                                        int levels=M.baseCharStats().combinedSubLevels();
3890                                        levels=M.basePhyStats().level()-levels;
3891                                        C=M.baseCharStats().getCurrentClass();
3892                                        M.baseCharStats().setClassLevel(C,levels);
3893                                }
3894                                else
3895                                        mob.tell(L("Unknown character class! Try '?'."));
3896                        }
3897                }
3898        }
3899
3900        protected void genTattoos(final MOB mob, final Tattooable M, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
3901                throws IOException
3902        {
3903                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3904                        return;
3905                String behave="NO";
3906                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(behave.length()>0))
3907                {
3908                        String tattoostr="";
3909                        for(final Enumeration<Tattoo> e=M.tattoos();e.hasMoreElements();)
3910                                tattoostr+=e.nextElement().getTattooName()+", ";
3911                        if(tattoostr.length()>0)
3912                                tattoostr=tattoostr.substring(0,tattoostr.length()-2);
3913                        if((tattoostr.length()>60)&&((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999)))
3914                                tattoostr=tattoostr.substring(0,60)+"...";
3915                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Tattoos: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,tattoostr));
3916                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
3917                                return;
3918                        behave=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a tattoo to add/remove\n\r:"),"");
3919                        if(behave.length()>0)
3920                        {
3921                                final Tattoo pT=((Tattoo)CMClass.getCommon("DefaultTattoo")).parse(behave);
3922                                final Tattoo T=M.findTattoo(pT.getTattooName());
3923                                if(T!=null)
3924                                {
3925                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",pT.getTattooName().trim().toUpperCase()));
3926                                        M.delTattoo(T);
3927                                }
3928                                else
3929                                {
3930                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",behave.trim().toUpperCase()));
3931                                        M.addTattoo(pT);
3932                                }
3933                        }
3934                        else
3935                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
3936                }
3937        }
3938
3939        protected void genTitles(final MOB mob, final MOB M, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
3940        throws IOException
3941        {
3942                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
3943                        return;
3944                if(M.playerStats()==null)
3945                        return;
3946                String behave="NO";
3947                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(behave.length()>0))
3948                {
3949                        String behaviorstr="";
3950                        if((showFlag==showNumber)||(showFlag<=-999))
3951                                behaviorstr+="\n\r";
3952                        for(int b=0;b<M.playerStats().getTitles().size();b++)
3953                        {
3954                                final String B=M.playerStats().getTitles().get(b);
3955                                if(B!=null)
3956                                {
3957                                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
3958                                                behaviorstr+=B+", ";
3959                                        else
3960                                                behaviorstr+="  "+(b+1)+") "+B+"\n\r";
3961                                }
3962                        }
3963                        if(behaviorstr.length()>0)
3964                                behaviorstr=behaviorstr.substring(0,behaviorstr.length()-2);
3965                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Titles: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,behaviorstr));
3966                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
3967                                return;
3968                        behave=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a title to add or a number to remove\n\r:"),"");
3969                        if(behave.length()>0)
3970                        {
3971                                String tattoo=behave;
3972                                if((tattoo.length()>0)
3973                                &&(CMath.isInteger(tattoo))
3974                                &&(CMath.s_int(tattoo)>0)
3975                                &&(CMath.s_int(tattoo)<=M.playerStats().getTitles().size()))
3976                                        tattoo=M.playerStats().getTitles().get(CMath.s_int(tattoo)-1);
3977                                else
3978                                if((tattoo.length()>0)
3979                                &&(Character.isDigit(tattoo.charAt(0)))
3980                                &&(tattoo.indexOf(' ')>0)
3981                                &&(CMath.isNumber(tattoo.substring(0,tattoo.indexOf(' ')))))
3982                                        tattoo=tattoo.substring(tattoo.indexOf(' ')+1).trim();
3983                                if(M.playerStats().getTitles().contains(tattoo))
3984                                {
3985                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",tattoo.trim().toUpperCase()));
3986                                        M.playerStats().getTitles().remove(tattoo);
3987                                }
3988                                else
3989                                {
3990                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",behave.trim().toUpperCase()));
3991                                        M.playerStats().getTitles().add(tattoo);
3992                                }
3993                        }
3994                        else
3995                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
3996                }
3997        }
3998
3999        protected void genExpertises(final MOB mob, final MOB M, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
4000                throws IOException
4001        {
4002                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
4003                        return;
4004                String behave="NO";
4005                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(behave.length()>0))
4006                {
4007                        final StringBuilder behaviorstr=new StringBuilder("");
4008                        for(final Enumeration<String> x=M.expertises();x.hasMoreElements();)
4009                                behaviorstr.append(x.nextElement()).append(", ");
4010                        if(behaviorstr.length()>0)
4011                                behaviorstr.setLength(behaviorstr.length()-2);
4012                        if((behaviorstr.length()>60)&&((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999)))
4013                        {
4014                                behaviorstr.setLength(60);
4015                                behaviorstr.append("...");
4016                        }
4017                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Expertises: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,behaviorstr.toString()));
4018                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
4019                                return;
4020                        behave=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a lesson to add/remove\n\r:"),"");
4021                        if(behave.length()>0)
4022                        {
4023                                if(M.fetchExpertise(behave)!=null)
4024                                {
4025                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",behave));
4026                                        M.delExpertise(behave);
4027                                }
4028                                else
4029                                if(CMLib.expertises().getDefinition(behave)==null)
4030                                {
4031                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 is undefined.",behave));
4032                                        continue;
4033                                }
4034                                else
4035                                {
4036                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",behave));
4037                                        M.addExpertise(behave);
4038                                }
4039                        }
4040                        else
4041                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
4042                }
4043        }
4044
4045        protected void genSecurity(final MOB mob, final MOB M, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
4046                throws IOException
4047        {
4048                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
4049                        return;
4050                final PlayerStats P=M.playerStats();
4051                if(P==null)
4052                        return;
4053                String behave="NO";
4054                final List<String> secFlags=CMParms.parseSemicolons(P.getSetSecurityFlags(null),true);
4055                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(behave.length()>0))
4056                {
4057                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Security Groups: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,CMParms.toListString(secFlags)));
4058                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
4059                                return;
4060                        behave=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a group to add/remove\n\r:"),"");
4061                        if(behave.length()>0)
4062                        {
4063                                if(secFlags.contains(behave.trim().toUpperCase()))
4064                                {
4065                                        secFlags.remove(behave.trim().toUpperCase());
4066                                        P.getSetSecurityFlags(CMParms.toSemicolonListString(secFlags));
4067                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",behave));
4068                                }
4069                                else
4070                                {
4071                                        final Object o=CMSecurity.instance().parseSecurityFlag(behave.trim().toUpperCase());
4072                                        final CMSecurity.SecFlag flag=(CMSecurity.SecFlag)CMath.s_valueOf(CMSecurity.SecFlag.class, behave.toUpperCase().trim());
4073                                        final boolean isFs=(o instanceof CMSecurity.SecPath);
4074                                        final boolean isGroup=(o instanceof CMSecurity.SecGroup);
4075                                        final boolean isFlag=(o instanceof CMSecurity.SecFlag) && (flag!=null);
4076                                        final boolean isJournalFlag=(o instanceof String);
4077                                        behave=behave.trim().toUpperCase().replace(' ','_');
4078                                        if((!isFlag) && (!isGroup) && (!isJournalFlag)&& (!isFs))
4079                                        {
4080                                                final List<String> grpNames=new ArrayList<String>();
4081                                                for(final Enumeration<SecGroup> g=CMSecurity.getSecurityGroups();g.hasMoreElements();)
4082                                                        grpNames.add(g.nextElement().getName().toUpperCase());
4083                                                final List<String> jFlagNames=new ArrayList<String>();
4084                                                for(final Enumeration<String> j=CMSecurity.getJournalSecurityFlags();j.hasMoreElements();)
4085                                                        jFlagNames.add(j.nextElement());
4086                                                mob.tell(L("No such security flag: @x1.",behave));
4087                                                mob.tell(L("Value flags include: @x1",CMParms.toListString(CMSecurity.SecFlag.values())));
4088                                                mob.tell(L("Valid groups include: @x1",CMParms.toListString(grpNames)));
4089                                                mob.tell(L("Value journal flags include: @x1",CMParms.toListString(jFlagNames)));
4090                                        }
4091                                        else
4092                                        {
4093                                                if(flag != null)
4094                                                {
4095                                                        if((flag.getAreaAlias()==flag)
4096                                                        &&(!CMSecurity.isAllowedAnywhere(mob,flag)))
4097                                                        {
4098                                                                mob.tell(L("You do not have clearance to add security code '@x1' to this class.",behave));
4099                                                                continue;
4100                                                        }
4101                                                        else
