4102                                                        if((flag.getRegularAlias()==flag)
4103                                                        &&(!CMSecurity.isAllowedEverywhere(mob,flag)))
4104                                                        {
4105                                                                mob.tell(L("You do not have clearance to add security code '@x1' to this class.",behave));
4106                                                                continue;
4107                                                        }
4108                                                }
4109                                                else
4110                                                if(isJournalFlag)
4111                                                {
4112                                                        if(!CMSecurity.isJournalAccessAllowed(mob,behave))
4113                                                        {
4114                                                                mob.tell(L("You do not have clearance to add security code '@x1' to this class.",behave));
4115                                                                continue;
4116                                                        }
4117                                                }
4118                                                else
4119                                                if(!CMSecurity.isASysOp(mob))
4120                                                {
4121                                                        mob.tell(L("You do not have clearance to add security group '@x1' to this class.",behave));
4122                                                        continue;
4123                                                }
4124                                                secFlags.add(behave.trim().toUpperCase());
4125                                                P.getSetSecurityFlags(CMParms.toSemicolonListString(secFlags));
4126                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",behave));
4127                                        }
4128                                }
4129                        }
4130                        else
4131                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
4132                }
4133        }
4134
4135        @Override
4136        public void genBehaviors(final MOB mob, final PhysicalAgent P, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
4137                throws IOException
4138        {
4139                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
4140                        return;
4141                String behave="NO";
4142                final ListStringer baseStringer = CMLib.lister().getListStringer();
4143                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(behave.length()>0))
4144                {
4145                        String behaviorstr="";
4146                        for(final Enumeration<Behavior> e=P.behaviors();e.hasMoreElements();)
4147                        {
4148                                final Behavior B=e.nextElement();
4149                                if((B!=null)&&(B.isSavable()))
4150                                {
4151                                        behaviorstr+=B.ID();
4152                                        if(B.getParms().trim().length()>0)
4153                                                behaviorstr+="("+B.getParms().trim()+"), ";
4154                                        else
4155                                                behaviorstr+=", ";
4156                                }
4157                        }
4158                        if(behaviorstr.length()>0)
4159                                behaviorstr=behaviorstr.substring(0,behaviorstr.length()-2);
4160                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Behaviors: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,behaviorstr.replace('@','_')));
4161                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
4162                                return;
4163                        behave=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a behavior to add/remove (?)\n\r:"),"");
4164                        if(behave.length()>0)
4165                        {
4166                                if(behave.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
4167                                {
4168                                        final ListingLibrary.ListStringer stringer=new ListingLibrary.ListStringer()
4169                                        {
4170                                                @Override
4171                                                public String stringify(final Object o)
4172                                                {
4173                                                        String s=baseStringer.stringify(o);
4174                                                        if((s!=null)&&(s.length()>0)
4175                                                        &&(o instanceof Behavior)
4176                                                        && (((Behavior)o).canImprove(P)))
4177                                                                s="^H"+s+"^N";
4178                                                        return s;
4179                                                }
4180                                        };
4181                                        mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.behaviors(),null,stringer).toString());
4182                                }
4183                                else
4184                                {
4185                                        Behavior chosenOne=null;
4186                                        for(final Enumeration<Behavior> e=P.behaviors();e.hasMoreElements();)
4187                                        {
4188                                                final Behavior B=e.nextElement();
4189                                                if((B!=null)&&(B.ID().equalsIgnoreCase(behave)))
4190                                                        chosenOne=B;
4191                                        }
4192                                        if(chosenOne!=null)
4193                                        {
4194                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",chosenOne.ID()));
4195                                                P.delBehavior(chosenOne);
4196                                        }
4197                                        else
4198                                        {
4199                                                chosenOne=CMClass.getBehavior(behave);
4200                                                if(chosenOne!=null)
4201                                                {
4202                                                        boolean alreadyHasIt=false;
4203                                                        for(final Enumeration<Behavior> e=P.behaviors();e.hasMoreElements();)
4204                                                        {
4205                                                                final Behavior B=e.nextElement();
4206                                                                if((B!=null)&&(B.ID().equals(chosenOne.ID())))
4207                                                                {
4208                                                                        alreadyHasIt=true;
4209                                                                        chosenOne=B;
4210                                                                }
4211                                                        }
4212                                                        String parms="?";
4213                                                        while(parms.equals("?"))
4214                                                        {
4215                                                                parms=chosenOne.getParms();
4216                                                                parms=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter any behavior parameters (?)\n\r:@x1",parms));
4217                                                                if(parms.equals("?"))
4218                                                                {
4219                                                                        final StringBuilder s2=CMLib.help().getHelpText(chosenOne.ID(),mob,true);
4220                                                                        if(s2!=null)
4221                                                                                mob.tell(s2.toString());
4222                                                                        else mob.tell(L("no help!"));
4223                                                                }
4224                                                        }
4225                                                        chosenOne.setParms(parms.trim());
4226                                                        if(!alreadyHasIt)
4227                                                        {
4228                                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",chosenOne.ID()));
4229                                                                P.addBehavior(chosenOne);
4230                                                        }
4231                                                        else
4232                                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 re-added.",chosenOne.ID()));
4233                                                }
4234                                                else
4235                                                {
4236                                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not recognized.  Try '?'.",behave));
4237                                                }
4238                                        }
4239                                }
4240                        }
4241                        else
4242                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
4243                }
4244        }
4245
4246        @Override
4247        public void genAffects(final MOB mob, final Physical P, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
4248                throws IOException
4249        {
4250                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
4251                        return;
4252                String behave="NO";
4253                final ListStringer baseStringer = CMLib.lister().getListStringer();
4254                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(behave.length()>0))
4255                {
4256                        String affectstr="";
4257                        for(int b=0;b<P.numEffects();b++)
4258                        {
4259                                final Ability A=P.fetchEffect(b);
4260                                if((A!=null)&&(A.isSavable()))
4261                                {
4262                                        affectstr+=A.ID();
4263                                        if(A.text().trim().length()>0)
4264                                                affectstr+="("+A.text().trim()+"), ";
4265                                        else
4266                                                affectstr+=", ";
4267                                }
4268                        }
4269                        if(affectstr.length()>0)
4270                                affectstr=affectstr.substring(0,affectstr.length()-2);
4271                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Effects: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,affectstr));
4272                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
4273                                return;
4274                        behave=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter an effect to add/remove (?)\n\r:"),"");
4275                        if(behave.length()>0)
4276                        {
4277                                if(behave.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
4278                                {
4279                                        final ListingLibrary.ListStringer stringer=new ListingLibrary.ListStringer()
4280                                        {
4281                                                @Override
4282                                                public String stringify(final Object o)
4283                                                {
4284                                                        String s=baseStringer.stringify(o);
4285                                                        if((s!=null)&&(s.length()>0)&&(o instanceof Ability) && (((Ability)o).canAffect(P)))
4286                                                                s="^X"+s+"^N";
4287                                                        return s;
4288                                                }
4289                                        };
4290                                        mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.abilities(),null,stringer).toString());
4291                                }
4292                                else
4293                                {
4294                                        Ability chosenOne=null;
4295                                        for(int a=0;a<P.numEffects();a++)
4296                                        {
4297                                                final Ability A=P.fetchEffect(a);
4298                                                if((A!=null)&&(A.ID().equalsIgnoreCase(behave)))
4299                                                        chosenOne=A;
4300                                        }
4301                                        if(chosenOne!=null)
4302                                        {
4303                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",chosenOne.ID()));
4304                                                P.delEffect(chosenOne);
4305                                        }
4306                                        else
4307                                        {
4308                                                chosenOne=CMClass.getAbility(behave);
4309                                                if((chosenOne!=null)
4310                                                &&((chosenOne.classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_DOMAINS)==Ability.DOMAIN_ARCHON)
4311                                                &&(mob.fetchAbility(chosenOne.ID())==null))
4312                                                        chosenOne=null;
4313                                                if(chosenOne!=null)
4314                                                {
4315                                                        String parms="?";
4316                                                        while(parms.equals("?"))
4317                                                        {
4318                                                                parms=chosenOne.text();
4319                                                                parms=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter any effect parameters (?)\n\r:@x1",parms));
4320                                                                if(parms.equals("?"))
4321                                                                {
4322                                                                        final StringBuilder s2=CMLib.help().getHelpText(chosenOne.ID(),mob,true);
4323                                                                        if(s2!=null)
4324                                                                                mob.tell(s2.toString());
4325                                                                        else mob.tell(L("no help!"));
4326                                                                }
4327                                                        }
4328                                                        chosenOne.setMiscText(parms.trim());
4329                                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",chosenOne.ID()));
4330                                                        P.addNonUninvokableEffect(chosenOne);
4331                                                }
4332                                                else
4333                                                {
4334                                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not recognized.  Try '?'.",behave));
4335                                                }
4336                                        }
4337                                }
4338                        }
4339                        else
4340                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
4341                }
4342        }
4343
4344        protected void genRideable1(final MOB mob, final Rideable R, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
4345                throws IOException
4346        {
4347                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
4348                        return;
4349                mob.tell(L("@x1. Rideable Type: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,Rideable.RIDEABLE_DESCS[R.rideBasis()]));
4350                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
4351                        return;
4352                boolean q=false;
4353                final String sel="LWACBTEDG";
4354                while(!q)
4355                {
4356                        final String newType=mob.session().choose(L("Enter a new value (?)\n\r:"),sel+"?","");
4357                        if(newType.equals("?"))
4358                        {
4359                                for(int i=0;i<sel.length();i++)
4360                                        mob.tell(sel.charAt(i)+") "+Rideable.RIDEABLE_DESCS[i].toLowerCase());
4361                                q=false;
4362                        }
4363                        else
4364                        {
4365                                q=true;
4366                                int newValue=-1;
4367                                if(newType.length()>0)
4368                                        newValue=sel.indexOf(newType.toUpperCase());
4369                                if(newValue>=0)
4370                                        R.setRideBasis(newValue);
4371                                else
4372                                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
4373                        }
4374                }
4375        }
4376
4377        protected void genRideable2(final MOB mob, final Rideable E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
4378        {
4379                E.setRiderCapacity(prompt(mob, E.riderCapacity(), showNumber, showFlag, "Number of MOBs held"));
4380        }
4381
4382        protected void genShopkeeper1(final MOB mob, final ShopKeeper M, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
4383                throws IOException
4384        {
4385                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
4386                        return;
4387                final long oldMask=M.getWhatIsSoldMask();
4388                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
4389                {
4390                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Shopkeeper type: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,M.storeKeeperString()));
4391                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
4392                                return;
4393
4394                        final StringBuffer buf=new StringBuffer("");
4395                        final StringBuffer codes=new StringBuffer("");
4396                        final String codeStr="0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ!=+-@#$%&*~;:,<.>_";
4397                        if(M instanceof Banker)
4398                        {
4399                                int r=ShopKeeper.DEAL_BANKER;
4400                                char c=codeStr.charAt(r);
4401                                codes.append(c);
4402                                buf.append(c+") "+ShopKeeper.DEAL_DESCS[r]+"\n\r");
4403                                r=ShopKeeper.DEAL_CLANBANKER;
4404                                c=codeStr.charAt(r);
4405                                codes.append(c);
4406                                buf.append(c+") "+ShopKeeper.DEAL_DESCS[r]+"\n\r");
4407                        }
4408                        else
4409                        if(M instanceof PostOffice)
4410                        {
4411                                int r=ShopKeeper.DEAL_POSTMAN;
4412                                char c=codeStr.charAt(r);
4413                                codes.append(c);
4414                                buf.append(c+") "+ShopKeeper.DEAL_DESCS[r]+"\n\r");
4415                                r=ShopKeeper.DEAL_CLANPOSTMAN;
4416                                c=codeStr.charAt(r);
4417                                codes.append(c);
4418                                buf.append(c+") "+ShopKeeper.DEAL_DESCS[r]+"\n\r");
4419                        }
4420                        else
4421                        if(M instanceof Auctioneer)
4422                        {
4423                                int r=ShopKeeper.DEAL_AUCTIONEER;
4424                                char c=codeStr.charAt(r);
4425                                codes.append(c);
4426                                buf.append(c+") "+ShopKeeper.DEAL_DESCS[r]+"\n\r");
4427                                r=ShopKeeper.DEAL_AUCTIONEER;
4428                                c=codeStr.charAt(r);
4429                                codes.append(c);
4430                                buf.append(c+") "+ShopKeeper.DEAL_DESCS[r]+"\n\r");
4431                        }
4432                        else
4433                        for(int r=0;r<ShopKeeper.DEAL_DESCS.length;r++)
4434                        {
4435                                if((r!=ShopKeeper.DEAL_CLANBANKER)
4436                                &&(r!=ShopKeeper.DEAL_BANKER)
4437                                &&(r!=ShopKeeper.DEAL_CLANPOSTMAN)
4438                                &&(r!=ShopKeeper.DEAL_POSTMAN))
4439                                {
4440                                        final char c=codeStr.charAt(r);
4441                                        codes.append(c);
4442                                        buf.append(c+") "+ShopKeeper.DEAL_DESCS[r]+"\n\r");
4443                                }
4444                        }
4445                        final String newType=mob.session().choose(L("@x1Enter a value to toggle on/off: ",buf.toString()),codes.toString(),"");
4446                        int newValue=-1;
4447                        if(newType.trim().length()==0)
4448                        {
4449                                if(M.getWhatIsSoldMask()==oldMask)
4450                                        mob.tell(L("(no change"));
4451                                return;
4452                        }
4453                        if(newType.length()>0)
4454                                newValue=codeStr.indexOf(newType.toUpperCase());
4455                        if(newValue<=0)
4456                                M.setWhatIsSoldMask(0);
4457                        else
4458                        if(M.isSold(newValue))
4459                        {
4460                                M.addSoldType(-newValue);
4461                                final CoffeeShop shop=(M instanceof Librarian)?((Librarian)M).getBaseLibrary():M.getShop();
4462                                for(final Iterator<Environmental> i=shop.getStoreInventory();i.hasNext();)
4463                                {
4464                                        final Environmental E2=i.next();
4465                                        if(!M.doISellThis(E2))
4466                                                shop.delAllStoreInventory(E2);
4467                                }
4468                        }
4469                        else
4470                                M.addSoldType(newValue);
4471                }
4472        }
4473
4474        protected void genShopkeeper2(final MOB mob, final ShopKeeper M, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
4475                throws IOException
4476        {
4477                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
4478                        return;
4479                String itemstr="NO";
4480                while(itemstr.length()>0)
4481                {
4482                        String inventorystr="";
4483                        final CoffeeShop shop=(M instanceof Librarian)?((Librarian)M).getBaseLibrary():M.getShop();
4484                        for(final Iterator<Environmental> i=shop.getStoreInventory();i.hasNext();)
4485                        {
4486                                final Environmental E2=i.next();
4487                                if(E2.isGeneric())
4488                                        inventorystr+=E2.name()+" ("+shop.numberInStock(E2)+"), ";
4489                                else
4490                                        inventorystr+=CMClass.classID(E2)+" ("+shop.numberInStock(E2)+"), ";
4491                        }
4492                        if(inventorystr.length()>0)
4493                                inventorystr=inventorystr.substring(0,inventorystr.length()-2);
4494                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Inventory: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,inventorystr));
4495                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
4496                                return;
4497                        itemstr=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter something to add/remove (?)\n\r:"),"");
4498                        if(itemstr.length()>0)
4499                        {
4500                                if(itemstr.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
4501                                {
4502                                        mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.abilities(),-1).toString());
4503                                        mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.armor(),-1).toString());
4504                                        mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.weapons(),-1).toString());
4505                                        mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.miscMagic(),-1).toString());
4506                                        mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.tech(),-1).toString());
4507                                        mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.clanItems(),-1).toString());
4508                                        mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.basicItems(),-1).toString());
4509                                        mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.mobTypes(),-1).toString());
4510                                        mob.tell(L("* Plus! Any items on the ground."));
4511                                        mob.tell(L("* Plus! Any mobs hanging around in the room."));
4512                                }
4513                                else
4514                                {
4515                                        Environmental item=shop.getStock(itemstr,null);
4516                                        if(item!=null)
4517                                        {
4518                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",item.ID()));
4519                                                shop.delAllStoreInventory((Environmental)item.copyOf());
4520                                        }
4521                                        else
4522                                        {
4523                                                item=CMClass.getUnknown(itemstr);
4524                                                if((item==null)&&(mob.location()!=null))
4525                                                {
4526                                                        final Room R=mob.location();
4527                                                        item=R.findItem(null,itemstr);
4528                                                        if(item==null)
4529                                                        {
4530                                                                item=R.fetchInhabitant(itemstr);
4531                                                                if((item instanceof MOB)&&(!((MOB)item).isMonster()))
4532                                                                        item=null;
4533                                                        }
4534                                                }
4535                                                if((item!=null)
4536                                                &&((!(item instanceof ArchonOnly))
4537                                                        ||(CMSecurity.isASysOp(mob))))
4538                                                {
4539                                                        item=(Environmental)item.copyOf();
4540                                                        if(item !=null)
4541                                                        {
4542                                                                if(item instanceof Physical)
4543                                                                        ((Physical)item).recoverPhyStats();
4544                                                                boolean ok=M.doISellThis(item);
4545                                                                if((item instanceof Ability)
4546                                                                &&((M.isSold(ShopKeeper.DEAL_TRAINER))||(M.isSold(ShopKeeper.DEAL_CASTER))))
4547                                                                        ok=true;
4548                                                                else
4549                                                                if(M.isSold(ShopKeeper.DEAL_INVENTORYONLY))
4550                                                                        ok=true;
4551                                                                if((ok)||((mob.session()!=null)&&mob.session().confirm(L("This shopkeeper type does not sell that. Are you sure (y/N)?"),"N")))
4552                                                                {
4553                                                                        boolean alreadyHasIt=false;
4554                                                                        if(M.getShop().doIHaveThisInStock(item.Name(),null))
4555                                                                                alreadyHasIt=true;
4556
4557                                                                        if(!alreadyHasIt)
4558                                                                        {
4559                                                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",item.ID()));
4560                                                                                int num=1;
4561                                                                                if(!(item instanceof Ability))
4562                                                                                        num=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("How many? :"),""));
4563                                                                                final int price=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("At what price? :"),""));
4564                                                                                M.getShop().addStoreInventory(item,num,price);
4565                                                                        }
4566                                                                }
4567                                                        }
4568                                                }
4569                                                else
4570                                                {
4571                                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not recognized.  Try '?'.",itemstr));
4572                                                }
4573                                        }
4574                                }
4575                        }
4576                        else
4577                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
4578                }
4579        }
4580
4581        protected void genEconomics1(final MOB mob, final Economics E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
4582        {
4583                E.setPrejudiceFactors(prompt(mob, E.prejudiceFactors(), showNumber, showFlag, "Prejudice", true, false));
4584        }
4585
4586        protected void genEconomics2(final MOB mob, final Economics E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
4587        throws IOException
4588        {
4589                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
4590                        return;
4591                final String header=L("@x1. Item Pricing Factors: ",""+showNumber);
4592                String[] prics=E.itemPricingAdjustments();
4593                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
4594                {
4595                        if(prics.length<1)
4596                                mob.tell(header+"''.");
4597                        else
4598                        if(prics.length==1)
4599                                mob.tell(header+"'"+prics[0]+"'.");
4600                        else
4601                                mob.tell(L("@x1@x2 defined..",header,""+prics.length));
4602                        return;
4603                }
4604                final String behave="NO";
4605                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(behave.length()>0))
4606                {
4607                        mob.tell(header+"\n\r");
4608                        for(int p=0;p<prics.length;p++)
4609                                mob.tell(CMStrings.SPACES.substring(0,header.length()-3)
4610                                                +(p+1)+") "+prics[p]+"\n\r");
4611                        final String newValue=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter # to remove, or A to add:\n\r:"),"");
4612                        if(CMath.isInteger(newValue))
4613                        {
4614                                final int x=CMath.s_int(newValue);
4615                                if((x>0)&&(x<=prics.length))
4616                                {
4617                                        final String[] newPrics=new String[prics.length-1];
4618                                        int y=0;
4619                                        for(int i=0;i<prics.length;i++)
4620                                        {
4621                                                if(i!=(x-1))
4622                                                        newPrics[y++]=prics[i];
4623                                        }
4624                                        prics=newPrics;
4625                                }
4626                        }
4627                        else
4628                        if(newValue.toUpperCase().startsWith("A"))
4629                        {
4630                                final double dbl=CMath.s_double(mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a price multiplier between 0.0 and X.Y\n\r: ")));
4631                                String mask="?";
4632                                while(mask.equals("?"))
4633                                {
4634                                        mask=mob.session().prompt(L("Now enter a mask that describes the item (? for syntax)\n\r: "));
4635                                        if(mask.equals("?"))
4636                                                mob.tell(CMLib.masking().maskHelp("\n\r","disallow"));
4637                                }
4638                                final String[] newPrics=new String[prics.length+1];
4639                                for(int i=0;i<prics.length;i++)
4640                                        newPrics[i]=prics[i];
4641                                newPrics[prics.length]=dbl+" "+mask;
4642                                prics=newPrics;
4643                        }
4644                        else
4645                        {
4646                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
4647                                break;
4648                        }
4649                }
4650                E.setItemPricingAdjustments(prics);
4651        }
4652
4653        protected void genAreaBlurbs(final MOB mob, final Area A, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
4654        throws IOException
4655        {
4656                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
4657                        return;
4658                final String header=showNumber+". Area Blurb Flags: ";
4659                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
4660                {
4661                        final int numFlags=A.numBlurbFlags();
4662                        if(numFlags<1)
4663                                mob.tell(header+"''.");
4664                        else
4665                        if(numFlags==1)
4666                        {
4667                                final String flag = A.areaBlurbFlags().nextElement();
4668                                mob.tell(header+"'"+flag+": "+A.getBlurbFlag(flag)+"'.");
4669                        }
4670                        else
4671                                mob.tell(L("@x1@x2 defined..",header,""+numFlags));
4672                        return;
4673                }
4674                final String behave="NO";
4675                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(behave.length()>0))
4676                {
4677                        mob.tell(header+"\n\r");
4678                        for(final Enumeration<String> f = A.areaBlurbFlags();f.hasMoreElements();)
4679                        {
4680                                final String flag = f.nextElement();
4681                                mob.tell(flag+": "+A.getBlurbFlag(flag));
4682                        }
4683                        final String newValue=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter flag to remove, or A to add:\n\r:"),"");
4684                        if(A.getBlurbFlag(newValue.toUpperCase().trim())!=null)
4685                        {
4686                                A.delBlurbFlag(newValue.toUpperCase().trim());
4687                                mob.tell(L("@x1 removed",newValue.toUpperCase().trim()));
4688                        }
4689                        else
4690                        if(newValue.toUpperCase().equals("A"))
4691                        {
4692                                final String flag=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new flag: "));
4693                                if(flag.trim().length()==0)
4694                                        continue;
4695                                final String desc=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a flag blurb (or nothing): "));
4696                                A.addBlurbFlag((flag.toUpperCase().trim()+" "+desc).trim());
4697                                mob.tell(L("@x1 added",flag.toUpperCase().trim()));
4698                        }
4699                        else
4700                        if(newValue.length()==0)
4701                        {
4702                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
4703                                break;
4704                        }
4705                }
4706        }
4707
4708        protected void genEconomics3(final MOB mob, final Economics E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
4709        {
4710                E.setBudget(prompt(mob, E.budget(), showNumber, showFlag, "Budget", true, false));
4711        }

4714        {

4716        }

4718        protected void genEconomics5(final MOB mob, final Economics E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
4719        {
4720                E.setInvResetRate(prompt(mob, E.invResetRate(), showNumber, showFlag, "Inventory reset rate [ticks]"));
4721        }

4723        protected void genEconomics6(final MOB mob, final Economics E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
4724        {
4725                E.setIgnoreMask(prompt(mob, E.ignoreMask(), showNumber, showFlag, "Ignore Mask", true, false));
4726        }
4727
4728        protected void genAbilities(final MOB mob, final MOB M, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
4729                throws IOException
4730        {
4731                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
4732                        return;
4733                String behave="NO";
4734                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(behave.length()>0))
4735                {
4736                        String abilitiestr="";
4737                        for(int a=0;a<M.numAbilities();a++)
4738                        {
4739                                final Ability A=M.fetchAbility(a);
4740                                if((A!=null)&&(A.isSavable()))
4741                                        abilitiestr+=A.ID()+", ";
4742                        }
4743                        if(abilitiestr.length()>0)
4744                                abilitiestr=abilitiestr.substring(0,abilitiestr.length()-2);
4745                        if((abilitiestr.length()>50)&&((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999)))
4746                                abilitiestr=abilitiestr.substring(0,50)+"...";
4747                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Abilities: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,abilitiestr));
4748                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
4749                                return;
4750                        behave=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter an ability to add/remove (?)\n\r:"),"");
4751                        if(behave.length()>0)
4752                        {
4753                                if(behave.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
4754                                        mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.abilities(),-1).toString());
4755                                else
4756                                {
4757                                        Ability chosenOne=null;
4758                                        for(int a=0;a<M.numAbilities();a++)
4759                                        {
4760                                                final Ability A=M.fetchAbility(a);
4761                                                if((A!=null)&&(A.ID().equalsIgnoreCase(behave)))
4762                                                        chosenOne=A;
4763                                        }
4764                                        if(chosenOne!=null)
4765                                        {
4766                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",chosenOne.ID()));
4767                                                M.delAbility(chosenOne);
4768                                                if(M.fetchEffect(chosenOne.ID())!=null)
4769                                                        M.delEffect(M.fetchEffect(chosenOne.ID()));
4770                                        }
4771                                        else
4772                                        {
4773                                                chosenOne=CMClass.getAbility(behave);
4774                                                if((chosenOne!=null)
4775                                                &&((chosenOne.classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_DOMAINS)==Ability.DOMAIN_ARCHON)
4776                                                &&(!CMSecurity.isASysOp(mob)))
4777                                                        chosenOne=null;
4778                                                if(chosenOne!=null)
4779                                                {
4780                                                        final boolean alreadyHasIt=(M.fetchAbility(chosenOne.ID())!=null);
4781                                                        if(!alreadyHasIt)
4782                                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",chosenOne.ID()));
4783                                                        else
4784                                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 re-added.",chosenOne.ID()));
4785                                                        if(!alreadyHasIt)
4786                                                        {
4787                                                                chosenOne=(Ability)chosenOne.copyOf();
4788                                                                M.addAbility(chosenOne);
4789                                                                chosenOne.setProficiency(75);
4790                                                                chosenOne.autoInvocation(mob, false);
4791                                                        }
4792                                                }
4793                                                else
4794                                                {
4795                                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not recognized.  Try '?'.",behave));
4796                                                }
4797                                        }
4798                                }
4799                        }
4800                        else
4801                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
4802                }
4803        }
4804
4805        @Override
4806        public void spells(final MOB mob, final List<Ability> V, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final boolean inParms) throws IOException
4807        {
4808                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
4809                        return;
4810                String behave="NO";
4811                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(behave.length()>0))
4812                {
4813                        String affectstr="";
4814                        for(int b=0;b<V.size();b++)
4815                        {
4816                                final Ability A=V.get(b);
4817                                if((A!=null)&&(A.isSavable()))
4818                                {
4819                                        affectstr+=A.ID();
4820                                        if(A.text().trim().length()>0)
4821                                                affectstr+="("+A.text().trim()+"), ";
4822                                        else
4823                                                affectstr+=", ";
4824                                }
4825
4826                        }
4827                        if(affectstr.length()>0)
4828                                affectstr=affectstr.substring(0,affectstr.length()-2);
4829                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Effects: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,affectstr));
4830                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
4831                                return;
4832                        behave=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a spell to add/remove (?)\n\r:"),"");
4833                        if(behave.length()>0)
4834                        {
4835                                if(behave.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
4836                                        mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.abilities(),-1).toString());
4837                                else
4838                                {
4839                                        Ability chosenOne=null;
4840                                        for(int a=0;a<V.size();a++)
4841                                        {
4842                                                final Ability A=V.get(a);
4843                                                if((A!=null)&&(A.ID().equalsIgnoreCase(behave)))
4844                                                        chosenOne=A;
4845                                        }
4846                                        if(chosenOne!=null)
4847                                        {
4848                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",chosenOne.ID()));
4849                                                V.remove(chosenOne);
4850                                        }
4851                                        else
4852                                        {
4853                                                chosenOne=CMClass.getAbility(behave);
4854                                                if((chosenOne!=null)
4855                                                &&((chosenOne.classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_DOMAINS)==Ability.DOMAIN_ARCHON)
4856                                                &&(!CMSecurity.isASysOp(mob)))
4857                                                        chosenOne=null;
4858                                                if(chosenOne!=null)
4859                                                {
4860                                                        if(inParms)
4861                                                        {
4862                                                                String parms="?";
4863                                                                while(parms.equals("?"))
4864                                                                {
4865                                                                        parms=chosenOne.text();
4866                                                                        parms=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter any effect parameters (?)\n\r:@x1",parms));
4867                                                                        if(parms.equals("?"))
4868                                                                        {
4869                                                                                final StringBuilder s2=CMLib.help().getHelpText(chosenOne.ID(),mob,true);
4870                                                                                if(s2!=null)
4871                                                                                        mob.tell(s2.toString());
4872                                                                                else mob.tell(L("no help!"));
4873                                                                        }
4874                                                                }
4875                                                                chosenOne.setMiscText(parms.trim());
4876                                                        }
4877                                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",chosenOne.ID()));
4878                                                        V.add(chosenOne);
4879                                                }
4880                                                else
4881                                                {
4882                                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not recognized.  Try '?'.",behave));
4883                                                }
4884                                        }
4885                                }
4886                        }
4887                        else
4888                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
4889                }
4890        }
4891
4892        @Override
4893        public void spellsOrBehaviors(final MOB mob, final List<CMObject> V, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final boolean inParms) throws IOException
4894        {
4895                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
4896                        return;
4897                String behave="NO";
4898                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(behave.length()>0))
4899                {
4900                        String affectstr="";
4901                        for(int b=0;b<V.size();b++)
4902                        {
4903                                if(V.get(b) instanceof Ability)
4904                                {
4905                                        final Ability A=(Ability)V.get(b);
4906                                        if((A!=null)&&(A.isSavable()))
4907                                        {
4908                                                affectstr+=A.ID();
4909                                                if(A.text().trim().length()>0)
4910                                                        affectstr+="("+A.text().trim()+"), ";
4911                                                else
4912                                                        affectstr+=", ";
4913                                        }
4914                                }
4915                                else
4916                                if(V.get(b) instanceof Behavior)
4917                                {
4918                                        final Behavior A=(Behavior)V.get(b);
4919                                        if((A!=null)&&(A.isSavable()))
4920                                        {
4921                                                affectstr+=A.ID();
4922                                                if(A.getParms().trim().length()>0)
4923                                                        affectstr+="("+A.getParms().trim()+"), ";
4924                                                else
4925                                                        affectstr+=", ";
4926                                        }
4927                                }
4928                        }
4929                        if(affectstr.length()>0)
4930                                affectstr=affectstr.substring(0,affectstr.length()-2);
4931                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Effects/Behavs: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,affectstr));
4932                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
4933                                return;
4934                        behave=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a spell/behavior to add/remove (?)\n\r:"),"");
4935                        if(behave.length()>0)
4936                        {
4937                                if(behave.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
4938                                {
4939                                        mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.abilities(),-1).toString());
4940                                        mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.behaviors(),-1).toString());
4941                                }
4942                                else
4943                                {
4944                                        CMObject chosenOne=null;
4945                                        for(int a=0;a<V.size();a++)
4946                                        {
4947                                                final CMObject A=V.get(a);
4948                                                if((A!=null)&&(A.ID().equalsIgnoreCase(behave)))
4949                                                        chosenOne=A;
4950                                        }
4951                                        if(chosenOne!=null)
4952                                        {
4953                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",chosenOne.ID()));
4954                                                V.remove(chosenOne);
4955                                        }
4956                                        else
4957                                        {
4958                                                chosenOne=CMClass.getAbility(behave);
4959                                                if((chosenOne instanceof Ability)
4960                                                &&((((Ability)chosenOne).classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_DOMAINS)==Ability.DOMAIN_ARCHON)
4961                                                &&(!CMSecurity.isASysOp(mob)))
4962                                                        chosenOne=null;
4963                                                if(chosenOne!=null)
4964                                                {
4965                                                        if(inParms)
4966                                                        {
4967                                                                String parms="?";
4968                                                                while(parms.equals("?"))
4969                                                                {
4970                                                                        if(chosenOne instanceof Ability)
4971                                                                        {
4972                                                                                parms=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter any effect parameters (?)\n\r:@x1",((Ability)chosenOne).text()));
4973                                                                        }
4974                                                                        else
4975                                                                        if(chosenOne instanceof Behavior)
4976                                                                        {
4977                                                                                parms=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter any behavior parameters (?)\n\r:@x1",((Behavior)chosenOne).getParms()));
4978                                                                        }
4979                                                                        if (parms.equals("?"))
4980                                                                        {
4981                                                                                final StringBuilder s2 = CMLib.help().getHelpText(chosenOne.ID(), mob, true);
4982                                                                                if (s2 != null)
4983                                                                                        mob.tell(s2.toString());
4984                                                                                else
4985                                                                                        mob.tell(L("no help!"));
4986                                                                        }
4987                                                                }
4988                                                                if(chosenOne instanceof Ability)
4989                                                                        ((Ability)chosenOne).setMiscText(parms.trim());
4990                                                                else
4991                                                                if(chosenOne instanceof Behavior)
4992                                                                        ((Behavior)chosenOne).setParms(parms.trim());
4993                                                        }
4994                                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",chosenOne.ID()));
4995                                                        V.add(chosenOne);
4996                                                }
4997                                                else
4998                                                {
4999                                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not recognized.  Try '?'.",behave));
5000                                                }
5001                                        }
5002                                }
5003                        }
5004                        else
5005                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
5006                }
5007        }
5008
5009        protected void genClanMembers(final MOB mob, final Clan C, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
5010        {
5011                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
5012                        return;
5013                String behave="NO";
5014                final List<MemberRecord> members=C.getMemberList();
5015                final List<MemberRecord> membersCopy=new XVector<MemberRecord>(members);
5016                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(behave.length()>0))
5017                {
5018                        String memberStr="";
5019                        for(final Clan.MemberRecord member : members)
5020                                memberStr+=member.name+" ("+C.getRoleName(member.role,true,false)+"), ";
5021                        if(memberStr.length()>0)
5022                                memberStr=memberStr.substring(0,memberStr.length()-2);
5023                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Clan Members : '@x2'.",""+showNumber,memberStr));
5024                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
5025                                return;
5026                        behave=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a name to add/remove\n\r:"),"");
5027                        if(behave.length()>0)
5028                        {
5029                                int chosenOne=-1;
5030                                for(int m=0;m<members.size();m++)
5031                                {
5032                                        if(behave.equalsIgnoreCase(members.get(m).name))
5033                                                chosenOne=m;
5034                                }
5035                                if(chosenOne>=0)
5036                                {
5037                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",members.get(chosenOne).name));
5038                                        members.remove(chosenOne);
5039                                }
5040                                else
5041                                {
5042                                        final MOB M=CMLib.players().getLoadPlayer(behave);
5043                                        if(M!=null)
5044                                        {
5045                                                int oldNum=-1;
5046                                                for(int m=0;m<membersCopy.size();m++)
5047                                                {
5048                                                        if(behave.equalsIgnoreCase(membersCopy.get(m).name))
5049                                                        {
5050                                                                oldNum=members.size();
5051                                                                members.add(membersCopy.get(m));
5052                                                                break;
5053                                                        }
5054                                                }
5055                                                int index=oldNum;
5056                                                if(index<0)
5057                                                {
5058                                                        index=members.size();
5059                                                        members.add(new MemberRecord(M.name(),C.getGovernment().getAcceptPos()));
5060                                                }
5061
5062                                                int newRole=-1;
5063                                                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(newRole<0))
5064                                                {
5065                                                        final String newRoleStr=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter this members role (?) '@x1': ",C.getRoleName(members.get(index).role,true,false)),"");
5066                                                        newRole =C.getRoleFromName(newRoleStr);
5067                                                        if(newRole<0)
5068                                                                mob.tell(L("That role is invalid.  Valid roles include: @x1",CMParms.toListString(C.getRolesList())));
5069                                                        else
5070                                                                break;
5071                                                }
5072                                                if(oldNum<0)
5073                                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",M.Name()));
5074                                                else
5075                                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 re-added.",M.Name()));
5076                                                if(newRole>=0)
5077                                                        members.get(index).role=newRole;
5078                                        }
5079                                        else
5080                                        {
5081                                                mob.tell(L("'@x1' is an unrecognized player name.",behave));
5082                                        }
5083                                }
5084                                // first add missing ones
5085                                for(int m=0;m<members.size();m++)
5086                                {
5087                                        final MemberRecord mR=members.get(m);
5088                                        final String newName=mR.name;
5089                                        if(!membersCopy.contains(mR))
5090                                        {
5091                                                final MOB M=CMLib.players().getLoadPlayer(newName);
5092                                                if((M!=null)&&(M.getClanRole(C.clanID())==null))
5093                                                        C.addMember(M, 0);
5094                                        }
5095                                }
5096                                // now adjust changed roles
5097                                for(int m=0;m<members.size();m++)
5098                                {
5099                                        final String newName=members.get(m).name;
5100                                        boolean found=false;
5101                                        for(final MemberRecord R : membersCopy)
5102                                                found=found||R.name.equals(newName);
5103                                        if(found)
5104                                        {
5105                                                final MOB M=CMLib.players().getLoadPlayer(newName);
5106                                                final Pair<Clan,Integer> oldClanRole=M.getClanRole(C.clanID());
5107                                                final int newRole=members.get(m).role;
5108                                                if((oldClanRole!=null)&&(newRole!=oldClanRole.second.intValue()))
5109                                                {
5110                                                        CMLib.database().DBUpdateClanMembership(M.Name(), C.clanID(), newRole);
5111                                                        M.setClan(C.clanID(),newRole);
5112                                                        C.updateClanPrivileges(M);
5113                                                }
5114                                        }
5115                                }
5116                                // now remove old members
5117                                for(int m=0;m<membersCopy.size();m++)
5118                                {
5119                                        final String newName=membersCopy.get(m).name;
5120                                        boolean found=false;
5121                                        for(final MemberRecord R : members)
5122                                                found=found||R.name.equals(newName);
5123                                        if(!found)
5124                                        {
5125                                                final MOB M=CMLib.players().getLoadPlayer(newName);
5126                                                if((M!=null)&&(M.getClanRole(C.clanID())!=null))
5127                                                        C.delMember(M);
5128                                        }
5129                                }
5130                        }
5131                        else
5132                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
5133                }
5134        }
5135
5136        protected void genDeity1(final MOB mob, final Deity E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
5137        {
5138                E.setClericRequirements(prompt(mob, E.getClericRequirements(), showNumber, showFlag, "Cleric Requirements", false, false));
5139        }
5140
5141        protected void genDeity2(final MOB mob, final Deity E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
5142        {
5143                E.setClericRitual(prompt(mob, E.getClericRitual(), showNumber, showFlag, "Cleric Ritual", false, false));
5144        }
