5146        protected void genDeity3(final MOB mob, final Deity E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
5147        {
5148                E.setWorshipRequirements(prompt(mob, E.getWorshipRequirements(), showNumber, showFlag, "Worshiper Requirements", false, false));
5149        }
5150
5151        protected void genDeity4(final MOB mob, final Deity E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
5152        {
5153                E.setWorshipRitual(prompt(mob, E.getWorshipRitual(), showNumber, showFlag, "Worshiper Ritual", false, false));
5154        }
5155
5156        protected void genDeity5(final MOB mob, final Deity E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
5157        {
5158                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
5159                        return;
5160                String behave="NO";
5161                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(behave.length()>0))
5162                {
5163                        String abilitiestr="";
5164                        for(int a=0;a<E.numBlessings();a++)
5165                        {
5166                                final Ability A=E.fetchBlessing(a);
5167                                if((A!=null)&&(A.isSavable()))
5168                                        abilitiestr+=A.ID()+", ";
5169                        }
5170                        if(abilitiestr.length()>0)
5171                                abilitiestr=abilitiestr.substring(0,abilitiestr.length()-2);
5172                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Blessings: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,abilitiestr));
5173                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
5174                                return;
5175                        behave=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter an ability to add/remove (?)\n\r:"),"");
5176                        if(behave.length()>0)
5177                        {
5178                                if(behave.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
5179                                        mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.abilities(),-1).toString());
5180                                else
5181                                {
5182                                        Ability chosenOne=null;
5183                                        for(int a=0;a<E.numBlessings();a++)
5184                                        {
5185                                                final Ability A=E.fetchBlessing(a);
5186                                                if((A!=null)&&(A.ID().equalsIgnoreCase(behave)))
5187                                                        chosenOne=A;
5188                                        }
5189                                        if(chosenOne!=null)
5190                                        {
5191                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",chosenOne.ID()));
5192                                                E.delBlessing(chosenOne);
5193                                        }
5194                                        else
5195                                        {
5196                                                chosenOne=CMClass.getAbility(behave);
5197                                                if((chosenOne!=null)
5198                                                &&((chosenOne.classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_DOMAINS)==Ability.DOMAIN_ARCHON)
5199                                                &&(mob.fetchAbility(chosenOne.ID())==null))
5200                                                        chosenOne=null;
5201                                                if(chosenOne!=null)
5202                                                {
5203                                                        boolean alreadyHasIt=false;
5204                                                        for(int a=0;a<E.numBlessings();a++)
5205                                                        {
5206                                                                final Ability A=E.fetchBlessing(a);
5207                                                                if((A!=null)&&(A.ID().equals(chosenOne.ID())))
5208                                                                        alreadyHasIt=true;
5209                                                        }
5210                                                        final boolean clericOnly=mob.session().confirm(L("Is this for clerics only (y/N)?"),"N");
5211                                                        if(!alreadyHasIt)
5212                                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",chosenOne.ID()));
5213                                                        else
5214                                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 re-added.",chosenOne.ID()));
5215                                                        if(!alreadyHasIt)
5216                                                                E.addBlessing((Ability)chosenOne.copyOf(),clericOnly);
5217                                                }
5218                                                else
5219                                                {
5220                                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not recognized.  Try '?'.",behave));
5221                                                }
5222                                        }
5223                                }
5224                        }
5225                        else
5226                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
5227                }
5228        }
5229
5230        protected void genDeity6(final MOB mob, final Deity E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
5231                throws IOException
5232        {
5233                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
5234                        return;
5235                String behave="NO";
5236                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(behave.length()>0))
5237                {
5238                        String abilitiestr="";
5239                        for(int a=0;a<E.numCurses();a++)
5240                        {
5241                                final Ability A=E.fetchCurse(a);
5242                                if((A!=null)&&(A.isSavable()))
5243                                        abilitiestr+=A.ID()+", ";
5244                        }
5245                        if(abilitiestr.length()>0)
5246                                abilitiestr=abilitiestr.substring(0,abilitiestr.length()-2);
5247                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Curses: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,abilitiestr));
5248                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
5249                                return;
5250                        behave=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter an ability to add/remove (?)\n\r:"),"");
5251                        if(behave.length()>0)
5252                        {
5253                                if(behave.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
5254                                        mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.abilities(),-1).toString());
5255                                else
5256                                {
5257                                        Ability chosenOne=null;
5258                                        for(int a=0;a<E.numCurses();a++)
5259                                        {
5260                                                final Ability A=E.fetchCurse(a);
5261                                                if((A!=null)&&(A.ID().equalsIgnoreCase(behave)))
5262                                                        chosenOne=A;
5263                                        }
5264                                        if(chosenOne!=null)
5265                                        {
5266                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",chosenOne.ID()));
5267                                                E.delCurse(chosenOne);
5268                                        }
5269                                        else
5270                                        {
5271                                                chosenOne=CMClass.getAbility(behave);
5272                                                if((chosenOne!=null)
5273                                                &&((chosenOne.classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_DOMAINS)==Ability.DOMAIN_ARCHON)
5274                                                &&(mob.fetchAbility(chosenOne.ID())==null))
5275                                                        chosenOne=null;
5276                                                if(chosenOne!=null)
5277                                                {
5278                                                        boolean alreadyHasIt=false;
5279                                                        for(int a=0;a<E.numCurses();a++)
5280                                                        {
5281                                                                final Ability A=E.fetchCurse(a);
5282                                                                if((A!=null)&&(A.ID().equals(chosenOne.ID())))
5283                                                                        alreadyHasIt=true;
5284                                                        }
5285                                                        final boolean clericOnly=mob.session().confirm(L("Is this for clerics only (y/N)?"),"N");
5286                                                        if(!alreadyHasIt)
5287                                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",chosenOne.ID()));
5288                                                        else
5289                                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 re-added.",chosenOne.ID()));
5290                                                        if(!alreadyHasIt)
5291                                                                E.addCurse((Ability)chosenOne.copyOf(),clericOnly);
5292                                                }
5293                                                else
5294                                                {
5295                                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not recognized.  Try '?'.",behave));
5296                                                }
5297                                        }
5298                                }
5299                        }
5300                        else
5301                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
5302                }
5303        }
5304
5305        protected void genDeity7(final MOB mob, final Deity E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
5306                throws IOException
5307        {
5308                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
5309                        return;
5310                String behave="NO";
5311                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(behave.length()>0))
5312                {
5313                        String abilitiestr="";
5314                        for(int a=0;a<E.numPowers();a++)
5315                        {
5316                                final Ability A=E.fetchPower(a);
5317                                if((A!=null)&&(A.isSavable()))
5318                                        abilitiestr+=A.ID()+", ";
5319                        }
5320                        if(abilitiestr.length()>0)
5321                                abilitiestr=abilitiestr.substring(0,abilitiestr.length()-2);
5322                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Granted Powers: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,abilitiestr));
5323                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
5324                                return;
5325                        behave=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter an ability to add/remove (?)\n\r:"),"");
5326                        if(behave.length()>0)
5327                        {
5328                                if(behave.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
5329                                        mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.abilities(),-1).toString());
5330                                else
5331                                {
5332                                        Ability chosenOne=null;
5333                                        for(int a=0;a<E.numPowers();a++)
5334                                        {
5335                                                final Ability A=E.fetchPower(a);
5336                                                if((A!=null)&&(A.ID().equalsIgnoreCase(behave)))
5337                                                        chosenOne=A;
5338                                        }
5339                                        if(chosenOne!=null)
5340                                        {
5341                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",chosenOne.ID()));
5342                                                E.delPower(chosenOne);
5343                                        }
5344                                        else
5345                                        {
5346                                                chosenOne=CMClass.getAbility(behave);
5347                                                if((chosenOne!=null)
5348                                                &&((chosenOne.classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_DOMAINS)==Ability.DOMAIN_ARCHON)
5349                                                &&(mob.fetchAbility(chosenOne.ID())==null))
5350                                                        chosenOne=null;
5351                                                if(chosenOne!=null)
5352                                                {
5353                                                        boolean alreadyHasIt=false;
5354                                                        for(int a=0;a<E.numPowers();a++)
5355                                                        {
5356                                                                final Ability A=E.fetchPower(a);
5357                                                                if((A!=null)&&(A.ID().equals(chosenOne.ID())))
5358                                                                        alreadyHasIt=true;
5359                                                        }
5360                                                        if(!alreadyHasIt)
5361                                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",chosenOne.ID()));
5362                                                        else
5363                                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 re-added.",chosenOne.ID()));
5364                                                        if(!alreadyHasIt)
5365                                                                E.addPower((Ability)chosenOne.copyOf());
5366                                                }
5367                                                else
5368                                                {
5369                                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not recognized.  Try '?'.",behave));
5370                                                }
5371                                        }
5372                                }
5373                        }
5374                        else
5375                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
5376                }
5377        }
5378
5379        protected void genDeity8(final MOB mob, final Deity E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
5380        {
5381                E.setClericSin(prompt(mob,E.getClericSin(),showNumber,showFlag,"Cleric Sin",false,false));
5382        }
5383

5387        }

5397        }
5398
5399        protected void genPlayerLevel(final MOB mob, final Area A, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
5400        {
5401                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
5402                        return;
5403                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
5404                {
5405                        final StringBuffer buf=new StringBuffer();
5406                        buf.append(showNumber+". ");
5407                        buf.append(L("Player Level: @x1",""+A.getPlayerLevel()));
5408                        if(A.getPlayerLevel()==0)
5409                                buf.append(L(" (Med MOB Lvl)"));
5410                        mob.tell(buf.toString());
5411                        return;
5412                }
5413                A.setPlayerLevel(prompt(mob,A.getPlayerLevel(),showNumber,showFlag,"New Player Level"));
5414        }

5425
5426        protected void genLocationCoords(final MOB mob, final LocationRoom E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
5427        {
5428                final double[] newDir=new double[2];
5429                newDir[0]=Math.toRadians(prompt(mob,Math.toDegrees(E.getDirectionFromCore()[0]),showNumber,showFlag,"Horiz. Dir From Core","This is a horizontal direction in degrees from 0 to 360.",0,360));
5430                newDir[1]=Math.toRadians(prompt(mob,Math.toDegrees(E.getDirectionFromCore()[1]),showNumber,showFlag,"Vert. Dir From Core","This is a vertical direction in degrees from 0 to 360.",0,360));
5431                E.setDirectionFromCore(newDir);
5432        }
5433
5434        public void genSpaceStuff(final MOB mob, final SpaceObject E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
5435        {
5436                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
5437                        return;
5438                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
5439                {
5440                        final StringBuffer buf=new StringBuffer();
5441                        buf.append(showNumber+". ");
5442                        buf.append(L("Radius: @x1, Coords in space: @x2\n\r",CMLib.english().sizeDescShort(E.radius()),CMLib.english().coordDescShort(E.coordinates())));
5443                        buf.append(showNumber+". Moving: ");
5444                        if(E.speed()<=0)
5445                                buf.append("no");
5446                        else
5447                                buf.append(CMLib.english().speedDescShort(E.speed())+", Direction: "+CMLib.english().directionDescShort(E.direction())+"\n\r");
5448                        mob.tell(buf.toString());
5449                        return;
5450                }
5451                while((mob!=null)&&(mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
5452                {
5453                        final String val=mob.session().prompt(L("@x1. Radius (ENTER=@x2): ",""+showNumber,(CMLib.english().sizeDescShort(E.radius()))));
5454                        if((val==null)||(val.trim().length()==0))
5455                        {
5456                                mob.tell(L("(unchanged)"));
5457                                break;
5458                        }
5459                        final Long newValue=CMLib.english().parseSpaceDistance(val);
5460                        if((newValue==null)||(newValue.longValue()<0))
5461                                mob.tell(L("Unknown radius: '@x1', valid units include: @x2.",val,SpaceObject.Distance.getFullList()));
5462                        else
5463                        {
5464                                E.setRadius(newValue.longValue());
5465                                break;
5466                        }
5467                }
5468                final String coordHelp1=L("Distances may be any of the following:")+"\n\r"
5469                                + L("1. 3 distances: '[X],[Y],[Z]', positive or negative.")+"\n\r"
5470                                + L("2. Relative distance: '[X] FROM [name of another space object]', in random direction.")+"\n\r"
5471                                + L("3. Relative distance: '[X] FROM [name of another space object] TOWARD [Y],[Z]', where Y,Z are a direction in degrees.");
5472                final String coordHelp2=L("Valid distance units include: @x1.",SpaceObject.Distance.getFullList());
5473                while((mob!=null)&&(mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
5474                {
5475                        String val=mob.session().prompt(L("@x1. Coordinates in Space (ENTER=@x2): ",""+showNumber,(CMLib.english().coordDescShort(E.coordinates()))));
5476                        if((val==null)||(val.trim().length()==0))
5477                        {
5478                                mob.tell(L("(unchanged)"));
5479                                break;
5480                        }
5481                        final List<String> utokens=CMParms.parseSpaces(val.toUpperCase(),true);
5482                        if(utokens.contains("FROM"))
5483                        {
5484                                final List<String> tokens=CMParms.parseSpaces(val,true);
5485                                final int x=utokens.indexOf("FROM");
5486                                final int y=utokens.indexOf("TOWARD");
5487                                double[] direction;
5488                                if(y>0)
5489                                {
5490                                        final List<String> degreeStr=CMParms.parseCommas(CMParms.combine(tokens,y+1),true);
5491                                        if((degreeStr.size()!=2)
5492                                        ||(!CMath.isInteger(degreeStr.get(0)))||(!CMath.isInteger(degreeStr.get(1)))
5493                                        ||(CMath.s_int(degreeStr.get(0))<0)||(CMath.s_int(degreeStr.get(0))>359)
5494                                        ||(CMath.s_int(degreeStr.get(0))<0)||(CMath.s_int(degreeStr.get(1))>359))
5495                                        {
5496
5497                                                mob.tell(L("Invalid degrees (0-359): ")+CMParms.combine(tokens,y+1)+".\n\r"+coordHelp1+"\n\r"+coordHelp2);
5498                                                continue;
5499                                        }
5500                                        final double[] degreesDbl=CMParms.toDoubleArray(degreeStr);
5501                                        direction=new double[]{Math.toRadians(degreesDbl[0]),Math.toRadians(degreesDbl[1])};
5502                                        while(tokens.size()>=y)
5503                                                tokens.remove(tokens.size()-1);
5504                                }
5505                                else
5506                                        direction=new double[]{Math.toRadians(CMLib.dice().roll(1, 360, -1)),Math.toRadians(CMLib.dice().roll(1,180,-1))};
5507
5508                                final String distStr=CMParms.combine(tokens,0,x);
5509                                final String objName=CMParms.combine(tokens,x+1);
5510                                final Long dist=CMLib.english().parseSpaceDistance(distStr);
5511                                if(dist==null)
5512                                {
5513                                        mob.tell(L("Unknown distance:")+" '"+distStr+"'. "+coordHelp2);
5514                                        continue;
5515                                }
5516                                SpaceObject O=null;
5517                                if(objName.trim().length()>0)
5518                                {
5519                                        O=CMLib.map().findSpaceObject(objName, true);
5520                                        if(O==null)
5521                                                O=CMLib.map().findSpaceObject(objName, false);
5522                                }
5523                                if(O==null)
5524                                {
5525                                        mob.tell(L("Unknown relative space object")+" '"+objName+"'.\n\r"+coordHelp2);
5526                                        continue;
5527                                }
5528                                val=CMParms.toListString(CMLib.map().getLocation(O.coordinates(), direction, dist.longValue()));
5529                        }
5530
5531                        final List<String> valsL=CMParms.parseCommas(val,true);
5532                        if(valsL.size()!=3)
5533                                mob.tell(coordHelp1+"\n\r"+coordHelp2);
5534                        else
5535                        {
5536                                boolean fail=true;
5537                                final Long[] valL=new Long[3];
5538                                for(int i=0;i<3;i++)
5539                                {
5540                                        final Long newValue=CMLib.english().parseSpaceDistance(valsL.get(i));
5541                                        if(newValue==null)
5542                                        {
5543                                                mob.tell(L("Unknown coord: '@x1'. @x2",valsL.get(i),coordHelp2));
5544                                                break;
5545                                        }
5546                                        else
5547                                        {
5548                                                valL[i]=newValue;
5549                                                if(i==2)
5550                                                        fail=false;
5551                                        }
5552                                }
5553                                if(!fail)
5554                                {
5555                                        E.setCoords(new long[]{valL[0].longValue(),valL[1].longValue(),valL[2].longValue()});
5556                                        E.coordinates()[0] = E.coordinates()[0] % SpaceObject.Distance.GalaxyRadius.dm;
5557                                        E.coordinates()[1] = E.coordinates()[1] % SpaceObject.Distance.GalaxyRadius.dm;
5558                                        E.coordinates()[2] = E.coordinates()[2] % SpaceObject.Distance.GalaxyRadius.dm;
5559                                        break;
5560                                }
5561                        }
5562                }
5563                while((mob!=null)&&(mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
5564                {
5565                        String val=mob.session().prompt(L("@x1. Speed in Space (ENTER=@x2): ",""+showNumber,(CMLib.english().speedDescShort(E.speed()))));
5566                        if((val==null)||(val.trim().length()==0))
5567                        {
5568                                mob.tell(L("(unchanged)"));
5569                                break;
5570                        }
5571                        val=val.trim();
5572                        if(val.trim().toLowerCase().endsWith("/sec"))
5573                                val=val.substring(0,val.length()-4);
5574                        if(val.trim().toLowerCase().endsWith("/second"))
5575                                val=val.substring(0,val.length()-7);
5576                        final Long newValue=CMLib.english().parseSpaceDistance(val);
5577                        if((newValue==null)||(newValue.longValue()<0))
5578                                mob.tell(L("Unknown speed/sec: '@x1', valid units include: @x2.",val,SpaceObject.Distance.getAbbrList()));
5579                        else
5580                        {
5581                                E.setSpeed(newValue.doubleValue());
5582                                break;
5583                        }
5584                }
5585                while((mob!=null)&&(mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(E.speed()>0))
5586                {
5587                        String val=mob.session().prompt(L("@x1. Direction in Space (ENTER=@x2): ",""+showNumber,(CMLib.english().directionDescShort(E.direction()))));
5588                        if((val==null)||(val.trim().length()==0))
5589                        {
5590                                mob.tell(L("(unchanged)"));
5591                                break;
5592                        }
5593                        val=val.toLowerCase().trim();
5594                        final int x=val.indexOf(" mark ");
5595                        if((x<0)
5596                        ||(!CMath.isDouble(val.substring(0,x).trim()))
5597                        ||(!CMath.isDouble(val.substring(x+6).trim()))
5598                        ||(CMath.s_double(val.substring(0,x).trim())<0)
5599                        ||(CMath.s_double(val.substring(0,x).trim())>=360)
5600                        ||(CMath.s_double(val.substring(x+6).trim())<0)
5601                        ||(CMath.s_double(val.substring(x+6).trim())>=360))
5602                                mob.tell(L("Invalid direction in degrees: '@x1', you might need to include 'mark' in the direction.",val));
5603                        else
5604                        {
5605                                E.setDirection(new double[]{Math.toRadians(CMath.s_double(val.substring(0,x).trim())),Math.toRadians(CMath.s_double(val.substring(x+6).trim()))});
5606                                break;
5607                        }
5608                }
5609        }
5610
5611        @Override
5612        public void wornLocation(final MOB mob, final long[] oldWornLocation, final boolean[] logicalAnd, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
5613        throws IOException
5614        {
5615                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
5616                        return;
5617                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
5618                {
5619                        final StringBuffer buf=new StringBuffer(showNumber+". ");
5620                        if(!logicalAnd[0])
5621                                buf.append(L("Wear on any one of: "));
5622                        else
5623                                buf.append(L("Worn on all of: "));
5624                        final Wearable.CODES codes = Wearable.CODES.instance();
5625                        for(int l=1;l<codes.all().length;l++)
5626                        {
5627                                final long wornCode=codes.all()[l];
5628                                if((oldWornLocation[0]&wornCode)>0)
5629                                        buf.append(codes.name(l)+", ");
5630                        }
5631                        if(buf.toString().endsWith(", "))
5632                                mob.tell(buf.substring(0,buf.length()-2));
5633                        else
5634                                mob.tell(buf.toString());
5635                        return;
5636                }
5637                int codeVal=-1;
5638                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(codeVal!=0))
5639                {
5640                        mob.tell(L("Wearing parameters\n\r0: Done"));
5641                        if(!logicalAnd[0])
5642                                mob.tell(L("1: Able to wear on any ONE of these locations:"));
5643                        else
5644                                mob.tell(L("1: Must be worn on ALL of these locations:"));
5645                        final Wearable.CODES codes = Wearable.CODES.instance();
5646                        for(int l=0;l<codes.total();l++)
5647                        {
5648                                final long wornCode=codes.get(l);
5649                                if(codes.name(wornCode).length()>0)
5650                                {
5651                                        final String header=(l+2)+": ("+codes.name(wornCode)+") : "+(((oldWornLocation[0]&wornCode)==wornCode)?"YES":"NO");
5652                                        mob.tell(header);
5653                                }
5654                        }
5655                        codeVal=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Select an option number above to TOGGLE\n\r: ")));
5656                        if((codeVal>0)&&(codeVal<codes.total()+2))
5657                        {
5658                                if(codeVal==1)
5659                                        logicalAnd[0]=!logicalAnd[0];
5660                                else
5661                                {
5662                                        final long wornCode=codes.get(codeVal-2);
5663                                        if((oldWornLocation[0]&wornCode)==wornCode)
5664                                                oldWornLocation[0]=(oldWornLocation[0]-wornCode);
5665                                        else
5666                                                oldWornLocation[0]=(oldWornLocation[0]|wornCode);
5667                                }
5668                        }
5669                }
5670        }
5671
5672        protected void genWornLocation(final MOB mob, final Item E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
5673                throws IOException
5674        {
5675                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
5676                        return;
5677                final long[] wornLoc = new long[]{E.rawProperLocationBitmap()};
5678                final boolean[] logicalAnd = new boolean[]{E.rawLogicalAnd()};
5679                wornLocation(mob,wornLoc,logicalAnd,showNumber,showFlag);
5680                E.setRawProperLocationBitmap(wornLoc[0]);
5681                E.setRawLogicalAnd(logicalAnd[0]);
5682        }
5683
5684        protected void genThirstQuenched(final MOB mob, final Drink E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
5685        {
5686                E.setThirstQuenched(prompt(mob, E.thirstQuenched(), showNumber, showFlag, "Quenched/Drink"));
5687        }
5688
5689        protected void genDrinkHeld(final MOB mob, final Drink E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
5690        {
5691                E.setLiquidHeld(prompt(mob,E.liquidHeld(),showNumber,showFlag,"Amount of Drink Held"));
5692                E.setLiquidRemaining(E.liquidHeld());
5693        }
5694
5695        protected void genAttackAttribute(final MOB mob, final CharClass E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String field)
5696                throws IOException
5697        {
5698                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
5699                        return;
5700                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+fieldDisplayStr+": '"+CharStats.CODES.DESC(CMath.s_int(E.getStat(field)))+"'.");
5701                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
5702                        return;
5703                final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new one\n\r:"),"");
5704                String newStat="";
5705                for(final int i : CharStats.CODES.BASECODES())
5706                {
5707                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase(CharStats.CODES.DESC(i)))
5708                                newStat=""+i;
5709                }
5710                if(newStat.length()>0)
5711                        E.setStat(field,newStat);
5712                else
5713                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
5714        }
5715
5716        protected void genArmorCode(final MOB mob, final CharClass E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String field)
5717                throws IOException
5718        {
5719                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
5720                        return;
5721                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+fieldDisplayStr+": '"+CharClass.ARMOR_LONGDESC[CMath.s_int(E.getStat(field))]+"'.");
5722                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
5723                        return;
5724                final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter (@x1)\n\r:",CMParms.toListString(CharClass.ARMOR_DESCS)),"");
5725                String newStat="";
5726                for(int i=0;i<CharClass.ARMOR_DESCS.length;i++)
5727                {
5728                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase(CharClass.ARMOR_DESCS[i]))
5729                                newStat=""+i;
5730                }
5731                if(newStat.length()>0)
5732                        E.setStat(field,newStat);
5733                else
5734                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
5735        }
5736
5737        protected void genQualifications(final MOB mob, final CharClass E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String field)
5738                throws IOException
5739        {
5740                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
5741                        return;
5742                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+fieldDisplayStr+": '"+CMLib.masking().maskDesc(E.getStat(field))+"'.");
5743                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
5744                        return;
5745                String newName="?";
5746                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(newName.equals("?")))
5747                {
5748                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new mask (?)\n\r:"),"");
5749                        if(newName.equals("?"))
5750                                mob.tell(CMLib.masking().maskHelp("\n","disallow"));
5751                }
5752                if((newName.length()>0)&&(!newName.equals("?")))
5753                        E.setStat(field,newName);
5754                else
5755                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
5756        }
5757
5758        protected void genClanAccept(final MOB mob, final Clan E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
5759        {
5760                E.setAcceptanceSettings(prompt(mob, E.getAcceptanceSettings(), showNumber, showFlag, "Clan Qualifications", false, false, CMLib.masking().maskHelp("\n", "disallow")));
5761        }
5762
5763        protected void genWeaponRestr(final MOB mob, final CharClass E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String FieldNum, final String field)
5764                throws IOException
5765        {
5766                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
5767                        return;
5768                final List<String> set=CMParms.parseCommas(E.getStat(field),true);
5769                final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer("");
5770                for(int v=0;v<set.size();v++)
5771                        str.append(" "+Weapon.CLASS_DESCS[CMath.s_int(set.get(v))].toLowerCase());
5772
5773                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+fieldDisplayStr+": '"+str.toString()+"'.");
5774                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
5775                        return;
5776                String newName="?";
5777                boolean setChanged=false;
5778                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(newName.equals("?")))
5779                {
5780                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a weapon class to add/remove (?)\n\r:"),"");
5781                        if(newName.equals("?"))
5782                                mob.tell(CMParms.toListString(Weapon.CLASS_DESCS));
5783                        else
5784                        if(newName.length()>0)
5785                        {
5786                                int foundCode=-1;
5787                                for(int i=0;i<Weapon.CLASS_DESCS.length;i++)
5788                                {
5789                                        if(Weapon.CLASS_DESCS[i].equalsIgnoreCase(newName))
5790                                                foundCode=i;
5791                                }
5792                                if(foundCode<0)
5793                                {
5794                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not recognized.  Try '?'.",newName));
5795                                        newName="?";
5796                                }
5797                                else
5798                                {
5799                                        final int x=set.indexOf(""+foundCode);
5800                                        if(x>=0)
5801                                        {
5802                                                setChanged=true;
5803                                                set.remove(x);
5804                                                mob.tell(L("'@x1' removed.",newName));
5805                                                newName="?";
5806                                        }
5807                                        else
5808                                        {
5809                                                set.add(""+foundCode);
5810                                                setChanged=true;
5811                                                mob.tell(L("'@x1' added.",newName));
5812                                                newName="?";
5813                                        }
5814                                }
5815                        }
5816                }
5817                if(setChanged)
5818                        E.setStat(field,CMParms.toListString(set));
5819                else
5820                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
5821        }
5822
5823        protected void genWeaponMaterials(final MOB mob, final CharClass E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String FieldNum, final String field)
5824        throws IOException
5825        {
5826                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
5827                        return;
5828                final List<String> set=CMParms.parseCommas(E.getStat(field),true);
5829                final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer("");
5830                for(int v=0;v<set.size();v++)
5831                        str.append(" "+CMLib.materials().getMaterialDesc(CMath.s_int(set.get(v))));
5832
5833                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+fieldDisplayStr+": '"+str.toString()+"'.");
5834                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
5835                        return;
5836                String newName="?";
5837                boolean setChanged=false;
5838                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(newName.equals("?")))
5839                {
5840                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a material type to add/remove to requirements (?)\n\r:"),"");
5841                        if(newName.equals("?"))
5842                                mob.tell(CMParms.toListString(RawMaterial.Material.values()));
5843                        else
5844                        if(newName.length()>0)
5845                        {
5846                                int foundCode=CMLib.materials().getMaterialCode(newName,true);
5847                                if(foundCode<0)
5848                                        foundCode=CMLib.materials().getMaterialCode(newName,false);
5849                                if(foundCode<0)
5850                                {
5851                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not recognized.  Try '?'.",newName));
5852                                        newName="?";
5853                                }
5854                                else
5855                                {
5856                                        final int x=set.indexOf(""+foundCode);
5857                                        if(x>=0)
5858                                        {
5859                                                setChanged=true;
5860                                                set.remove(x);
5861                                                mob.tell(L("'@x1' removed.",newName));
5862                                                newName="?";
5863                                        }
5864                                        else
5865                                        {
5866                                                set.add(""+foundCode);
5867                                                setChanged=true;
5868                                                mob.tell(L("'@x1' added.",newName));
5869                                                newName="?";
5870                                        }
5871                                }
5872                        }
5873                }
5874                if(setChanged)
5875                        E.setStat(field,CMParms.toListString(set));
5876                else
5877                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
5878        }
5879
5880        protected void genDisableFlags(final MOB mob, final Race E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
5881        throws IOException
5882        {
5883                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
5884                        return;
5885                int flags=CMath.s_int(E.getStat("DISFLAGS"));
5886                String newName="?";
5887                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(newName.equals("?")))
5888                {
5889                        final StringBuffer disabled=new StringBuffer("");
5890                        for(int i=0;i<Race.GENFLAG_DESCS.length;i++)
5891                        {
5892                                if(CMath.isSet(flags,i))
5893                                        disabled.append(Race.GENFLAG_DESCS[i]);
5894                        }
5895
5896                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Disabled: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,disabled.toString()));
5897                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
5898                                return;
5899
5900                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter flag to toggle (?)\n\r:"),"").toUpperCase();
5901                        if(newName.length()==0)
5902                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
5903                        else
5904                        if(CMParms.contains(Race.GENFLAG_DESCS,newName))
5905                        {
5906                                final int bit=CMParms.indexOf(Race.GENFLAG_DESCS,newName);
5907                                if(CMath.isSet(flags,bit))
5908                                        flags=flags-(int)CMath.pow(2,bit);
5909                                else
5910                                        flags=flags+(int)CMath.pow(2,bit);
5911                        }
5912                        else
5913                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
5914                        {
5915                                final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer(L("Valid values: \n\r"));
5916                                for (final String element : Race.GENFLAG_DESCS)
5917                                        str.append(element+"\n\r");
5918                                mob.tell(str.toString());
5919                        }
5920                        else
5921                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
5922                }
5923                E.setStat("DISFLAGS",""+flags);
5924        }
5925
5926        protected void genRaceWearFlags(final MOB mob, final Race E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
5927        throws IOException
5928        {
5929                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
5930                        return;
5931                int flags=CMath.s_int(E.getStat("WEAR"));
5932                String newName="?";
5933                final Wearable.CODES codes = Wearable.CODES.instance();
5934                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(newName.equals("?")))
5935                {
5936                        final StringBuffer wearable=new StringBuffer("");
5937                        for(int i=1;i<codes.total();i++)
5938                        {
5939                                if(CMath.isSet(flags,i-1))
5940                                        wearable.append(codes.name(i)+" ");
5941                        }
5942
5943                        mob.tell(L("@x1. UNWearable locations: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,wearable.toString()));
5944                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
5945                                return;
5946
5947                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a location to toggle (?)\n\r:"),"").toUpperCase();
5948                        if(newName.length()==0)
5949                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
5950                        else
5951                        if(CMParms.containsIgnoreCase(codes.names(),newName))
5952                        {
5953                                final int bit=CMParms.indexOfIgnoreCase(codes.names(),newName)-1;
5954                                if(bit>=0)
5955                                {
5956                                        if(CMath.isSet(flags,bit))
5957                                                flags=flags-(int)CMath.pow(2,bit);
5958                                        else
5959                                                flags=flags+(int)CMath.pow(2,bit);
5960                                }
5961                        }
5962                        else
5963                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
5964                        {
5965                                final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer(L("Valid values: \n\r"));
5966                                for(final String name : codes.names())
5967                                        str.append(name+" ");
5968                                mob.tell(str.toString());
5969                        }
5970                        else
5971                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
5972                }
5973                E.setStat("WEAR",""+flags);
5974        }
5975
5976        protected void genRaceAvailability(final MOB mob, final Race E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
5977                throws IOException
5978        {
5979                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
5980                        return;
5981                mob.tell(L("@x1. Availability: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,Area.THEME_PHRASE_EXT[CMath.s_int(E.getStat("AVAIL"))]));
5982                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
5983                        return;
5984                String newName="?";
5985                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(newName.equals("?")))
5986                {
5987                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new value (?)\n\r:"),"");
5988                        if(newName.length()==0)
5989                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
5990                        else
5991                        if((CMath.isNumber(newName))&&(CMath.s_int(newName)<Area.THEME_PHRASE_EXT.length))
5992                                E.setStat("AVAIL",""+CMath.s_int(newName));
5993                        else
5994                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
5995                        {
5996                                final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer(L("Valid values: \n\r"));
5997                                for(int i=0;i<Area.THEME_PHRASE_EXT.length;i++)
5998                                        str.append(i+") "+Area.THEME_PHRASE_EXT[i]+"\n\r");
5999                                mob.tell(str.toString());
6000                        }
6001                        else
6002                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6003                }
6004        }
6005
6006        protected void genClassAvailability(final MOB mob, final CharClass E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
6007        throws IOException
6008        {
6009                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
6010                        return;
6011                mob.tell(L("@x1. Availability: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,Area.THEME_PHRASE_EXT[CMath.s_int(E.getStat("PLAYER"))]));
6012                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
6013                        return;
6014                String newName="?";
6015                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(newName.equals("?")))
6016                {
6017                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new value (?)\n\r:"),"");
6018                        if(newName.length()==0)
6019                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6020                        else
6021                        if((CMath.isNumber(newName))&&(CMath.s_int(newName)<Area.THEME_PHRASE_EXT.length))
6022                                E.setStat("PLAYER",""+CMath.s_int(newName));
6023                        else
6024                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
6025                        {
6026                                final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer(L("Valid values: \n\r"));
6027                                for(int i=0;i<Area.THEME_PHRASE_EXT.length;i++)
6028                                        str.append(i+") "+Area.THEME_PHRASE_EXT[i]+"\n\r");
6029                                mob.tell(str.toString());
6030                        }
6031                        else
6032                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6033                }
6034        }
6035
6036        protected void genCat(final MOB mob, final Race E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
6037                throws IOException
6038        {
6039                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
6040                        return;
6041                mob.tell(L("@x1. Racial Category: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,E.racialCategory()));
6042                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
6043                        return;
6044                String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new one\n\r:"),"");
6045                if(newName.length()>0)
6046                {
6047                        boolean found=false;
6048                        if(newName.startsWith("new "))
6049                        {
6050                                newName=CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(newName.substring(4));
6051                                if(newName.length()>0)
6052                                        found=true;
6053                        }
6054                        else
6055                        for(final Enumeration<Race> r=CMClass.races();r.hasMoreElements();)
6056                        {
6057                                final Race R=r.nextElement();
6058                                if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase(R.racialCategory()))
6059                                {
6060                                        newName=R.racialCategory();
6061                                        found=true;
6062                                        break;
6063                                }
6064                        }
6065                        if(!found)
6066                        {
6067                                final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer(L("That category does not exist.  Valid categories include: "));
6068                                final HashSet<String> H=new HashSet<String>();
6069                                for(final Enumeration<Race> r=CMClass.races();r.hasMoreElements();)
6070                                {
6071                                        final Race R=r.nextElement();
6072                                        if(!H.contains(R.racialCategory()))
6073                                        {
6074                                                H.add(R.racialCategory());
6075                                                str.append(R.racialCategory()+", ");
6076                                        }
6077                                }
6078                                mob.tell(str.toString().substring(0,str.length()-2)+".");
6079                        }
6080                        else
6081                                E.setStat("CAT",newName);
6082                }
6083                else
6084                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6085        }
6086
6087        protected void genRaceBuddy(final MOB mob, final Race E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String prompt, final String flag)
6088                throws IOException
6089        {
6090                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
6091                        return;
6092                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+prompt+": '"+E.getStat(flag)+"'.");
6093                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
6094                        return;
6095                final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new one\n\r:"),"");
6096                if(newName.length()>0)
6097                {
6098                        Race R2=CMClass.getRace(newName);
6099                        if(R2==null)
6100                                R2=(Race)CMClass.getLoadNewClassInstance(CMObjectType.RACE,newName,true);
6101                        if((R2!=null)&&(R2.isGeneric()))
6102                                R2=null;
6103                        if(R2==null)
6104                        {
6105                                final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer(L("That race name is invalid or is generic.  Valid races include: "));
6106                                for(final Enumeration<Race> r=CMClass.races();r.hasMoreElements();)
6107                                {
6108                                        final Race R=r.nextElement();
6109                                        if(!R.isGeneric())
6110                                                str.append(R.ID()+", ");
6111                                }
6112                                mob.tell(str.toString().substring(0,str.length()-2)+".");
6113                        }
6114                        else
6115                        if(CMClass.getRace(newName)==R2)
6116                                E.setStat(flag,R2.ID());
6117                        else
6118                                E.setStat(flag,R2.getClass().getName());
6119                }
6120                else
6121                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6122        }
6123
6124        protected void genClassBuddy(final MOB mob, final CharClass E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String prompt, final String flag)
6125        throws IOException
6126        {
6127                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
6128                        return;
6129                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+prompt+": '"+E.getStat(flag)+"'.");
6130                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
6131                        return;
6132                final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new one\n\r:"),"");
6133                if(newName.length()>0)
6134                {
6135                        CharClass C2=CMClass.getCharClass(newName);
6136                        if(C2==null)
6137                                C2=(CharClass)CMClass.getLoadNewClassInstance(CMObjectType.CHARCLASS,newName,true);
6138                        if((C2!=null)&&(C2.isGeneric()))
6139                                C2=null;
6140                        if(C2==null)
6141                        {
6142                                final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer(L("That char class name is invalid or is generic.  Valid char classes include: "));
6143                                for(final Enumeration<CharClass> c=CMClass.charClasses();c.hasMoreElements();)
6144                                {
6145                                        final CharClass C=c.nextElement();
6146                                        if(!C.isGeneric())
6147                                                str.append(C.ID()+", ");
6148                                }
6149                                mob.tell(str.toString().substring(0,str.length()-2)+".");
6150                        }
6151                        else
6152                        if(CMClass.getCharClass(newName)==C2)
6153                                E.setStat(flag,C2.ID());
6154                        else
6155                                E.setStat(flag,C2.getClass().getName());
6156                }
6157                else
6158                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6159        }
6160
6161        protected void genClassRaceQuals(final MOB mob, final CharClass E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String prompt, final String flag)
6162        throws IOException
6163        {
6164                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
6165                        return;
6166                boolean cont=true;
6167                final List<String> newRaces=new XVector<String>(CMParms.parseCommas(E.getStat(flag), true));
6168                while((!mob.session().isStopped()) && (cont))
6169                {
6170                        mob.tell(showNumber+". "+prompt+": '"+CMParms.toListString(newRaces)+"'.");
6171                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
6172                                return;
6173                        final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a race to add or remove\n\r:"),"");
6174                        if(newName.length()>0)
6175                        {
6176                                final int x=CMParms.indexOfIgnoreCase(newRaces, newName);
6177                                if(x>=0)
6178                                {
6179                                        newRaces.remove(x);
6180                                        mob.tell(L("Race/RaceCat @x1 removed.",newName));
6181                                }
6182                                else
6183                                {
6184                                        boolean found=newName.equalsIgnoreCase("All");
6185                                        if(found)
6186                                                newRaces.add("All");
6187                                        else
6188                                        {
6189                                                Race R=CMClass.findRace(newName);
6190                                                if(R!=null)
6191                                                {
6192                                                        newRaces.add(R.ID());
6193                                                        found=true;
6194                                                }
6195                                                else
6196                                                {
6197                                                        for(final Enumeration<Race> r=CMClass.races();r.hasMoreElements();)
6198                                                        {
6199                                                                R=r.nextElement();
6200                                                                if(R.racialCategory().equalsIgnoreCase(newName))
6201                                                                {
6202                                                                        newRaces.add(R.racialCategory());
6203                                                                        found=true;
6204                                                                        break;
6205                                                                }
6206                                                        }
6207                                                }
6208                                        }
6209                                        if(found)
6210                                                mob.tell(L("Race/RaceCat @x1 added.",newName));
6211                                        else
6212                                                mob.tell(L("Could not find any race, racecat, or all."));
6213                                }
6214                        }
6215                        else
6216                                cont=false;
6217                }
6218                E.setStat(flag, CMParms.toListString(newRaces));
6219        }
6220
6221        protected void genBodyParts(final MOB mob, final Race E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
6222                throws IOException
6223        {
6224                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
6225                        return;
6226                final StringBuffer parts=new StringBuffer("");
6227                for(int i=0;i<Race.BODYPARTSTR.length;i++)
6228                {
6229                        if(E.bodyMask()[i]!=0)
6230                                parts.append(Race.BODYPARTSTR[i].toLowerCase()+"("+E.bodyMask()[i]+") ");
6231                }
6232                mob.tell(L("@x1. Body Parts: @x2.",""+showNumber,parts.toString()));
6233                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
6234                        return;
6235                String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a body part\n\r:"),"");
6236                if(newName.length()>0)
6237                {
6238                        final Integer partNum=Race.BODYPARTHASH.get(newName.toUpperCase().trim());
6239                        if(partNum==null)
6240                        {
6241                                final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer(L("That body part is invalid.  Valid parts include: "));
6242                                for (final String element : Race.BODYPARTSTR)
6243                                        str.append(element+", ");
6244                                mob.tell(str.toString().substring(0,str.length()-2)+".");
6245                        }
6246                        else
6247                        {
6248                                newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter new number (@x1), 0=none\n\r:",""+E.bodyMask()[partNum.intValue()]),""+E.bodyMask()[partNum.intValue()]);
6249                                if(newName.length()>0)
6250                                        E.bodyMask()[partNum.intValue()]=CMath.s_int(newName);
6251                                else
6252                                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6253                        }
6254                }
6255                else
6256                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6257        }
6258
6259        protected void genPStats(final MOB mob, final Race R, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
6260                throws IOException
6261        {
6262                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
6263                        return;
6264                final PhyStats S=(PhyStats)CMClass.getCommon("DefaultPhyStats");
6265                S.setAllValues(0);
6266                CMLib.coffeeMaker().setPhyStats(S,R.getStat("ESTATS"));
6267                final StringBuffer parts=new StringBuffer("");
6268                for(int i=0;i<S.getStatCodes().length;i++)
6269                {
6270                        if(CMath.s_int(S.getStat(S.getStatCodes()[i]))!=0)
6271                                parts.append(CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(S.getStatCodes()[i])+"("+S.getStat(S.getStatCodes()[i])+") ");
6272                }
6273                mob.tell(L("@x1. PhysStat Adjustments: @x2.",""+showNumber,parts.toString()));
6274                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
6275                        return;
6276                boolean done=false;
6277                while((!done)&&(mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
6278                {
6279                        String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a stat name\n\r:"),"");
6280                        if(newName.length()>0)
6281                        {
6282                                String partName=null;
6283                                for(int i=0;i<S.getStatCodes().length;i++)
6284                                {
6285                                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase(S.getStatCodes()[i]))
6286                                        {
6287                                                partName=S.getStatCodes()[i];
6288                                                break;
6289                                        }
6290                                }
6291                                if(partName==null)
6292                                {
6293                                        final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer(L("That stat is invalid.  Valid stats include: "));
6294                                        for(int i=0;i<S.getStatCodes().length;i++)
6295                                                str.append(S.getStatCodes()[i]+", ");
6296                                        mob.tell(str.toString().substring(0,str.length()-2)+".");
6297                                }
6298                                else
6299                                {
6300                                        boolean checkChange=false;
6301                                        if(partName.equals("DISPOSITION"))
6302                                        {
6303                                                genDisposition(mob,S,0,0);
6304                                                checkChange=true;
6305                                        }
6306                                        else
6307                                        if(partName.equals("SENSES"))
6308                                        {
6309                                                genSensesMask(mob,S,0,0);
6310                                                checkChange=true;
6311                                        }
6312                                        else
6313                                        {
6314                                                newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a value\n\r:"),"");
6315                                                if(newName.length()>0)
6316                                                {
6317                                                        S.setStat(partName,newName);
6318                                                        checkChange=true;
6319                                                }
6320                                                else
6321                                                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6322                                        }
6323                                        if(checkChange)
6324                                        {
6325                                                boolean zereoed=true;
6326                                                for(int i=0;i<S.getStatCodes().length;i++)
6327                                                {
6328                                                        if(CMath.s_int(S.getStat(S.getStatCodes()[i]))!=0)
6329                                                        {
6330                                                                zereoed=false;
6331                                                                break;
6332                                                        }
6333                                                }
6334                                                if(zereoed)
6335                                                        R.setStat("ESTATS","");
6336                                                else
6337                                                        R.setStat("ESTATS",CMLib.coffeeMaker().getPhyStatsStr(S));
6338                                        }
6339                                }
6340                        }
6341                        else
6342                        {
6343                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6344                                done=true;
6345                        }
6346                }
6347        }
6348
6349        protected void genAState(final MOB mob,
6350                                                  final Race R,
6351                                                  final String field,
6352                                                  final String prompt,
6353                                                  final int showNumber,
6354                                                  final int showFlag)
6355                throws IOException
6356        {
6357                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
6358                        return;
6359                final CharState S=(CharState)CMClass.getCommon("DefaultCharState"); S.setAllValues(0);
6360                CMLib.coffeeMaker().setCharState(S,R.getStat(field));
6361                final StringBuffer parts=new StringBuffer("");
6362                for(int i=0;i<S.getStatCodes().length;i++)
6363                {
6364                        if(CMath.s_int(S.getStat(S.getStatCodes()[i]))!=0)
6365                                parts.append(CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(S.getStatCodes()[i])+"("+S.getStat(S.getStatCodes()[i])+") ");
6366                }
6367                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+prompt+": "+parts.toString()+".");
6368                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
6369                        return;
6370                boolean done=false;
6371                while((!done)&&(mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
6372                {
6373                        String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a stat name\n\r:"),"");
6374                        if(newName.length()>0)
6375                        {
6376                                String partName=null;
6377                                for(int i=0;i<S.getStatCodes().length;i++)
6378                                {
6379                                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase(S.getStatCodes()[i]))
6380                                        {
6381                                                partName=S.getStatCodes()[i];
6382                                                break;
6383                                        }
6384                                }
6385                                if(partName==null)
6386                                {
6387                                        final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer(L("That stat is invalid.  Valid stats include: "));
6388                                        for(int i=0;i<S.getStatCodes().length;i++)
6389                                                str.append(S.getStatCodes()[i]+", ");
6390                                        mob.tell(str.toString().substring(0,str.length()-2)+".");
6391                                }
6392                                else
6393                                {
6394                                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a value\n\r:"),"");
6395                                        if(newName.length()>0)
6396                                        {
6397                                                S.setStat(partName,newName);
6398                                                boolean zereoed=true;
6399                                                for(int i=0;i<S.getStatCodes().length;i++)
6400                                                {
6401                                                        if(CMath.s_int(S.getStat(S.getStatCodes()[i]))!=0)
6402                                                        {
6403                                                                zereoed=false;
6404                                                                break;
6405                                                        }
6406                                                }
6407                                                if(zereoed)
6408                                                        R.setStat(field,"");
6409                                                else
6410                                                        R.setStat(field,CMLib.coffeeMaker().getCharStateStr(S));
6411                                        }
6412                                        else
6413                                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6414                                }
6415                        }
6416                        else
6417                        {
6418                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6419                                done=true;
6420                        }
6421                }
6422        }
6423
6424        protected void genAStats(final MOB mob, final Race R, final String field, final String FieldName, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
6425                throws IOException
6426        {
6427                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
6428                        return;
6429                final CharStats S=(CharStats)CMClass.getCommon("DefaultCharStats"); S.setAllValues(0);
6430                CMLib.coffeeMaker().setCharStats(S,R.getStat(field));
6431                final StringBuffer parts=new StringBuffer("");
6432                for(final int i : CharStats.CODES.ALLCODES())
6433                {
6434                        if(S.getStat(i)!=0)
6435                                parts.append(CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(CharStats.CODES.DESC(i))+"("+S.getStat(i)+") ");
6436                }
6437                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+FieldName+": "+parts.toString()+".");
6438                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
6439                        return;
6440                boolean done=false;
6441                while((!done)&&(mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
6442                {
6443                        String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a stat name\n\r:"),"");
6444                        if(newName.length()>0)
6445                        {
6446                                int partNum=-1;
6447                                for(final int i : CharStats.CODES.ALLCODES())
6448                                {
6449                                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase(CharStats.CODES.DESC(i)))
6450                                        {
6451                                                partNum=i;
6452                                                break;
6453                                        }
6454                                }
6455                                if(partNum<0)
6456                                {
6457                                        final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer(L("That stat is invalid.  Valid stats include: "));
6458                                        for(final int i : CharStats.CODES.ALLCODES())
6459                                                str.append(CharStats.CODES.DESC(i)+", ");
6460                                        mob.tell(str.toString().substring(0,str.length()-2)+".");
6461                                }
6462                                else
6463                                {
6464                                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a value\n\r:"),"");
6465                                        if(newName.length()>0)
6466                                        {
6467                                                if(newName.trim().equalsIgnoreCase("0"))
6468                                                        S.setStat(partNum,CMath.s_int(newName));
6469                                                else
6470                                                if(partNum==CharStats.STAT_GENDER)
6471                                                        S.setStat(partNum,newName.charAt(0));
6472                                                else
6473                                                        S.setStat(partNum,CMath.s_int(newName));
6474                                                boolean zereoed=true;
6475                                                for(final int i : CharStats.CODES.ALLCODES())
