6476                                                {
6477                                                        if(S.getStat(i)!=0)
6478                                                        {
6479                                                                zereoed=false;
6480                                                                break;
6481                                                        }
6482                                                }
6483                                                if(zereoed)
6484                                                        R.setStat(field,"");
6485                                                else
6486                                                        R.setStat(field,CMLib.coffeeMaker().getCharStatsStr(S));
6487                                        }
6488                                        else
6489                                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6490                                }
6491                        }
6492                        else
6493                        {
6494                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6495                                done=true;
6496                        }
6497                }
6498        }
6499
6500        protected void genPStats(final MOB mob, final CharClass R, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
6501                        throws IOException
6502        {
6503                genPStats(mob,R,showNumber,showFlag,false);
6504        }
6505
6506        protected void genPStats(final MOB mob, final CharClass R, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final boolean skipRejuv)
6507                throws IOException
6508        {
6509                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
6510                        return;
6511                final PhyStats S=(PhyStats)CMClass.getCommon("DefaultPhyStats");
6512                S.setAllValues(0);
6513                CMLib.coffeeMaker().setPhyStats(S,R.getStat("ESTATS"));
6514                final StringBuffer parts=new StringBuffer("");
6515                for(int i=0;i<S.getStatCodes().length;i++)
6516                        if((i!=PhyStats.STAT_REJUV)||(!skipRejuv))
6517                                if(CMath.s_int(S.getStat(S.getStatCodes()[i]))!=0)
6518                                        parts.append(CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(S.getStatCodes()[i])+"("+S.getStat(S.getStatCodes()[i])+") ");
6519                mob.tell(L("@x1. PhysStat Adjustments: @x2.",""+showNumber,parts.toString()));
6520                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
6521                        return;
6522                boolean done=false;
6523                while((!done)&&(mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
6524                {
6525                        String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a stat name\n\r:"),"");
6526                        if(newName.length()>0)
6527                        {
6528                                String partName=null;
6529                                for(int i=0;i<S.getStatCodes().length;i++)
6530                                {
6531                                        if((i!=PhyStats.STAT_REJUV)||(!skipRejuv))
6532                                        {
6533                                                if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase(S.getStatCodes()[i]))
6534                                                {
6535                                                        partName=S.getStatCodes()[i];
6536                                                        break;
6537                                                }
6538                                        }
6539                                }
6540                                if(partName==null)
6541                                {
6542                                        final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer(L("That stat is invalid.  Valid stats include: "));
6543                                        for(int i=0;i<S.getStatCodes().length;i++)
6544                                                str.append(S.getStatCodes()[i]+", ");
6545                                        mob.tell(str.toString().substring(0,str.length()-2)+".");
6546                                }
6547                                else
6548                                {
6549                                        boolean checkChange=false;
6550                                        if(partName.equals("DISPOSITION"))
6551                                        {
6552                                                genDisposition(mob,S,0,0);
6553                                                checkChange=true;
6554                                        }
6555                                        else
6556                                        if(partName.equals("SENSES"))
6557                                        {
6558                                                genSensesMask(mob,S,0,0);
6559                                                checkChange=true;
6560                                        }
6561                                        else
6562                                        {
6563                                                newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a value\n\r:"),"");
6564                                                if(newName.length()>0)
6565                                                {
6566                                                        S.setStat(partName,newName);
6567                                                        checkChange=true;
6568                                                }
6569                                                else
6570                                                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6571                                        }
6572                                        if(checkChange)
6573                                        {
6574                                                boolean zereoed=true;
6575                                                for(int i=0;i<S.getStatCodes().length;i++)
6576                                                {
6577                                                        if(CMath.s_int(S.getStat(S.getStatCodes()[i]))!=0)
6578                                                        {
6579                                                                zereoed=false;
6580                                                                break;
6581                                                        }
6582                                                }
6583                                                if(zereoed)
6584                                                        R.setStat("ESTATS","");
6585                                                else
6586                                                        R.setStat("ESTATS",CMLib.coffeeMaker().getPhyStatsStr(S));
6587                                        }
6588                                }
6589                        }
6590                        else
6591                        {
6592                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6593                                done=true;
6594                        }
6595                }
6596        }
6597
6598        protected void genAState(final MOB mob,
6599                                                         final CharClass R,
6600                                                         final String field,
6601                                                         final String prompt,
6602                                                         final int showNumber,
6603                                                         final int showFlag)
6604                throws IOException
6605        {
6606                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
6607                        return;
6608                final CharState S=(CharState)CMClass.getCommon("DefaultCharState"); S.setAllValues(0);
6609                CMLib.coffeeMaker().setCharState(S,R.getStat(field));
6610                final StringBuffer parts=new StringBuffer("");
6611                for(int i=0;i<S.getStatCodes().length;i++)
6612                {
6613                        if(CMath.s_int(S.getStat(S.getStatCodes()[i]))!=0)
6614                                parts.append(CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(S.getStatCodes()[i])+"("+S.getStat(S.getStatCodes()[i])+") ");
6615                }
6616                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+prompt+": "+parts.toString()+".");
6617                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
6618                        return;
6619                boolean done=false;
6620                while((!done)&&(mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
6621                {
6622                        String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a stat name\n\r:"),"");
6623                        if(newName.length()>0)
6624                        {
6625                                String partName=null;
6626                                for(int i=0;i<S.getStatCodes().length;i++)
6627                                {
6628                                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase(S.getStatCodes()[i]))
6629                                        {
6630                                                partName=S.getStatCodes()[i];
6631                                                break;
6632                                        }
6633                                }
6634                                if(partName==null)
6635                                {
6636                                        final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer(L("That stat is invalid.  Valid stats include: "));
6637                                        for(int i=0;i<S.getStatCodes().length;i++)
6638                                                str.append(S.getStatCodes()[i]+", ");
6639                                        mob.tell(str.toString().substring(0,str.length()-2)+".");
6640                                }
6641                                else
6642                                {
6643                                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a value\n\r:"),"");
6644                                        if(newName.length()>0)
6645                                        {
6646                                                S.setStat(partName,newName);
6647                                                boolean zereoed=true;
6648                                                for(int i=0;i<S.getStatCodes().length;i++)
6649                                                {
6650                                                        if(CMath.s_int(S.getStat(S.getStatCodes()[i]))!=0)
6651                                                        {
6652                                                                zereoed=false;
6653                                                                break;
6654                                                        }
6655                                                }
6656                                                if(zereoed)
6657                                                        R.setStat(field,"");
6658                                                else
6659                                                        R.setStat(field,CMLib.coffeeMaker().getCharStateStr(S));
6660                                        }
6661                                        else
6662                                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6663                                }
6664                        }
6665                        else
6666                        {
6667                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6668                                done=true;
6669                        }
6670                }
6671        }
6672
6673        protected void genAStats(final MOB mob, final CharClass R, final String field, final String FieldName, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
6674                throws IOException
6675        {
6676                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
6677                        return;
6678                final CharStats S=(CharStats)CMClass.getCommon("DefaultCharStats"); S.setAllValues(0);
6679                CMLib.coffeeMaker().setCharStats(S,R.getStat(field));
6680                final StringBuffer parts=new StringBuffer("");
6681                for(final int i : CharStats.CODES.ALLCODES())
6682                {
6683                        if(S.getStat(i)!=0)
6684                                parts.append(CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(CharStats.CODES.DESC(i))+"("+S.getStat(i)+") ");
6685                }
6686                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+FieldName+": "+parts.toString()+".");
6687                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
6688                        return;
6689                boolean done=false;
6690                while((!done)&&(mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
6691                {
6692                        String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a stat name\n\r:"),"");
6693                        if(newName.length()>0)
6694                        {
6695                                int partNum=-1;
6696                                for(final int i : CharStats.CODES.ALLCODES())
6697                                {
6698                                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase(CharStats.CODES.DESC(i)))
6699                                        {
6700                                                partNum=i;
6701                                                break;
6702                                        }
6703                                }
6704                                if(partNum<0)
6705                                {
6706                                        final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer(L("That stat is invalid.  Valid stats include: "));
6707                                        for(final int i : CharStats.CODES.ALLCODES())
6708                                                str.append(CharStats.CODES.DESC(i)+", ");
6709                                        mob.tell(str.toString().substring(0,str.length()-2)+".");
6710                                }
6711                                else
6712                                {
6713                                        newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a value\n\r:"),"");
6714                                        if(newName.length()>0)
6715                                        {
6716                                                S.setStat(partNum,CMath.s_int(newName));
6717                                                boolean zereoed=true;
6718                                                for(final int i : CharStats.CODES.ALLCODES())
6719                                                {
6720                                                        if(S.getStat(i)!=0)
6721                                                        {
6722                                                                zereoed=false;
6723                                                                break;
6724                                                        }
6725                                                }
6726                                                if(zereoed)
6727                                                        R.setStat(field,"");
6728                                                else
6729                                                        R.setStat(field,CMLib.coffeeMaker().getCharStatsStr(S));
6730                                        }
6731                                        else
6732                                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6733                                }
6734                        }
6735                        else
6736                        {
6737                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6738                                done=true;
6739                        }
6740                }
6741        }
6742
6743        protected void genResources(final MOB mob, final Race E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
6744                throws IOException
6745        {
6746                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
6747                        return;
6748                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(true))
6749                {
6750                        final StringBuffer parts=new StringBuffer("");
6751                        final int numResources=CMath.s_int(E.getStat("NUMRSC"));
6752                        final DVector DV=new DVector(2);
6753                        for(int r=0;r<numResources;r++)
6754                        {
6755                                final Item I=CMClass.getItem(E.getStat("GETRSCID"+r));
6756                                if(I!=null)
6757                                {
6758                                        I.setMiscText(E.getStat("GETRSCPARM"+r));
6759                                        I.recoverPhyStats();
6760                                        boolean done=false;
6761                                        for(int v=0;v<DV.size();v++)
6762                                        {
6763                                                if(I.sameAs((Environmental)DV.elementAt(v,1)))
6764                                                {
6765                                                        DV.setElementAt(v, 2, Integer.valueOf(((Integer) DV.elementAt(v, 2)).intValue() + 1));
6766                                                        done = true;
6767                                                        break;
6768                                                }
6769                                        }
6770                                        if(!done)
6771                                                DV.addElement(I,Integer.valueOf(1));
6772                                }
6773                                else
6774                                        parts.append("Unknown: "+E.getStat("GETRSCID"+r)+", ");
6775                        }
6776                        for(int v=0;v<DV.size();v++)
6777                        {
6778                                final Item I=(Item)DV.elementAt(v,1);
6779                                final int i=((Integer)DV.elementAt(v,2)).intValue();
6780                                if(i<2)
6781                                        parts.append(I.name()+", ");
6782                                else
6783                                        parts.append(I.name()+" ("+i+"), ");
6784                        }
6785                        if(parts.toString().endsWith(", "))
6786                        {
6787                                parts.deleteCharAt(parts.length() - 1);
6788                                parts.deleteCharAt(parts.length() - 1);
6789                        }
6790                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Resources: @x2.",""+showNumber,parts.toString()));
6791                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
6792                                return;
6793                        final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a resource name to remove or\n\rthe word new and an item name to add from your inventory\n\r:"),"");
6794                        if(newName.length()>0)
6795                        {
6796                                int partNum=-1;
6797                                for(int i=0;i<DV.size();i++)
6798                                {
6799                                        if(CMLib.english().containsString(((Item)DV.elementAt(i,1)).name(),newName))
6800                                        {
6801                                                partNum=i;
6802                                                break;
6803                                        }
6804                                }
6805                                boolean updateList=false;
6806                                if(partNum<0)
6807                                {
6808                                        if(!newName.toLowerCase().startsWith("new "))
6809                                                mob.tell(L("That is neither an existing resource name, or the word new followed by a valid item name."));
6810                                        else
6811                                        {
6812                                                Item I=mob.fetchItem(null,Wearable.FILTER_UNWORNONLY,newName.substring(4).trim());
6813                                                if(I!=null)
6814                                                {
6815                                                        I=(Item)I.copyOf();
6816                                                        if(I!=null)
6817                                                        {
6818                                                                boolean done=false;
6819                                                                for(int v=0;v<DV.size();v++)
6820                                                                {
6821                                                                        if(I.sameAs((Environmental)DV.elementAt(v,1)))
6822                                                                        {
6823                                                                                DV.setElementAt(v,2,Integer.valueOf(((Integer)DV.elementAt(v,2)).intValue()+1));
6824                                                                                done=true;
6825                                                                                break;
6826                                                                        }
6827                                                                }
6828                                                                if(!done)
6829                                                                        DV.addElement(I,Integer.valueOf(1));
6830                                                                else
6831                                                                        I.destroy();
6832                                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",I.name()));
6833                                                                updateList=true;
6834                                                        }
6835                                                }
6836                                        }
6837                                }
6838                                else
6839                                {
6840                                        final Item I=(Item)DV.elementAt(partNum,1);
6841                                        final int i=((Integer)DV.elementAt(partNum,2)).intValue();
6842                                        if(i<2)
6843                                                DV.removeElementAt(partNum);
6844                                        else
6845                                                DV.setElementAt(partNum,2,Integer.valueOf(i-1));
6846                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",I.name()));
6847                                        updateList=true;
6848                                }
6849                                if(updateList)
6850                                {
6851                                        int dex=0;
6852                                        for(int i=0;i<DV.size();i++)
6853                                                dex+=((Integer)DV.elementAt(i,2)).intValue();
6854                                        E.setStat("NUMRSC",""+dex);
6855                                        dex=0;
6856                                        Item I=null;
6857                                        Integer N=null;
6858                                        for(int i=0;i<DV.size();i++)
6859                                        {
6860                                                I=(Item)DV.elementAt(i,1);
6861                                                N=(Integer)DV.elementAt(i,2);
6862                                                for(int n=0;n<N.intValue();n++)
6863                                                        E.setStat("GETRSCID"+(dex++),I.ID());
6864                                        }
6865                                        dex=0;
6866                                        for(int i=0;i<DV.size();i++)
6867                                        {
6868                                                I=(Item)DV.elementAt(i,1);
6869                                                N=(Integer)DV.elementAt(i,2);
6870                                                for(int n=0;n<N.intValue();n++)
6871                                                        E.setStat("GETRSCPARM"+(dex++),I.text());
6872                                        }
6873                                }
6874                        }
6875                        else
6876                        {
6877                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6878                                return;
6879                        }
6880                }
6881        }
6882
6883        protected void genOutfit(final MOB mob, final Race E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
6884                throws IOException
6885        {
6886                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
6887                        return;
6888                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(true))
6889                {
6890                        final StringBuffer parts=new StringBuffer("");
6891                        final int numResources=CMath.s_int(E.getStat("NUMOFT"));
6892                        final Vector<Item> V=new Vector<Item>();
6893                        for(int v=0;v<numResources;v++)
6894                        {
6895                                final Item I=CMClass.getItem(E.getStat("GETOFTID"+v));
6896                                if(I!=null)
6897                                {
6898                                        I.setMiscText(E.getStat("GETOFTPARM"+v));
6899                                        I.recoverPhyStats();
6900                                        parts.append(I.name()+", ");
6901                                        V.addElement(I);
6902                                }
6903                        }
6904                        if(parts.toString().endsWith(", "))
6905                        {
6906                                parts.deleteCharAt(parts.length()-1);
6907                                parts.deleteCharAt(parts.length()-1);
6908                        }
6909                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Outfit: @x2.",""+showNumber,parts.toString()));
6910                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
6911                                return;
6912                        final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter an item name to remove or\n\rthe word new and an item name to add from your inventory\n\r:"),"");
6913                        if(newName.length()>0)
6914                        {
6915                                int partNum=-1;
6916                                for(int i=0;i<V.size();i++)
6917                                {
6918                                        if(CMLib.english().containsString(V.elementAt(i).name(),newName))
6919                                        {
6920                                                partNum = i;
6921                                                break;
6922                                        }
6923                                }
6924                                boolean updateList=false;
6925                                if(partNum<0)
6926                                {
6927                                        if(!newName.toLowerCase().startsWith("new "))
6928                                                mob.tell(L("That is neither an existing item name, or the word new followed by a valid item name."));
6929                                        else
6930                                        {
6931                                                Item I=mob.fetchItem(null,Wearable.FILTER_UNWORNONLY,newName.substring(4).trim());
6932                                                if(I!=null)
6933                                                {
6934                                                        I=(Item)I.copyOf();
6935                                                        V.addElement(I);
6936                                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",I.name()));
6937                                                        updateList=true;
6938                                                }
6939
6940                                        }
6941                                }
6942                                else
6943                                {
6944                                        final Item I=V.elementAt(partNum);
6945                                        V.removeElementAt(partNum);
6946                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",I.name()));
6947                                        updateList=true;
6948                                }
6949                                if(updateList)
6950                                {
6951                                        E.setStat("NUMOFT","");
6952                                        for(int i=0;i<V.size();i++)
6953                                                E.setStat("GETOFTID"+i,V.elementAt(i).ID());
6954                                        for(int i=0;i<V.size();i++)
6955                                                E.setStat("GETOFTPARM"+i,V.elementAt(i).text());
6956                                }
6957                        }
6958                        else
6959                        {
6960                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
6961                                return;
6962                        }
6963                }
6964        }
6965
6966        protected void genOutfit(final MOB mob, final CharClass E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
6967                throws IOException
6968        {
6969                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
6970                        return;
6971                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(true))
6972                {
6973                        final StringBuffer parts=new StringBuffer("");
6974                        final int numResources=CMath.s_int(E.getStat("NUMOFT"));
6975                        final Vector<Item> V=new Vector<Item>();
6976                        for(int v=0;v<numResources;v++)
6977                        {
6978                                final Item I=CMClass.getItem(E.getStat("GETOFTID"+v));
6979                                if(I!=null)
6980                                {
6981                                        I.setMiscText(E.getStat("GETOFTPARM"+v));
6982                                        I.recoverPhyStats();
6983                                        parts.append(I.name()+", ");
6984                                        V.addElement(I);
6985                                }
6986                        }
6987                        if(parts.toString().endsWith(", "))
6988                        {
6989                                parts.deleteCharAt(parts.length()-1);
6990                                parts.deleteCharAt(parts.length()-1);
6991                        }
6992                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Outfit: @x2.",""+showNumber,parts.toString()));
6993                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
6994                                return;
6995                        final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter an item name to remove or\n\rthe word new and an item name to add from your inventory\n\r:"),"");
6996                        if(newName.length()>0)
6997                        {
6998                                int partNum=-1;
6999                                for(int i=0;i<V.size();i++)
7000                                {
7001                                        if(CMLib.english().containsString(V.elementAt(i).name(),newName))
7002                                        {
7003                                                partNum = i;
7004                                                break;
7005                                        }
7006                                }
7007                                boolean updateList=false;
7008                                if(partNum<0)
7009                                {
7010                                        if(!newName.toLowerCase().startsWith("new "))
7011                                                mob.tell(L("That is neither an existing item name, or the word new followed by a valid item name."));
7012                                        else
7013                                        {
7014                                                Item I=mob.fetchItem(null,Wearable.FILTER_UNWORNONLY,newName.substring(4).trim());
7015                                                if(I!=null)
7016                                                {
7017                                                        I=(Item)I.copyOf();
7018                                                        V.addElement(I);
7019                                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",I.name()));
7020                                                        updateList=true;
7021                                                }
7022
7023                                        }
7024                                }
7025                                else
7026                                {
7027                                        final Item I=V.elementAt(partNum);
7028                                        V.removeElementAt(partNum);
7029                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",I.name()));
7030                                        updateList=true;
7031                                }
7032                                if(updateList)
7033                                {
7034                                        E.setStat("NUMOFT","");
7035                                        for(int i=0;i<V.size();i++)
7036                                                E.setStat("GETOFTID"+i,V.elementAt(i).ID());
7037                                        for(int i=0;i<V.size();i++)
7038                                                E.setStat("GETOFTPARM"+i,V.elementAt(i).text());
7039                                }
7040                        }
7041                        else
7042                        {
7043                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
7044                                return;
7045                        }
7046                }
7047        }
7048
7049        protected void genMinimumStatQualifications(final MOB mob, final CharClass E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
7050                throws IOException
7051        {
7052                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
7053                        return;
7054                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(true))
7055                {
7056                        final StringBuffer parts=new StringBuffer("");
7057                        final int numResources=CMath.s_int(E.getStat("NUMMINSTATS"));
7058                        final Vector<Pair<String,Integer>> V=new Vector<Pair<String,Integer>>();
7059                        for(int v=0;v<numResources;v++)
7060                        {
7061                                final Pair<String,Integer> p=new Pair<String,Integer>(E.getStat("GETMINSTAT"+v),Integer.valueOf(CMath.s_int(E.getStat("GETSTATMIN"+v))));
7062                                V.add(p);
7063                                parts.append(p.first+"("+p.second.toString()+"), ");
7064                        }
7065                        if(parts.toString().endsWith(", "))
7066                        {
7067                                parts.deleteCharAt(parts.length()-1);
7068                                parts.deleteCharAt(parts.length()-1);
7069                        }
7070                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Min. Stats: @x2.",""+showNumber,parts.toString()));
7071                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
7072                                return;
7073                        String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a stat name to remove or add:"),"");
7074                        if(newName.length()>0)
7075                        {
7076                                int statNum=-1;
7077                                for(final int stat : CharStats.CODES.BASECODES())
7078                                {
7079                                        if(CharStats.CODES.NAME(stat).equalsIgnoreCase(newName))
7080                                        {
7081                                                statNum=stat;
7082                                                newName=CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(newName);
7083                                                break;
7084                                        }
7085                                }
7086                                boolean updateList=false;
7087                                if(statNum<0)
7088                                        mob.tell(L("That is not a stat, like one of these: @x1",CMParms.toListString(CharStats.CODES.BASENAMES())));
7089                                else
7090                                {
7091                                        int vNum=-1;
7092                                        for(int v=0;v<V.size();v++)
7093                                        {
7094                                                if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase(V.get(v).first))
7095                                                        vNum=v;
7096                                        }
7097                                        if(vNum<0)
7098                                        {
7099                                                final String newMin=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a minimum stat value:"),"");
7100                                                if((newMin.length()>0)&&(CMath.isInteger(newMin)))
7101                                                {
7102                                                        V.add(new Pair<String,Integer>(newName,Integer.valueOf(CMath.s_int(newMin))));
7103                                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",newName));
7104                                                        updateList=true;
7105                                                }
7106                                        }
7107                                        else
7108                                        {
7109                                                V.removeElementAt(vNum);
7110                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",newName));
7111                                                updateList=true;
7112                                        }
7113                                }
7114                                if(updateList)
7115                                {
7116                                        E.setStat("NUMMINSTATS",""+V.size());
7117                                        for(int i=0;i<V.size();i++)
7118                                                E.setStat("GETMINSTAT"+i,V.get(i).first);
7119                                        for(int i=0;i<V.size();i++)
7120                                                E.setStat("GETSTATMIN"+i,V.get(i).second.toString());
7121                                }
7122                        }
7123                        else
7124                        {
7125                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
7126                                return;
7127                        }
7128                }
7129        }
7130
7131        protected void genWeapon(final MOB mob, final Race E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
7132                throws IOException
7133        {
7134                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
7135                        return;
7136                final StringBuffer parts=new StringBuffer("");
7137                Item I=CMClass.getItem(E.getStat("WEAPONCLASS"));
7138                if(I!=null)
7139                {
7140                        I.setMiscText(E.getStat("WEAPONXML"));
7141                        I.recoverPhyStats();
7142                        parts.append(I.name());
7143                }
7144                mob.tell(L("@x1. Natural Weapon: @x2.",""+showNumber,parts.toString()));
7145                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
7146                        return;
7147                final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a weapon name from your inventory to change, or 'null' for human\n\r:"),"");
7148                if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("null"))
7149                {
7150                        E.setStat("WEAPONCLASS","");
7151                        mob.tell(L("Human weapons set."));
7152                }
7153                else
7154                if(newName.length()>0)
7155                {
7156                        I=mob.fetchItem(null,Wearable.FILTER_UNWORNONLY,newName);
7157                        if(I==null)
7158                        {
7159                                mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not in your inventory.",newName));
7160                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
7161                                return;
7162                        }
7163                        I=(Item)I.copyOf();
7164                        E.setStat("WEAPONCLASS",I.ID());
7165                        E.setStat("WEAPONXML",I.text());
7166                        I.destroy();
7167                }
7168                else
7169                {
7170                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
7171                        return;
7172                }
7173        }
7174
7175        protected void modifyDField(final DVector fields, final String fieldName, final String value)
7176        {
7177                final int x=fields.indexOf(fieldName.toUpperCase());
7178                if(x<0)
7179                        return;
7180                fields.setElementAt(x,2,value);
7181        }
7182
7183        protected void genAgingChart(final MOB mob, final Race E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
7184        throws IOException
7185        {
7186                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
7187                        return;
7188
7189                mob.tell(L("@x1. Aging Chart: @x2.",""+showNumber,CMParms.toListString(E.getAgingChart())));
7190                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
7191                        return;
7192                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(true))
7193                {
7194                        final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a comma-delimited list of 9 numbers, running from infant -> ancient\n\r:"),"");
7195                        if(newName.length()==0)
7196                        {
7197                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
7198                                return;
7199                        }
7200                        final List<String> V=CMParms.parseCommas(newName,true);
7201                        if(V.size()==9)
7202                        {
7203                                int highest=-1;
7204                                boolean cont=false;
7205                                for(int i=0;i<V.size();i++)
7206                                {
7207                                        if(CMath.s_int(V.get(i))<highest)
7208                                        {
7209                                                mob.tell(L("Entry @x1 is out of place.",(V.get(i))));
7210                                                cont=true;
7211                                                break;
7212                                        }
7213                                        highest=CMath.s_int(V.get(i));
7214                                }
7215                                if(cont)
7216                                        continue;
7217                                E.setStat("AGING",newName);
7218                                break;
7219                        }
7220                }
7221        }
7222
7223        protected void genClassFlags(final MOB mob, final CharClass E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
7224        throws IOException
7225        {
7226                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
7227                        return;
7228
7229                int flags=CMath.s_int(E.getStat("DISFLAGS"));
7230                final StringBuffer sets=new StringBuffer("");
7231                if(CMath.bset(flags,CharClass.GENFLAG_NORACE))
7232                        sets.append("Raceless ");
7233                if(CMath.bset(flags,CharClass.GENFLAG_NOLEVELS))
7234                        sets.append("Leveless ");
7235                if(CMath.bset(flags,CharClass.GENFLAG_NOEXP))
7236                        sets.append("Expless ");
7237                if(CMath.bset(flags,CharClass.GENFLAG_THINQUALLIST))
7238                        sets.append("ThinQualList ");
7239
7240                mob.tell(L("@x1. Extra CharClass Flags: @x2.",""+showNumber,sets.toString()));
7241                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
7242                        return;
7243                final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter: 1) Classless, 2) Leveless, 3) Expless\n\r:"),"");
7244                switch(CMath.s_int(newName))
7245                {
7246                case 1:
7247                        if(CMath.bset(flags,CharClass.GENFLAG_NORACE))
7248                                flags=CMath.unsetb(flags,CharClass.GENFLAG_NORACE);
7249                        else
7250                                flags=flags|CharClass.GENFLAG_NORACE;
7251                        break;
7252                case 2:
7253                        if(CMath.bset(flags,CharClass.GENFLAG_NOLEVELS))
7254                                flags=CMath.unsetb(flags,CharClass.GENFLAG_NOLEVELS);
7255                        else
7256                                flags=flags|CharClass.GENFLAG_NOLEVELS;
7257                        break;
7258                case 3:
7259                        if(CMath.bset(flags,CharClass.GENFLAG_NOEXP))
7260                                flags=CMath.unsetb(flags,CharClass.GENFLAG_NOEXP);
7261                        else
7262                                flags=flags|CharClass.GENFLAG_NOEXP;
7263                        break;
7264                default:
7265                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
7266                        break;
7267                }
7268                E.setStat("DISFLAGS",""+flags);
7269        }
7270
7271        protected void genDynamicAbilities(final MOB mob, final Modifiable E, final String typeName, final String levelName, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
7272                throws IOException
7273        {
7274                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
7275                        return;
7276                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(true))
7277                {
7278                        final StringBuffer parts=new StringBuffer("");
7279                        final int numResources=CMath.s_int(E.getStat("NUMRABLE"));
7280                        final Vector<Ability> ables=new Vector<Ability>();
7281                        final Vector<String> data=new Vector<String>();
7282                        for(int v=0;v<numResources;v++)
7283                        {
7284                                final Ability A=CMClass.getAbility(E.getStat("GETRABLE"+v));
7285                                if(A!=null)
7286                                {
7287                                        parts.append("("+A.ID()+"/"+E.getStat("GETRABLELVL"+v)+"/"+E.getStat("GETRABLEQUAL"+v)+"/"+E.getStat("GETRABLEPROF"+v)+"/"+E.getStat("GETRABLEPARM"+v));
7288                                        if(CMParms.contains(E.getStatCodes(),"GETRABLEROLE") && (E instanceof ClanGovernment))
7289                                        {
7290                                                final List<String> roleIdsList=CMParms.parseCommas(E.getStat("GETRABLEROLE"+v), true);
7291                                                final List<String> roleNamesList=new ArrayList<String>(roleIdsList.size());
7292                                                for(final String roleId : roleIdsList)
7293                                                {
7294                                                        final ClanPosition P=((ClanGovernment)E).findPositionRole(roleId);
7295                                                        if(P!=null)
7296                                                                roleNamesList.add(P.getID());
7297                                                }
7298                                                parts.append("/"+CMParms.toListString(roleNamesList)+"), ");
7299                                        }
7300                                        else
7301                                                parts.append("), ");
7302                                        ables.addElement(A);
7303                                        data.addElement(A.ID()+";"+E.getStat("GETRABLELVL"+v)+";"+E.getStat("GETRABLEQUAL"+v)+";"+E.getStat("GETRABLEPROF"+v)+";"+E.getStat("GETRABLEPARM"+v)+";"+E.getStat("GETRABLEROLE"+v));
7304                                }
7305                        }
7306                        if(parts.toString().endsWith(", "))
7307                        {
7308                                parts.deleteCharAt(parts.length()-1);
7309                                parts.deleteCharAt(parts.length()-1);
7310                        }
7311                        mob.tell(L("@x1. @x2 Abilities: @x3.",""+showNumber,typeName,parts.toString()));
7312                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
7313                                return;
7314                        final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter an ability name to add or remove (?)\n\r:"),"");
7315                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
7316                                mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.abilities(),-1).toString());
7317                        else
7318                        if(newName.length()>0)
7319                        {
7320                                int partNum=-1;
7321                                for(int i=0;i<ables.size();i++)
7322                                {
7323                                        if(CMLib.english().containsString(ables.elementAt(i).ID(),newName))
7324                                        {
7325                                                partNum=i;
7326                                                break;
7327                                        }
7328                                }
7329                                boolean updateList=false;
7330                                if(partNum<0)
7331                                {
7332                                        final Ability A=CMClass.getAbility(newName);
7333                                        if((A==null)
7334                                        ||(((A.classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_DOMAINS)==Ability.DOMAIN_ARCHON)
7335                                                &&(mob.fetchAbility(A.ID())==null)))
7336                                        {
7337                                                mob.tell(L("That is neither an existing ability name, nor a valid one to add.  Use ? for a list."));
7338                                        }
7339                                        else
7340                                        if(A.isAutoInvoked())
7341                                                mob.tell(L("'@x1' cannot be named, as it is autoinvoked.",A.name()));
7342                                        else
7343                                        if((A.triggerStrings()==null)||(A.triggerStrings().length==0))
7344                                                mob.tell(L("'@x1' cannot be named, as it has no trigger/command words.",A.name()));
7345                                        else
7346                                        {
7347                                                final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer(A.ID()+";");
7348                                                final String level=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter the level of this skill (1): "),"1");
7349                                                str.append((""+CMath.s_int(level))+";");
7350                                                if(mob.session().confirm(L("Is this skill automatically gained (Y/n)?"),"Y"))
7351                                                        str.append("false;");
7352                                                else
7353                                                        str.append("true;");
7354                                                final String prof=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter the (perm) proficiency level (100): "),"100");
7355                                                str.append((""+CMath.s_int(prof))+";");
7356                                                final String parm=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter any default parameters: "),"");
7357                                                str.append(""+parm+";");
7358                                                String roles="";
7359                                                if((CMParms.contains(E.getStatCodes(),"GETRABLEROLE"))&&(E instanceof ClanGovernment))
7360                                                {
7361                                                        final boolean repeat=true;
7362                                                        while(repeat && (mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
7363                                                        {
7364                                                                final String s=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter one or more roles to restrict this to (?): "),"");
7365                                                                if(s.trim().equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
7366                                                                        mob.tell(L("Roles: ")+CMParms.toCMObjectListString(((ClanGovernment)E).getPositions()));
7367                                                                else
7368                                                                if(s.trim().length()==0)
7369                                                                        break;
7370                                                                else
7371                                                                {
7372                                                                        final StringBuilder finalListBuilder=new StringBuilder("");
7373                                                                        final List<String> newRoleList=CMParms.parseCommas(s,true);
7374                                                                        for(final String nr : newRoleList)
7375                                                                        {
7376                                                                                final ClanPosition P=((ClanGovernment)E).findPositionRole(nr);
7377                                                                                if(P==null)
7378                                                                                {
7379                                                                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not a valid position. The list is comma-delimited.  Try ?"));
7380                                                                                        finalListBuilder.setLength(0);
7381                                                                                        break;
7382                                                                                }
7383                                                                                else
7384                                                                                        finalListBuilder.append(", ").append(P.getRoleID());
7385                                                                        }
7386                                                                        if(finalListBuilder.length()>2)
7387                                                                        {
7388                                                                                roles=finalListBuilder.substring(2);
7389                                                                                break;
7390                                                                        }
7391                                                                }
7392                                                        }
7393                                                }
7394                                                str.append(roles+";");
7395                                                data.addElement(str.toString());
7396                                                ables.addElement(A);
7397                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",A.name()));
7398                                                updateList=true;
7399                                        }
7400                                }
7401                                else
7402                                {
7403                                        final Ability A=ables.elementAt(partNum);
7404                                        ables.removeElementAt(partNum);
7405                                        data.removeElementAt(partNum);
7406                                        updateList=true;
7407                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",A.name()));
7408                                }
7409                                if(updateList)
7410                                {
7411                                        if(data.size()>0)
7412                                                E.setStat("NUMRABLE",""+data.size());
7413                                        else
7414                                                E.setStat("NUMRABLE","");
7415                                        for(int i=0;i<data.size();i++)
7416                                        {
7417                                                final List<String> V=CMParms.parseSemicolons(data.elementAt(i),false);
7418                                                E.setStat("GETRABLE"+i,(V.get(0)));
7419                                                E.setStat("GETRABLELVL"+i,(V.get(1)));
7420                                                E.setStat("GETRABLEQUAL"+i,(V.get(2)));
7421                                                E.setStat("GETRABLEPROF"+i,(V.get(3)));
7422                                                E.setStat("GETRABLEPARM"+i,(V.get(4)));
7423                                                if(CMParms.contains(E.getStatCodes(),"GETRABLEROLE")&&(V.size()>5))
7424                                                        E.setStat("GETRABLEROLE"+i,(V.get(5)));
7425                                        }
7426                                }
7427                        }
7428                        else
7429                        {
7430                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
7431                                return;
7432                        }
7433                }
7434        }
7435
7436        protected void genDynamicEffects(final MOB mob, final Modifiable E, final String typeName, final String levelName, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
7437                throws IOException
7438        {
7439                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
7440                        return;
7441                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(true))
7442                {
7443                        final StringBuffer parts=new StringBuffer("");
7444                        final int numResources=CMath.s_int(E.getStat("NUMREFF"));
7445                        final Vector<Ability> ables=new Vector<Ability>();
7446                        final Vector<String> data=new Vector<String>();
7447                        for(int v=0;v<numResources;v++)
7448                        {
7449                                final Ability A=CMClass.getAbility(E.getStat("GETREFF"+v));
7450                                if(A!=null)
7451                                {
7452                                        parts.append("("+A.ID()+"/"+E.getStat("GETREFFLVL"+v)+"/"+E.getStat("GETREFFPARM"+v));
7453                                        final StringBuilder roles=new StringBuilder("");
7454                                        if((E instanceof ClanGovernment)&&(CMParms.contains(E.getStatCodes(), "GETREFFROLE")))
7455                                        {
7456                                                roles.append("/");
7457                                                final List<String> roleIdsList=CMParms.parseCommas(E.getStat("GETREFFROLE"+v), true);
7458                                                final List<String> roleNamesList=new ArrayList<String>(roleIdsList.size());
7459                                                for(final String roleId : roleIdsList)
7460                                                {
7461                                                        final ClanPosition P=((ClanGovernment)E).findPositionRole(roleId);
7462                                                        if(P!=null)
7463                                                                roleNamesList.add(P.getID());
7464                                                }
7465                                                roles.append(CMParms.toListString(roleNamesList));
7466                                        }
7467                                        parts.append(roles.toString()+"), ");
7468                                        ables.addElement(A);
7469                                        data.addElement(A.ID()+"~"+E.getStat("GETREFFLVL"+v)+"~"+E.getStat("GETREFFPARM"+v)+"~"+E.getStat("GETREFFROLE"+v));
7470                                }
7471                        }
7472                        if(parts.toString().endsWith(", "))
7473                        {
7474                                parts.deleteCharAt(parts.length()-1);
7475                                parts.deleteCharAt(parts.length()-1);
7476                        }
7477                        mob.tell(L("@x1. @x2 Effects: @x3.",""+showNumber,typeName,parts.toString()));
7478                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
7479                                return;
7480                        final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter an effect name to add or remove\n\r:"),"");
7481                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
7482                                mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.abilities(),-1).toString());
7483                        else
7484                        if(newName.length()>0)
7485                        {
7486                                int partNum=-1;
7487                                for(int i=0;i<ables.size();i++)
7488                                {
7489                                        if(CMLib.english().containsString(ables.elementAt(i).ID(),newName))
7490                                        {
7491                                                partNum=i;
7492                                                break;
7493                                        }
7494                                }
7495                                boolean updateList=false;
7496                                if(partNum<0)
7497                                {
7498                                        final Ability A=CMClass.getAbility(newName);
7499                                        if((A==null)
7500                                        ||(((A.classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_DOMAINS)==Ability.DOMAIN_ARCHON)
7501                                                &&(mob.fetchAbility(A.ID())==null)))
7502                                        {
7503                                                mob.tell(L("That is neither an existing effect name, nor a valid one to add.  Use ? for a list."));
7504                                        }
7505                                        else
7506                                        {
7507                                                final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer(A.ID()+"~");
7508                                                final String level=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter the @x1 level to gain this effect (1): ",levelName),"1");
7509                                                str.append((""+CMath.s_int(level))+"~");
7510                                                final String prof=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter any parameters: "),"");
7511                                                str.append(""+prof+"~");
7512                                                String roles="";
7513                                                if((CMParms.contains(E.getStatCodes(),"GETREFFROLE"))&&(E instanceof ClanGovernment))
7514                                                {
7515                                                        final boolean repeat=true;
7516                                                        while(repeat && (mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
7517                                                        {
7518                                                                final String s=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter one or more roles to restrict this to (?): "),"");
7519                                                                if(s.trim().equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
7520                                                                        mob.tell(L("Roles: ")+CMParms.toCMObjectListString(((ClanGovernment)E).getPositions()));
7521                                                                else
7522                                                                if(s.trim().length()==0)
7523                                                                        break;
7524                                                                else
7525                                                                {
7526                                                                        final StringBuilder finalListBuilder=new StringBuilder("");
7527                                                                        final List<String> newRoleList=CMParms.parseCommas(s,true);
7528                                                                        for(final String nr : newRoleList)
7529                                                                        {
7530                                                                                final ClanPosition P=((ClanGovernment)E).findPositionRole(nr);
7531                                                                                if(P==null)
7532                                                                                {
7533                                                                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not a valid position. The list is comma-delimited.  Try ?"));
7534                                                                                        finalListBuilder.setLength(0);
7535                                                                                        break;
7536                                                                                }
7537                                                                                else
7538                                                                                        finalListBuilder.append(", ").append(P.getRoleID());
7539                                                                        }
7540                                                                        if(finalListBuilder.length()>2)
7541                                                                        {
7542                                                                                roles=finalListBuilder.substring(2);
7543                                                                                break;
7544                                                                        }
7545                                                                }
7546                                                        }
7547                                                }
7548                                                str.append(roles+"~");
7549                                                data.addElement(str.toString());
7550                                                ables.addElement(A);
7551                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",A.name()));
7552                                                updateList=true;
7553                                        }
7554                                }
7555                                else
7556                                {
7557                                        final Ability A=ables.elementAt(partNum);
7558                                        ables.removeElementAt(partNum);
7559                                        data.removeElementAt(partNum);
7560                                        updateList=true;
7561                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",A.name()));
7562                                }
7563                                if(updateList)
7564                                {
7565                                        if(data.size()>0)
7566                                                E.setStat("NUMREFF",""+data.size());
7567                                        else
7568                                                E.setStat("NUMREFF","");
7569                                        for(int i=0;i<data.size();i++)
7570                                        {
7571                                                final List<String> V=CMParms.parseSquiggleDelimited(data.elementAt(i),false);
7572                                                E.setStat("GETREFF"+i,V.get(0));
7573                                                E.setStat("GETREFFLVL"+i,V.get(1));
7574                                                E.setStat("GETREFFPARM"+i,V.get(2));
7575                                                if((CMParms.contains(E.getStatCodes(),"GETREFFROLE"))&&(V.size()>3))
7576                                                        E.setStat("GETREFFROLE"+i,V.get(3));
7577                                        }
7578                                }
7579                        }
7580                        else
7581                        {
7582                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
7583                                return;
7584                        }
7585                }
7586        }
7587
7588        protected void genDynamicImmunitiess(final MOB mob, final Modifiable E, final String typeName, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
7589                        throws IOException
7590        {
7591                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
7592                        return;
7593                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(true))
7594                {
7595                        final StringBuffer parts=new StringBuffer("");
7596                        final int numResources=CMath.s_int(E.getStat("NUMIABLE"));
7597                        final Vector<Ability> ables=new Vector<Ability>();
7598                        final Vector<String> data=new Vector<String>();
7599                        for(int v=0;v<numResources;v++)
7600                        {
7601                                final Ability A=CMClass.getAbility(E.getStat("GETIABLE"+v));
7602                                if(A!=null)
7603                                {
7604                                        parts.append(A.ID());
7605                                        parts.append(", ");
7606                                        ables.addElement(A);
7607                                        data.addElement(A.ID());
7608                                }
7609                        }
7610                        if(parts.toString().endsWith(", "))
7611                        {
7612                                parts.deleteCharAt(parts.length()-1);
7613                                parts.deleteCharAt(parts.length()-1);
7614                        }
7615                        mob.tell(L("@x1. @x2 Immunities: @x3.",""+showNumber,typeName,parts.toString()));
7616                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
7617                                return;
7618                        final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter an ability id to add or remove\n\r:"),"");
7619                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
7620                                mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.abilities(),-1).toString());
7621                        else
7622                        if(newName.length()>0)
7623                        {
7624                                int partNum=-1;
7625                                for(int i=0;i<ables.size();i++)
7626                                {
7627                                        if(ables.elementAt(i).ID().equalsIgnoreCase(newName))
7628                                        {
7629                                                partNum=i;
7630                                                break;
7631                                        }
7632                                }
7633                                boolean updateList=false;
7634                                if(partNum<0)
7635                                {
7636                                        final Ability A=CMClass.getAbility(newName);
7637                                        if((A==null)
7638                                        ||(((A.classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_DOMAINS)==Ability.DOMAIN_ARCHON)
7639                                                &&(mob.fetchAbility(A.ID())==null)))
7640                                        {
7641                                                mob.tell(L("That is neither an existing immunity ability id, nor a valid one to add.  Use ? for a list."));
7642                                        }
7643                                        else
7644                                        {
7645                                                data.addElement(A.ID());
7646                                                ables.addElement(A);
7647                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",A.name()));
7648                                                updateList=true;
7649                                        }
7650                                }
7651                                else
7652                                {
7653                                        final Ability A=ables.elementAt(partNum);
7654                                        ables.removeElementAt(partNum);
7655                                        data.removeElementAt(partNum);
7656                                        updateList=true;
7657                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",A.name()));
7658                                }
7659                                if(updateList)
7660                                {
7661                                        if(data.size()>0)
7662                                                E.setStat("NUMIABLE",""+data.size());
7663                                        else
7664                                                E.setStat("NUMIABLE","");
7665                                        for(int i=0;i<data.size();i++)
7666                                        {
7667                                                E.setStat("GETIABLE"+i,data.get(i));
7668                                        }
7669                                }
7670                        }
7671                        else
7672                        {
7673                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
7674                                return;
7675                        }
7676                }
7677        }
7678
7679        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
7680        protected DVector genClassAbleMod(final MOB mob, final DVector sets, final String ableID, final int origLevelIndex, int origAbleIndex)
7681        throws IOException
7682        {
7683                Integer level=null;
7684                if(origLevelIndex>=0)
7685                {
7686                        if(mob.session().confirm(L("Enter Y to DELETE, or N to modify (y/N)?"),"N"))
7687                        {
7688                                final List<AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping> set=(List<AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping>)sets.elementAt(origLevelIndex,2);
7689                                set.remove(origAbleIndex);
7690                                return null;
7691                        }
7692                        level=(Integer)sets.elementAt(origLevelIndex,1);
7693                }
7694                else
7695                        level=Integer.valueOf(1);
7696                level=Integer.valueOf(CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Enter the level of this skill (@x1): ",""+level),""+level)));
7697                if(level.intValue()<=0)
7698                {
7699                        mob.tell(L("Aborted."));
7700                        return null;
7701                }
7702
7703                AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping aMAP=CMLib.ableMapper().newAbilityMapping().ID(ableID);
7704                if(origLevelIndex<0)
7705                {
7706                        aMAP.abilityID(ableID);
7707                        aMAP.defaultProficiency(0);
7708                        aMAP.maxProficiency(100);
7709                        aMAP.defaultParm("");
7710                        aMAP.originalSkillPreReqList("");
7711                        aMAP.extraMask("");
7712                        aMAP.autoGain(false);
7713                        aMAP.isSecret(false);
7714                }
7715                else
7716                {
7717                        final List<AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping> levelSet=(List<AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping>)sets.elementAt(origLevelIndex,2);
7718                        aMAP=levelSet.get(origAbleIndex);
7719                        levelSet.remove(origAbleIndex);
7720                        origAbleIndex=-1;
7721                }
7722
7723                int newlevelIndex=sets.indexOf(level);
7724                List<AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping> levelSet=null;
7725                if(newlevelIndex<0)
7726                {
7727                        newlevelIndex=sets.size();
