7728                        levelSet=new Vector<AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping>();
7729                        sets.addElement(level,levelSet);
7730                }
7731                else
7732                        levelSet=(List<AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping>)sets.elementAt(newlevelIndex,2);
7733                aMAP.defaultProficiency(CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Enter the (default) proficiency level (@x1): ",""+aMAP.defaultProficiency()),aMAP.defaultProficiency()+"")));
7734                aMAP.maxProficiency(CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Enter the (maximum) proficiency level (@x1): ",""+aMAP.maxProficiency()),aMAP.maxProficiency()+"")));
7735                aMAP.autoGain(mob.session().confirm(L("Is this skill automatically gained@x1?",(aMAP.autoGain()?"(Y/n)":"(y/N)")),""+aMAP.autoGain()));
7736                aMAP.isSecret(mob.session().confirm(L("Is this skill secret @x1?",(aMAP.isSecret()?"(Y/n)":"(y/N)")),""+aMAP.isSecret()));
7737                aMAP.defaultParm(mob.session().prompt(L("Enter any properties (@x1)\n\r: ",aMAP.defaultParm()),aMAP.defaultParm()));
7738                String s="?";
7739                while(s.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
7740                {
7741                        s=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter any pre-requisites (@x1)\n\r(?) : ",aMAP.originalSkillPreReqList()),aMAP.originalSkillPreReqList());
7742                        if(s.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
7743                                mob.tell(""+CMLib.help().getHelpText("ABILITY_PREREQS",mob,true));
7744                        else
7745                                aMAP.originalSkillPreReqList(s);
7746                }
7747                s="?";
7748                while(s.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
7749                {
7750                        s=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter any requirement mask (@x1)\n\r(?) : ",aMAP.extraMask()),aMAP.extraMask());
7751                        if(s.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
7752                                mob.tell(""+CMLib.help().getHelpText("MASKS",mob,true));
7753                        else
7754                                aMAP.extraMask(s);
7755                }
7756                levelSet.add(aMAP);
7757                return sets;
7758        }
7759
7760        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
7761        protected void genClassAbilities(final MOB mob, final CharClass E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
7762                throws IOException
7763        {
7764                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
7765                        return;
7766                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
7767                {
7768                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Class Abilities: [...].",""+showNumber));
7769                        return;
7770                }
7771                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(true))
7772                {
7773                        final StringBuffer parts=new StringBuffer("");
7774                        int numAbles=CMath.s_int(E.getStat("NUMCABLE"));
7775                        final DVector levelSets=new DVector(2);
7776                        int maxAbledLevel=Integer.MIN_VALUE;
7777                        for(int v=0;v<numAbles;v++)
7778                        {
7779                                final Ability A=CMClass.getAbility(E.getStat("GETCABLE"+v));
7780                                if((A!=null)
7781                                &&(!CMLib.ableMapper().getAllQualified(E.ID(), true, A.ID())))
7782                                {
7783                                        final AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping aMAP=CMLib.ableMapper().newAbilityMapping().ID(A.ID());
7784                                        aMAP.abilityID(A.ID());
7785                                        aMAP.autoGain(CMath.s_bool(E.getStat("GETCABLEGAIN"+v)));
7786                                        aMAP.defaultProficiency(CMath.s_int(E.getStat("GETCABLEPROF"+v)));
7787                                        aMAP.qualLevel(CMath.s_int(E.getStat("GETCABLELVL"+v)));
7788                                        aMAP.isSecret(CMath.s_bool(E.getStat("GETCABLESECR"+v)));
7789                                        aMAP.maxProficiency(CMath.s_int(E.getStat("GETCABLEMAXP"+v)));
7790                                        aMAP.defaultParm(E.getStat("GETCABLEPARM"+v));
7791                                        aMAP.originalSkillPreReqList(E.getStat("GETCABLEPREQ"+v));
7792                                        aMAP.extraMask(E.getStat("GETCABLEMASK"+v));
7793                                        final int lvlIndex=levelSets.indexOf(Integer.valueOf(aMAP.qualLevel()));
7794                                        Vector<AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping> set=null;
7795                                        if(lvlIndex<0)
7796                                        {
7797                                                set=new Vector<AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping>();
7798                                                levelSets.addElement(Integer.valueOf(aMAP.qualLevel()),set);
7799                                                if(aMAP.qualLevel()>maxAbledLevel)
7800                                                        maxAbledLevel=aMAP.qualLevel();
7801                                        }
7802                                        else
7803                                                set=(Vector<AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping>)levelSets.elementAt(lvlIndex,2);
7804                                        set.addElement(aMAP);
7805                                }
7806                        }
7807                        final String header=showNumber+". Class Abilities: ";
7808                        final String spaces=CMStrings.repeat(' ',2+(""+showNumber).length());
7809                        parts.append("\n\r");
7810                        parts.append(spaces+CMStrings.padRight(L("Lvl"),3)+" "
7811                                                           +CMStrings.padRight(L("Skill"),25)+" "
7812                                                           +CMStrings.padRight(L("Proff"),5)+" "
7813                                                           +CMStrings.padRight(L("Gain"),5)+" "
7814                                                           +CMStrings.padRight(L("Secret"),6)+" "
7815                                                           +CMStrings.padRight(L("Parm"),7)+" "
7816                                                           +CMStrings.padRight(L("Preq"),7)+" "
7817                                                           +CMStrings.padRight(L("Mask"),6)+"\n\r"
7818                                                           );
7819                        for(int i=0;i<=maxAbledLevel;i++)
7820                        {
7821                                final int index=levelSets.indexOf(Integer.valueOf(i));
7822                                if(index<0)
7823                                        continue;
7824                                final List<AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping> set=(List<AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping>)levelSets.elementAt(index,2);
7825                                for(int s=0;s<set.size();s++)
7826                                {
7827                                        final AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping aMAP=set.get(s);
7828                                        parts.append(spaces+CMStrings.padRight(""+i,3)+" "
7829                                                                           +CMStrings.padRight(""+aMAP.abilityID(),25)+" "
7830                                                                           +CMStrings.padRight(""+aMAP.defaultProficiency(),5)+" "
7831                                                                           +CMStrings.padRight(""+aMAP.autoGain(),5)+" "
7832                                                                           +CMStrings.padRight(""+aMAP.isSecret(),6)+" "
7833                                                                           +CMStrings.padRight(""+aMAP.defaultParm(),7)+" "
7834                                                                           +CMStrings.padRight(""+aMAP.originalSkillPreReqList(),7)+" "
7835                                                                           +CMStrings.padRight(""+aMAP.extraMask(),6)+"\n\r"
7836                                                                           );
7837                                }
7838                        }
7839
7840                        mob.session().wraplessPrintln(header+parts.toString());
7841                        final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter an ability name to add or remove (?)\n\r:"),"");
7842                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
7843                                mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.abilities(),-1).toString());
7844                        else
7845                        if(newName.length()>0)
7846                        {
7847                                int lvlIndex=-1;
7848                                int ableIndex=-1;
7849                                List<AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping> myLevelSet=null;
7850                                for(int s=0;s<levelSets.size();s++)
7851                                {
7852                                        final List<AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping> lvls=(List<AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping>)levelSets.elementAt(s,2);
7853                                        for(int l=0;l<lvls.size();l++)
7854                                        {
7855                                                if(CMLib.english().containsString(lvls.get(l).abilityID(),newName))
7856                                                {
7857                                                        lvlIndex=s;
7858                                                        ableIndex=l;
7859                                                        myLevelSet=lvls;
7860                                                        break;
7861                                                }
7862                                        }
7863                                        if(lvlIndex>=0)
7864                                                break;
7865                                }
7866                                boolean updateList=false;
7867                                if(ableIndex<0)
7868                                {
7869                                        final Ability A=CMClass.getAbility(newName);
7870                                        if((A==null)
7871                                        ||(((A.classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_DOMAINS)==Ability.DOMAIN_ARCHON)
7872                                                &&(mob.fetchAbility(A.ID())==null)))
7873                                        {
7874                                                mob.tell(L("That is neither an existing ability name, nor a valid one to add.  Use ? for a list."));
7875                                        }
7876                                        else
7877                                        {
7878                                                // add new one here
7879                                                if(genClassAbleMod(mob,levelSets,A.ID(),-1,-1)!=null)
7880                                                {
7881                                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",A.ID()));
7882                                                        updateList=true;
7883                                                        numAbles++;
7884                                                }
7885                                        }
7886                                }
7887                                else
7888                                if(myLevelSet!=null)
7889                                {
7890                                        final String aID=myLevelSet.get(ableIndex).abilityID();
7891                                        if(genClassAbleMod(mob,levelSets,aID,lvlIndex,ableIndex)!=null)
7892                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 modified.",aID));
7893                                        else
7894                                        {
7895                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",aID));
7896                                                numAbles--;
7897                                        }
7898
7899                                        updateList=true;
7900                                }
7901                                if(updateList)
7902                                {
7903                                        if(numAbles>0)
7904                                                E.setStat("NUMCABLE",""+numAbles);
7905                                        else
7906                                                E.setStat("NUMCABLE","");
7907                                        int dex=0;
7908                                        for(int s=0;s<levelSets.size();s++)
7909                                        {
7910                                                final Integer lvl=(Integer)levelSets.elementAt(s,1);
7911                                                final List<AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping> lvls=(List<AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping>)levelSets.elementAt(s,2);
7912                                                for(int l=0;l<lvls.size();l++)
7913                                                {
7914                                                        final AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping aMAP=lvls.get(l);
7915                                                        E.setStat("GETCABLELVL"+dex,lvl.toString());
7916                                                        E.setStat("GETCABLEGAIN"+dex,""+aMAP.autoGain());
7917                                                        E.setStat("GETCABLEPROF"+dex,""+aMAP.defaultProficiency());
7918                                                        E.setStat("GETCABLESECR"+dex,""+aMAP.isSecret());
7919                                                        E.setStat("GETCABLEPARM"+dex,""+aMAP.defaultParm());
7920                                                        E.setStat("GETCABLEPREQ"+dex,aMAP.originalSkillPreReqList());
7921                                                        E.setStat("GETCABLEMASK"+dex,aMAP.extraMask());
7922                                                        E.setStat("GETCABLEMAXP"+dex,""+aMAP.maxProficiency());
7923                                                        // CABLE MUST BE LAST
7924                                                        E.setStat("GETCABLE"+dex,aMAP.abilityID());
7925                                                        dex++;
7926                                                }
7927                                        }
7928                                }
7929                        }
7930                        else
7931                        {
7932                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
7933                                return;
7934                        }
7935                }
7936        }
7937
7938        protected void genCulturalAbilities(final MOB mob, final Race E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
7939                throws IOException
7940        {
7941                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
7942                        return;
7943                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(true))
7944                {
7945                        final StringBuffer parts=new StringBuffer("");
7946                        final int numResources=CMath.s_int(E.getStat("NUMCABLE"));
7947                        final Vector<Ability> ables=new Vector<Ability>();
7948                        final Vector<String> data=new Vector<String>();
7949                        for(int v=0;v<numResources;v++)
7950                        {
7951                                final Ability A=CMClass.getAbility(E.getStat("GETCABLE"+v));
7952                                if(A!=null)
7953                                {
7954                                        parts.append("("+A.ID()+"/"+E.getStat("GETCABLEPROF"+v)+"), ");
7955                                        ables.addElement(A);
7956                                        data.addElement(A.ID()+";"+E.getStat("GETCABLEPROF"+v)+";"+E.getStat("GETCABLELVL"+v)+";"+E.getStat("GETCABLEGAIN"+v));
7957                                }
7958                        }
7959                        if(parts.toString().endsWith(", "))
7960                        {
7961                                parts.deleteCharAt(parts.length() - 1);
7962                                parts.deleteCharAt(parts.length() - 1);
7963                        }
7964                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Cultural Abilities: @x2.",""+showNumber,parts.toString()));
7965                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
7966                                return;
7967                        final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter an ability name to add or remove (?)\n\r:"),"");
7968                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
7969                                mob.tell(CMLib.lister().reallyList(mob,CMClass.abilities(),-1).toString());
7970                        else
7971                        if(newName.length()>0)
7972                        {
7973                                int partNum=-1;
7974                                for(int i=0;i<ables.size();i++)
7975                                {
7976                                        if(CMLib.english().containsString(ables.elementAt(i).ID(),newName))
7977                                        {
7978                                                partNum = i;
7979                                                break;
7980                                        }
7981                                }
7982                                boolean updateList=false;
7983                                if(partNum<0)
7984                                {
7985                                        final Ability A=CMClass.getAbility(newName);
7986                                        if((A==null)
7987                                        ||(((A.classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_DOMAINS)==Ability.DOMAIN_ARCHON)
7988                                                &&(mob.fetchAbility(A.ID())==null)))
7989                                        {
7990                                                mob.tell(L("That is neither an existing ability name, nor a valid one to add.  Use ? for a list."));
7991                                        }
7992                                        else
7993                                        {
7994                                                final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer(A.ID()+";");
7995                                                final String prof=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter the default proficiency level (100): "),"100");
7996                                                str.append((""+CMath.s_int(prof)));
7997                                                final String levelStr=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter the character level (0): "),"0");
7998                                                str.append(";");
7999                                                str.append((""+CMath.s_int(levelStr)));
8000                                                final String gainStr=Boolean.valueOf(mob.session().confirm(L("Enter Y if it is auto-gained (Y/n)? "),"Y")).toString();
8001                                                str.append(";");
8002                                                str.append(gainStr);
8003                                                data.addElement(str.toString());
8004                                                ables.addElement(A);
8005                                                mob.tell(L("@x1 added.",A.name()));
8006                                                updateList=true;
8007                                        }
8008                                }
8009                                else
8010                                {
8011                                        final Ability A=ables.elementAt(partNum);
8012                                        ables.removeElementAt(partNum);
8013                                        data.removeElementAt(partNum);
8014                                        updateList=true;
8015                                        mob.tell(L("@x1 removed.",A.name()));
8016                                }
8017                                if(updateList)
8018                                {
8019                                        if(data.size()>0)
8020                                                E.setStat("NUMCABLE",""+data.size());
8021                                        else
8022                                                E.setStat("NUMCABLE","");
8023                                        for(int i=0;i<data.size();i++)
8024                                        {
8025                                                final List<String> V=CMParms.parseSemicolons(data.elementAt(i),false);
8026                                                E.setStat("GETCABLE"+i,V.get(0));
8027                                                E.setStat("GETCABLEPROF"+i,V.get(1));
8028                                                E.setStat("GETCABLELVL"+i,V.get(2));
8029                                                E.setStat("GETCABLEGAIN"+i,V.get(3));
8030                                        }
8031                                }
8032                        }
8033                        else
8034                        {
8035                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
8036                                return;
8037                        }
8038                }
8039        }
8040
8041        @Override
8042        public void modifyGenClass(final MOB mob, final CharClass me, int showFlag)
8043                throws IOException
8044        {
8045                if(mob.isMonster())
8046                        return;
8047                boolean ok=false;
8048                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
8049                        showFlag=-999;
8050                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
8051                {
8052                        int showNumber=0;
8053
8054                        promptStatInt(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Number of Class Names: ","NUMNAME");
8055                        final int numNames=CMath.s_int(me.getStat("NUMNAME"));
8056                        if(numNames<=1)
8057                                promptStatStr(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Class Name","NAME0");
8058                        else
8059                        for(int i=0;i<numNames;i++)
8060                        {
8061                                promptStatStr(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Class Name #"+i+": ","NAME"+i);
8062                                if(i>0)
8063                                while(!mob.session().isStopped())
8064                                {
8065                                        final int oldNameLevel=CMath.s_int(me.getStat("NAMELEVEL"+i));
8066                                        promptStatInt(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Class Name #"+i+" class level: ","NAMELEVEL"+i);
8067                                        final int previousNameLevel=CMath.s_int(me.getStat("NAMELEVEL"+(i-1)));
8068                                        final int newNameLevel=CMath.s_int(me.getStat("NAMELEVEL"+i));
8069                                        if((oldNameLevel!=newNameLevel)&&(newNameLevel<(previousNameLevel+1)))
8070                                        {
8071                                                mob.tell(L("This level may not be less than @x1.",""+(previousNameLevel+1)));
8072                                                me.setStat("NAMELEVEL"+i,""+(previousNameLevel+1));
8073                                                showNumber--;
8074                                        }
8075                                        else
8076                                                break;
8077                                }
8078                        }
8079                        promptStatInt(mob,me,"Use -1 to disable a class Level Cap",++showNumber,showFlag,"Level Cap (?)","LEVELCAP");
8080                        promptStatStr(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Base Class","BASE");
8081                        genClassAvailability(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8082                        promptStatStr(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"HP/Level Formula","HITPOINTSFORMULA");
8083                        promptStatStr(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Mana/Level Formula","MANAFORMULA");
8084                        promptStatInt(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Prac/Level","LVLPRAC");
8085                        promptStatInt(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Attack/Level","LVLATT");
8086                        genAttackAttribute(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Attack Attribute","ATTATT");
8087                        promptStatInt(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Practices/1stLvl","FSTPRAC");
8088                        promptStatInt(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Trains/1stLvl","FSTTRAN");
8089                        promptStatInt(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Levels/Dmg Pt","LVLDAM");
8090                        promptStatStr(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Move/Level Formula","MOVEMENTFORMULA");
8091                        genArmorCode(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Armor Restr.","ARMOR");
8092
8093                        final int armorMinorCode=CMath.s_int(me.getStat("ARMORMINOR"));
8094                        final boolean newSpells=prompt(mob,armorMinorCode>0,++showNumber,showFlag,"Armor restricts only spells");
8095                        me.setStat("ARMORMINOR",""+(newSpells?CMMsg.TYP_CAST_SPELL:-1));
8096
8097                        promptStatStr(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Limitations","STRLMT");
8098                        promptStatStr(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Bonuses","STRBON");
8099                        genQualifications(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Qualifications","QUAL");
8100                        genMinimumStatQualifications(mob, me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8101                        genClassRaceQuals(mob, me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Required Races", "RACQUAL");
8102                        genPStats(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,true);
8103                        genAStats(mob,me,"ASTATS","CharStat Adjustments",++showNumber,showFlag);
8104                        genAStats(mob,me,"CSTATS","CharStat Settings",++showNumber,showFlag);
8105                        genAState(mob,me,"ASTATE","CharState Adjustments",++showNumber,showFlag);
8106                        genAState(mob,me,"STARTASTATE","New Player CharState Adj.",++showNumber,showFlag);
8107                        genClassFlags(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8108                        genWeaponRestr(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Weapon Restr.","NUMWEP","GETWEP");
8109                        genWeaponMaterials(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Weapon Materials","NUMWMAT","GETWMAT");
8110                        genOutfit(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8111                        promptStatStr(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Starting Money","MONEY");
8112                        genClassBuddy(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Stat-Modifying Class","STATCLASS");
8113                        genClassBuddy(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Special Events Class","EVENTCLASS");
8114                        promptStatChoices(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Sub Class Switch Rule","SUBRUL", CMParms.toStringArray(CharClass.SubClassRule.values()));
8115                        promptStatInt(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Max Non-Crafting Skills","MAXNCS");
8116                        promptStatInt(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Max Crafting Skills","MAXCRS");
8117                        promptStatInt(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Max All-Common Skills","MAXCMS");
8118                        promptStatInt(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Max Languages","MAXLGS");
8119                        genClassAbilities(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8120                        promptStatInt(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Number of Security Code Sets: ","NUMSSET");
8121                        final int numGroups=CMath.s_int(me.getStat("NUMSSET"));
8122                        for(int i=0;i<numGroups;i++)
8123                        {
8124                                promptStatStr(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Security Codes in Set #"+i,"SSET"+i);
8125                                while(!mob.session().isStopped())
8126                                {
8127                                        final int oldGroupLevel=CMath.s_int(me.getStat("SSETLEVEL"+i));
8128                                        promptStatInt(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Class Level for Security Set #"+i+": ","SSETLEVEL"+i);
8129                                        final int previousGroupLevel=CMath.s_int(me.getStat("SSETLEVEL"+(i-1)));
8130                                        final int newGroupLevel=CMath.s_int(me.getStat("SSETLEVEL"+i));
8131                                        if((oldGroupLevel!=newGroupLevel)
8132                                        &&(i>0)
8133                                        &&(newGroupLevel<(previousGroupLevel+1)))
8134                                        {
8135                                                mob.tell(L("This level may not be less than @x1.",""+(previousGroupLevel+1)));
8136                                                me.setStat("SSETLEVEL"+i,""+(previousGroupLevel+1));
8137                                                showNumber--;
8138                                        }
8139                                        else
8140                                                break;
8141                                }
8142                        }
8143
8144                        if (showFlag < -900)
8145                        {
8146                                ok = true;
8147                                break;
8148                        }
8149                        if (showFlag > 0)
8150                        {
8151                                showFlag = -1;
8152                                continue;
8153                        }
8154                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
8155                        if(showFlag<=0)
8156                        {
8157                                showFlag=-1;
8158                                ok=true;
8159                        }
8160                }
8161        }
8162
8163        public void modifyClanPosition(final MOB mob, final ClanPosition me, int showFlag) throws IOException
8164        {
8165                if(mob.isMonster())
8166                        return;
8167                boolean ok=false;
8168                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
8169                        showFlag=-999;
8170                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
8171                {
8172                        int showNumber=0;
8173                        promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Simple ID","ID",false);
8174                        promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Name","NAME",false);
8175                        promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Name (Plural)","PLURALNAME",false);
8176                        promptStatInt(mob, me,++showNumber, showFlag,"Rank (low=better)", "RANK");
8177                        if((me.getRank()<0)||(me.getRank()>99))
8178                                me.setRank(0);
8179                        promptStatInt(mob, me,++showNumber, showFlag,"Maximum", "MAX");
8180                        if((me.getMax()<0)||(me.getMax()>9999))
8181                                me.setMax(Integer.MAX_VALUE);
8182                        promptStatStr(mob,me,CMLib.masking().maskHelp("\n","disallow"),++showNumber,showFlag,"Position Mask","INNERMASK",false);
8183                        promptStatBool(mob, me,++showNumber, showFlag,"Is Shown", "ISPUBLIC");
8184                        promptStatCommaChoices(mob, me,CMParms.toListString(Clan.Function.values()),++showNumber, showFlag,"Powers", "FUNCTIONS",Clan.Function.values());
8185
8186                        if (showFlag < -900)
8187                        {
8188                                ok = true;
8189                                break;
8190                        }
8191                        if (showFlag > 0)
8192                        {
8193                                showFlag = -1;
8194                                continue;
8195                        }
8196                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
8197                        if(showFlag<=0)
8198                        {
8199                                showFlag=-1;
8200                                ok=true;
8201                        }
8202                }
8203        }
8204
8205        public void clanGovernmentPositions(final MOB mob, final ClanGovernment me, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
8206        {
8207                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
8208                        return;
8209                String list = CMParms.toListString(me.getPositions());
8210                mob.tell(L("@x1. Positions: @x2",""+showNumber,list));
8211                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
8212                        return;
8213                final String promptStr=L("Enter a position ID to edit/remove or ADD\n\r:");
8214                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
8215                {
8216                        final String word=mob.session().prompt(promptStr,"");
8217                        if(word.trim().length()==0)
8218                        {
8219                                return;
8220                        }
8221                        if(word.trim().equalsIgnoreCase("ADD"))
8222                        {
8223                                final ClanPosition P=me.addPosition();
8224                                modifyClanPosition(mob,P,showFlag);
8225                        }
8226                        else
8227                        {
8228                                ClanPosition editMe=null;
8229                                for(final ClanPosition pos : me.getPositions())
8230                                {
8231                                        if(pos.getID().equalsIgnoreCase(word))
8232                                                editMe=pos;
8233                                }
8234                                if(editMe == null)
8235                                {
8236                                        list = CMParms.toListString(me.getPositions());
8237                                        mob.tell(L("Position @x1 is not listed.  Try one of these: @x2",word,list));
8238                                }
8239                                else
8240                                if(mob.session()!=null)
8241                                {
8242                                        final String choice=mob.session().choose(L("Edit or Delete position @x1 (E/D/)?",editMe.getID()), L("ED"), "");
8243                                        if(choice.equalsIgnoreCase("E"))
8244                                                modifyClanPosition(mob,editMe,showFlag);
8245                                        else
8246                                        if(choice.equalsIgnoreCase("D"))
8247                                        {
8248                                                if(me.getPositions().length==1)
8249                                                        mob.tell(L("You can't delete the last position."));
8250                                                else
8251                                                        me.delPosition(editMe);
8252                                        }
8253                                }
8254                        }
8255                }
8256        }
8257
8258        @Override
8259        public void modifyGovernment(final MOB mob, final ClanGovernment me, int showFlag) throws IOException
8260        {
8261                if(mob.isMonster())
8262                        return;
8263                boolean ok=false;
8264                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
8265                        showFlag=-999;
8266                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
8267                {
8268                        int showNumber=0;
8269                        promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Type Name","NAME",false);
8270                        promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Category","CATEGORY",false);
8271                        promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Short Desc","SHORTDESC",false);
8272                        promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Long Desc","LONGDESC",60);
8273                        promptStatStr(mob,me,CMLib.masking().maskHelp("\n","disallow"),++showNumber,showFlag,"Member Mask","REQUIREDMASK",true);
8274                        promptStatBool(mob, me,++showNumber, showFlag,"Is Public", "ISPUBLIC");
8275                        promptStatBool(mob, me,++showNumber, showFlag,"Is Family", "ISFAMILYONLY");
8276                        promptStatBool(mob, me,++showNumber, showFlag,"Is Rivalrous", "ISRIVALROUS");
8277                        promptStatStr(mob, me,null,++showNumber, showFlag,"Minimum Members", "OVERRIDEMINMEMBERS",true);
8278                        if((me.getOverrideMinMembers()!=null)&&((me.getOverrideMinMembers().intValue()<0)||(me.getOverrideMinMembers().intValue()>999)))
8279                                me.setOverrideMinMembers(null);
8280
8281                        ++showNumber;
8282                        clanGovernmentPositions(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8283                        promptStatStr(mob,me,"Use @x1 for the clan level.\n\r"+CMLib.help().getHelpText("FORMULA", mob, true),++showNumber,showFlag,"XP Per Level Formula","XPLEVELFORMULA",true);
8284                        promptStatBool(mob, me,++showNumber, showFlag,"Conquest Enabled", "CONQUESTENABLED");
8285                        if(CMath.s_bool(me.getStat("CONQUESTENABLED")))
8286                        {
8287                                promptStatBool(mob, me,++showNumber, showFlag,"Clan Item Loyalty", "CONQUESTITEMLOYALTY");
8288                                promptStatBool(mob, me,++showNumber, showFlag,"Conq. by Worship", "CONQUESTDEITYBASIS");
8289                        }
8290                        promptStatCommaChoices(mob, me,CMParms.toListString(Clan.Function.values()),++showNumber, showFlag,"Vote Approved", "VOTEFUNCS",Clan.Function.values());
8291                        if(me.getStat("VOTEFUNCS").length()>0)
8292                        {
8293                                promptStatInt(mob, me,++showNumber, showFlag,"Max Vote Days", "MAXVOTEDAYS");
8294                                if((me.getMaxVoteDays()<0)||(me.getMaxVoteDays()>999999))
8295                                        me.setMaxVoteDays(10);
8296                                promptStatInt(mob, me,++showNumber, showFlag,"Vote Quorum (Pct%)", "VOTEQUORUMPCT");
8297                                if((me.getVoteQuorumPct()<0)||(me.getVoteQuorumPct()>100))
8298                                        me.setVoteQuorumPct(100);
8299                        }
8300                        promptStatChoices(mob,me,CMParms.toListString(Clan.AutoPromoteFlag.values()),++showNumber,showFlag,"Auto-Promotion","AUTOPROMOTEBY",Clan.AutoPromoteFlag.values());
8301                        promptStatChoices(mob,me,CMParms.toListString(me.getPositions()),++showNumber,showFlag,"Apply Position","AUTOROLE",me.getPositions());
8302                        promptStatChoices(mob,me,CMParms.toListString(me.getPositions()),++showNumber,showFlag,"Accept Position","ACCEPTPOS",me.getPositions());
8303                        promptStatStr(mob,me,CMLib.help().getHelpText("SCRIPTABLE", mob, true).toString(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Entry Scriptable","ENTRYSCRIPT",true);
8304                        promptStatStr(mob,me,CMLib.help().getHelpText("SCRIPTABLE", mob, true).toString(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Exit Scriptable","EXITSCRIPT",true);
8305                        genDynamicAbilities(mob,me,"Clan & Char","clan",++showNumber,showFlag);
8306                        genDynamicEffects(mob,me,"Clan","clan",++showNumber,showFlag);
8307
8308                        if (showFlag < -900)
8309                        {
8310                                ok = true;
8311                                break;
8312                        }
8313                        if (showFlag > 0)
8314                        {
8315                                showFlag = -1;
8316                                continue;
8317                        }
8318                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
8319                        if(showFlag<=0)
8320                        {
8321                                showFlag=-1;
8322                                ok=true;
8323                        }
8324                }
8325        }
8326
8327        @Override
8328        public void modifyGenAbility(final MOB mob, final Ability me, int showFlag) throws IOException
8329        {
8330                if(mob.isMonster())
8331                        return;
8332                boolean ok=false;
8333                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
8334                        showFlag=-999;
8335                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
8336                {
8337                        int showNumber=0;
8338                        // id is bad to change.. make them delete it.
8339                        //genText(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Enter the class","CLASS");
8340                        promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Ability/Skill name","NAME",false);
8341                        promptStatStr(mob,me,CMParms.toListString(Ability.ACODE_DESCS)+","+CMParms.toListString(Ability.DOMAIN_DESCS),++showNumber,showFlag,"Type, Domain","CLASSIFICATION",false);
8342                        promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Command Words (comma sep)","TRIGSTR",false);
8343                        promptStatStr(mob,me,CMParms.toListString(Ability.RANGE_CHOICES),++showNumber,showFlag,"Minimum Range","MINRANGE",false);
8344                        promptStatStr(mob,me,CMParms.toListString(Ability.RANGE_CHOICES),++showNumber,showFlag,"Maximum Range","MAXRANGE",false);
8345                        promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Ticks Between Casts","TICKSBETWEENCASTS",false);
8346                        promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Duration Override (0=NO)","TICKSOVERRIDE",false);
8347                        promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Affect String","DISPLAY",true);
8348                        promptStatBool(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Is Auto-invoking","AUTOINVOKE");
8349                        promptStatStr(mob,me,"0,"+CMParms.toListString(Ability.FLAG_DESCS),++showNumber,showFlag,"Skill Flags (comma sep)","FLAGS",true);
8350                        promptStatInt(mob,me,"-1,x,"+Integer.MAX_VALUE+","+Integer.MAX_VALUE+"-(1 to 100)",++showNumber,showFlag,"Override Cost","OVERRIDEMANA");
8351                        promptStatStr(mob,me,CMParms.toListString(Ability.USAGE_DESCS),++showNumber,showFlag,"Cost Type","USAGEMASK",false);
8352                        promptStatStr(mob,me,"0,"+CMParms.toListString(Ability.CAN_DESCS),++showNumber,showFlag,"Can Affect","CANAFFECTMASK",true);
8353                        promptStatBool(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Tick/Periodic Affects","TICKAFFECTS");
8354                        promptStatStr(mob,me,"0,"+CMParms.toListString(Ability.CAN_DESCS),++showNumber,showFlag,"Can Target","CANTARGETMASK",true);
8355                        promptStatStr(mob,me,CMParms.toListString(Ability.QUALITY_DESCS),++showNumber,showFlag,"Quality Code","QUALITY",true);
8356                        promptStatStr(mob,me,"The parameters for this field are LIKE the parameters for this property:\n\r\n\r"+
8357                                        CMLib.help().getHelpText("Prop_HereAdjuster",mob,true).toString(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Affect Adjustments","HERESTATS",true);
8358                        promptStatStr(mob,me,CMLib.masking().maskHelp("\n","disallow"),++showNumber,showFlag,"Caster Mask","CASTMASK",true);
8359                        promptStatStr(mob,me,CMLib.help().getHelpText("Scriptable",mob,true).toString(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Scriptable Parm","SCRIPT",true);
8360                        promptStatStr(mob,me,CMLib.masking().maskHelp("\n","disallow"),++showNumber,showFlag,"Target Mask","TARGETMASK",true);
8361                        promptRawStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Fizzle Message","FIZZLEMSG",true);
8362                        promptRawStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Auto-Cast Message","AUTOCASTMSG",true);
8363                        promptRawStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Normal-Cast Message","CASTMSG",true);
8364                        promptRawStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Post-Cast Message","POSTCASTMSG",true);
8365                        promptStatStr(mob,me,CMParms.toListString(CMMsg.TYPE_DESCS),++showNumber,showFlag,"Attack-Type","ATTACKCODE",true);
8366                        promptStatStr(mob,me,"The parameters for this field are LIKE the parameters for this property:\n\r\n\r"+
8367                                        CMLib.help().getHelpText("Prop_HereSpellCast",mob,true).toString(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Silent affects","POSTCASTAFFECT",true);
8368                        promptStatStr(mob,me,"The parameters for this field are LIKE the parameters for this property:\n\r\n\r"+
8369                                        CMLib.help().getHelpText("Prop_HereSpellCast",mob,true).toString(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Extra castings","POSTCASTABILITY",true);
8370                        promptStatStr(mob,me,"Enter a damage or healing formula. Use +-*/()?. @x1=caster level, @x2=target level.  Formula evaluates >0 for damage, <0 for healing. Requires Can Target!",++showNumber,showFlag,"Damage/Healing Formula","POSTCASTDAMAGE",true);
8371                        promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Help Text","HELP",true);
8372
8373                        if (showFlag < -900)
8374                        {
8375                                ok = true;
8376                                break;
8377                        }
8378                        if (showFlag > 0)
8379                        {
8380                                showFlag = -1;
8381                                continue;
8382                        }
8383                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
8384                        if(showFlag<=0)
8385                        {
8386                                showFlag=-1;
8387                                ok=true;
8388                        }
8389                }
8390        }
8391
8392        @Override
8393        public void modifyGenLanguage(final MOB mob, final Language me, int showFlag) throws IOException
8394        {
8395                if(mob.isMonster())
8396                        return;
8397                boolean ok=false;
8398                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
8399                        showFlag=-999;
8400                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
8401                {
8402                        int showNumber=0;
8403                        // id is bad to change.. make them delete it.
8404                        //genText(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Enter the class","CLASS");
8405                        promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Language name","NAME",false);
8406                        for(int i=0;i<=me.translationLists(me.ID()).size();i++)
8407                        {
8408                                promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,(i+1)+" letter words","WORDS"+(i+1),true);
8409                        }
8410                        ++showNumber;
8411                        if((showFlag<=0)||(showFlag==showNumber))
8412                        {
8413                                mob.tell(L("@x1. Hashed words: @x2",""+showNumber,me.getStat("HASHEDWORDS")));
8414                                if((showFlag==showNumber)||(showFlag<=-999))
8415                                {
8416                                        final String promptStr=L("Enter a word definition to add or remove\n\r:");
8417                                        while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
8418                                        {
8419                                                String word=mob.session().prompt(promptStr,"");
8420                                                if(word.trim().length()==0)
8421                                                {
8422                                                        break;
8423                                                }
8424                                                final int x=word.indexOf("=");
8425                                                String val=null;
8426                                                if(x>0)
8427                                                {
8428                                                        val=word.substring(x+1);
8429                                                        word=word.substring(0,x);
8430                                                }
8431                                                if((val==null)&&(!me.translationHash(me.ID()).containsKey(word.toUpperCase().trim())))
8432                                                        mob.tell(L("You can not remove @x1, it is not on the current list.",word));
8433                                                else
8434                                                if(me.translationHash(me.ID()).containsKey(word.toUpperCase().trim()))
8435                                                {
8436                                                        me.translationHash(me.ID()).remove(word.toUpperCase().trim());
8437                                                        mob.tell(L("Word '@x1' removed.",word));
8438                                                }
8439                                                else
8440                                                {
8441                                                        me.translationHash(me.ID()).put(word.toUpperCase().trim(),val);
8442                                                        mob.tell(L("Word '@x1' added.",word));
8443                                                }
8444                                        }
8445                                }
8446                        }
8447                        promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Help Text","HELP",true);
8448
8449                        if (showFlag < -900)
8450                        {
8451                                ok = true;
8452                                break;
8453                        }
8454                        if (showFlag > 0)
8455                        {
8456                                showFlag = -1;
8457                                continue;
8458                        }
8459                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
8460                        if(showFlag<=0)
8461                        {
8462                                showFlag=-1;
8463                                ok=true;
8464                        }
8465                }
8466        }
8467
8468        @Override
8469        public void modifyGenCraftSkill(final MOB mob, final Ability me, int showFlag) throws IOException
8470        {
8471                if(mob.isMonster())
8472                        return;
8473                boolean ok=false;
8474                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
8475                        showFlag=-999;
8476                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
8477                {
8478                        int showNumber=0;
8479                        // id is bad to change.. make them delete it.
8480                        //genText(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Enter the class","CLASS");
8481                        promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Skill name","NAME",false);
8482                        promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Skill verb","VERB",false);
8483                        promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Command Words (comma sep)","TRIGSTR",false);
8484                        promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Recipe filename","FILENAME",false);
8485                        ++showNumber;
8486                        if((showFlag<=0)||(showFlag==showNumber))
8487                        {
8488                                mob.tell(L("@x1. Raw materials: @x2",""+showNumber,me.getStat("MATLIST")));
8489                                if((showFlag==showNumber)||(showFlag<=-999))
8490                                {
8491                                        final String promptStr=L("Enter a material or resource to add or remove (?)\n\r:");
8492                                        while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
8493                                        {
8494                                                final String word=mob.session().prompt(promptStr,"");
8495                                                if(word.trim().length()==0)
8496                                                {
8497                                                        break;
8498                                                }
8499                                                if(word.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))
8500                                                {
8501                                                        final StringBuilder str=new StringBuilder(CMParms.toListString(RawMaterial.Material.values()));
8502                                                        str.append(", ").append(CMParms.toListString(RawMaterial.CODES.NAMES()));
8503                                                        mob.tell(str.toString());
8504                                                        continue;
8505                                                }
8506                                                final List<String> curSet=CMParms.parseCommas(me.getStat("MATLIST").toUpperCase(),true);
8507                                                if(curSet.contains(word.toUpperCase().trim()))
8508                                                {
8509                                                        curSet.remove(word.toUpperCase().trim());
8510                                                        me.setStat("MATLIST", CMParms.toListString(curSet.toArray(new String[0])));
8511                                                        mob.tell(L("Resource or Material '@x1' removed.",word));
8512                                                }
8513                                                else
8514                                                if((RawMaterial.Material.findIgnoreCase(word)!=null)
8515                                                ||CMParms.containsIgnoreCase(RawMaterial.CODES.NAMES(), word))
8516                                                {
8517                                                        curSet.add(word.toUpperCase().trim());
8518                                                        me.setStat("MATLIST", CMParms.toListString(curSet.toArray(new String[0])));
8519                                                        if(RawMaterial.Material.findIgnoreCase(word)!=null)
8520                                                                mob.tell(L("Material type '@x1' added.",word));
8521                                                        else
8522                                                                mob.tell(L("Raw resource '@x1' added.",word));
8523                                                }
8524                                                else
8525                                                        mob.tell(L("'@x1' is not a material or resource.  Try ?",word));
8526                                        }
8527                                }
8528                        }
8529                        promptStatBool(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Can mend","CANMEND");
8530                        promptStatBool(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Can refit","CANREFIT");
8531                        promptStatBool(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Can bundle","CANBUNDLE");
8532                        promptStatBool(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Can sit","CANSIT");
8533                        promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"MSP file","SOUND",false);
8534                        promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Help Text","HELP",true);
8535
8536                        if (showFlag < -900)
8537                        {
8538                                ok = true;
8539                                break;
8540                        }
8541                        if (showFlag > 0)
8542                        {
8543                                showFlag = -1;
8544                                continue;
8545                        }
8546                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
8547                        if(showFlag<=0)
8548                        {
8549                                showFlag=-1;
8550                                ok=true;
8551                        }
8552                }
8553        }
8554
8555        protected boolean genText(final MOB mob, final PairList<String,String> set, final String[] choices, final String help, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String field)
8556        throws IOException
8557        {
8558                final int setDex=set.indexOfFirst(field);
8559                if(((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))||(setDex<0))
8560                        return true;
8561                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+fieldDisplayStr+": '"+(set.get(setDex).second+"'."));
8562                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
8563                        return true;
8564                String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new one\n\r:"),"");
8565                if(newName.trim().length()==0)
8566                {
8567                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
8568                        return false;
8569                }
8570                if((newName.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))&&(help!=null))
8571                {
8572                        if((mob.session()==null)||(mob.session().isStopped()))
8573                                return false;
8574                        mob.tell(help);
8575                        return genText(mob,set,choices,help,showNumber,showFlag,fieldDisplayStr,field);
8576                }
8577                if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("null"))
8578                        newName="";
8579                if((choices==null)||(choices.length==0))
8580                {
8581                        set.get(setDex).second = newName;
8582                        return true;
8583                }
8584                boolean found=false;
8585                for (final String choice : choices)
8586                {
8587                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase(choice))
8588                        {
8589                                newName = choice;
8590                                found = true;
8591                                break;
8592                        }
8593                }
8594                if(!found)
8595                {
8596                        if((mob.session()==null)||(mob.session().isStopped()))
8597                                return false;
8598                        mob.tell(help);
8599                        return genText(mob,set,choices,help,showNumber,showFlag,fieldDisplayStr,field);
8600                }
8601                set.get(setDex).second = newName;
8602                return true;
8603        }
8604
8605        protected boolean genText(final MOB mob, final Map<String,String> map, final String[] choices, final String help, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String fieldDisplayStr, final String field)
8606        throws IOException
8607        {
8608                if(((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))||(!map.containsKey(field)))
8609                        return true;
8610                mob.tell(showNumber+". "+fieldDisplayStr+": '"+(map.get(field)+"'."));
8611                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
8612                        return true;
8613                String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new one\n\r:"),"");
8614                if(newName.trim().length()==0)
8615                {
8616                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
8617                        return false;
8618                }
8619                if((newName.equalsIgnoreCase("?"))&&(help!=null))
8620                {
8621                        if((mob.session()==null)||(mob.session().isStopped()))
8622                                return false;
8623                        mob.tell(help);
8624                        return genText(mob,map,choices,help,showNumber,showFlag,fieldDisplayStr,field);
8625                }
8626                if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase("null"))
8627                        newName="";
8628                if((choices==null)||(choices.length==0))
8629                {
8630                        map.put(field,newName);
8631                        return true;
8632                }
8633                boolean found=false;
8634                for (final String choice : choices)
8635                {
8636                        if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase(choice))
8637                        {
8638                                newName = choice;
8639                                found = true;
8640                                break;
8641                        }
8642                }
8643                if(!found)
8644                {
8645                        if((mob.session()==null)||(mob.session().isStopped()))
8646                                return false;
8647                        mob.tell(help);
8648                        return genText(mob,map,choices,help,showNumber,showFlag,fieldDisplayStr,field);
8649                }
8650                map.put(field,newName);
8651                return true;
8652        }
8653
8654        protected boolean modifyComponent(final MOB mob, final AbilityComponent comp, int showFlag)
8655        throws IOException
8656        {
8657                final PairList<String,String> decoded=CMLib.ableComponents().getAbilityComponentCoded(comp);
8658                if(mob.isMonster())
8659                        return true;
8660                boolean ok=false;
8661                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
8662                        showFlag=-999;
8663                final String choices="Your choices are: ";
8664                final String allComponents=CMParms.toListString(RawMaterial.Material.values())+","+CMParms.toListString(RawMaterial.CODES.NAMES());
8665                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
8666                {
8667                        int showNumber=0;
8668                        genText(mob,decoded,(new String[]{"&&","||","X"}),choices+" &&, ||, X",++showNumber,showFlag,"Conjunction (X Deletes) (?)","ANDOR");
8669                        if(decoded.get(0).second.equalsIgnoreCase("X"))
8670                                return false;
8671                        genText(mob,decoded,(new String[]{"INVENTORY","HELD","WORN"}),choices+" INVENTORY, HELD, WORN",++showNumber,showFlag,"Component position (?)","DISPOSITION");
8672                        genText(mob,decoded,(new String[]{"KEPT","CONSUMED"}),choices+" KEPT, CONSUMED",++showNumber,showFlag,"Component fate (?)","FATE");
8673                        genText(mob,decoded,null,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Amount of component","AMOUNT");
8674                        genText(mob,decoded,null,allComponents,++showNumber,showFlag,"Type of component (?)","COMPONENTID");
8675                        genText(mob,decoded,null,allComponents,++showNumber,showFlag,"Component Subtype","SUBTYPE");
8676                        genText(mob,decoded,null,CMLib.masking().maskHelp("\n","disallow"),++showNumber,showFlag,"Component applies-to mask (?)","MASK");
8677
8678                        if (showFlag < -900)
8679                        {
8680                                ok = true;
8681                                break;
8682                        }
8683                        if (showFlag > 0)
8684                        {
8685                                showFlag = -1;
8686                                continue;
8687                        }
8688                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
8689                        if(showFlag<=0)
8690                        {
8691                                showFlag=-1;
8692                                ok=true;
8693                        }
8694                }
8695                CMLib.ableComponents().setAbilityComponentCodedFromCodedPairs(decoded,comp);
8696                return true;
8697        }
8698
8699        @Override
8700        public void modifyComponents(final MOB mob, final String componentID, int showFlag) throws IOException
8701        {
8702                if(mob.isMonster())
8703                        return;
8704                boolean ok=false;
8705                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
8706                        showFlag=-999;
8707                final List<AbilityComponent> codedDV=CMLib.ableComponents().getAbilityComponents(componentID);
8708                if(codedDV!=null)
8709                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
8710                {
8711                        int showNumber=0;
8712                        for(int v=0;v<codedDV.size();v++)
8713                        {
8714                                if((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
8715                                {
8716                                        showNumber++;
8717                                        if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
8718                                                continue;
8719                                        mob.tell(showNumber+": '"+CMLib.ableComponents().getAbilityComponentDesc(null,codedDV.get(v),v>0)+"'.");
8720                                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
8721                                                continue;
8722                                        if(!modifyComponent(mob,codedDV.get(v),showFlag))
8723                                        {
8724                                                codedDV.remove(v);
8725                                                v--;
8726                                        }
8727                                }
8728                        }
8729                        while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
8730                        {
8731                                showNumber++;
8732                                mob.tell(L("@x1. Add new component requirement.",""+showNumber));
8733                                if((showFlag==showNumber)||(showFlag<=-999))
8734                                {
8735                                        final AbilityComponent comp = CMLib.ableComponents().createBlankAbilityComponent();
8736                                        final boolean success=modifyComponent(mob,comp,showFlag);
8737                                        if(!success)
8738                                        {
8739                                                // do nothing
8740                                        }
8741                                        else
8742                                        {
8743                                                codedDV.add(comp);
8744                                                if(showFlag<=-999)
8745                                                        continue;
8746                                        }
8747                                }
8748                                break;
8749                        }
8750
8751                        if (showFlag < -900)
8752                        {
8753                                ok = true;
8754                                break;
8755                        }
8756                        if (showFlag > 0)
8757                        {
8758                                showFlag = -1;
8759                                continue;
8760                        }
8761                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
8762                        if(showFlag<=0)
8763                        {
8764                                showFlag=-1;
8765                                ok=true;
8766                        }
8767                }
8768        }
8769
8770        @Override
8771        public void modifyGenRace(final MOB mob, final Race me, int showFlag) throws IOException
8772        {
8773                if(mob.isMonster())
8774                        return;
8775                boolean ok=false;
8776                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
8777                        showFlag=-999;
8778                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
8779                {
8780                        int showNumber=0;
8781                        promptStatStr(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Name","NAME");
8782                        genCat(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8783                        promptStatInt(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Base Weight","BWEIGHT");
8784                        promptStatInt(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Weight Variance","VWEIGHT");
8785                        promptStatInt(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Base Male Height","MHEIGHT");
8786                        promptStatInt(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Base Female Height","FHEIGHT");
8787                        promptStatInt(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Height Variance","VHEIGHT");
8788                        genRaceAvailability(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8789                        genDisableFlags(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8790                        genBreathes(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8791                        promptStatStr(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Leaving text","LEAVE");
8792                        promptStatStr(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Arriving text","ARRIVE");
8793                        genRaceBuddy(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Health Race","HEALTHRACE");
8794                        genRaceBuddy(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Event Race","EVENTRACE");
8795                        genBodyParts(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8796                        genRaceWearFlags(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8797                        genAgingChart(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8798                        promptStatBool(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Never create corpse","BODYKILL");
8799                        promptStatBool(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Rideable Player","CANRIDE");
8800                        promptStatInt(mob, me, ++showNumber, showFlag, "XP Adjustment %", "XPADJ");
8801                        genPStats(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8802                        genAStats(mob,me,"ASTATS","CharStat Adjustments",++showNumber,showFlag);
8803                        genAStats(mob,me,"CSTATS","CharStat Settings",++showNumber,showFlag);
8804                        genAState(mob,me,"ASTATE","CharState Adjustments",++showNumber,showFlag);
8805                        genAState(mob,me,"STARTASTATE","New Player CharState Adj.",++showNumber,showFlag);
8806                        genResources(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8807                        genOutfit(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8808                        genWeapon(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8809                        genRaceBuddy(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,"Weapons Race","WEAPONRACE");
8810                        genDynamicAbilities(mob,me,"Racial","char",++showNumber,showFlag);
8811                        genCulturalAbilities(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8812                        genDynamicEffects(mob,me,"Racial","char",++showNumber,showFlag);
8813                        genDynamicImmunitiess(mob,me,"Racial",++showNumber,showFlag);
8814
8815                        if (showFlag < -900)
8816                        {
8817                                ok = true;
8818                                break;
8819                        }
8820                        if (showFlag > 0)
8821                        {
8822                                showFlag = -1;
8823                                continue;
8824                        }
8825                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
8826                        if(showFlag<=0)
8827                        {
8828                                showFlag=-1;
8829                                ok=true;
8830                        }
8831                }
8832        }
8833
8834        protected void modifyGenItem(final MOB mob, final Item me, int showFlag)
8835                throws IOException
8836        {
8837                boolean ok=false;
8838                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
8839                        showFlag=-999;
8840                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
8841                {
8842                        if(mob.isMonster())
8843                                return;
8844                        int showNumber=0;
8845                        if(showFlag<0)
8846                                mob.tell(L("*. Class: @x1",me.ID()));
8847                        genName(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8848                        genDisplayText(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8849                        genDescription(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8850                        genLevel(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8851                        genSecretIdentity(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8852                        genMaterialCode(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8853                        if(me instanceof RawMaterial)
8854                                genMaterialSubType(mob,(RawMaterial)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8855                        if(me instanceof Book)
8856                        {
8857                                ((Book)me).setMaxPages(prompt(mob, ((Book)me).getMaxPages(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Max Pages"));
8858                                ((Book)me).setMaxCharsPerPage(prompt(mob, ((Book)me).getMaxCharsPerPage(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Chars/Page"));
8859                        }
8860                        if(me instanceof ClanItem)
8861                                genClanItem(mob,(ClanItem)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8862                        if(me instanceof Electronics)
8863                        {
8864                                final Electronics E=(Electronics)me;
8865                                E.setManufacturerName(prompt(mob, E.getManufacturerName(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Manufacturer"));
8866                                E.setPowerCapacity(prompt(mob, E.powerCapacity(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Pow Capacity"));
8867                                E.setPowerRemaining(prompt(mob, E.powerRemaining(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Pow Remaining"));
8868                                E.activate(prompt(mob, E.activated(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Activated"));
8869                        }
8870                        if((me instanceof ElecPanel)&&(!(me instanceof Computer)))
8871                                genPanelType(mob,(ElecPanel)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8872                        if(me instanceof FalseLimb)
8873                                ((FalseLimb)me).setRaceID(prompt(mob,((FalseLimb)me).getRaceID(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Race ID"));
8874                        if(me instanceof TechComponent)
8875                        {
8876                                final TechComponent E=(TechComponent)me;
8877                                E.setInstalledFactor((float)prompt(mob, E.getInstalledFactor(), ++showNumber, showFlag, L("Installed Factor")));
8878                                E.setRechargeRate((float)prompt(mob, E.getRechargeRate(), ++showNumber, showFlag, L("Pwr Recharge Rate")));
8879                        }
8880                        if(me instanceof ShipEngine)
8881                        {
8882                                final ShipEngine E=(ShipEngine)me;
8883                                E.setMinThrust(prompt(mob, E.getMinThrust(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Min thrust"));
8884                                E.setMaxThrust(prompt(mob, E.getMaxThrust(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Max thrust"));
8885                                E.setConstantThruster(prompt(mob, E.isConstantThruster(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Constant thrust"));
8886                                E.setSpecificImpulse(prompt(mob, E.getSpecificImpulse(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Spec Impulse"));
8887                                E.setFuelEfficiency(prompt(mob, E.getFuelEfficiency()*100.0, ++showNumber, showFlag, "Fuel Effic. %")/100.0);
8888                                E.setAvailPorts(CMParms.parseEnumList(TechComponent.ShipDir.class,prompt(mob, CMParms.toListString(E.getAvailPorts()), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Avail. ports").toUpperCase(),',').toArray(new TechComponent.ShipDir[0]));
8889                        }
8890                        if(me instanceof ShipWarComponent)
8891                        {
8892                                final ShipWarComponent E=(ShipWarComponent)me;
8893                                E.setPermittedNumDirections(prompt(mob, E.getPermittedNumDirections(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Max Ports"));
8894                                E.setPermittedDirections(CMParms.parseEnumList(TechComponent.ShipDir.class,prompt(mob, CMParms.toListString(E.getPermittedDirections()), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Avail. ports").toUpperCase(),',').toArray(new TechComponent.ShipDir[0]));
8895                                genMessageTypes(mob, E, ++showNumber, showFlag);
8896                        }
8897                        if(me instanceof PackagedItems)
