8898                                ((PackagedItems)me).setNumberOfItemsInPackage(prompt(mob,((PackagedItems)me).numberOfItemsInPackage(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Number of items in the package"));
8899                        if(me instanceof PrivateProperty)
8900                        {
8901                                promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Owner","OWNER",true);
8902                                promptStatInt(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Price","PRICE");
8903                        }
8904                        genGettable(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8905                        genReadable1(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8906                        genReadable2(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8907                        if(me instanceof Recipe)
8908                                genRecipe(mob,(Recipe)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8909                        if(me instanceof Light)
8910                                genBurnout(mob,(Light)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8911                        genRejuv(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8912                        if(me instanceof Coins)
8913                                genCoinStuff(mob,(Coins)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8914                        else
8915                        if((me instanceof BoardableShip)&&(!(me instanceof SpaceObject)))
8916                                genAbility(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,L("Moves per Tick"));
8917                        else
8918                                genAbility(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8919                        genUses(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8920                        if(me instanceof Wand)
8921                                genMaxUses(mob,(Wand)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8922                        genValue(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8923                        genWeight(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8924                        genDisposition(mob,me.basePhyStats(),++showNumber,showFlag);
8925                        if(me instanceof SpaceObject)
8926                        {
8927                                final SpaceObject spaceArea=(SpaceObject)me;
8928                                genSpaceStuff(mob,spaceArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
8929                        }
8930                        genBehaviors(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8931                        genAffects(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8932                        if(me instanceof LandTitle)
8933                                genTitleRoom(mob,(LandTitle)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8934                        genImage(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8935                        for(int x=me.getSaveStatIndex();x<me.getStatCodes().length;x++)
8936                                me.setStat(me.getStatCodes()[x],prompt(mob,me.getStat(me.getStatCodes()[x]),++showNumber,showFlag,CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(me.getStatCodes()[x])));
8937
8938                        if (showFlag < -900)
8939                        {
8940                                ok = true;
8941                                break;
8942                        }
8943                        if (showFlag > 0)
8944                        {
8945                                showFlag = -1;
8946                                continue;
8947                        }
8948                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
8949                        if(showFlag<=0)
8950                        {
8951                                showFlag=-1;
8952                                ok=true;
8953                        }
8954                }
8955                if(showFlag != -950)
8956                {
8957                        me.recoverPhyStats();
8958                        if(me.text().length()>=maxLength)
8959                                mob.tell(L("\n\rThe data entered exceeds the string limit of @x1 characters.",""+maxLength));
8960                }
8961        }
8962
8963        protected void modifyGenFood(final MOB mob, final Food me, int showFlag)
8964                throws IOException
8965        {
8966                if(mob.isMonster())
8967                        return;
8968                boolean ok=false;
8969                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
8970                        showFlag=-999;
8971                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
8972                {
8973                        int showNumber=0;
8974                        if(showFlag<0)
8975                                mob.tell(L("*. Class: @x1",me.ID()));
8976                        genName(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8977                        genDisplayText(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8978                        genDescription(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8979                        genSecretIdentity(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8980                        genLevel(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8981                        genValue(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8982                        genRejuv(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8983                        genWeight(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8984                        genMaterialCode(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8985                        if(me instanceof RawMaterial)
8986                                genMaterialSubType(mob,(RawMaterial)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8987                        genNourishment(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8988                        genBiteSize(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8989                        genDisposition(mob,me.basePhyStats(),++showNumber,showFlag);
8990                        genGettable(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8991                        genReadable1(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8992                        genReadable2(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8993                        if(me instanceof Light)
8994                                genBurnout(mob,(Light)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8995                        genBehaviors(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8996                        genAffects(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8997                        genImage(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
8998                        for(int x=me.getSaveStatIndex();x<me.getStatCodes().length;x++)
8999                                me.setStat(me.getStatCodes()[x],prompt(mob,me.getStat(me.getStatCodes()[x]),++showNumber,showFlag,CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(me.getStatCodes()[x])));
9000
9001                        if (showFlag < -900)
9002                        {
9003                                ok = true;
9004                                break;
9005                        }
9006                        if (showFlag > 0)
9007                        {
9008                                showFlag = -1;
9009                                continue;
9010                        }
9011                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
9012                        if(showFlag<=0)
9013                        {
9014                                showFlag=-1;
9015                                ok=true;
9016                        }
9017                }
9018                if(showFlag != -950)
9019                {
9020                        me.recoverPhyStats();
9021                        if(me.text().length()>=maxLength)
9022                                mob.tell(L("\n\rThe data entered exceeds the string limit of @x1 characters.",""+maxLength));
9023                }
9024        }
9025
9026        protected void genScripts(final MOB mob, final MOB E, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
9027        throws IOException
9028        {
9029                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
9030                        return;
9031                String behave="NO";
9032                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(behave.length()>0))
9033                {
9034                        String behaviorstr="";
9035                        int b=1;
9036                        for(final Enumeration<ScriptingEngine> e=E.scripts();e.hasMoreElements();b++)
9037                        {
9038                                final ScriptingEngine SE=e.nextElement();
9039                                if(SE!=null)
9040                                        behaviorstr+=b+":"+SE.defaultQuestName()+", ";
9041                        }
9042                        if(behaviorstr.length()>0)
9043                                behaviorstr=behaviorstr.substring(0,behaviorstr.length()-2);
9044                        mob.tell(L("@x1. Scripts: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,behaviorstr));
9045                        if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
9046                                return;
9047                        behave=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a script number to remove\n\r:"),"");
9048                        if(behave.length()>0)
9049                        {
9050                                final String tattoo=behave;
9051                                if((tattoo.length()>0)
9052                                &&(CMath.isInteger(tattoo))
9053                                &&(CMath.s_int(tattoo)>0)
9054                                &&(CMath.s_int(tattoo)<=E.numScripts()))
9055                                {
9056                                        final int x=CMath.s_int(tattoo);
9057                                        mob.tell(L("Script #@x1 removed.",""+x));
9058                                        E.delScript(E.fetchScript(x-1));
9059                                }
9060                        }
9061                        else
9062                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
9063                }
9064        }
9065
9066        protected void modifyGenDrink(final MOB mob, final Drink me, int showFlag)
9067                throws IOException
9068        {
9069                if(mob.isMonster())
9070                        return;
9071                boolean ok=false;
9072                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
9073                        showFlag=-999;
9074                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
9075                {
9076                        int showNumber=0;
9077                        if(showFlag<0)
9078                                mob.tell(L("*. Class: @x1",me.ID()));
9079                        genName(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9080                        genDisplayText(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9081                        genDescription(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9082                        genSecretIdentity(mob,(Item)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9083                        genValue(mob,(Item)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9084                        if(me instanceof Physical)
9085                        {
9086                                genLevel(mob,(Physical)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9087                                genWeight(mob,(Physical)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9088                                genRejuv(mob,(Physical)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9089                        }
9090                        genThirstQuenched(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9091                        genMaterialCode(mob,(Item)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9092                        if(me instanceof RawMaterial)
9093                                genMaterialSubType(mob,(RawMaterial)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9094                        genDrinkHeld(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9095                        genGettable(mob,(Item)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9096                        genReadable1(mob,(Item)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9097                        genReadable2(mob,(Item)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9098                        if(me instanceof Light)
9099                                genBurnout(mob,(Light)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9100                        if(me instanceof PhysicalAgent)
9101                                genBehaviors(mob,(PhysicalAgent)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9102                        if(me instanceof Physical)
9103                        {
9104                                genAffects(mob,(Physical)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9105                                genDisposition(mob,((Physical)me).basePhyStats(),++showNumber,showFlag);
9106                        }
9107                        if(me instanceof Container)
9108                        {
9109                                genContainerTypes(mob,(Container)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9110                                genCapacity(mob,(Container)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9111                                genDoorsNLocks(mob,(Container)me,L("lid"),++showNumber,showFlag);
9112                        }
9113                        if(me instanceof Perfume)
9114                                ((Perfume)me).setSmellList(prompt(mob,((Perfume)me).getSmellList(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Smells list (; delimited)"));
9115                        genImage(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9116                        for(int x=me.getSaveStatIndex();x<me.getStatCodes().length;x++)
9117                                me.setStat(me.getStatCodes()[x],prompt(mob,me.getStat(me.getStatCodes()[x]),++showNumber,showFlag,CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(me.getStatCodes()[x])));
9118
9119                        if (showFlag < -900)
9120                        {
9121                                ok = true;
9122                                break;
9123                        }
9124                        if (showFlag > 0)
9125                        {
9126                                showFlag = -1;
9127                                continue;
9128                        }
9129                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
9130                        if(showFlag<=0)
9131                        {
9132                                showFlag=-1;
9133                                ok=true;
9134                        }
9135                }
9136                if(showFlag != -950)
9137                {
9138                        if(me instanceof Physical)
9139                                ((Physical)me).recoverPhyStats();
9140                        if(me.text().length()>=maxLength)
9141                                mob.tell(L("\n\rThe data entered exceeds the string limit of @x1 characters.",""+maxLength));
9142                }
9143        }
9144
9145        protected void modifyGenWallpaper(final MOB mob, final Item me, int showFlag)
9146                throws IOException
9147        {
9148                if(mob.isMonster())
9149                        return;
9150                boolean ok=false;
9151                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
9152                        showFlag=-999;
9153                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
9154                {
9155                        int showNumber=0;
9156                        if(showFlag<0)
9157                                mob.tell(L("*. Class: @x1",me.ID()));
9158                        genName(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9159                        genDescription(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9160                        genReadable1(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9161                        genReadable2(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9162                        if(me instanceof Light)
9163                                genBurnout(mob,(Light)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9164                        for(int x=me.getSaveStatIndex();x<me.getStatCodes().length;x++)
9165                                me.setStat(me.getStatCodes()[x],prompt(mob,me.getStat(me.getStatCodes()[x]),++showNumber,showFlag,CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(me.getStatCodes()[x])));
9166
9167                        if (showFlag < -900)
9168                        {
9169                                ok = true;
9170                                break;
9171                        }
9172                        if (showFlag > 0)
9173                        {
9174                                showFlag = -1;
9175                                continue;
9176                        }
9177                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
9178                        if(showFlag<=0)
9179                        {
9180                                showFlag=-1;
9181                                ok=true;
9182                        }
9183                }
9184                if(showFlag != -950)
9185                {
9186                        me.recoverPhyStats();
9187                        if(me.text().length()>=maxLength)
9188                                mob.tell(L("\n\rThe data entered exceeds the string limit of @x1 characters.",""+maxLength));
9189                }
9190        }

9192        protected void modifyGenMap(final MOB mob, final com.planet_ink.coffee_mud.Items.interfaces.RoomMap me, int showFlag)
9193                throws IOException
9194        {
9195                if(mob.isMonster())
9196                        return;

9198                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
9199                        showFlag=-999;
9200                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
9201                {
9202                        int showNumber=0;
9203                        if(showFlag<0)
9204                                mob.tell(L("*. Class: @x1",me.ID()));
9205                        genName(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9206                        genDisplayText(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9207                        genDescription(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);

9218                        genBehaviors(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);

9220                        genImage(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);

9222                                me.setStat(me.getStatCodes()[x],prompt(mob,me.getStat(me.getStatCodes()[x]),++showNumber,showFlag,CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(me.getStatCodes()[x])));

9225                        {

9230                        {

9235                        if(showFlag<=0)
9236                        {
9237                                showFlag=-1;
9238                                ok=true;
9239                        }
9240                }
9241                if(showFlag != -950)
9242                {
9243                        me.recoverPhyStats();
9244                        if(me.text().length()>=maxLength)
9245                                mob.tell(L("\n\rThe data entered exceeds the string limit of @x1 characters.",""+maxLength));
9246                }
9247        }
9248
9249        protected void modifyGenContainer(final MOB mob, final Container me, int showFlag)
9250                throws IOException
9251        {
9252                if(mob.isMonster())
9253                        return;
9254                boolean ok=false;
9255                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
9256                        showFlag=-999;
9257                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
9258                {
9259                        int showNumber=0;
9260                        if(showFlag<0)
9261                                mob.tell(L("*. Class: @x1",me.ID()));
9262                        genName(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9263                        genDisplayText(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9264                        genDescription(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9265                        genLevel(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9266                        genRejuv(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9267                        genCapacity(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9268                        if(me instanceof Electronics)
9269                        {
9270                                final Electronics E=(Electronics)me;
9271                                E.setManufacturerName(prompt(mob, E.getManufacturerName(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Manufacturer"));
9272                                E.setPowerCapacity(prompt(mob, E.powerCapacity(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Pow Capacity"));
9273                                E.setPowerRemaining(prompt(mob, E.powerRemaining(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Pow Remaining"));
9274                                E.activate(prompt(mob, E.activated(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Activated"));
9275                        }
9276                        if((me instanceof ElecPanel)&&(!(me instanceof Computer)))
9277                                genPanelType(mob,(ElecPanel)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9278                        if(me instanceof PowerGenerator)
9279                        {
9280                                final PowerGenerator E=(PowerGenerator)me;
9281                                E.setGeneratedAmountPerTick(prompt(mob, E.getGeneratedAmountPerTick(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Gen Amt/Tick"));
9282                        }
9283                        if(me instanceof FuelConsumer)
9284                        {
9285                                final FuelConsumer E=(FuelConsumer)me;
9286                                genConsumedMaterials(mob, E, ++showNumber, showFlag);
9287                        }
9288                        if(me instanceof ShipEngine)
9289                        {
9290                                final ShipEngine E=(ShipEngine)me;
9291                                E.setMinThrust(prompt(mob, E.getMinThrust(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Min thrust"));
9292                                E.setMaxThrust(prompt(mob, E.getMaxThrust(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Max thrust"));
9293                                E.setConstantThruster(prompt(mob, E.isConstantThruster(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Constant thrust"));
9294                                E.setSpecificImpulse(prompt(mob, E.getSpecificImpulse(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Spec Impulse"));
9295                                E.setFuelEfficiency(prompt(mob, E.getFuelEfficiency()*100.0, ++showNumber, showFlag, "Fuel Effic. %")/100.0);
9296                                E.setAvailPorts(CMParms.parseEnumList(TechComponent.ShipDir.class,prompt(mob, CMParms.toListString(E.getAvailPorts()), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Avail. ports").toUpperCase(),',').toArray(new TechComponent.ShipDir[0]));
9297                        }
9298                        if(me instanceof TechComponent)
9299                        {
9300                                final TechComponent E=(TechComponent)me;
9301                                E.setInstalledFactor((float)prompt(mob, E.getInstalledFactor(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Installed Factor"));
9302                                E.setRechargeRate((float)prompt(mob, E.getRechargeRate(), ++showNumber, showFlag, L("Pwr Recharge Rate")));
9303                        }
9304                        if(!(me instanceof Electronics))
9305                        {
9306                                genContainerTypes(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9307                        }
9308                        if(me instanceof PrivateProperty)
9309                        {
9310                                promptStatStr(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Owner","OWNER",true);
9311                                promptStatInt(mob,me,null,++showNumber,showFlag,"Price","PRICE");
9312                        }
9313                        genDoorsNLocks(mob,me,L("lid"),++showNumber,showFlag);
9314                        if(me.hasADoor() && me.hasALock() && !CMLib.flags().isReadable(me))
9315                                me.setKeyName(prompt(mob,me.keyName(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Key Code"));
9316                        genMaterialCode(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9317                        genSecretIdentity(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9318                        genValue(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9319                        genUses(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9320                        genWeight(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9321                        genDisposition(mob,me.basePhyStats(),++showNumber,showFlag);
9322                        if(me instanceof DeadBody)
9323                                genCorpseData(mob,(DeadBody)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9324                        if(me instanceof ClanItem)
9325                                genClanItem(mob,(ClanItem)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9326                        genGettable(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9327                        genReadable1(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9328                        genReadable2(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9329                        if(me instanceof Light)
9330                                genBurnout(mob,(Light)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9331                        genBehaviors(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9332                        genAffects(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9333                        if(me instanceof Rideable)
9334                        {
9335                                genRideable1(mob,(Rideable)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9336                                genRideable2(mob,(Rideable)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9337                                genMountText(mob,(Rideable)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9338                                if(!(me instanceof Exit)) // doesn't make sense for portals
9339                                        genMountText2(mob,(Rideable)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9340                        }
9341                        if(me instanceof Exit)
9342                        {
9343                                genDoorName(mob,(Exit)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9344                                genClosedText(mob,(Exit)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9345                        }
9346                        if((me instanceof BoardableShip)&&(!(me instanceof SpaceObject)))
9347                                genAbility(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,L("Moves per Tick"));
9348                        //if(me instanceof PrivateProperty)
9349                        //      me.setStat("OWNER",prompt(mob,((PrivateProperty)me).getOwnerName(),++showNumber,showFlag,CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower("Property Owner")));
9350                        genImage(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9351                        for(int x=me.getSaveStatIndex();x<me.getStatCodes().length;x++)
9352                                me.setStat(me.getStatCodes()[x],prompt(mob,me.getStat(me.getStatCodes()[x]),++showNumber,showFlag,CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(me.getStatCodes()[x])));
9353
9354                        if (showFlag < -900)
9355                        {
9356                                ok = true;
9357                                break;
9358                        }
9359                        if (showFlag > 0)
9360                        {
9361                                showFlag = -1;
9362                                continue;
9363                        }
9364                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
9365                        if(showFlag<=0)
9366                        {
9367                                showFlag=-1;
9368                                ok=true;
9369                        }
9370                }
9371                if(showFlag != -950)
9372                {
9373                        me.recoverPhyStats();
9374                        if(me.text().length()>=maxLength)
9375                                mob.tell(L("\n\rThe data entered exceeds the string limit of @x1 characters.",""+maxLength));
9376                }
9377        }
9378
9379        protected void modifyGenWeapon(final MOB mob, final Weapon me, int showFlag)
9380                throws IOException
9381        {
9382                if(mob.isMonster())
9383                        return;
9384                boolean ok=false;
9385                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
9386                        showFlag=-999;
9387                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
9388                {
9389                        int showNumber=0;
9390                        if(showFlag<0)
9391                                mob.tell(L("*. Class: @x1",me.ID()));
9392                        genName(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9393                        genDisplayText(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9394                        genDescription(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9395                        final int oldLevel = me.basePhyStats().level();
9396                        genLevel(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9397                        if(me.basePhyStats().level() != oldLevel)
9398                                CMLib.itemBuilder().balanceItemByLevel(me);
9399                        genAttack(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9400                        genDamage(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9401                        genMaterialCode(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9402                        genWeaponType(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9403                        genWeaponClassification(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9404                        genWeaponRanges(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9405                        if(me instanceof Rideable)
9406                        {
9407                                genRideable1(mob,(Rideable)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9408                                genRideable2(mob,(Rideable)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9409                                genMountText(mob,(Rideable)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9410                                if(!(me instanceof Exit)) // doesn't make sense for portals
9411                                        genMountText2(mob,(Rideable)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9412                        }
9413                        if(me instanceof Wand)
9414                        {
9415                                genReadable1(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9416                                genReadable2(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9417                                genUses(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9418                                genMaxUses(mob,(Wand)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9419                                if(me instanceof Light)
9420                                        genBurnout(mob,(Light)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9421                        }
9422                        else
9423                        if(me instanceof AmmunitionWeapon)
9424                                genWeaponAmmo(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9425                        if(me instanceof Electronics)
9426                        {
9427                                final Electronics E=(Electronics)me;
9428                                E.setManufacturerName(prompt(mob, E.getManufacturerName(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Manufacturer"));
9429                                E.setPowerCapacity(prompt(mob, E.powerCapacity(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Pow Capacity"));
9430                                E.setPowerRemaining(prompt(mob, E.powerRemaining(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Pow Remaining"));
9431                                E.activate(prompt(mob, E.activated(), ++showNumber, showFlag, "Activated"));
9432                        }
9433                        genRejuv(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9434                        if(((!(me instanceof AmmunitionWeapon)) || (!((AmmunitionWeapon)me).requiresAmmunition()))
9435                        &&(!(me instanceof Wand)))
9436                                genCondition(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9437                        genAbility(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9438                        genSecretIdentity(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9439                        if(me instanceof ClanItem)
9440                                genClanItem(mob,(ClanItem)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9441                        genGettable(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9442                        genValue(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9443                        genWeight(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9444                        genDisposition(mob,me.basePhyStats(),++showNumber,showFlag);
9445                        genBehaviors(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9446                        genAffects(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9447                        genImage(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9448                        for(int x=me.getSaveStatIndex();x<me.getStatCodes().length;x++)
9449                                me.setStat(me.getStatCodes()[x],prompt(mob,me.getStat(me.getStatCodes()[x]),++showNumber,showFlag,CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(me.getStatCodes()[x])));
9450
9451                        if (showFlag < -900)
9452                        {
9453                                ok = true;
9454                                break;
9455                        }
9456                        if (showFlag > 0)
9457                        {
9458                                showFlag = -1;
9459                                continue;
9460                        }
9461                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
9462                        if(showFlag<=0)
9463                        {
9464                                showFlag=-1;
9465                                ok=true;
9466                        }
9467                }
9468                if(showFlag != -950)
9469                {
9470                        me.recoverPhyStats();
9471                        if(me.text().length()>=maxLength)
9472                                mob.tell(L("\n\rThe data entered exceeds the string limit of @x1 characters.",""+maxLength));
9473                }
9474        }
9475
9476        protected void modifyGenArmor(final MOB mob, final Armor me, int showFlag)
9477                throws IOException
9478        {
9479                if(mob.isMonster())
9480                        return;
9481                boolean ok=false;
9482                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
9483                        showFlag=-999;
9484                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
9485                {
9486                        int showNumber=0;
9487                        if(showFlag<0)
9488                                mob.tell(L("*. Class: @x1",me.ID()));
9489                        genName(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9490                        genDisplayText(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9491                        genDescription(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9492                        final int oldLevel = me.basePhyStats().level();
9493                        genLevel(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9494                        if(me.basePhyStats().level() != oldLevel)
9495                                CMLib.itemBuilder().balanceItemByLevel(me);
9496                        genMaterialCode(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9497                        genWornLocation(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9498                        genLayer(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9499                        genRejuv(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9500                        genArmor(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9501                        if(me.subjectToWearAndTear())
9502                                genCondition(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9503                        else
9504                                genUses(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9505                        genAbility(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9506                        genSecretIdentity(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9507                        if(me instanceof ClanItem)
9508                                genClanItem(mob,(ClanItem)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9509                        genGettable(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9510                        if(me instanceof Container)
9511                        {
9512                                genCapacity(mob,(Container)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9513                                if(!(me instanceof Electronics))
9514                                {
9515                                        genContainerTypes(mob,(Container)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9516                                }
9517                                if(me.ID().equalsIgnoreCase("GenCloak"))
9518                                        me.setStat("READABLETEXT", prompt(mob,me.getStat("READABLETEXT"),++showNumber,showFlag,L("Cloak Name")));
9519                                else
9520                                        genDoorsNLocks(mob,(Container)me,L("lid"),++showNumber,showFlag);
9521                        }
9522                        //genReadable1(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag); // since they can have keys, no readability for you.
9523                        //genReadable2(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9524                        if(me instanceof Light)
9525                                genBurnout(mob,(Light)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9526                        genValue(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9527                        genWeight(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9528                        if(me instanceof Container) // because thin armor doesn't care about size
9529                                genSize(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9530                        genDisposition(mob,me.basePhyStats(),++showNumber,showFlag);
9531                        genBehaviors(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9532                        genAffects(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9533                        genImage(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9534                        for(int x=me.getSaveStatIndex();x<me.getStatCodes().length;x++)
9535                                me.setStat(me.getStatCodes()[x],prompt(mob,me.getStat(me.getStatCodes()[x]),++showNumber,showFlag,CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(me.getStatCodes()[x])));
9536
9537                        if (showFlag < -900)
9538                        {
9539                                ok = true;
9540                                break;
9541                        }
9542                        if (showFlag > 0)
9543                        {
9544                                showFlag = -1;
9545                                continue;
9546                        }
9547                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
9548                        if(showFlag<=0)
9549                        {
9550                                showFlag=-1;
9551                                ok=true;
9552                        }
9553                }
9554                if(showFlag != -950)
9555                {
9556                        me.recoverPhyStats();
9557                        if(me.text().length()>=maxLength)
9558                                mob.tell(L("\n\rThe data entered exceeds the string limit of @x1 characters.",""+maxLength));
9559                }
9560        }
9561
9562        protected void modifyGenInstrument(final MOB mob, final MusicalInstrument me, int showFlag)
9563                throws IOException
9564        {
9565                if(mob.isMonster())
9566                        return;
9567                boolean ok=false;
9568                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
9569                        showFlag=-999;
9570                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
9571                {
9572                        int showNumber=0;
9573                        if(showFlag<0)
9574                                mob.tell(L("*. Class: @x1",me.ID()));
9575                        genName(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9576                        genDisplayText(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9577                        genDescription(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9578                        genLevel(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9579                        genMaterialCode(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9580                        genWornLocation(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9581                        genRejuv(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9582                        genAbility(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9583                        genSecretIdentity(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9584                        genGettable(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9585                        genInstrumentType(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9586                        genValue(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9587                        genWeight(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9588                        genDisposition(mob,me.basePhyStats(),++showNumber,showFlag);
9589                        genBehaviors(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9590                        genAffects(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9591                        genImage(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9592                        for(int x=me.getSaveStatIndex();x<me.getStatCodes().length;x++)
9593                                me.setStat(me.getStatCodes()[x],prompt(mob,me.getStat(me.getStatCodes()[x]),++showNumber,showFlag,CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(me.getStatCodes()[x])));
9594
9595                        if (showFlag < -900)
9596                        {
9597                                ok = true;
9598                                break;
9599                        }
9600                        if (showFlag > 0)
9601                        {
9602                                showFlag = -1;
9603                                continue;
9604                        }
9605                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
9606                        if(showFlag<=0)
9607                        {
9608                                showFlag=-1;
9609                                ok=true;
9610                        }
9611                }
9612                if(showFlag != -950)
9613                {
9614                        me.recoverPhyStats();
9615                        if(me.text().length()>=maxLength)
9616                                mob.tell(L("\n\rThe data entered exceeds the string limit of @x1 characters.",""+maxLength));
9617                }
9618        }
9619
9620        @Override
9621        public void modifyGenExit(final MOB mob, final Exit me, int showFlag)
9622                throws IOException
9623        {
9624                if(mob.isMonster())
9625                        return;
9626                boolean ok=false;
9627                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
9628                        showFlag=-999;
9629                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
9630                {
9631                        int showNumber=0;
9632                        if(showFlag<0)
9633                                mob.tell(L("*. Class: @x1",me.ID()));
9634                        genName(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9635                        genDisplayText(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9636                        genDescription(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9637                        genLevel(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9638                        genDoorsNLocks(mob,me,L("door"),++showNumber,showFlag);
9639                        if(me.hasADoor())
9640                        {
9641                                genClosedText(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9642                                genDoorName(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9643                                genOpenWord(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9644                                genCloseWord(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9645                        }
9646                        genExitMisc(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9647                        genDisposition(mob,me.basePhyStats(),++showNumber,showFlag);
9648                        genBehaviors(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9649                        genAffects(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9650                        genImage(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9651                        for(int x=me.getSaveStatIndex();x<me.getStatCodes().length;x++)
9652                                me.setStat(me.getStatCodes()[x],prompt(mob,me.getStat(me.getStatCodes()[x]),++showNumber,showFlag,CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(me.getStatCodes()[x])));
9653
9654                        if (showFlag < -900)
9655                        {
9656                                ok = true;
9657                                break;
9658                        }
9659                        if (showFlag > 0)
9660                        {
9661                                showFlag = -1;
9662                                continue;
9663                        }
9664                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
9665                        if(showFlag<=0)
9666                        {
9667                                showFlag=-1;
9668                                ok=true;
9669                        }
9670                }
9671                if(showFlag != -950)
9672                {
9673                        me.recoverPhyStats();
9674                        if(me.text().length()>=maxLength)
9675                                mob.tell(L("\n\rThe data entered exceeds the string limit of @x1 characters.",""+maxLength));
9676                }
9677        }
9678
9679        protected MOB possibleCatalogSwap(final MOB editorMOB, final MOB me) throws IOException
9680        {
9681                if(!CMLib.flags().isCataloged(me))
9682                        return me;
9683                final MOB cataM=CMLib.catalog().getCatalogMob(me.Name());
9684                if(cataM!=null)
9685                {
9686                        final Session session = editorMOB.session();
9687                        for(final Enumeration<Item> i=cataM.items();i.hasMoreElements();)
9688                        {
9689                                final Item I=i.nextElement();
9690                                if((I!=null)&&(I.basePhyStats().rejuv()>0)&&(I.basePhyStats().rejuv()!=PhyStats.NO_REJUV)&&(session!=null))
9691                                {
9692                                        if(session.confirm(L("\n\r**This mob has variable equipment in the catalog, would you like to reset it first (Y/n)? "),"Y"))
9693                                        {
9694                                                CMLib.coffeeMaker().setPropertiesStr(me, cataM.text(),false);
9695                                                CMLib.catalog().changeCatalogUsage(me, true);
9696                                                break;
9697                                        }
9698                                }
9699                        }
9700                }
9701                return me;
9702        }
9703
9704        protected void modifyGenMOB(final MOB mob, final MOB me, int showFlag)
9705                throws IOException
9706        {
9707                if(mob.isMonster())
9708                        return;
9709                possibleCatalogSwap(mob,me);
9710                boolean ok=false;
9711                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
9712                        showFlag=-999;
9713                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
9714                {
9715                        int showNumber=0;
9716                        if(showFlag<0)
9717                                mob.tell(L("*. Class: @x1",me.ID()));
9718                        genName(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9719                        genDisplayText(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9720                        genDescription(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9721                        final int oldLevel=me.basePhyStats().level();
9722                        genLevel(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9723                        if((oldLevel<2)&&(me.basePhyStats().level()>1))
9724                        {
9725                                CMLib.leveler().fillOutMOB(me,me.basePhyStats().level());
9726                                mob.tell("^ZCombat stats rescored.^.^N");
9727                        }
9728                        genRejuv(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9729                        genRace(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9730                        CMLib.factions().updatePlayerFactions(me,me.location(), false);
9731                        Faction F=null;
9732                        for(final Enumeration<Faction> e=CMLib.factions().factions();e.hasMoreElements();)
9733                        {
9734                                F=e.nextElement();
9735                                if(F.showInEditor())
9736                                        genSpecialFaction(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,F);
9737                        }
9738                        genGender(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9739                        genHeight(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9740                        genWeight(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9741                        genClan(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9742                        genSpeed(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9743                        genAttack(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9744                        genDamage(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9745                        genArmor(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9746                        genHitPoints(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9747                        genMoney(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9748                        me.setMoneyVariation(CMath.s_double(prompt(mob,""+me.getMoneyVariation(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Money Variation")));
9749                        genAbilities(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9750                        genBehaviors(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9751                        genAffects(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9752                        genDisposition(mob,me.basePhyStats(),++showNumber,showFlag);
9753                        genSensesMask(mob,me.basePhyStats(),++showNumber,showFlag);
9754                        if(me instanceof Rideable)
9755                        {
9756                                genRideable1(mob,(Rideable)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9757                                genRideable2(mob,(Rideable)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9758                                genMountText(mob,(Rideable)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9759                                genMountText2(mob,(Rideable)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9760                        }
9761                        if(me instanceof Drink)
9762                        {
9763                                genThirstQuenched(mob,(Drink)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9764                                genDrinkHeld(mob,(Drink)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9765                                genDrinkType(mob, (Drink)me, ++showNumber, showFlag);
9766                        }
9767                        if(me instanceof Deity)
9768                        {
9769                                genDeity1(mob,(Deity)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9770                                genDeity2(mob,(Deity)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9771                                genDeity3(mob,(Deity)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9772                                genDeity4(mob,(Deity)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9773                                genDeity5(mob,(Deity)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9774                                genDeity8(mob,(Deity)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9775                                genDeity9(mob,(Deity)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9776                                genDeity6(mob,(Deity)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9777                                genDeity0(mob,(Deity)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9778                                genDeity7(mob,(Deity)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9779                                genDeity11(mob,(Deity)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9780                        }
9781                        genFaction(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9782                        genTattoos(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9783                        genExpertises(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9784                        genImage(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9785                        for(int x=me.getSaveStatIndex();x<me.getStatCodes().length;x++)
9786                                me.setStat(me.getStatCodes()[x],prompt(mob,me.getStat(me.getStatCodes()[x]),++showNumber,showFlag,CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(me.getStatCodes()[x])));
9787
9788                        if (showFlag < -900)
9789                        {
9790                                ok = true;
9791                                break;
9792                        }
9793                        if (showFlag > 0)
9794                        {
9795                                showFlag = -1;
9796                                continue;
9797                        }
9798                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
9799                        if(showFlag<=0)
9800                        {
9801                                showFlag=-1;
9802                                ok=true;
9803                        }
9804                }
9805                if(showFlag != -950)
9806                {
9807                        me.recoverCharStats();
9808                        me.recoverMaxState();
9809                        me.recoverPhyStats();
9810                        me.resetToMaxState();
9811                        if(me.text().length()>=maxLength)
9812                                mob.tell(L("\n\rThe data entered exceeds the string limit of @x1 characters.",""+maxLength));
9813                }
9814        }
9815
9816        @Override
9817        public void modifyPlayer(final MOB mob, final MOB me, int showFlag) throws IOException
9818        {
9819                if(mob.isMonster())
9820                        return;
9821                boolean ok=false;
9822                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
9823                        showFlag=-999;
9824                final String oldName=me.Name();
9825                if(CMProps.isUsingAccountSystem())
9826                        mob.tell(L("*. Account: '@x1'.",((me.playerStats()!=null)&&(me.playerStats().getAccount()!=null))?me.playerStats().getAccount().getAccountName():L("None")));
9827                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
9828                {
9829                        int showNumber=0;
9830                        genName(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9831                        String newName=CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(me.Name());
9832                        me.setName(oldName);
9833                        while(
9834                        (!newName.equals(oldName))
9835                        &&(CMLib.players().playerExists(newName))
9836                        &&(mob.session()!=null)
9837                        &&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
9838                        {
9839                                mob.tell(L("The name given cannot be chosen, as it is already being used."));
9840                                genName(mob,me,showNumber,showNumber); // showNumber twice to force the issue
9841                                newName=CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(me.Name());
9842                                me.setName(oldName);
9843                        }
9844                        me.setName(newName);
9845
9846                        if(CMProps.isUsingAccountSystem())
9847                        {
9848                                final String oldAccountName = ((me.playerStats()!=null)&&(me.playerStats().getAccount()!=null))?me.playerStats().getAccount().getAccountName():"";
9849                                String accountName =CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(prompt(mob,oldAccountName,++showNumber,showFlag,"Account",true,false,null));
9850                                while((!accountName.equals(oldAccountName))&&(CMLib.players().getLoadAccount(accountName)==null)
9851                                &&(mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
9852                                {
9853                                        mob.tell(L("The account can not be used, as it does not exist."));
9854                                        accountName =CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(prompt(mob,oldAccountName,showNumber,showFlag,"Account",true,false,null));
9855                                }
9856                                if(!oldAccountName.equals(accountName))
9857                                {
9858                                        final PlayerAccount newAccount = CMLib.players().getLoadAccount(accountName);
9859                                        me.playerStats().setAccount(newAccount);
9860                                        newAccount.addNewPlayer(me);
9861                                        final PlayerAccount oldAccount = CMLib.players().getLoadAccount(oldAccountName);
9862                                        if(oldAccount!=null)
9863                                        {
9864                                                oldAccount.delPlayer(me);
9865                                                CMLib.database().DBUpdateAccount(oldAccount);
9866                                        }
9867                                }
9868                                if(CMProps.getBoolVar(CMProps.Bool.ACCOUNTEXPIRATION))
9869                                        genAccountExpiration(mob,me.playerStats().getAccount(),++showNumber,showFlag);
9870                        }
9871                        else
9872                        if(CMProps.getBoolVar(CMProps.Bool.ACCOUNTEXPIRATION))
9873                                genAccountExpiration(mob,me.playerStats(),++showNumber,showFlag);
9874                        genPassword(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9875
9876                        genDescription(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9877                        genLevel(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9878                        genRace(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9879                        genCharClass(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9880                        genCharStats(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9881                        genCharState(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9882                        CMLib.factions().updatePlayerFactions(me,me.location(), false);
9883                        Faction F=null;
9884                        for(final Enumeration<Faction> e=CMLib.factions().factions();e.hasMoreElements();)
9885                        {
9886                                F=e.nextElement();
9887                                if(F.showInEditor())
9888                                        genSpecialFaction(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag,F);
9889                        }
9890                        genGender(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9891                        genHeight(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9892                        genWeight(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9893                        genClan(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9894                        genDeity(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9895                        genSpeed(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9896                        genAttack(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9897                        genDamage(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9898                        genArmor(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9899                        genTPQ(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9900                        final PlayerStats pStats = me.playerStats();
9901                        if(pStats != null)
9902                                genCommonBonus(mob,pStats,++showNumber,showFlag);
9903                        genAbilities(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9904                        genAffects(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9905                        genBehaviors(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9906                        genDisposition(mob,me.basePhyStats(),++showNumber,showFlag);
9907                        genSensesMask(mob,me.basePhyStats(),++showNumber,showFlag);
9908                        if(me instanceof Rideable)
9909                        {
9910                                genRideable1(mob,(Rideable)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9911                                genRideable2(mob,(Rideable)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9912                                genMountText(mob,(Rideable)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9913                                genMountText2(mob,(Rideable)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9914                        }
9915                        genFaction(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9916                        genTattoos(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9917                        genExpertises(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9918                        genTitles(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9919                        genBirthday(mob,me.playerStats(),++showNumber,showFlag);
9920                        genEmail(mob,me.playerStats(),++showNumber,showFlag);
9921                        genSecurity(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9922                        genImage(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9923                        genScripts(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9924                        genNotes(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
9925                        for(int x=me.getSaveStatIndex();x<me.getStatCodes().length;x++)
9926                                me.setStat(me.getStatCodes()[x],prompt(mob,me.getStat(me.getStatCodes()[x]),++showNumber,showFlag,CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(me.getStatCodes()[x])));
9927                        if(me.playerStats()!=null)
9928                        for(int x=me.playerStats().getSaveStatIndex();x<me.playerStats().getStatCodes().length;x++)
9929                                me.playerStats().setStat(me.playerStats().getStatCodes()[x],prompt(mob,me.playerStats().getStat(me.playerStats().getStatCodes()[x]),++showNumber,showFlag,CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(me.playerStats().getStatCodes()[x])));
9930
9931                        if (showFlag < -900)
9932                        {
9933                                ok = true;
9934                                break;
9935                        }
9936                        if (showFlag > 0)
9937                        {
9938                                showFlag = -1;
9939                                continue;
9940                        }
9941                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
9942                        if(showFlag<=0)
9943                        {
9944                                showFlag=-1;
9945                                ok=true;
9946                        }
9947                }
9948                if(showFlag >= -900)
9949                {
9950                        me.recoverCharStats();
9951                        me.recoverMaxState();
9952                        me.recoverPhyStats();
9953                        me.resetToMaxState();
9954                        if(!oldName.equals(me.Name()))
9955                        {
9956                                if(mob.session()!=null)
9957                                        mob.session().print(L("Changing player name..."));
9958                                CMLib.players().renamePlayer(me, oldName);
9959                                if(mob.session()!=null)
9960                                        mob.session().println(".");
9961                                Log.sysOut("CMGenEditor",mob.Name()+" changed user "+oldName+" to "+me.name());
9962                        }
9963                        Log.sysOut("CMGenEditor",mob.Name()+" edited user "+me.name());
9964                        CMLib.database().DBUpdatePlayer(me);
9965                        CMLib.database().DBUpdateFollowers(me);
9966                }
9967        }
9968
9969        protected void genClanStatus(final MOB mob, final Clan C, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
9970        {
9971                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
9972                        return;
9973                mob.tell(L("@x1. Clan Status: @x2",""+showNumber,Clan.CLANSTATUS_DESC[C.getStatus()]));
9974                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
9975                        return;
9976                switch(C.getStatus())
9977                {
9978                case Clan.CLANSTATUS_ACTIVE:
9979                        C.setStatus(Clan.CLANSTATUS_PENDING);
9980                        mob.tell(L("Clan '@x1' has been changed from active to pending!",C.name()));
9981                        break;
9982                case Clan.CLANSTATUS_PENDING:
9983                        C.setStatus(Clan.CLANSTATUS_ACTIVE);
9984                        mob.tell(L("Clan '@x1' has been changed from pending to active!",C.name()));
9985                        break;
9986                case Clan.CLANSTATUS_FADING:
9987                        C.setStatus(Clan.CLANSTATUS_ACTIVE);
9988                        mob.tell(L("Clan '@x1' has been changed from fading to active!",C.name()));
9989                        break;
9990                default:
9991                        mob.tell(L("Clan '@x1' has not been changed!",C.name()));
9992                        break;
9993                }
9994        }
9995
9996        protected void genClanGovt(final MOB mob, final Clan C, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
9997        throws IOException
9998        {
9999                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
10000                        return;
10001                mob.tell(L("@x1. Government type: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,C.getGovernmentName()));
10002                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
10003                        return;
10004                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
10005                {
10006                        final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new one (?)\n\r:"),"");
10007                        if(newName.trim().length()==0)
10008                        {
10009                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
10010                                return;
10011                        }
10012                        int newGovt=-1;
10013                        StringBuffer gvts=new StringBuffer();
10014                        for(final ClanGovernment gvt : CMLib.clans().getStockGovernments())
10015                        {
10016                                gvts.append(gvt.getName()+", ");
10017                                if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase(gvt.getName()))
10018                                        newGovt=gvt.getID();
10019                        }
10020                        gvts=new StringBuffer(gvts.substring(0,gvts.length()-2));
10021                        if(newGovt<0)
10022                                mob.tell(L("That government type is invalid.  Valid types include: @x1",gvts.toString()));
10023                        else
10024                        {
10025                                C.setGovernmentID(newGovt);
10026                                break;
10027                        }
10028                }
10029        }
10030
10031        protected double genAuctionPrompt(final MOB mob, final double oldVal, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String msg, final boolean pct)
10032        throws IOException
10033        {
10034                final String oldStr=(oldVal<0)?"":(pct?""+(oldVal*100.0)+"%":""+oldVal);
10035                final String newStr=prompt(mob,oldStr,showNumber,showFlag,msg);
10036                if(newStr.trim().length()==0)
10037                        return -1.0;
10038                if((pct)&&(!CMath.isPct(newStr))&&(!CMath.isNumber(newStr)))
10039                        return -1.0;
10040                else
10041                if((!pct)&&(!CMath.isNumber(newStr)))
10042                        return -1.0;
10043                if(pct)
10044                        return CMath.s_pct(newStr);
10045                return CMath.s_double(newStr);
10046        }
10047
10048        protected int genAuctionPrompt(final MOB mob, final int oldVal, final int showNumber, final int showFlag, final String msg)
10049        throws IOException
10050        {
10051                final String oldStr=(oldVal<0)?"":""+oldVal;
10052                final String newStr=prompt(mob,oldStr,showNumber,showFlag,msg);
10053                if(newStr.trim().length()==0)
10054                        return -1;
10055                if(!CMath.isNumber(newStr))
10056                        return -1;
10057                return CMath.s_int(newStr);
10058        }
10059
10060        protected void genClanRole(final MOB mob, final Clan C, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
10061        throws IOException
10062        {
10063                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
10064                        return;
10065                mob.tell(L("@x1. Apply Role: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,C.getRoleName(C.getAutoPosition(),true,false)));
10066                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
10067                        return;
10068                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
10069                {
10070                        final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new one (?)\n\r:"),"");
10071                        if(newName.trim().length()==0)
10072                        {
10073                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
10074                                return;
10075                        }
10076                        int newRole=-1;
10077                        StringBuffer roles=new StringBuffer();
10078                        for(int i=0;i<C.getRolesList().length;i++)
10079                        {
10080                                roles.append(C.getRolesList()[i]+", ");
10081                                if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase(C.getRolesList()[i]))
10082                                        newRole=i;
10083                        }
10084                        roles=new StringBuffer(roles.substring(0,roles.length()-2));
10085                        if(newRole<0)
10086                                mob.tell(L("That role is invalid.  Valid roles include: @x1",roles.toString()));
10087                        else
10088                        {
10089                                C.setAutoPosition(newRole);
10090                                break;
10091                        }
10092                }
10093        }
10094
10095        protected void genClanClass(final MOB mob, final Clan C, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
10096        throws IOException
10097        {
10098                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
10099                        return;
10100                CharClass CC=CMClass.getCharClass(C.getClanClass());
10101                if(CC==null)
10102                        CC=CMClass.findCharClass(C.getClanClass());
10103                final String clasName=(CC==null)?"NONE":CC.name();
10104                mob.tell(L("@x1. Clan Auto-Class: '@x2'.",""+showNumber,clasName));
10105                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
10106                        return;
10107                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
10108                {
10109                        final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new one (?)\n\r:"),"");
10110                        if(newName.trim().equalsIgnoreCase("none"))
10111                        {
10112                                C.setClanClass("");
10113                                return;
10114                        }
10115                        else
10116                        if(newName.trim().length()==0)
10117                        {
10118                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
10119                                return;
10120                        }
10121                        CharClass newC=null;
10122                        StringBuffer clss=new StringBuffer();
10123                        for(final Enumeration<CharClass> e=CMClass.charClasses();e.hasMoreElements();)
10124                        {
10125                                CC=e.nextElement();
10126                                clss.append(CC.name()+", ");
10127                                if(newName.equalsIgnoreCase(CC.name())||(newName.equalsIgnoreCase(CC.ID())))
10128                                        newC=CC;
10129                        }
10130                        clss=new StringBuffer(clss.substring(0,clss.length()-2));
10131                        if((newC==null)||(newC.availabilityCode()==0))
10132                                mob.tell(L("That class name is invalid.  Valid names include: @x1",clss.toString()));
10133                        else
10134                        {
10135                                C.setClanClass(newC.ID());
10136                                break;
10137                        }
10138                }
10139        }
10140
10141        protected String genClanRoom(final MOB mob, final Clan C, final String oldRoomID, final String promptCode, final int showNumber, final int showFlag)
10142        throws IOException
10143        {
10144                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
10145                        return oldRoomID;
10146                mob.tell(showNumber+CMStrings.replaceAll(promptCode,"@x1",oldRoomID));
10147                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
10148                        return oldRoomID;
10149                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
10150                {
10151                        final String newName=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new one (null)\n\r:"),"");
10152                        if(newName.trim().equalsIgnoreCase("null"))
10153                                return "";
10154                        else
10155                        if(newName.trim().length()==0)
10156                        {
10157                                mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
10158                                return oldRoomID;
10159                        }
10160                        final Room newRoom=CMLib.map().getRoom(newName);
10161                        if((newRoom==null)
10162                        ||(CMLib.map().getExtendedRoomID(newRoom).length()==0)
10163                        ||(!CMLib.law().doesOwnThisProperty(C.clanID(),newRoom)))
10164                                mob.tell(L("That is either not a valid room id, or that room is not owned by the clan."));
10165                        else
10166                                return CMLib.map().getExtendedRoomID(newRoom);
10167                }
10168                return oldRoomID;
10169        }
10170
10171        @Override
10172        public void modifyClan(final MOB mob, final Clan C, int showFlag)
10173        throws IOException
10174        {
10175                if(mob.isMonster())
10176                        return;
10177                boolean ok=false;
10178                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
10179                        showFlag=-999;
10180                final String oldName=C.ID();
10181                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
10182                {
10183                        mob.tell(L("*. Name: '@x1'.",C.name()));
10184                        int showNumber=0;
10185                        genClanGovt(mob,C,++showNumber,showFlag);
10186                        C.setCategory(prompt(mob,C.getCategory(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Category",true));
10187                        C.setPremise(prompt(mob,C.getPremise(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Clan Premise",true));
10188                        C.setMinClanMembers(prompt(mob,C.getMinClanMembers(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Minimum members"));
10189                        C.setExp(prompt(mob,C.getExp(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Clan Experience"));
10190                        C.setTaxes(prompt(mob,C.getTaxes(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Clan Tax Rate (X 100%)"));
10191                        C.setMorgue(genClanRoom(mob,C,C.getMorgue(),". Morgue RoomID: '@x1'.",++showNumber,showFlag));
10192                        C.setRecall(genClanRoom(mob,C,C.getRecall(),". Clan Home RoomID: '@x1'.",++showNumber,showFlag));
10193                        C.setDonation(genClanRoom(mob,C,C.getDonation(),". Clan Donate RoomID: '@x1'.",++showNumber,showFlag));
10194                        genClanAccept(mob,C,++showNumber,showFlag);
10195                        genClanClass(mob,C,++showNumber,showFlag);
10196                        genClanRole(mob,C,++showNumber,showFlag);
10197                        genClanStatus(mob,C,++showNumber,showFlag);
10198                        C.setRivalrous(prompt(mob,C.isRivalrous(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Rivalrous Clan"));
10199                        genClanMembers(mob,C,++showNumber,showFlag);
10200
10201                        /*setClanRelations, votes?*/
10202                        if (showFlag < -900)
10203                        {
10204                                ok = true;
10205                                break;
10206                        }
10207                        if (showFlag > 0)
10208                        {
10209                                showFlag = -1;
10210                                continue;
10211                        }
10212                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
10213                        if(showFlag<=0)
10214                        {
10215                                showFlag=-1;
10216                                ok=true;
10217                        }
10218                }
10219                if(!oldName.equals(C.ID()))
10220                {
10221                        //cycle through everything changing the name
10222                        CMLib.database().DBDeleteClan(C);
10223                        CMLib.database().DBCreateClan(C);
10224                }
10225                C.update();
10226        }
10227
10228        protected void modifyGenShopkeeper(final MOB mob, final ShopKeeper me, int showFlag)
10229                throws IOException
10230        {
10231                if(mob.isMonster())
10232                        return;
10233                if(!(me instanceof MOB))
10234                        return;
10235                final MOB M=(MOB)me;
10236                possibleCatalogSwap(mob,M);
10237                boolean ok=false;
10238                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
10239                        showFlag=-999;
10240                while((mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped())&&(!ok))
10241                {
10242                        int showNumber=0;
10243                        if(showFlag<0)
10244                                mob.tell(L("*. Class: @x1",me.ID()));
10245                        genName(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
10246                        genDisplayText(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
10247                        genDescription(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
10248                        final int oldLevel=M.basePhyStats().level();
10249                        genLevel(mob,M,++showNumber,showFlag);
10250                        if((oldLevel<2)&&(M.basePhyStats().level()>1))
10251                        {
10252                                CMLib.leveler().fillOutMOB(M,M.basePhyStats().level());
10253                                mob.tell("^ZCombat stats rescored.^.^N");
10254                        }
