10255                        genRejuv(mob,M,++showNumber,showFlag);
10256                        genRace(mob,M,++showNumber,showFlag);
10257                        genHeight(mob,M,++showNumber,showFlag);
10258                        genWeight(mob,M,++showNumber,showFlag);
10259                        CMLib.factions().updatePlayerFactions(M,(M).location(), false);
10260                        Faction F=null;
10261                        for(final Enumeration<Faction> e=CMLib.factions().factions();e.hasMoreElements();)
10262                        {
10263                                F=e.nextElement();
10264                                if(F.showInEditor())
10265                                        genSpecialFaction(mob,M,++showNumber,showFlag,F);
10266                        }
10267                        genGender(mob,M,++showNumber,showFlag);
10268                        genClan(mob,M,++showNumber,showFlag);
10269                        genSpeed(mob,M,++showNumber,showFlag);
10270                        if((oldLevel<2)&&(M.basePhyStats().level()>1))
10271                                M.basePhyStats().setDamage((int)Math.round(CMath.div(M.basePhyStats().damage(),M.basePhyStats().speed())));
10272                        genAttack(mob,M,++showNumber,showFlag);
10273                        genDamage(mob,M,++showNumber,showFlag);
10274                        genArmor(mob,M,++showNumber,showFlag);
10275                        if(me instanceof MOB)
10276                                genHitPoints(mob,M,++showNumber,showFlag);
10277                        genMoney(mob,M,++showNumber,showFlag);
10278                        M.setMoneyVariation(CMath.s_double(prompt(mob,""+M.getMoneyVariation(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Money Variation")));
10279                        genAbilities(mob,M,++showNumber,showFlag);
10280                        if(me instanceof PhysicalAgent)
10281                                genBehaviors(mob,(PhysicalAgent)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
10282                        genAffects(mob,M,++showNumber,showFlag);
10283                        if(!(me instanceof Auctioneer))
10284                        {
10285                                genShopkeeper1(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
10286                                me.setWhatIsSoldZappermask(prompt(mob,me.getWhatIsSoldZappermask(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Item Buy Mask (?)", true, CMLib.masking().maskHelp("\n\r", "disallow")));
10287                                genShopkeeper2(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
10288                                genEconomics1(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
10289                                genEconomics5(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
10290                        }
10291                        genEconomics6(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
10292                        if(me instanceof Banker)
10293                        {
10294                                genBanker1(mob,(Banker)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
10295                                genBanker2(mob,(Banker)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
10296                                genBanker3(mob,(Banker)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
10297                                genBanker4(mob,(Banker)me,++showNumber,showFlag);
10298                        }
10299                        else
10300                        if(me instanceof PostOffice)
10301                        {
10302                                ((PostOffice)me).setPostalChain(prompt(mob,((PostOffice)me).postalChain(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Postal chain"));
10303                                ((PostOffice)me).setFeeForNewBox(prompt(mob,((PostOffice)me).feeForNewBox(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Fee to open a new box"));
10304                                ((PostOffice)me).setMinimumPostage(prompt(mob,((PostOffice)me).minimumPostage(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Minimum postage cost"));
10305                                ((PostOffice)me).setPostagePerPound(prompt(mob,((PostOffice)me).postagePerPound(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Postage cost per pound after 1st pound"));
10306                                ((PostOffice)me).setHoldFeePerPound(prompt(mob,((PostOffice)me).holdFeePerPound(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Holding fee per pound per month"));
10307                                ((PostOffice)me).setMaxMudMonthsHeld(prompt(mob,((PostOffice)me).maxMudMonthsHeld(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Maximum number of months held"));
10308                        }
10309                        else
10310                        if(me instanceof Librarian)
10311                        {
10312                                ((Librarian)me).setLibraryChain(prompt(mob,((Librarian)me).libraryChain(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Library name"));
10313                                ((Librarian)me).setMaxBorrowed(prompt(mob,((Librarian)me).getMaxBorrowed(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Max borrowed"));
10314                                ((Librarian)me).setMinOverdueDays(prompt(mob,((Librarian)me).getMinOverdueDays(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Overdue mud-days"));
10315                                ((Librarian)me).setMaxOverdueDays(prompt(mob,((Librarian)me).getMaxOverdueDays(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Reclaim mud-days"));
10316                                ((Librarian)me).setOverdueCharge(prompt(mob,((Librarian)me).getOverdueCharge(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Overdue charge"));
10317                                ((Librarian)me).setOverdueChargePct(CMath.s_pct(prompt(mob,CMath.toPct(((Librarian)me).getOverdueChargePct()),++showNumber,showFlag,"Overdue charge pct")));
10318                                ((Librarian)me).setDailyOverdueCharge(prompt(mob,((Librarian)me).getDailyOverdueCharge(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Daily overdue charge"));
10319                                ((Librarian)me).setDailyOverdueChargePct(CMath.s_pct(prompt(mob,CMath.toPct(((Librarian)me).getDailyOverdueChargePct()),++showNumber,showFlag,"Daily overdue charge pct")));
10320                        }
10321                        else
10322                        if(me instanceof Auctioneer)
10323                        {
10324                                ((Auctioneer)me).setAuctionHouse(prompt(mob,((Auctioneer)me).auctionHouse(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Auction house"));
10325                                ((Auctioneer)me).setTimedListingPrice(genAuctionPrompt(mob,((Auctioneer)me).timedListingPrice(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Flat fee per auction",false));
10326                                ((Auctioneer)me).setTimedListingPct(genAuctionPrompt(mob,((Auctioneer)me).timedListingPct(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Listing Cut/%Pct per day",true));
10327                                ((Auctioneer)me).setTimedFinalCutPct(genAuctionPrompt(mob,((Auctioneer)me).timedFinalCutPct(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Cut/%Pct of final price",true));
10328                                ((Auctioneer)me).setMaxTimedAuctionDays(genAuctionPrompt(mob,((Auctioneer)me).maxTimedAuctionDays(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Maximum number of auction mud-days"));
10329                                ((Auctioneer)me).setMinTimedAuctionDays(genAuctionPrompt(mob,((Auctioneer)me).minTimedAuctionDays(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Minimum number of auction mud-days"));
10330                        }
10331                        else
10332                        {
10333                                genEconomics2(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
10334                                genEconomics3(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
10335                                genEconomics4(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
10336                        }
10337                        genDisposition(mob,M.basePhyStats(),++showNumber,showFlag);
10338                        genSensesMask(mob,M.basePhyStats(),++showNumber,showFlag);
10339                        genFaction(mob,M,++showNumber,showFlag);
10340                        genTattoos(mob,M,++showNumber,showFlag);
10341                        genExpertises(mob,M,++showNumber,showFlag);
10342                        genImage(mob,me,++showNumber,showFlag);
10343                        for(int x=me.getSaveStatIndex();x<me.getStatCodes().length;x++)
10344                                me.setStat(me.getStatCodes()[x],prompt(mob,me.getStat(me.getStatCodes()[x]),++showNumber,showFlag,CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(me.getStatCodes()[x])));
10345
10346                        if (showFlag < -900)
10347                        {
10348                                ok = true;
10349                                break;
10350                        }
10351                        if (showFlag > 0)
10352                        {
10353                                showFlag = -1;
10354                                continue;
10355                        }
10356                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
10357                        if(showFlag<=0)
10358                        {
10359                                showFlag=-1;
10360                                ok=true;
10361                        }
10362                }
10363                if(showFlag != -950)
10364                {
10365                        M.recoverCharStats();
10366                        M.recoverMaxState();
10367                        M.recoverPhyStats();
10368                        M.resetToMaxState();
10369                        if(me.text().length()>=maxLength)
10370                                mob.tell(L("\n\rThe data entered exceeds the string limit of @x1 characters.",""+maxLength));
10371                }
10372        }
10373
10374        @Override
10375        public Room modifyRoom(final MOB mob, Room R, int showFlag) throws IOException
10376        {
10377                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
10378                        showFlag=-999;
10379                boolean ok=false;
10380                while(!ok)
10381                {
10382                        int showNumber=0;
10383                        R=genRoomType(mob,R,++showNumber,showFlag);
10384                        genDisplayText(mob,R,++showNumber,showFlag);
10385                        genDescription(mob,R,++showNumber,showFlag);
10386                        if(R instanceof GridZones)
10387                        {
10388                                genGridLocaleX(mob,(GridZones)R,++showNumber,showFlag);
10389                                genGridLocaleY(mob,(GridZones)R,++showNumber,showFlag);
10390                                //((GridLocale)mob.location()).buildGrid();
10391                        }
10392                        if(R instanceof LocationRoom)
10393                        {
10394                                genLocationCoords(mob,(LocationRoom)R, ++showNumber, showFlag);
10395                        }
10396                        //genClimateType(mob,R,++showNumber,showFlag);
10397                        //R.setAtmosphere(genAnyMaterialCode(mob,"Atmosphere",R.getAtmosphereCode(),true,++showNumber,showFlag));
10398                        genBehaviors(mob,R,++showNumber,showFlag);
10399                        genAffects(mob,R,++showNumber,showFlag);
10400                        for(int x=R.getSaveStatIndex();x<R.getStatCodes().length;x++)
10401                                R.setStat(R.getStatCodes()[x],prompt(mob,R.getStat(R.getStatCodes()[x]),++showNumber,showFlag,CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(R.getStatCodes()[x])));
10402
10403                        if (showFlag < -900)
10404                        {
10405                                ok = true;
10406                                break;
10407                        }
10408                        if (showFlag > 0)
10409                        {
10410                                showFlag = -1;
10411                                continue;
10412                        }
10413                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
10414                        if(showFlag<=0)
10415                        {
10416                                showFlag=-1;
10417                                ok=true;
10418                        }
10419                }
10420                return R;
10421        }
10422
10423        protected void genAccountExpiration(final MOB mob, final AccountStats A, final int showNumber, final int showFlag) throws IOException
10424        {
10425                if((showFlag>0)&&(showFlag!=showNumber))
10426                        return;
10427                mob.tell(L("@x1. Expires: @x2",""+showNumber,CMLib.time().date2String(A.getAccountExpiration())));
10428                if((showFlag!=showNumber)&&(showFlag>-999))
10429                        return;
10430                final String s=mob.session().prompt(L("Enter a new value\n\r:"),"");
10431                if(s.length()>0)
10432                        A.setAccountExpiration(CMLib.time().string2Millis(s));
10433                else
10434                        mob.tell(L("(no change)"));
10435        }
10436
10437        @Override
10438        public void modifyAccount(final MOB mob, final PlayerAccount A, int showFlag) throws IOException
10439        {
10440                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
10441                        showFlag=-999;
10442                boolean ok=false;
10443                while(!ok)
10444                {
10445                        int showNumber=0;
10446                        String acctName=CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(prompt(mob,A.getAccountName(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Name",true,false,null));
10447                        while((!acctName.equals(A.getAccountName()))
10448                        &&(CMLib.players().getLoadAccount(acctName)!=null)
10449                        &&(mob.session()!=null)&&(!mob.session().isStopped()))
10450                        {
10451                                mob.tell(L("The name given cannot be chosen, as it is already being used."));
10452                                acctName=CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(prompt(mob,acctName,showNumber,showNumber,"Name",true,false,null));
10453                        }
10454                        A.setAccountName(acctName);
10455                        genEmail(mob, A, ++showNumber, showFlag);
10456                        if(CMProps.getBoolVar(CMProps.Bool.ACCOUNTEXPIRATION))
10457                                genAccountExpiration(mob,A,++showNumber,showFlag);
10458                        promptStatStr(mob,A,PlayerAccount.AccountFlag.getListString(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Flags (?)","FLAGS",true);
10459                        promptStatInt(mob,A,++showNumber,showFlag,L("Bonus Languages: "),"BONUSLANGS");
10460                        promptStatInt(mob,A,++showNumber,showFlag,L("Bonus Char Limit: "),"BONUSCHARLIMIT");
10461                        promptStatInt(mob,A,++showNumber,showFlag,L("Bonus Char Online: "),"BONUSCHARONLINE");
10462                        promptStatInt(mob,A,++showNumber,showFlag,L("Bonus Char Stat Points: "),"BONUSCHARSTATS");
10463                        promptStatInt(mob,A,++showNumber,showFlag,L("Bonus All-Common Skills: "),"BONUSCOMMON");
10464                        promptStatInt(mob,A,++showNumber,showFlag,L("Bonus Crafting Skills: "),"BONUSCRAFT");
10465                        promptStatInt(mob,A,++showNumber,showFlag,L("Bonus Non-Craft Common Skills: "),"BONUSNONCRAFT");
10466                        promptStatStr(mob,A,++showNumber,showFlag,"Notes: ","NOTES");
10467                        genTattoos(mob,A,++showNumber,showFlag);
10468                        for(int x=A.getSaveStatIndex();x<A.getStatCodes().length;x++)
10469                                A.setStat(A.getStatCodes()[x],prompt(mob,A.getStat(A.getStatCodes()[x]),++showNumber,showFlag,CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(A.getStatCodes()[x])));
10470
10471                        if (showFlag < -900)
10472                        {
10473                                ok = true;
10474                                break;
10475                        }
10476                        if (showFlag > 0)
10477                        {
10478                                showFlag = -1;
10479                                continue;
10480                        }
10481                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
10482                        if(showFlag<=0)
10483                        {
10484                                showFlag=-1;
10485                                ok=true;
10486                        }
10487                }
10488        }
10489
10490        @Override
10491        public void modifyStdMob(final MOB mob, final MOB E, int showFlag) throws IOException
10492        {
10493                try
10494                {
10495                        if(E!=mob)
10496                                CMLib.threads().suspendTicking(E, -1);
10497                        if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
10498                                showFlag=-999;
10499                        boolean ok=false;
10500                        while(!ok)
10501                        {
10502                                int showNumber=0;
10503                                if(CMLib.flags().isCataloged(E))
10504                                {
10505                                        if(CMLib.catalog().isCatalogObj(E.Name()))
10506                                                mob.tell(L("*** This object is Cataloged **\n\r"));
10507                                        else
10508                                                mob.tell(L("*** This object WAS cataloged and is still tied **\n\r"));
10509                                }
10510                                if(showFlag<0)
10511                                        mob.tell(L("*. Class: @x1",E.ID()));
10512                                genLevel(mob,E,++showNumber,showFlag);
10513                                genAbility(mob,E,++showNumber,showFlag);
10514                                genRejuv(mob,E,++showNumber,showFlag);
10515                                genMiscText(mob,E,++showNumber,showFlag);
10516                                if (showFlag < -900)
10517                                {
10518                                        ok = true;
10519                                        break;
10520                                }
10521                                if (showFlag > 0)
10522                                {
10523                                        showFlag = -1;
10524                                        continue;
10525                                }
10526                                showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
10527                                if(showFlag<=0)
10528                                {
10529                                        showFlag=-1;
10530                                        ok=true;
10531                                }
10532                        }
10533                        catalogCheckUpdate(mob, E);
10534                }
10535                finally
10536                {
10537                        if(E!=mob)
10538                                CMLib.threads().resumeTicking(E, -1);
10539                }
10540        }
10541
10542        @Override
10543        public void modifyStdItem(final MOB mob, final Item E, int showFlag) throws IOException
10544        {
10545                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
10546                        showFlag=-999;
10547                boolean ok=false;
10548                while(!ok)
10549                {
10550                        int showNumber=0;
10551                        if(CMLib.flags().isCataloged(E))
10552                        {
10553                                if(CMLib.catalog().isCatalogObj(E.Name()))
10554                                        mob.tell(L("*** This object is Cataloged **\n\r"));
10555                                else
10556                                        mob.tell(L("*** This object WAS cataloged and is still tied **\n\r"));
10557                        }
10558                        if(showFlag<0)
10559                                mob.tell(L("*. Class: @x1",E.ID()));
10560                        genLevel(mob,E,++showNumber,showFlag);
10561                        genAbility(mob,E,++showNumber,showFlag);
10562                        genRejuv(mob,E,++showNumber,showFlag);
10563                        genUses(mob,E,++showNumber,showFlag);
10564                        genMiscText(mob,E,++showNumber,showFlag);
10565                        if (showFlag < -900)
10566                        {
10567                                ok = true;
10568                                break;
10569                        }
10570                        if (showFlag > 0)
10571                        {
10572                                showFlag = -1;
10573                                continue;
10574                        }
10575                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
10576                        if(showFlag<=0)
10577                        {
10578                                showFlag=-1;
10579                                ok=true;
10580                        }
10581                }
10582                catalogCheckUpdate(mob, E);
10583        }
10584
10585        @Override
10586        public void modifyArea(final MOB mob, final Area myArea, final Set<Area> alsoUpdateAreas, int showFlag) throws IOException
10587        {
10588                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
10589                        showFlag=-999;
10590                boolean ok=false;
10591                while(!ok)
10592                {
10593                        int showNumber=0;
10594                        if(showFlag<0)
10595                                mob.tell(L("*. Class: @x1",myArea.ID()));
10596                        genName(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10597                        if(myArea instanceof BoardableShip)
10598                                genDisplayText(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10599                        genDescription(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10600                        genAuthor(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10601                        getTheme(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10602                        genClimateType(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10603                        myArea.setAtmosphere(genAnyMaterialCode(mob,"Atmosphere",myArea.getAtmosphereCode(),true,++showNumber,showFlag));
10604                        genTimeClock(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10605                        genPlayerLevel(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10606                        genParentAreas(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag,alsoUpdateAreas);
10607                        genChildAreas(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag,alsoUpdateAreas);
10608                        genSubOps(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10609                        genAreaBlurbs(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10610                        if(myArea instanceof GridZones)
10611                        {
10612                                genGridLocaleX(mob,(GridZones)myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10613                                genGridLocaleY(mob,(GridZones)myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10614                        }
10615                        if(myArea instanceof AutoGenArea)
10616                        {
10617                                promptStatStr(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag,"AutoGen Xml File Path","GENERATIONFILEPATH");
10618                                promptStatStr(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag,"AutoGen Variables (VAR=VAL format)","OTHERVARS");
10619                        }
10620                        if(myArea instanceof SpaceObject)
10621                        {
10622                                final SpaceObject spaceArea=(SpaceObject)myArea;
10623                                genSpaceStuff(mob,spaceArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10624                        }
10625                        genBehaviors(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10626                        genAffects(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10627                        genImage(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10628                        for(int x=myArea.getSaveStatIndex();x<myArea.getStatCodes().length;x++)
10629                                myArea.setStat(myArea.getStatCodes()[x],prompt(mob,myArea.getStat(myArea.getStatCodes()[x]),++showNumber,showFlag,CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(myArea.getStatCodes()[x])));
10630                        if((showFlag<=0)||((showFlag>=showNumber)&&(showFlag<=showNumber+7)))
10631                        mob.tell(L("*** Area Economics settings: "));
10632                        genCurrency(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10633                        genEconomics1(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10634                        genEconomics2(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10635                        genEconomics3(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10636                        genEconomics4(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10637                        genEconomics5(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10638                        genEconomics6(mob,myArea,++showNumber,showFlag);
10639                        if (showFlag < -900)
10640                        {
10641                                ok = true;
10642                                break;
10643                        }
10644                        if (showFlag > 0)
10645                        {
10646                                showFlag = -1;
10647                                continue;
10648                        }
10649                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
10650                        if(showFlag<=0)
10651                        {
10652                                showFlag=-1;
10653                                ok=true;
10654                        }
10655                }
10656        }
10657
10658        @Override
10659        public AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping modifyAllQualifyEntry(final MOB mob, final String eachOrAll, final Ability me, int showFlag) throws IOException
10660        {
10661                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
10662                        showFlag=-999;
10663                final Map<String,Map<String,AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping>> map=CMLib.ableMapper().getAllQualifiesMap(null);
10664                final Map<String,AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping> subMap=map.get(eachOrAll.toUpperCase().trim());
10665                AbilityMapper.AbilityMapping mapped = subMap.get(me.ID().toUpperCase());
10666                if(mapped==null)
10667                        mapped=CMLib.ableMapper().makeAbilityMapping(me.ID(),1,me.ID(),0,100,"",true,false, true,new Vector<String>(),"",null);
10668                boolean ok=false;
10669                while(!ok)
10670                {
10671                        int showNumber=0;
10672                        mob.tell(L("* Ability Mapping for @x1",me.ID()));
10673                        mapped.qualLevel(prompt(mob,mapped.qualLevel(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Qualifying Level: "));
10674                        mapped.autoGain(prompt(mob,mapped.autoGain(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Auto-Gained: "));
10675                        mapped.defaultProficiency(prompt(mob,mapped.defaultProficiency(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Def. Proficiency: "));
10676                        mapped.extraMask(prompt(mob,mapped.extraMask(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Qualifying Mask (?): ", true, CMLib.masking().maskHelp("\n\r", "disallow")));
10677                        mapped.originalSkillPreReqList(prompt(mob,mapped.originalSkillPreReqList(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Required Skills (?): ", true, "Space delimited list of Ability IDs.  " +
10678                                        "Put a required proficiency level in parenthesis after the Ability ID if desired.  " +
10679                                        "For example: Skill_Write Skill_Trip Skill_Dirt(25) Hunting"));
10680                        if (showFlag < -900)
10681                        {
10682                                ok = true;
10683                                break;
10684                        }
10685                        if (showFlag > 0)
10686                        {
10687                                showFlag = -1;
10688                                continue;
10689                        }
10690                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
10691                        if(showFlag<=0)
10692                        {
10693                                showFlag=-1;
10694                                ok=true;
10695                        }
10696                }
10697                return CMLib.ableMapper().makeAbilityMapping(mapped.abilityID(), mapped.qualLevel(), mapped.abilityID(), mapped.defaultProficiency(), 100, "", mapped.autoGain(), false, true,
10698                                CMParms.parseSpaces(mapped.originalSkillPreReqList().trim(), true), mapped.extraMask(), null);
10699        }
10700
10701        @Override
10702        public void modifyManufacturer(final MOB mob, final Manufacturer me, int showFlag) throws IOException
10703        {
10704                if((showFlag == -1) && (CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.EDITORTYPE)>0))
10705                        showFlag=-999;
10706                boolean ok=false;
10707                while(!ok)
10708                {
10709                        int showNumber=0;
10710                        final String newName=prompt(mob,me.name(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Name: ");
10711                        if(!newName.equals(me.name()))
10712                        {
10713                                CMLib.tech().delManufacturer(me);
10714                                me.setName(newName);
10715                                CMLib.tech().addManufacturer(me);
10716                        }
10717                        me.setEfficiencyPct(CMath.div(prompt(mob,Math.round(me.getEfficiencyPct()*100),++showNumber,showFlag,"Efficiency % (50-150): "),100.0));
10718                        me.setReliabilityPct(CMath.div(prompt(mob,Math.round(me.getReliabilityPct()*100),++showNumber,showFlag,"Reliability % (0-100): "),100.0));
10719                        me.setItemMask(prompt(mob,me.getItemMaskStr(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Item Mask (?): "));
10720                        me.setMinTechLevelDiff((byte)prompt(mob,me.getMinTechLevelDiff(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Min Tech Diff: "));
10721                        me.setMaxTechLevelDiff((byte)prompt(mob,me.getMaxTechLevelDiff(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Max Tech Diff: "));
10722                        if(me.getMaxTechLevelDiff()<me.getMinTechLevelDiff())
10723                                me.setMaxTechLevelDiff(me.getMinTechLevelDiff());
10724                        me.setManufactureredTypesList(promptCommaList(mob,me.getManufactureredTypesList(),++showNumber,showFlag,"Manufact. Types: ",
10725                                        "Choices: "+CMParms.toListString(TechType.values()),CMEVAL_INSTANCE,TechType.values()));
10726                        if (showFlag < -900)
10727                        {
10728                                ok = true;
10729                                break;
10730                        }
10731                        if (showFlag > 0)
10732                        {
10733                                showFlag = -1;
10734                                continue;
10735                        }
10736                        showFlag=CMath.s_int(mob.session().prompt(L("Edit which? "),""));
10737                        if(showFlag<=0)
10738                        {
10739                                showFlag=-1;
10740                                ok=true;
10741                        }
10742                }
10743        }
10744}
